description:
Lierac Arkéskin The Menopause Night Cream is specially formulated for nighttime, to target the needs of skin during menopause. That said, this moisturizer helps restore density, firmness, nutrition, and comfort to the skin during this period. For this purpose, this product resorts to an exclusive formula that arose from a scientific discovery. During menopause, the reduced estradiol levels affect the skin's circadian rhythm. In turn, this accelerates skin aging. With this in mind, the formula features the Synchro+ Night complex that works to synchronize the skin's biological rhythm. This complex comprises a Bio-Peptide that rebalances the skin's night rhythm and Hyaluronic acid to deeply hydrate the skin.
As a result, this moisturizer restores the skin's regeneration process during the night and intensely nourishes the skin. As such, the skin is intensely nourished, plumped, and protected. Furthermore, with a creamy texture, this moisturizer melts on the skin and delivers instant comfort. In conclusion, night after night this moisturizer visibly improves aging signs.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Lierac Arkéskin The Menopause Night Cream to the face and neck in the evening routine.

description:
Martiderm Acniover Restoring Cream 40ml (1.3 fl oz) is designed specifically to address the needs of skin that has been sensitized by drying acne treatments. With this in mind, this product stands out due to its intensive moisturizing properties, repair capabilities, and soothing effects. At its core, this cream focuses on re-establishing the skin's barrier function, which is crucial for maintaining skin health and resilience. By doing so, it significantly contributes to the skin's overall comfort and well-being. An essential component of its formula is the inclusion of a Smart Moisturizing Active. This ingredient improves skin hydration efficiently. Beyond simply providing moisture, it offers a comforting effect, which is particularly beneficial for skin that has been left dry or irritated by drying treatments. Prebiotics also play a pivotal role in this formulation as they help balance the skin microbiota.
As a result, after using this product, 93% of users report a reduction in skin dryness. Furthermore, 80% of users describe a soothed skin feel post-application, indicating the cream's efficacy in calming irritation and providing a comforting sensation. In summary, this product offers deep moisturization, repairs, and soothes skin that has been sensitized by acne treatments whether topic or oral ones.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Martiderm Acniover Restoring Cream 40ml (1.3 fl oz) to clean, dry skin of the face.

description:
Chasin' Rabbits All About Glow Tone Up Cream 50ml (1.69floz) is a versatile skincare product designed to brighten the skin while delivering intense moisture. In other words, enriched with a unique blend of ingredients, it offers intensive moisturization. That said, the cream is adept at enhancing the skin's radiance through hydration, contributing to a more even and luminous skin tone. One of the key ingredients in this cream is niacinamide, with brightening properties. Another important inclusion in the formula is a white flower complex that delivers a burst of moisture, contributing to the overall nourishment and hydration of the skin. In addition, apple mint leaf and cypress water add a refreshing touch of moisture.
Thanks to these properties, this product stands out as a multifunctional product. In summary, it is suitable for those looking to enhance their skin’s moisture, and radiance. In addition, beyond its primary use on the face, this cream is also an excellent choice for brightening darker areas of the body, such as the knees, elbows, and armpits.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Chasin' Rabbits All About Glow Tone Up Cream 50ml (1.69floz) to the face or body areas.

description:
Esthederm Eau Cellulaire Moisturizing Fresh Moisturizing Gel 40ml (1.3 fl oz) is an energizing care that protects and strengthens the skin. That said, this moisturizer features an exclusive formula with clinically proven efficacy. On one hand, the formula features the renowned Eau Cellulaire patent which is able to mimic the natural water on the skin, having high affinity and efficacy. In this way, it boosts skin hydration while providing antioxidant protection. Then, Skin Notox technology protects the skin against pollutants whereas Aquaporine patent boosts skin hydration. As a result, this moisturizer provides the skin with optimal hydration and comfort while keeping it protected from daily aggressions such as pollution and stress that can contribute to the appearance of dullness, dark spots, and aging signs.
Suitable for all skin types but ideal for combination to oily skin, this product has a lightweight gel texture that offers a refreshing sensation and is easily absorbed. Moreover, it works well as a makeup base. All in all, this moisturizer helps to preserve the skin's youthfulness by protecting it against the harmful effects of environmental aggressions and boosting its hydration.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Esthederm Eau Cellulaire Moisturizing Fresh Moisturizing Gel 40ml (1.3 fl oz) to clean, dry skin of the face, neck, and décolleté.

description:
Erborian Yuza Cure 25ml (0.89floz) is a superb moisturizer that rescues your skin in just 14 days! Infused with the power of Yuzu, this product is a great shot of vitality for the skin. In fact, the formula combines three Yuzu extracts. Firstly, it contains Yuzu fermented extract, rich in vitamin C and polyphenols, that provides potent antioxidant properties to help protect the skin and helps even the skin tone. Then, Yuzu water is rich in minerals whereas Yuzu oil is rich in fatty acids, thus nourishing the skin and reinforcing the skin barrier. In addition, the formula resorts to two depigmenting ingredients. Hexylresorcinol reduces melanin production while Sea Daffodil extract blocks melanin transfer to the surface. In this way, these ingredients work together to help reduce the appearance of dark spots. And last but not least, the formula features Squalane and Niacinamide to strengthen the skin barrier.
All in all, this moisturizer helps reduce the appearance of dark spots and reinforces the skin barrier in 14 days. With an incredible texture, it restores comfort to the skin and recovers its luminosity!
how_to_use:
How to use
First, take the spatula and fold it accordingly to the instructions. Then, place it on Erborian Yuza Cure 25ml (0.89floz) and mix well for ten seconds until the product gets a creamy and slight yellow appearance. Apply this product to clean, dry skin of the face morning and evening for 14 days.

description:
La Roche-Posay Hydraphase HA UV SPF25 Rich Moisturizer 40ml (1.35 fl oz) is a moisturizer that both hydrates and protects the skin at the same time. Firstly, this product features a hydrating formula to lastingly moisturize the skin. This is because it stars Hyaluronic acid of natural origin, which is a famous ingredient known to deeply moisturize and plump the skin. Secondly, the formula also features La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water with soothing and moisturizing benefits. As a result, this product provides lasting hydration for 72 hours as well it leaves the skin plumper and more radiant. At the same time, this moisturizer also features sun protection with an SPF25, therefore protecting against UVA and UVB rays. Besides, its antioxidant composition helps protect from oxidative stress.
In particular, this moisturizer has a rich and non-sticky texture, being ideal for normal to dry skin, even sensitive skin. It leaves the skin immediately feeling comfortable and supple. In conclusion, this rich moisturizer provides optimal hydration and protection in a single step! In other words, it's a practical product to include in your morning routine, guaranteeing your skin is hydrated and protected.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous amount of La Roche-Posay Hydraphase HA UV SPF25 Rich Moisturizer 40ml (1.35 fl oz) in the morning to clean, dry skin.

description:
Garnier Hyaluronic Aloe Moisturizing Jelly Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a moisturizer specifically for the evening routine. This night cream allies a hydrating formula with an amazing texture for outstanding results. First and foremost, the 98% natural-origin formula features Hyaluronic acid and Aloe vera. Both ingredients are well-known for their moisturizing qualities and like so, they work together to intensely hydrate the skin and, consequently, replump it. Then, this moisturizer has a refreshing and fast-absorbing gel texture that just leaves the skin feeling fresh and lightweight. Equally important, you can use this product as a night moisturizer every day, or as a night mask for a hydration boost.
With proven effectiveness, this moisturizer keeps skin hydrated for up to 48 hours. And in four-week time, it visibly improves skin luminosity and reduces signs of fatigue. As a last note, this moisturizer has a vegan formula containing no animal-origin ingredients. In conclusion, suitable for all skin types, this hydrating jelly is a great moisturizer to fight dehydration and fatigue signs overnight.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Garnier Hyaluronic Aloe Moisturizing Jelly Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) to clean, dry face. Use it in the evening routine. Alternatively, use it as a mask, apply a thick layer, and leave it on overnight.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description: Babé Healthy Aging+ Multi Action Cream For Mature Skin has a unique formula designed to fulfill the needs of mature skin. While fighting aging signs, such as wrinkles and loss of density, it also protects and provides comfort to the skin. Having the ability to enhance cell turnover and boost collagen production, due to the presence of Centella asiatica and Lactic Acid, it has a deep firming effect helping densify the skin structure and restore its contours. In addition, with a nourishing complex, its smooth and silky texture deeply hydrates and nourishes, helping strengthen the skin barrier and providing comfort to the skin. Replenishing and comforting it lends you a smoother, luminous and younger look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Babé Healthy Aging+ Multi Action Cream For Mature Skin onto cleansed and dry skin both morning and evening. Gently massage until fully absorbed.

description: Weleda White Mallow Baby Derma Face Cream Fragrance-Free is a gentle face cream, suitable for baby’s hypersensitive dry skin, that provides comfort and soothing effect. In fact, a peaceful, smiling baby is all a mother and father want. Unquestionably, proper care with face delicate skin is something important for the baby's well-being. For that reason, Weleda launched this mild cream, enriched with white mallow, pansy, and nourishing oils such as sweet almond and coconut. Although it has no added fragrance, the beeswax will provide the skin a honeyed natural scent. Additionally, it creates a mildly resistant layer that protects from harmful environmental influences.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Weleda White Mallow Baby Derma Face Cream Fragrance-Free with a very gentle massage until full absorption. Besides, it is suitable for sensitive, dry and atopic adult skin.

description:
Clarins Hydra-Essentiel [HA²] Silky Cream SPF15 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a hydrating and antioxidant cream that quenches normal to dry skin. For this purpose, this new formula features a Hyaluronic Power Complex that provides a triple action thanks to a Hyaluronic acid duo combined with Leaf of Life extract. Consequently, this moisturizer immediately hydrates and re-densifies the skin for a smoother complexion. Equally important, it also provides long-term hydration, and day by day the skin is fortified and visibly more hydrated. In this way, this moisturizer plumps and smoothes the skin while also providing a luminous complexion and reducing the appearance of fine lines. It is ideal for everyone who struggles with dehydrated skin. As an additional benefit, this product contains an SPF15 to simultaneously provide protection from ultraviolet radiation.
In addition to these hydrating benefits, the texture and scent will captivate your senses. With a fresh and creamy texture, this moisturizer restores immediate comfort in normal to dry skin. In conclusion, this product is the perfect ally to keep the skin healthy and luminous all day.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins Hydra-Essentiel [HA²] Silky Cream SPF15 50ml (1.7 fl oz) to the face and neck in the morning routine.

description: B-Lift Age Supreme Rich Lifting Complex Face cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is the ideal anti-aging care for dry skin. This cream is fast absorbing and works on deep and superficial wrinkles, with a rich formula that provides a tightening effect. As a result of the presence of a 5% peptide solution of Acetyl Octapeptide-3, a molecule capable of decreasing contractions of the muscles of the face, the cream creates a relaxing effect on the skin. In addition to its lifting effect, this peptide also visibly reduces expression wrinkles, contributing to a youthful appearance. At the same time, the action of the peptide solution is enhanced by the presence of other equally important ingredients, such as Hyaluronic Acid which deeply hydrates the skin keeping it that way for a long time.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply B-Lift Age Supreme Rich Lifting Complex Face cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) in the morning and/or in the evening on a previously cleansed face. Then, massage gently until the skin absorbs the cream completely. Avoid contact with the eyes. The B-Lift Lifting Cream is ideal as a make-up base.

description:
NUXE Crème Fraîche de Beauté 48h Moisturizing Plumping Cream is a moisturizer ideal for normal skin. To that end, this formula combines Sweet Almond Plant Milk and Oil and “Hyaluronic-like” Red Seaweed Extract together with Wheat and Wood Sugars. On one hand, the combination of Sweet Almond Plant Milk and Oil retains water deep inside the skin and consequently softens the skin and provides long-lasting moisture. On the other hand, the presence of a “Hyaluronic-like” Red Seaweed extract boosts and extends hydration for up to 48 hours. Combined with Wheat and Wood Sugars results in a unique and ultra-hydrating texture.
Another key point of this range is its fragrance. In this case, the product has notes of Orange Blossom, Petitgrain, and Cedar. Furthermore, this formula contains 97% of natural origin ingredients while respecting the skin's microbiome. In conclusion, its velvety texture plumps and hydrates the skin. It not only leaves the skin comfortable and smooth but also feeling light and plumped.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Crème Fraîche de Beauté 48h Moisturizing Plumping Cream in the morning and/or evening to the face, neck, and décolleté.

description:
Missha Super Aqua Ultra Hyalron Gel Cream 70ml (2.37fl oz) has a watery gel texture and a renewed hypoallergenic formula free of 20 irritated chemicals perfectly designed to hydrate dry and sensitized oily skin. That said, this new formula has 10 types of Hyaluronic Acid that, in essence, offer the skin 100 hours of persistent hydration. In other words, by having molecules of different weights, this component easily penetrates into several layers of the epidermis, providing each one with powerful long-lasting hydration. In the end, the skin is visibly restored, more radiant and with a more glowy complexion.
On the other hand, this composition also has a blend of Xylitol and Glucose that optimizes the circulation of water on the skin, therefore strengthening the structure of the epidermis. In particular, these two act on the outer surface of the skin, thus preventing moisture from evaporating. Finally, Ceramide NP acts on the middle layer of the epidermis as it holds the skin tissues together and forms a protective layer to also prevent moisture loss. At the same time, it shields your complexion from damage caused by environmental threats. In this way, this renewed formula guarantees effective hydration to the skin, keeping it healthy for a long time.
how_to_use:
How to use
After washing the face, apply an appropriate amount of Missha Super Aqua Ultra Hyalron Gel Cream 70ml (2.37fl oz) to the skin of your face. Gently spread the product then lightly tap on the skin until it is fully absorbed. Use this cream as the last step of your skincare routine.

description:
Revolution Skincare Retinol Overnight Moisture Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) is an extremely hydrating night cream perfect for all skin types. Specifically, this fast-absorbing cream has hard-working ingredients that make it perfect for fighting signs of age like wrinkles and fine lines. In turn, the skin not only looks rejuvenated but also repaired and revitalized. At the same time, the face ends up with a more uniform tone and texture, while the skin gains greater comfort as it is soothed and much smoother. All this while you're in your beauty sleep!
Regarding its composition, this cream has 0.1% Retinol as its main ingredient. In turn, this works on the skin of your face, smoothing and reducing signs of age such as wrinkles and fine expression lines. In addition, it works to even out the skin, also helping to decongest and prevent the formation of blemishes. It is also important to mention that as it contains a relatively low percentage of this ingredient, this cream can perfectly be used in conjunction with other retinol products. Furthermore, the presence of Bisabolol, a natural soothing active, helps to reduce redness and irritation, making it perfect for use in combination with Retinol. Moreover, Rosehip Seed Oil, rich in Vitamin C, brightens and hydrates the complexion while Trans-Retinoic Acid soothes mature or problematic skin types.
All in all, this cream makes the complexion more refined as well as evens out its tone. In turn, the signs of age are smoothed and prevented as the skin gains a new, perfect illuminating radiance. Finally, the skin is firmer, smoother, soothed and even more hydrated and nourished.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Revolution Skincare Retinol Overnight Moisture Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) at night to clean, dry skin. Use one pump and gently massage into your skin in circular outward motions. Avoid direct contact with eyes. This product may increase your skins sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility to sunburn, so use a sunscreen as required.

description:
Noreva Iklen+ [Pure-C-Reverse] Night Care 50ml (1.69fl oz) has the ability to restore skin elasticity, firmness and radiance overnight. In this way, this cream provides a sublime care suitable for all types of mature skin. In this sense, it also helps to smooth and prevent signs of age such as wrinkles and fine lines. At the same time, the skin ends up looking more rejuvenated and with a radiant and sublime luminosity, all during your beauty sleep. Finally, the skin also gains a hydration boost that becomes suitable and necessary even for mixed or oily skins.
Regarding the composition of this night cream, the main star is Pure Vitamin C. This, in turn, brightens the entire complexion of the face while preventing and protecting the skin from the common signs of aging. In addition, biometric Hyaluronic Acid provides enormous hydration and a boost of firmness throughout the night. Furthermore, both Vitamin PP and Resorcinol reduce skin hyperpigmentation and limit the appearance of skin blemishes. Finally, the X-light present contains a gentle illuminating and exfoliating action for all skin types. All in all, this night cream not only smoothes and prevents signs of age, but also gently cares for the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Noreva Iklen+ [Pure-C-Reverse] Night Care 50ml (1.69fl oz) to clean, dry face every evening. You can apply after Noreva Iklen+ Booster Serum for a more intense and prolonged effect.

description:
NUXE Merveillance Lift Concentrated Night Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) is a night firming cream perfect for more mature skin. Specifically, this formula enriched with 97% natural ingredients has an anti-wrinkle action while also firming the skin. At the same time, this cream strengthens the skin's barrier leaving it more hydrated and restored, all during your beauty sleep. In turn, when you wake up, your skin will feel fresher and healthier as if you had slept an additional two hours. Furthermore, this cream has a floral fragrance with notes of white musk, magnolia, and freesia for a luxuriously sensorial nighttime experience.
The composition of this night firming cream is enriched with Micro-Algae Oil with high concentrations of actives. This specifically consists of microscopic green algae with high regeneration abilities. In turn, this strengthens the skin's protective barrier so that it is restored, more revitalized, and with incredible radiance. At the same time, the skin gains a new firmness, which leads to a smoothing of wrinkles and fine lines present on the face. Furthermore, the large percentage of Squalane intensely hydrates the skin leaving it nice and smooth without being heavy or greasy. Still in this hydrating aspect, Shea Butter also hydrates the skin while calming any sensation of discomfort or redness.
All in all, this vegan anti-aging firming cream allows you to wake up with refreshed and energized skin. In addition, the skin is visibly more repaired, smoothed and wrinkles are corrected. Finally, the skin's new firmness gives it a rejuvenated appearance while its entire natural protective barrier is effortlessly strengthened.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Merveillance Lift Concentrated Night Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) at night to clean, dry skin of the face, neck and décolleté.

description:
NUXE Merveillance Lift Firming Velvet Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) is a firming cream with a velvety effect perfectly designed for normal to dry skin. In this sense, this cream enriched with 97% of ingredients of natural origin has a firming action on the skin leaving it more toned and rejuvenated. In this way, wrinkles and fine lines end up being fuller and less visible while the skin gains an lifted effect. At the same time, this daily cream leaves the skin with a tendency to be dry with a velvety and smoother touch. Any discomfort such as tightness or scaling on the skin is also instantly stopped. This is because this cream also has a great moisturizing and nourishing capacity that fills the skin leaving it silky and voluptuous. Last but not least, this cream has a floral fragrance with notes of white musk, magnolia, and freesia for a luxuriously sensorial experience.
Furthermore, the composition of this anti-aging cream is enriched with firming activating properties. Specifically, Micro-Algae Oil with high concentrations of actives provides a strong regenerating action. In turn, this ingredient strengthens the skin's protective barrier so that it is restored, revitalized and radiant. At the same time, the skin gains a new firmness, which leads to a smoothing of wrinkles and fine lines present on the face. Furthermore, this cream has a high moisturizing and nourishing action, namely due to the presence of vegetable oils and Squalane. The latter intensely hydrates the skin leaving it perfectly soothed and smoothed. It also provides a silky touch without leaving the skin heavy or greasy. In turn, the presence of Sunflower Oil moisturizes and improves the damaged or irritated skin barrier.
In short, this vegan firming daily cream provides a much more firmed, rejuvenated and hydrated appearance for normal to dry skin. Wrinkles and fine lines become plumper and smoother, and the skin gains a new smoothness. In addition, its velvety texture leaves the skin much more soothed and comfortable throughout the day.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Merveillance Lift Firming Velvet Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) in the morning to clean, dry skin of the face, neck and décolleté.

description: Nivea Refreshing Day Cream 24h Moisture SPF30 nourishes and soothes the skin thanks to a soft-textured yet nutritive formula. Thus, a small portion is enough to minimize the appearance of early aging signs, protecting against UV-induced damage such as photo-aging or dark spots. In fact, this option is enriched with SPF30, preventing further issues that may arise from prolonged sun exposure. At the same time, Vitamin E as well as other anti-oxidants awaken your complexion, refreshing it as much as possible. Finally, suitable for normal skin types, this option is dermatologically approved and should be applied 20 minutes before direct contact with the sun. For extra protection, make sure to wear a hat as well as sunglasses when going outside!
how_to_use:
How to use
Before applying the Nivea Refreshing Day Cream 24h Moisture SPF30, cleanse the skin as well as possible. Then, massage a small amount of the formula all over your face, about 20 minutes prior to sun exposure. Finally, avoid direct eye contact and wait until the skin absorbs the cream completely.

description: Nivea Nutritive Day Cream - Dry and Sensitive Skin SPF15 increases dry skin's resilience, smoothing deeply thanks to Shea Butter. Besides, it relies on high-quality antioxidants to add further nourishment that lasts for 24 hours. In fact, this rich yet quick-absorbing day cream also contains SPF15 to shield vulnerable areas from harmful solar rays. To intensify results, match this option with the same brand's Rich Regenerating Face Night Cream. Dermatologically tested, a small portion is capable of healing parched skin sections, performing a recharging action. To the same extent, your face will be less prone to oxidative stress as this moisturizes enhances one's defensive barrier.
how_to_use:
How to use
Before applying the Nivea Nutritive Day Cream - Dry and Sensitive Skin SPF15, cleanse your face as well as possible. Then, spread a suitable portion all over the face, delicately massaging the formula in circular/upward motions. Make sure to avoid direct contact with the eye area and wait until the skin absorbs the formula completely!

description:
Filorga Skin-Unify Illuminating Even Skin Tone Cream is a daily moisturizer that helps prevent and reduce the appearance of dark spots. It enhances the overall appearance of the skin helping even out and illuminate the complexion for a brighter and unified appearance. Inspired by three aesthetic medicine techniques it contains a powerful triple-action formula. It has an anti-dark spot action, inspired by laser treatment, that helps to prevent and reduce dark spots and hyperpigmentations. It has an even skin tone action, inspired by peels, that helps even out and unify the skin tone. And it also has an illuminating action, inspired by medical strobing technique, that deeply hydrates and plumps the skin leading to a radiant and smoother appearance. As an added benefit, it also contains soft-focus agents that help even out the skin and instantly illuminate the complexion.
With a smooth texture, that leaves an ultra-comfortable finish on the skin, this moisturizer takes care of your skin while stimulating your senses. Combining a powerful formula with a pleasant sensorial experience, it is ideal to not only prevent and reduce the appearance of dark spots but also instantly illuminate the complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Filorga Skin-Unify Illuminating Even Skin Tone Cream both morning and evening onto previously clean and dry skin. Gently massage it over the skin of the face, neck and décolleté until fully absorbed. Always use sunscreen in the morning to help prevent further pigmentation.

description:
Mizon Multi Function Formula All in One Snail Repair Cream is a daily moisturizing cream suitable for all skin types. In addition, it is a cream with several actions as it is indicated to treat wrinkles and fine lines, acne marks and is also repairing and regenerating. This way, your skin has less visible aging signs as well as less marks and blemishes left by acne. Furthermore, the skin is much more hydrated, soothed, smoothed and looking firmer and rejuvenated. Its formula is easily spread on the skin, quickly absorbed and does not leave the skin sticky or oily.
For all these actions to be successful, this cream is enriched with 92% Snail Mucin extract. This component helps repair the skin while deeply moisturizing it. Moreover, it is thanks to it that this cream is able to repair from dry patches, acne breakouts to signs of aging. In addition, this moisturizer also contains Dimethicone and Adenosine, two ingredients that enhance the action of repairing and protecting the skin. In short, this cream is ideal for many types of skin problems. It repairs, regenerates, moisturizes and protects your skin so you can look more rejuvenated and radiant than ever.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mizon Multi Function Formula All in One Snail Repair Cream to your clean, dry skin on your face and neck. Gently massage the product until absorbed.

description:
Australian Gold Smooth Faces Hypoallergenic Facial Intensifier is a tan intensifier that was specially developed for sensitive skin. Hypoallergenic and fragrance-free, this product is perfect to help you achieve a glowing sun-kissed look while taking care of your skin. The gentle and nourishing formula is able to promote melanin production, but that's not all this product can do; it also delivers multiple caring benefits, so your skin will benefit from much, much more than a radiant tan.
The innovative Clear Complexion Complex, which is present in this formula, works as a pH balancer, helping to draw impurities from the skin to promote a smooth and flawless complexion. Simultaneously, a Firming Blend targets loss of firmness and dullness, while a combination of vitamins neutralizes free radicals and counteracts the effects of environmental stress. Last but not least, the Australian Gold Smooth Faces Hypoallergenic Facial Intensifier provides an immediate beautifying effect due to the presence of a lightweight mattifying polymer. All things considered, this is the perfect product to keep you company during the summer: it will work well as a tan intensifier, a moisturizer, and even a primer!
how_to_use:
How to use
Use the Australian Gold Smooth Faces Hypoallergenic Facial Intensifier as your daily moisturizer or as a primer. Apply a generous amount on the skin of your face and neck, massing for even distribution.

description:
Clarins Extra-Firming Neck & Décolleté Care is an anti-aging neck cream that minimizes wrinkles, skin slackening, and dark spots. Because the skin of the neck and bust is very delicate, it is where the first signs of aging become visible. As such, it is important to pamper this area with specific products; these should not only target age-related imperfections, but actively boost the resilience of the skin.
This plant-powered formula utilizes the latest innovation from Clarins, which consists of an exclusive combination of sunflower extracts: unsaponifiables from the seed and auxins from the stem). This sunflower-based firming complex lends greater flexibility to the skin; as a result, it allows it to bend and rotate without creasing as you move throughout the day. As the skin grows more resistant, it forms fewer wrinkles and creases, so it is able to remain smooth for longer. Other natural plant extracts, such as oat sugars, promote this effect by gently lifting and tightening the skin, creating the appearance of firmer, sharper facial contours.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins Extra-Firming Neck & Décolleté Care after your usual day or night cream. Warm a small amount of product between your palms, then apply to the clean and dry skin of the neck and décolleté. Massage gently from the chin down in order to stimulate absorption. Because the lightweight formula absorbs easily, you will be able to dress immediately after application.

description:
Uriage Toléderm Control Soothing Care is a facial cream that soothes and protects the skin at the same time. Suitable for all skin types that seek comfort, this texture is airy and replenishes the skin from the first application. It is ideal for sensitive skin and actively works to improve the condition of intolerant, hyper-reactive and allergic skin.
Featuring 94% of natural ingredients, this formula not only contains Uriage thermal water but also algae polyuronides and plant squalane. Uriage thermal water - naturally rich in mineral salts and trace elements - contributes to soothe the skin and helps to relieve discomfort. At the same time, algae polyuronides work to protect, soothe and calm irritated skin. Equally important, plant squalane, with Ecocert certificate, contributes to protect, hydrate and soothe the skin without harming the environment. Each application contributes to soothe and calm sensitive and irritated skin, all the while working to strengthen the skin barrier. Day after day, the skin feels more comfortable and looks healthier.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Toléderm Control Soothing Care onto both clean and dry skin. Massage it gently from the center of the face outwards in order to improve absorption.

description:
Sensilis Eternalist A.G.E. [Day Cream] Anti-Glycation Cream is a facial cream that provides the skin with comfort and repairs visible signs of aging. The texture is nourishing and provides immediate and long-lasting comfort to dry to very dry or mature skin. 
In order to visibly reduce wrinkles and rejuvenate the skin, the cream offers the skin complete and replenishing ingredients. To begin with, an anti-glycation complex prevents the degradation of collagen and elastin all the while boosting skin's elasticity and tone. Equally important, Lupinus albus seed extract helps to boost collagen production, redensifies and improves the tone and firmness of the skin. At the same time, hyaluronic acid helps to reduce the loss of water and favors its absorption, contributing to increasing skin hydration levels while pentavitin not only hydrates and smoothes the skin but also reduces flaking and itching. This comfortable moisturizer leaves the skin feeling soft and supple every morning. Day after day, it improves collagen synthesis, smoothing and correcting deep wrinkles while redensifying and improving radiance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Sensilis Eternalist A.G.E. [Day Cream] Anti-Glycation Cream onto the skin of the face and neck. After cleansing and applying your favorite facial serum, massage it gently onto the face and neck.

description:
Mádara Time Miracle Age Defence Day Cream delivers strong hydration while also awakening skin cells, towards higher levels of performance. On the one hand, the innovative ingredients behind this nourishing, anti-aging cream form a protective barrier that blocks impurities. On the other, the Cellular Bio-Complex is filled with anti-inflammatory properties that detoxify your complexion, allowing pores to breathe better. Meanwhile, it enables natural collagen production. More precisely, the extracts of 7 Northern Plants not only moisturize but also work towards frequent cell renewal, strengthening the skin. Plus, the multi-molecular Hyaluronic Acid noticeably reduces aging and fatigue indicators, whether circumstantial or genetic. In a heartbeat, you'll obtain a brighter, jovial look, complete with defined facial contours and a satisfying push-up effect. 
Morever, you'll outsmart environmental aggressions and wave goodbye to daily stress having fewer concerns. Besides the fantastic, long-lasting end results, Mádara tests its products in an in-house lab and has an admirable low waste policy. Indeed, to preserve the brand's mission of transparency and sustainability, the founders put great effort into extracting natural resources consciously. From an ethical standpoint, achieving optimal results with their products is as relevant as fighting for the planet's well-being. Thus these vegan, cruelty-free cosmetics made with fewer chemicals and affordable for all ages embrace a noble cause. Finally, smooth, luminous, and supple skin is just a few applications away, overcoming aging factors.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mádara Time Miracle Age Defence Day Cream every day after cleansing and drying the areas you want to focus on. Then, spread a generous portion and massage delicately as you move your hands in circular, upwards motions. Wait until the cream is fully absorbed and then proceed to other cosmetics of the Time Miracle range for great, faster results. Alternatively, add two or three drops of your favorite Custom Actives concentrate into the cream to boost its effects. Suitable for facial skin, as well as neck and cleavage areas.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Classic Moisturizing Night Cream provides an intense and instant anti-wrinkle action and extra-firmness throughout the night. Thus, this night cream penetrates the skin through its rapid absorption leaving it protected, hydrated and more toned while you sleep. In addition, this formula provides advanced anti-wrinkle efficacy by filling them, moisturizing the skin and visibly smoothing it.  
The formula of this day cream is enriched with Advanced Pro-Retinol which helps to improve the structure of the epidermis and promote its regeneration. In this way, this formula reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines of expression while reducing dark spots as well at night. In addition, this cream is enriched with Fibrelastyl, a firming complex to help reinforce skin elasticity for firmer skin. All in all, it provides long-lasting hydration, leaves the face firmer and smoother while plums the skin filling fine lines and wrinkles. It is also suitable for all skin types looking for a younger, smoother looking skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Classic Moisturizing Night Cream every night on a perfectly cleansed face and neck using circular motions for better absorption. Avoid eye area.

description: La Roche-Posay Pure Vitamin C Light Anti-Wrinkle Firming Filler is an anti-aging care specially formulated for the needs of normal to combination skin, including sensitive. This new image replaces La Roche-Posay Redermic C Anti-Wrinkle Normal-Combination Skin, the previous version with the same exact formula. Made with a blend of powerful anti-aging ingredients, such as Mannose and Hyaluronic Acid, this cream combats signs of aging such as wrinkles, fine lines, and a dulling complexion. The fresh and lightweight texture absorbs quickly and leaves the skin feeling soft and silky to the touch. In addition, it significantly reduces visible redness and evens out the complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply La Roche-Posay Pure Vitamin C Light Anti-Wrinkle Firming Filler onto the clean and dry skin. Then, massage gently onto the face and neck to improve absorption. It also works as an excellent make-up base.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Laser X3 Day Care Cream SPF20 is an intensive anti-wrinkle cream that will renew your complexion. Its enriched formula with 3% of Pro-Xylane™ a patented active ingredient penetrates deeply into the skin and energizes the molecules accountable for protecting the skin against water loss by reinforcing the extracellular matrix. By doing so, this cream will keep your skin moisturized and will minimize its natural aging signs. Also, the LHA present in its composition confers exceptional exfoliating properties, which will lift off dead skin cells to renew, refresh and smooth the complexion thus resulting in a radiant, unified appearance. The mix of both active ingredients leads to a smoother, revitalized and rejuvenated look.
This daily cream helps reduce wrinkles and tones the skin while restoring its density. Its dermatologically tested formula is suitable for sensitive skin. Furthermore, the SPF20 in its formulation protects against damaging UV rays, which will avoid new skin discolorations. All in all, the skin tone is visibly illuminated, the thin lines and overall wrinkles are attenuated and the complexion rejuvenated.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Laser X3 Day Care Cream SPF20 every morning after cleansing the complexion. Massage into the skin of both face and neck in circular motions.

description: ISDINCEUTICS A.G.E. Reverse Day Facial Remodelling Cream is suitable for normal to dry skin and has triple antiaging action: anti-pollution, remodeling and anti-glycation. This product acts like an anti-pollution shield thanks to Exo-P, a novel peptide that protects against environmental hazards by not letting them adhere to the skin, combating free radical action and reducing tha damaged caused by hydracarbonates. At the same time, Syn-Hycan fights loss of firmness and helps rebuild collagen and elastin.
ingredients: Not found

description:
Sensilis Upgrade [Day Cream] Firming Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) is a day cream ideal to help fight aging signs on sensitive skin. For this purpose, its unique formula contains powerful antiaging ingredients and technology that provide immediate and long-term benefits. On one hand, Oat Polysaccharides provide an immediate lifting effect. On the other hand, a blend of Red Rice, Soy extract, and Chrysanthemum extract, reinforce and stimulate collagen production. So, day after day, it will enhance elasticity and firmness and smooth fine lines and wrinkles. Additionally, this moisturizer has a luxurious texture that envelops the skin with comfort, thus being ideal for normal to dry skin.
Besides, Sensilis always formulates with sensitive skin in mind. So, all these benefits are possible with a formula that has the utmost respect for sensitive skin. All in all, it helps improve skin firmness with an immediate firming effect in 15 minutes. Besides, it visibly reduces wrinkles and improves skin hydration day after day. As a result, the skin is smoother and younger-looking.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sensilis Upgrade [Day Cream] Firming Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) in the morning to clean and dry face, neck, and décolleté. Massage with outwards and upwards movements.

description:
Esthederm Sensi System Calming Cream is fluid cream for hyperreactive skin types that progressively increases tolerance to external threats. Thanks to its unique formula, this option gradually boosts the skin's resilience levels, reducing discomfort, redness, and tightness. Thus, even the most vulnerable skin sections become less sensitive over time, in turn being extra receptive to other skincare products. In fact, the innovative Sensi and Time Control Systems unite in order to minimize premature aging and fatigue signs, alleviating stressed complexions.
At the same time, the brand's exclusive Cellular Water boosts skin cell's vitality, refreshing as well as preserving a more youthful appearance. Meanwhile, through daily applications, you'll end up maximizing the efficiency of other beneficial alternatives. Finally, besides a wonderful selection of powerful yet gentle ingredients, the cream's fluid texture provides the perfect finishing touch. Choose this dermatologically approved option and pamper your sensitive skin, ending irritation definitively.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a nice portion of Esthederm Sensi System Calming Cream to the face and neck in the morning and evening. Perform a gentle massage with your fingertips distributing the formula as evenly as possible by drawing circular as well as upward motions. Use this soothing option by itself or apply right after the Esthederm Cellular Concentrate Fundamental Serum Skin Perfector. Make sure your face/neck is clean and dry before using the product and allow it to penetrate by doing little pressure, protecting more vulnerable sections.

description: Vichy Normaderm S.O.S. Sulphur Anti-Spot Paste was specially formulated for acne-prone skin helping dry out localized imperfections while soothing the skin. Containing 10% Sulphur, it has the ability to absorb excess sebum and help accelerate the spot maturation process due to its bacteriostatic and keratolytic properties. Also, the Glycolic Acid in its formula, provides a gentle peeling effect helping remove dead cells and stimulate cell renewal for a fresher and purified skin. In addition, because it also contains Niacinamide, it helps reduce itching and discomfort. With a unique formula that has anti-inflammatory, bacteriostatic, exfoliating, keratolytic and soothing properties it is perfect to quickly help reduce the size, height and redness of the pimple during night time. Furthermore, with a precision applicator, it is also very practical and easy to apply.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Vichy Normaderm S.O.S. Sulphur Anti-Spot Paste in the evening, onto clean and dry skin directly on the affected area. If you need to apply it in the morning wait for the product to dry and apply sunscreen after.

description:
Sensilis Peptide [AR] HD Lifting & Soothing Sorbet Cream 50ml (1.69floz) is specifically formulated to deliver immediate lifting effects, enhance skin firmness and elasticity, and provide intense hydration for sensitive skin. For that purpose, the formula features a 6% high-definition peptide solution that targets firmness, elasticity, and wrinkles. The addition of organic salts further supports the production of collagen and elastin. The balm also features L-Ornithine encapsulated in ionosomes, which contributes to the skin's firmness and volume. Furthermore, hyaluronic acid offers hydrating properties while CM-Naringenin-Chalcone calms sensitive skin. As a result, this balm helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles and provides lifting and firming actions. At the same time, its ability to reduce skin temperature by up to 3 degrees Celsius within a minute of application adds a soothing and calming effect.
In fact, this product is suitable for use after medical-aesthetic procedures and even for those with rosacea. The creamy, fast-absorbing sorbet texture is designed for normal to combination skin types. In summary, this moisturizer offers a comprehensive approach to anti-aging and skin sensitivity management.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sensilis Peptide [AR] HD Lifting & Soothing Sorbet Cream 50ml (1.69floz) to the face and neckline, morning and evening.

description:
Sensilis Peptide [AR] HD Lifting & Soothing Sorbet Balm 50ml (1.69floz) is specifically formulated to deliver immediate lifting effects, enhance skin firmness and elasticity, and provide intense hydration for sensitive skin. For that purpose, the formula features a 6% high-definition peptide solution that targets firmness, elasticity, and wrinkles. The addition of organic salts further supports the production of collagen and elastin. The balm also features L-Ornithine encapsulated in ionosomes, which contributes to the skin's firmness and volume. Furthermore, hyaluronic acid offers hydrating properties while CM-Naringenin-Chalcone calms sensitive skin. As a result, this balm helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles and provides lifting and firming actions. At the same time, its ability to reduce skin temperature by up to 3 degrees Celsius within a minute of application adds a soothing and calming effect.
In fact, this product is suitable for use after medical-aesthetic procedures and even for those with rosacea. The ultra-rich, fast-absorbing sorbet texture is designed for normal to dry skin types. In summary, this moisturizer offers a comprehensive approach to anti-aging and skin sensitivity management.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sensilis Peptide [AR] HD Lifting & Soothing Sorbet Balm 50ml (1.69floz) to the face and neckline, morning and evening.

how_to_use: Not found

description:
Avène Cicalfate+ Multi-Protective Skin Repair Cream SPF50+ 30ml (1.01floz) expertly blends skin repair with protection against a broad spectrum of sun rays, including UVB, UVA, and HEV blue light. This product specifically addresses the needs of irritated skin that is exposed to the sun, enhancing skin repair while preventing hyperpigmentation and the risk of scarring. That said, the cream features an innovative repairing complex, [C+-Restore], combined with Avène's patented TriAsorB photoprotection system. These active ingredients work synergistically to soothe and repair sensitive, irritated skin, providing an optimal environment for skin regeneration. Clinical studies have shown that it reduces the repair time by 4 days, ensuring quick recovery for damaged skin. Additionally, this cream is dedicated to protecting the skin from further damage by shielding it from solar radiation.
Its formula also helps improve the appearance of red marks and prevent hyperpigmentation, with studies indicating a 34% reduction in red marks after three weeks of use. Moreover, the product maintains skin hydration for 24 hours, thereby promoting a feeling of comfort. It is rigorously tested for high tolerance on sensitive and irritated skin, including post-minor dermatological procedures and on tattooed skin, ensuring excellent cutaneous and ocular tolerance. In summary, this product offers a solution for skin repair and protection, suitable for both face and body.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

[C+-Restore] is an active repairing postbiotic obtained from Aqua Dolomiae, a unique bacteria found in Avène Thermal Spring Water. This ingredient promotes skin repair since it has a beneficial effect on the skin's microbiome;
TriAsorb™ protects not only from UVA and UVB rays but also from high-energy visible light often referred to as "blue light".
Avéne Thermal Spring Water calms and soothes irritated skin, immediately relieving signs of discomfort.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Avène Cicalfate+ Multi-Protective Skin Repair Cream SPF50+ 30ml (1.01floz) twice a day and massage until full absorption. This product does not replace the use of sunscreen.

description:
Babé Aloe Vera Gel brings the perfect balance of hydration, soothing, and refreshing to your skincare regimen. Indeed, this product features Aloe vera to deliver amazing benefits. These ingredient's moisturizing and soothing benefits are complemented by betaine, panthenol, and chamomile extract. As a result, the formula delivers immediate soothing effects, targeting areas of irritation and reducing redness. One of the standout features of this product is its gel texture that absorbs fast and doesn't leave a sticky finish. At the same time, its texture provides quick relief and an instant refreshing feeling.
Whether you’ve spent a day in the sun, undergone shaving or waxing, or simply need a burst of freshness, this product is your go-to. The cooling and calming effects of aloe vera make it an ideal after-sun treatment, helping to alleviate sunburn and discomfort. For those who shave or wax, the gel acts as an excellent soothing agent, reducing inflammation and promoting skin repair. In short, this gel is ideal for sensitive or irritated skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Babé Aloe Vera Gel to clean, dry skin and massage until complete absorption.

description:
SVR Palpebral Anti-Irritation Protection Balm 30ml (1floz) particularly addresses the needs of sensitive and irritation-prone skin, including the eye area and face. This protection balm offers a comprehensive solution to soothe, repair, and protect very dry skin or skin that is prone to atopic eczema. For that reason, the formula features a rich blend of ingredients, including hyaluronic acid, omegas, borage oil, vegetable butter, and patented ceramides AD complex. These ingredients work together to effectively combat redness, irritation, itching, and dryness, ensuring long-lasting comfort. At the same time, this balm has the ability to protect against external aggressors like pollution, mites, and hard water. It's dermatologically tested and has a rich, fragrance-free texture that melts into the skin, providing immediate relief without leaving any sticky residue.
The effectiveness of this balm is clinically proven, with immediate soothing effects and protection that lasts all day. In just 24 hours, users experience significantly less redness, dryness, and itching. Long-term use leads to a noticeable reduction in flare-ups and an anti-recurrence effect that extends up to 48 hours. Its versatility is another great highlight! It is suitable for the whole family, from babies to adults, and for the entire face, eye contour, and eyelids.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply SVR Palpebral Anti-Irritation Protection Balm 30ml (1floz) daily to the face, eye contour and eyelid. For redness and severe dryness and itching, apply a thick layer as a mask.

description:
NUXE Prodigieuse Boost Night Recovery Oil Balm 50ml (1.7oz) is a luxurious skincare solution particularly designed to rejuvenate your complexion overnight. For that purpose, this moisturizer harnesses the power of nature to deeply moisturize and help skin recover while you rest. As a result, you wake up to facial features that appear more relaxed, a complexion that looks fresher, and skin that feels rested and rejuvenated. The combination of Jasmine flower and Calendula flower extracts makes for an antioxidant-rich formula, that neutralizes free radical damage and protects against oxidative stress. Moreover, the inclusion of macadamia oil contributes to deeply nourishing the skin.
But the formula's standout feature is its unique sensoriality. It features an oil balm texture, which envelops the skin in a soft cocoon, providing intensive hydration without leaving a greasy finish. To enhance the sensory experience, this night balm is imbued with a fresh scent characterized by notes of jasmine and pink lychee. This delightful fragrance adds an element of luxury to your nightly skincare routine, making it a truly indulgent ritual that you look forward to each evening.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Prodigieuse Boost Night Recovery Oil Balm 50ml (1.7oz) to the face, neck, and décolleté in he evening routine.

description:
Mizon Intensive Firming Solution Collagen Power Lifting Cream is an intensely moisturizing cream suitable for your face. Its formula is indicated for a more mature skin that suffers from some signs of age such as wrinkles and fine lines. In this way, this cream helps not only to prevent but also to fight these already existing signs. The skin is then more hydrated, smoothed, regenerated and more plumped. Furthermore, fine lines and wrinkles are much less visible as the skin becomes firm and more elastic.
For these benefits to be successful on the skin, this cream contains 75% of Marine Collagen in its composition. This ingredient provides the skin with a deep hydration and firming effect thus helping to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. On the other hand, it also has Hyaluronic Acid, a blend of Organic Argan Oil and Adenosine. In the end your skin becomes firm, nourished and much more hydrated. It is also dermatologically tested and has no alcohol, fragrance and essential oils, making it ideal for all skin types. Additionally, this small size is ideal for you to carry this product with you at all times, specifically during your holidays.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a little amount of Mizon Intensive Firming Solution Collagen Power Lifting Cream  to your face. Gently pat with your ring finger until the product is absorbed into the skin.

description:
NUXE Nuxuriance Ultra The Global Anti-Aging Cream 50ml (1.7floz) is particularly formulated to address the comprehensive needs of aging skin. At the core of this cream is ALFA [3R] technology which harnesses the power of three key ingredients: alfalfa seed extract, hyaluronic acid, and Hemerocallis fulva extract. These components work synergistically to provide a comprehensive anti-aging action. It revitalizes, renews, and resurfaces the skin. As a result, this cream helps reduce wrinkles, remodel the facial contour, and improve skin firmness. After just one month of consistent use, 90% of women confirmed that their facial features appeared more toned, 76% observed their wrinkles smoothed out, and an impressive 96% felt their skin was firmer.
This product stands out not only for its formula but also for its unique sensorial experience. The creamy texture suits all skin types while its modern and elegant feminine scent enhances the application experience. In summary, this cream offers a global anti-aging action to visibly correct the main signs of aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Nuxuriance Ultra The Global Anti-Aging Cream 50ml (1.7floz) to the face, neck, and décolleté.
Notes
This product has a new packaging and formula.

description:
NUXE Nuxuriance Ultra The Global Anti-Aging Rich Cream 50ml (1.7floz) particularly addresses the comprehensive needs of aging dry to very dry skin. At the core of this cream is ALFA [3R] technology which harnesses the power of three key ingredients: alfalfa seed extract, hyaluronic acid, and Hemerocallis fulva extract. These components work synergistically to provide a comprehensive anti-aging action. It revitalizes, renews, and resurfaces the skin. After a month of regular application, 81% of women reported their skin appeared plumped, 71% noticed a reduction in visible wrinkles, and another 71% felt their skin was more toned.
This product stands out not only for its formula but also for its unique sensorial experience. The rich and creamy texture is perfectly suited for dry to very dry skin types while its modern and elegant feminine scent enhances the application experience. In summary, this cream offers a global anti-aging action to visibly correct the main signs of aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Nuxuriance Ultra The Global Anti-Aging Rich Cream 50ml (1.7floz) to the face, neck, and décolleté.
Notes
This product has a new packaging and formula.

description:
Clarins Multi-Active Glow Boosting Day Cream 50ml (1.69floz) specifically meets the demands of skin exposed to the stresses of daily life. With 91% ingredients of natural origin, this smoothing and radiance-boosting formula features the [Skin Charger Complex], a dynamic duo of niacinamide and sea holly extract. This powerful combination works diligently to reduce the visible signs of aging and fatigue, enhance skin radiance, and smooth its texture. Additionally, the cream is enriched with revitalizing teasel extract, which energizes the skin, and strawberry tree extract, known for its ability to refine skin texture and minimize the appearance of pores. In addition, the formula contains Clarins exclusive Anti-Pollution Complex to protect the skin from environmental aggressions such as pollution and blue light.
Furthermore, the quick-absorbing texture melts in the skin, leaving an invigorating feel that is perfect to suit the needs of all skin types. And equally important, the fragrance of this cream is specially designed to relieve stress, featuring an energizing scent. In summary, this day cream offers an anti-aging action to revive skin luminosity, smooth wrinkles and refine skin texture.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, take a small amount of Clarins Multi-Active Glow Boosting Day Cream 50ml (1.69floz) and warm the product between your palms. Then, apply light pressing motions to the face and neck, starting from the center of the face outwards.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Bright Reveal Anti-Spot Cream SPF50 50ml (1.69 fl oz) is a moisturizer specifically designed for the needs of hyperpigmented skin, that provides sun protection at the same time. To begin with, this moisturizer contains niacinamide as its main ingredient. This ingredient is well-known for its multiple benefits, including its brightening properties and its ability to help reduce dark spots. Therefore, it plays a crucial role in evening out the skin tone and reducing the appearance of dark spots. Additionally, the cream also contains UV filters, including Mexoryl 400, offering high protection against both UVA and UVB rays. This dual action offers a comprehensive approach to dark spots by offering a targeted approach but also sun protection which can aggravate dark spots. Moreover, the cream's moisturizing complex hydrates and softens the skin, lending the skin smoothness and suppleness.
Overall, this moisturizer goes beyond simple hydration and protection. It visibly reduces dark spots, illuminates the complexion and evens out the skin tone. The result is a complexion that looks uniformly youthful and radiant. In summary, this cream allies sun protection with niacinamide to fight dark spots, leaving the skin looking smooth, supple, and radiant.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Bright Reveal Anti-Spot Cream SPF50 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to the face and neck in the morning.

description:
Frezyderm Ac-Norm Spot Care 15ml (0.5floz) is a fast-acting, tinted gel uniquely formulated for the treatment of blemishes on oily, acne-prone skin. This product stands out for its innovative blend of ingredients, encapsulated in microspheres. This delivery system ensures a prolonged and gradual release of the active ingredients, thereby offering long-lasting effects without causing skin irritation. At the heart of the formula is salicylic acid, renowned for its sebum-regulating and keratolytic properties that help unclog pores. The inclusion of this ingredient makes this product an excellent choice for those struggling with comedones (blackheads and whiteheads) as well as pimples and papules. Additionally, the presence of Camelia sinensis in the gel ensures that acne-causing bacteria are combated effectively while also soothing inflammation. Moreover, zinc sulfate reduces excess sebum while equally minimizing skin inflammation.
Another key aspect of this product is its tinted beige texture with sheer coverage, designed to be universally suitable for all skin color tones. It provides a camouflage effect that visibly covers blemishes.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Frezyderm Ac-Norm Spot Care 15ml (0.5floz) on localized blemishes once or twice a day.

description:
Dr. PawPaw Your Gorgeous Skin Hydrating Day Cream 45ml (1.52 fl oz) is a versatile skincare solution that meets the hydration needs of all skin types. This day cream is distinguished by its unique formula that provides the benefits of its hero ingredient, Papayaluronic™. In detail, this ingredient harnesses the nourishing and soothing properties of papaya extract, alongside a potent blend of eight types of hyaluronic acids. The incorporation of multiple hyaluronic acids in the cream's formulation is a key feature, enabling it to penetrate deeply into the skin. This comprehensive absorption ensures that the skin receives hydration not only on the surface but also at deeper levels, thus promoting long-lasting moisturization. The result of this deep penetration is instantly soft skin that remains hydrated throughout the day.
Moreover, one of the standout features of this cream is its lightweight and fragrance-free composition. The cream's texture is designed to melt into the skin effortlessly, ensuring quick absorption. The cream also plays a role in enhancing skin radiance and has rejuvenating properties, contributing to a more youthful and vibrant skin appearance. In summary, this moisturizer provides deep hydration, nourishment, and protection to the skin, all while being suitable for various skin types and preferences..

How to use
Apply Dr. PawPaw Your Gorgeous Skin Hydrating Day Cream 45ml (1.52 fl oz) to the skin and massage into the face and neck until complete absorption.

description: Noreva Cicadiane Soothing Repairing Care SPF50+ provides optimal sun protection and limits post-scarring hyperpigmentation. Moreover, this product is fragrance, alcohol, silicone and oil-free, containing hyaluronic acid, zinc, and copper, which means it rapidly hydrates and repairs the skin’s barrier after various types of damage such as small injuries, skin irritation and sensitivity, as well as after cosmetic or surgical procedures. Also, this cream has a non-sticky texture, leaving no white traces. With its SPF50+, it also provides sun protection not only against UVB but, with the addition of Tinosorb S and Uvinul A Plus, it also protects against UVA. Additionally, it can be used by infants, children, and adults.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Noreva Cicadiane Soothing Repairing Care SPF50+ in the affected area before sun exposure. Repeat every two hours.

description:
This gift set contains the following products:

1x L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Classic Hydrating Smoothing Serum 30ml
1x L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Classic Moisturizing Day Cream 50ml


L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Classic Hydrating Smoothing Serum is a hydrating and anti-aging serum that helps fight signs of aging, such as wrinkles and loss of firmness. In fact, the formula boasts adenosine, a known anti-wrinkle ingredient. Moreover, it features Fibrelastyl, a firming complex that helps reinforce skin elasticity, giving the skin a boost of firmness. This serum leaves an immediate hydrating and smoothing effect, while working to plump the skin, fight wrinkles, and enhance the skin's firmness.

L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Classic Moisturizing Day Cream  provides an intense and instant anti-wrinkle action and extra-firmness. Thus, this day cream penetrates the skin through its rapid absorption leaving it hydrated and more toned. In addition, this formula provides advanced anti-wrinkle efficacy by filling them, moisturizing the skin and visibly smoothing it. The formula of this day cream is enriched with Advanced Pro-Retinol which helps to improve the structure of the epidermis and promote its regeneration. In this way, this formula reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines of expression while reducing dark spots as well. In addition, this cream is enriched with Fibrelastyl, a firming complex to help reinforce skin elasticity for firmer skin. All in all, it provides long-lasting hydration, leaves the face firmer and smoother while plums the skin filling fine lines and wrinkles. It is also suitable for all skin types looking for a younger, smoother looking skin.

description:
Erborian Centella Acne Care 30ml (1 fl oz) is designed specifically for acne-prone skin or skin with blemishes. For that purpose, the formula harnesses the power of several ingredients to fight acne imperfections. Among them, Centella Asiatica, renowned for its soothing properties, takes center stage. This ingredient provides instant relief of discomfort often associated with acne and blemishes. At the same time, bakuchiol, present at 1% concentration, aids in reducing skin imperfections. Complementing this is Niacinamide at a 4% concentration, which also helps reduce the appearance of blemishes. As a result, this product visibly reduces blemishes and smooths skin texture in 14 days. Moreover, it provides immediate soothing as well as up to 24 hours of hydration.
Presenting a fresh and light effect on application, this treatment soothes the skin and aims to pave the way for a more uniform complexion. Additionally, the formula is vegan and silicone-free, with 79% of its ingredients being of natural origin. In conclusion, this fluid treatment battles acne or occasional blemishes, restoring comfort to your skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Erborian Centella Acne Care 30ml (1 fl oz) to clean, dry skin of the face.

description:
YOUTH LAB Peptides Reload First Wrinkles Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is an anti-wrinkle face cream that addresses the initial signs of aging. With its unique formula, this cream targets and slows down the appearance of aging signs. For that purpose, the formula harnesses the power of peptides. In particular, Elafin and Matrixyl® play a pivotal role in slowing down skin aging. Their combined effects boost collagen and elastin production – two essential proteins that grant our skin its elasticity and strength. As a result, the overall appearance of the skin is uplifted, wrinkles are smoothed out, and the oval of the face is reshaped. Furthermore, niacinamide complements this cream's anti-aging action by boosting skin's radiance while hyaluronic acid, panthenol, betaine, and naringenin ensure skin hydration.
Beyond its anti-aging prowess, the cream delights the senses with a refreshing aroma. And the light texture also ensures that the application process is a pleasure. It spreads evenly and is absorbed swiftly. In conclusion, this cream fights the first aging signs ensuring the skin bounces back with restored elasticity, smoothness, and a radiant glow.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply YOUTH LAB Peptides Reload First Wrinkles Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) on clean face, neck, and décolleté.

description:
Uriage Depiderm Anti-Dark Spot Intensive Care 30ml (1.01 fl oz) features a unique formula to address dark spots and uneven skin tone. At the heart of this formula is the proprietary Mela Technology that combines pea and sucrose extract, enoxolone, and Uriage thermal water. In addition, the formula integrates vitamin C and niacinamide. All these ingredients work together to combat dark spots. AHA in the formula further complements this product's effectiveness with its exfoliating properties. This intensive treatment not only corrects the appearance of dark spots but also refines the skin's texture, ultimately paving the way for a more uniform complexion.
With a fragrance-free and non-comedogenic formula, this product is suitable for all skin types, including those that are sensitive. In summary, this product helps reduce dark spots and even out the skin tone.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Depiderm Anti-Dark Spot Intensive Care 30ml (1.01 fl oz) to the face, neck, and décolleté.

description:
Ziaja Goat's Milk Ultralight Face Cream Moisturising & Smoothing SPF15 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a lightweight moisturizer that hydrates, soothes, and smooths the skin. It also provides protection against UV radiation, helping to safeguard the skin from the effects of sun exposure. The formula includes goat milk, known for its smoothing, softening, and soothing properties. This ingredient helps to maintain the skin’s natural moisture, ensuring it remains supple and healthy. Additionally, the cream contains a mannuronic acid derivative, which aids in preserving collagen production. So, this helps maintain firmer, more elastic skin, reducing the visibility of signs of aging such as wrinkles.
This product also contains UV filters that deliver medium protection against sun radiation, offering an SPF of 15, which also helps prevent photoaging. Lastly, this ultralight cream boasts a quick-absorbing texture that provides a satin-smooth effect, making the skin look refined and smooth, and serving as a great base for makeup. In essence, this product combines moisturizing and soothing properties with UV protection and anti-aging benefits, so that the skin stays hydrated, smooth, and protected.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Goat's Milk Ultralight Face Cream Moisturising & Smoothing SPF15 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto the skin of the face, neck, and décolleté, avoiding the eye area. Then, gently massage the skin until the product fully absorbs.

description:
Ziaja Argan Oil Revitalising Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a facial moisturizer designed to improve the smoothness, elasticity, and moisture levels of very dry skin. This cream's formula contains 95% ingredients of natural origin and features argan oil and panthenol, which deliver hydrating and soothing properties. In fact, in vivo tests showed that this product increases skin hydration by 49%. This boost in moisture helps to alleviate dryness and discomfort, leaving the skin feeling soft and supple. Additionally, the cream also works to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and prevent their formation, promoting a smoother and more youthful complexion. In addition to these, this face cream also helps soothe the skin, making it ideal for those with irritated skin due to excessive dryness, ensuring that the skin remains comfortable and balanced throughout the day.
All in all, this product is a good choice for those struggling with very dry skin. Its ability to enhance skin smoothness and elasticity, combined with its protective and soothing effects, makes it a comprehensive solution for maintaining happy and hydrated skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Argan Oil Revitalising Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto previously cleansed skin of the face, avoiding the eye area. Then, gently massage until the product fully absorbs.

description:
Ziaja Jasmine Anti-Wrinkle Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a rich cream designed for dry, mature skin. This night cream provides long-lasting hydration and nourishment, reducing skin roughness while fighting signs of aging such as wrinkles and loss of firmness. In fact, its formula contains ingredients that promote collagen production and natural skin regeneration, which help improve the appearance of wrinkles and increase skin firmness. Moreover, this cream also includes hyaluronic acid, jasmine oil, and fatty acids derived from vegetable oils, ensuring that the skin retains moisture throughout the night and providing softness and smoothness.
Last but not least, the inclusion of Japanese mandarin extract helps improve the appearance of uneven skin tone. In essence, this product delivers skincare during the night, leaving the skin hydrated and comfortable while reducing the appearance of wrinkles and improving the skin's firmness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Jasmine Anti-Wrinkle Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto the skin of face and neck. Then, gently massage until the product fully absorbs.

description:
Ziaja Manuka Tree Purifying Gently Exfoliating Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a gently exfoliating and moisturizing night cream formulated with 3% mandelic acid. Mandelic acid, an alpha-hydroxy acid, gently removes dead skin cells from the surface of the skin, unclogging pores, helping to diminish hyperpigmentation, and leaving the skin smoother. This ingredient also has antimicrobial properties, helping to prevent acne lesions. The cream also includes antibacterial manuka leaf extract, which also works to keep the skin free from blemishes. Then, the astringent properties of zinc gluconate help to control excess sebum production and reduce the appearance of enlarged pores. 
Last but not least, this cream's moisturizing components ensure that the skin remains hydrated throughout the night. All in all, this product aims to create a clearer, more refined complexion, addressing skin concerns such as acne, hyperpigmentation, and excess oil production.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Manuka Tree Purifying Gently Exfoliating Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto the skin of the face, avoiding the eye area. Then, gently massage the skin until the product completely absorbs. During the day, use sun protection.

description:
Ziaja Avocado Regenerating Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a nourishing face cream designed for dry skin. This cream intensely nourishes and relieves dryness, reducing the feeling of roughness and leaving the skin looking healthy and soft. This product's formula contains avocado oil, which is rich in vitamins, minerals, and fatty acids. This ingredient provides essential nourishment and moisture to the skin, helping to make it soft and smooth. Then, panthenol is another key component of this face cream. Panthenol helps maintain hydrated skin while also having soothing and regenerating effects, promoting a more comfortable skin feel. 
So, this cream helps to alleviate dryness and roughness, promoting a smoother and more supple complexion. It is a good option for those seeking a reliable and affordable facial cream for dry skin. Its nourishing and hydrating properties make it an excellent addition to the skincare routine, so that the skin looks healthy, feels soft, and remains well-hydrated.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Avocado Regenerating Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto clean skin of the face. Then, gently massage the skin until the product fully absorbs.

Ziaja Marigold Soothing Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a face moisturizer that soothes and protects the skin. This vegan product features calendula extract, also known as marigold, which is renowned for its soothing properties. This extract helps to calm the skin, making it ideal for those with sensitive skin. In addition to calendula extract, the cream contains a derivative of vitamin E. This antioxidant helps protect the skin from damage caused by free radicals and sun exposure, helping to maintain the skin’s health.
So, this cream nourishes and moisturizes the skin, ensuring it remains soft and supple. Its moisturizing properties help to prevent the loss of elasticity, keeping the skin smooth. Moreover, the soothing effects are particularly beneficial for those with irritated or sensitive skin, promoting a comfortable complexion. All in all, this moisturizer nourishes and hydrates the skin while offering a blend of soothing and protective benefits.

How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Marigold Soothing Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto clean skin of the face. Then, gently massage until the product completely absorbs.

Clarins My Clarins Re-Boost Hydra-Energizing Cream 50ml (1.7 oz) is particularly designed to energize and hydrate the skin, hence promoting a radiant and healthy appearance. For that purpose, at the heart of the formula lies the unique [Healthy Plant Complex], featuring coconut water and alpenrose. This complex offers nutrition and antioxidant benefits thus promoting a healthy-looking complexion. In addition, the cream includes organic goji berry extract, a component especially renowned for its energy-boosting properties. Given that, this natural ingredient plays a crucial role in revitalizing the skin, contributing to a more vibrant and energetic complexion. Furthermore, the inclusion of acerola seed extract boosts skin radiance as well. Last but not least, organic fig extract, another key ingredient in this cream, is chosen for its exceptional hydrating properties. This extract improves skin hydration, consequently contributing to the overall radiance and glow.
The texture of this product is another notable aspect. Suitable for all skin types, it boasts a light and fresh cream consistency that feels pleasant on the skin. In summary, this moisturizer energizes the skin and also provides essential hydration. As such, it meets the needs of those seeking both a healthy and radiant complexion.
