description:
APIVITA Beevine Elixir Wrinkle & Firmness Lift Cream Light Texture 50ml (1.69floz) is a carefully formulated product designed to cater to the needs of mature skin. For that purpose, this moisturizer resorts to the revolutionary patented Propolift complex, coupled with plant-based collagen. The combination of these two ingredients helps restore collagen and, consequently works to fill in wrinkles, presenting the skin with a more refined and lifted appearance. The facial contour gains more definition, appearing more toned and youthful. Moreover, hyaluronic acid in the formula ensures the skin remains supple, plump, and hydrated.
The texture of this cream is also incredible. A softly-melting, satiny consistency ensures that the product is quickly absorbed by the skin and leaves no oily feeling. What's more, the delightful scent combines top notes of blood orange, pink pepper, and quince with a floral heart of rose, jasmine, and ylang, further supported by base notes of iris, white musk, and palo santo. A true treat for the senses! It also presents responsible packaging that is 100% recyclable and contains a high percentage of recycled materials. In summary, this cream offers intense anti-aging benefits, hydration, and a rejuvenated appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply APIVITA Beevine Elixir Wrinkle & Firmness Lift Cream Light Texture 50ml (1.69floz) to clean, dry skin of the face and neckline.

description:
Corine de Farme Nourishes Day Cream With Aloe Vera Extract 50ml (1.69floz) is a hydrating day cream that brings comfort and softness to the skin. This cream not only hydrates the skin but also helps soothe any feelings of tightness and prepare the skin for makeup application. Formulated with 99% ingredients of natural origin, it is enriched with aloe vera extract, known for its moisturizing and calming properties. So, this ingredient contributes to the cream's hydrating and soothing effects.
This cream's texture absorbs easily without leaving any sticky or oily residue on the skin. This makes it a pleasure to use every morning. Additionally, the versatility of this cream extends its use beyond a daily moisturizer. It also works as a hydrating mask, offering a hydration boost whenever the skin feels in need of extra care. This dual functionality makes it a valuable addition to the skincare routine. All in all, this product offers a gentle yet effective solution for maintaining the skin's hydration and comfort.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Aloe Vera is rich in vitamins, minerals, and polyphenols. It soothes, hydrates, and supports skin repair, also having antioxidant properties.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Corine de Farme Nourishes Day Cream With Aloe Vera Extract 50ml (1.69floz) onto clean and dry skin of the face, neck, and décolleté. Then, gently massage the skin until the product fully absorbs. Alternatively, for using the product as a face mask, apply a thick layer onto the skin and then leave it on for 5 minutes. Then, remove the excess product with a cotton pad or reusable alternative.

description:
Chasin' Rabbits Green Golden Ruler Cream 100ml (3.38 fl oz) blends rich moisturization with a creamy yet well-absorbing texture. At the heart of its formula is a 67% concentration of matcha green tea, renowned for its antioxidant and soothing properties. Another key ingredient is hemp seed oil with highly nourishing properties. Moreover, probiotics in the cream's formula support a healthy skin barrier. Lastly, this formula incorporates five different forms of hyaluronic acid, an ingredient known for its exceptional moisture-binding capabilities, thus ensuring deep hydration to maintain a plump and youthful appearance.
This product stands out for its unique texture with a non-sticky and moist yogurt-like consistency, suitable for various skin types. While the cream is free from added fragrances, it possesses a fresh, natural scent derived from its plant-based components. As a last note, it is formulated as a facial and neck cream. All in all, this cream offers a pleasant texture and potent moisturization.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Chasin' Rabbits Green Golden Ruler Cream 100ml (3.38 fl oz) to clean dry skin of the face and neck.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products:

Neutrogena Bright Boost Gel Cream 50ml
Neutrogena Bright Boost Resurfacing Face Polish 75ml

Neutrogena Bright Boost Gel Cream is a multi-purpose composition that promises to ensure optimal levels of hydration while focusing on improving the skin’s radiance and smoothness levels. According to the brand, with just one week of regular use, you will enjoy a visibly improved skin tone and texture that display fewer dark spots and wrinkles. On one side, this unique gel cream is part of the Neutrogena Bright Boost™ collection - a line of products that primarily aims to brighten and revive dull and tired-looking skin. At the same time, the Neutrogena Bright Boost Gel Cream also contains a blend of Neoglucosamine® and Exfoliating Acids (AHAs, PHAs, Glycolic, and Mandelic Acid). This mix of active ingredients is responsible for plumping, exfoliating and resurfacing the skin, simultaneously. As a result, this product not only ensures a glowy and awakened complexion, but also smooth and nourished skin. 
Neutrogena Bright Boost Resurfacing Face Polish is an innovative product that provides both chemical and physical exfoliation for visibly improved tone and radiance. On one side, this formula resorts to the power of Exfoliating Acids such as Glycolic AHA and Mandelic AHA to boost cell turnover. These components are able to dissolve the tiny junctions that hold skin cells together and, therefore, eliminate dead skin that is causing dullness or fine lines. At the same time, the Neutrogena Bright Boost Resurfacing Face Polish also contains Micro-Exfoliating Spheres that equally contribute to a smoother and more glowy finish.

description:
Rilastil Hydrotenseur Rich Restructuring Anti-Wrinkle Cream 40ml (1.35 fl oz) is an anti-aging moisturizer that fights both wrinkles and lack of firmness. With this in mind, this product is especially suitable for people over 40 years old, as it targets mainly gravitation wrinkles that are typical of this age. For that purpose, the formula features a combination of Hyaluronic acid, Ceramides, Lupeol, and Miolift. To begin with, Hyaluronic acid present in the formula has three molecular weights to intensely hydrate and fill in wrinkles. Then, Ceramides help restore the skin barrier whereas Lupeol and Miolift improve skin elasticity and firmness. In this way, this moisturizer is able to reduce the appearance of wrinkles with a filling effect while hydrating and repairing the skin at the same time.
In particular, this moisturizer has a rich and dense texture, therefore being especially suitable for dry skin. As a last note, this cream is non-comedogenic and hypoallergenic. All in all, it's the ideal moisturizer to target aging signs like gravitational wrinkles as it offers a firming, filling, and repairing effect for an overall younger and plumper look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Rilastil Hydrotenseur Rich Restructuring Anti-Wrinkle Cream 40ml (1.35 fl oz) to clean, dry skin of the face and neck in the morning and evening routines.

description: HAAN Peptide Antioxidant Face Cream nourishes, hydrates and protects the skin. Due to a formula with 94,3% ingredients of natural origin that work together, this cream provides deep hydration to the skin and restores the brightness levels. Moreover, it contains peptide, an active antioxidant that tackles signs of aging and protects from pollution. On top of that, it reduces hyperpigmentation and inflammation, brightening up the complexion. As a result, this cleanser is ideal for dry skin, as the pores of dry skin are tighter, therefore causing more visible lines and less elasticity.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply HAAN Peptide Antioxidant Face Cream in the morning and/or evening to previously cleansed skin. Then, massage gently all over the face.

description:
Garnier Hyaluronic Aloe Moisturizing Jelly Day Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a daily moisturizer that fights dehydration. This day cream allies a hydrating formula with an amazing texture for outstanding results. First and foremost, the 98% natural-origin formula features Hyaluronic acid and Aloe vera. Both ingredients are well-known for their moisturizing qualities and like so, they work together to intensely hydrate the skin and, consequently, replump it. Then, this moisturizer has a refreshing and fast-absorbing gel texture that just leaves the skin feeling fresh and lightweight. Equally important, you can use this product as a day moisturizer every day, or as a mask for a hydration boost.
With proven effectiveness, this moisturizer keeps skin hydrated for up to 48 hours. And in four-week time, it brightens the skin, reduces signs of fatigue, and increases its comfort. As a last note, this moisturizer has a vegan formula containing no animal-origin ingredients. In conclusion, suitable for all skin types, this hydrating jelly is a great moisturizer to fight dehydration and fatigue signs.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Garnier Hyaluronic Aloe Moisturizing Jelly Day Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) to clean, dry face. Use it in the morning routine. Alternatively, use it as a mask and apply a thick layer, leave it on for three minutes, and then remove the excess with a cotton pad.

description:
This set contains the following products:

Nivea Refreshing 24h Moisture Day Cream SPF15 50ml
Labello Soft Rosé Lip Balm 4.8g
Nivea MicellAIR 5In1 Micellar Water Normal Skin 200ml

Nivea Refreshing 24h Moisture Day Cream SPF15 gives an instant feeling of moisture and hydration that lasts for up to 24h. The presence of Glycerin results in the ability to retain water on the skin, protect against irritation and also repair the skin barrier. On the other hand, Shea Butter is responsible for its emollient properties and for soothing the skin. And the Vitamin E in the product leads to an antioxidant activity that protects against free radicals and UV rays. With a lightweight formula, quickly absorbed through the skin, this daily moisturizer leaves the skin hydrated and with a refreshing and plumping feeling. In addition, the presence of sunscreen filters allows this product to also protect the skin against UVA and UVB. All in all, it not only deeply hydrates the skin for up to 24 hours but also refreshes, plumps and protects the skin being perfect for everyday use.
Labello Soft Rosé Lip Balm  is an iconic product that not only deeply nourishes your lips but also enhances its natural pink undertone. In fact, this unique lip balm is the perfect blend between care and beauty, leaving your lips smooth and shiny, at the same time. On one side, the incredibly hydrating benefits of this formula are able to keep your skin soft and comfortable for up to 24 hours. Like so, this lip balm not only provides instant nourishment but also prevents future dryness. Concurrently, with each application, the Labello Soft Rosé Lip Balm heightens the natural beauty of your lips, providing a soft fragrance and a delicate tone, as well.
Nivea MicellAIR 5In1 Micellar Water Normal Skin is a practical cleanser that offers five benefits in a single product. This all-in-one formula not only removes makeup but also cleanses the skin while moisturizing, without leaving any product residue, allowing your skin to breathe. Moreover, this cleanser is dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested as well as fragrance-free so it is safe to use on the face, eyes, or lips. Thanks to its micellar technology, it does not require rinsing, ensuring a practical cleansing experience for those with normal skin types.

description:

Nivea MicellAIR 5In1 Micellar Water Fragrance Free 200ml
Labello Strawberry Shine Lip Balm 4.8g

This formula not only smoothens and nourishes the skin but also shields it from external stressors. description:
Vichy Liftactiv B3 Anti-Dark Spots Cream SPF50 50ml (1.7 fl oz) combines sun protection and anti-hyperpigmentation action in one product. This day moisturizer resorts to the renowned Niacinamide, also known as vitamin B3, to act on reducing the appearance of not only dark spots but also wrinkles. At the same time, LHA resurfaces the skin, boosting the results. Equally important, the formula provides an SPF50 that protects from sun exposure and in this way, helps prevent pigmentation induced by UV radiation and also skin aging. In other words, this cream acts on reducing the appearance of aging signs such as wrinkles and dark spots.
The creamy velvety texture leaves the skin comfortable and soft, without a greasy or sticky finish. All in all, this moisturizer is ideal for those looking for a practical anti-aging product as this cream helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles and dark spots while providing sun protection at the same time.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a suitable amount of Vichy Liftactiv B3 Anti-Dark Spots Cream SPF50 50ml (1.7 fl oz) every morning to the face and neck. Avoid the eye area.

description:
This gift set contains the following products:

W7 Nourishing Skin Face Oil 30ml
W7 Good Night Glow Night Cream 50ml
Satin Eye Mask x1

W7 Nourishing Skin Face Oil nourishes the skin with powerful ingredients. That said, this formula features Retinol and Squalane which work together to take care of your skin. Firstly, Retinol is a well-known ingredient for its antiaging benefits. It boosts collagen production and consequently, reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Secondly, Squalane has anti-inflammatory properties and therefore, soothes the skin and reduces redness as well as swelling. In short, this nourishing oil adds a protective step to your skincare routine that cares for your skin and its delicate barrier. 
W7 Good Night Glow Night Cream is formulated with ingredients that will change your skincare game. On one hand, the formula contains Hyaluronic acid, a renowned ingredient for its hydrating and anti-aging properties. Because it has the ability to retain water in the skin, not only does it hydrate the skin but also plumps it. Therefore, it reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. On the other hand, this product features Retinol, an anti-aging gold standard. This ingredient boosts skin renewal and enhances collagen production. As a result, it works to reduce fine lines and wrinkles and improve firmness, elasticity, and radiance. In conclusion, this face cream is the perfect end to your day!

description:
L'Oréal Paris Wrinkle Expert Anti-Wrinkle Day Cream 45+ 50ml (1.69 fl oz) addresses the first aging signs of the skin, such as fine lines and wrinkles, and helps maintain a youthful and vibrant appearance for longer. Due to the slow down of cellular regeneration, the skin starts to lose firmness and elasticity, which also leads to less defined facial contours. This daily moisturizer directly targets these areas due to its active and all-encompassing formula. It hydrates and nourishes the skin for up to 24h while also toning the skin which, on its own, improves the appearance of wrinkles and the skin's elasticity.
Lightweight and soft, this cream leaves the skin feeling suppler with each and every use. And, when combined with its night counterpart, it will help prevent and delay the visible signs of aging while letting your inner shine and radiance come through.
how_to_use:
How to use
After cleansing the skin, apply a small amount of L'Oréal Paris Wrinkle Expert Anti-Wrinkle Day Cream 45+ 50ml (1.69 fl oz) onto the face, neck, and décolleté areas. Then, gently massage it with circular motions to improve absorption and circulation. Afterward, finish with your preferred sunscreen.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Cell Renewal Midnight Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is an anti-aging cream that resorts to antioxidants to help slow down the natural aging process. In this way, the formula features the exclusive and patented  Antioxidant Recovery Complex, comprising Neohesperidin and Vitamin E to provide powerful antioxidant properties to this moisturizer. Consequently, it protects the skin from free radical damage and thus helps prevent skin aging. Furthermore, this restorative cream helps repair the skin barrier 1,5 times faster, which also helps keep the skin protected from external aggressions. At the same time, this moisturizer greatly contributes to replenishing the skin with hydration. With an enveloping texture that melts on the skin, this moisturizer brings comfort to the skin while feeling lightweight at the same time. As a result, the skin is comfortable and smoother. 
In other words, through the power of antioxidants, the cream repairs and deeply hydrates the skin. Day after day, this moisturizer works to improve skin firmness and radiance as well as helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles. All in all, this cream repairs and hydrates the skin, promoting a younger-looking complexion.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

[Antioxidant Recovery Complex] comprises the powerful antioxidants vitamin E and Neohesperidin. Therefore, it helps protect the skin from free radical damage and prevent oxidative stress. Consequently, it promotes a fast recovery process by keeping the skin protected and thus helps the skin recover from daily aggressions.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Cell Renewal Midnight Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) both morning and evening to clean and dry face and neck.

description:
Martiderm Shots Salicylic Imperfections 20ml (0.676 fl oz) is a concentrated powerful serum specifically for skin blemishes. This new range from Martiderm combines two active ingredients to obtain a synergic effect and maximum efficacy with each drop! In this way, this shot contains a high concentration of Salicylic acid (2%) coupled with Tea Tree extract to help mattify and reduce skin blemishes for a clear purified complexion. On one hand, Salicylic acid regulates excess sebum and helps reduce skin blemishes in combination to oily skin. On the other hand, Tea Tree extract soothes the skin and further helps to reduce skin blemishes. With a fresh gel-cream texture, this shot is lightweight and easily absorbed into the skin.
Therefore, this shot purifies and balances the skin, to help reduce blemishes. In fact, in clinical studies, 100% of the test subjects say this product regulates excess sebum while 94% notice the blemishes disappear faster when used twice a day for 56 days. Furthermore, 91% notice the pores are tightened. In conclusion, this shot is a great add-on to boost your anti-blemish routine!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Martiderm Shots Salicylic Imperfections 20ml (0.676 fl oz) on the face after cleansing and before applying serum/moisturizer. Use it either in the morning or evening, or both.

How to use
Apply Uriage Eau Thermale Rich Water Cream 40ml (1.35 fl oz) onto clean and dry skin in the morning and/or evening. Use soft upward motions in order to improve absorption. Avoid contact with the eyes.

description:
Frudia Green Grape Pore Control Cream is perfect for oily skin and skin with large pores. In just one cream you will find not only sebum care and pore tightening but also a primer effect. Due to the Green Grape Extract (81%) this cream can tighten the pores and leave the skin feeling smooth and soft. Therefore, you can count on an even skin texture. At the same time, its sherbet formulation provides a cooling effect. As soon as you apply it to the skin, the creamy texture turns watery which makes it easy for the skin to absorb fast. Finally, within two weeks you can expect improvement in the levels of sebum and quantity of large pores.
Frudia is a Korean skincare brand, the result of more than 30 years of development and research. Their products make maximum use of antioxidant-rich plants and fruit extracts. The patented R VITA W technology reduces the destruction of nutrients and vitamins from the fruits used in the products so that their effects are optimized!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Frudia Green Grape Pore Control Cream at the last step of your skincare routine. Apply the appropriate amount to the affected areas. Then, spread evenly from the inside to the outside.

description:
Frudia Avocado Relief Cream is especially suitable for damaged, dry and sensitive skin. In just two weeks, this cream manages to improve the skin barrier and prevent loss of hydration. Additionally, it reduces redness caused by external aggressions. Its nutrient-rich formula of avocado extract and amino acid takes care of the skin, leaving it relaxed. 
Frudia is a Korean skincare brand, the result of more than 30 years of development and research. Their products make maximum use of antioxidant-rich plants and fruit extracts. The patented R VITA W technology reduces the destruction of nutrients and vitamins from the fruits used in the products so that their effects are optimized!
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Avocado Fruit Extract and Amino Acid are responsible for enhancing the defensive power of the skin, protecting it from the aggressions of the external environment;
Panthenol, also called pro-vitamin B5, moisturizes the skin and produces important lipids, responsible for keeping a strong skin barrier.
Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract increases skin firmness and elasticity while stimulating collagen production. Thus, it improves the condition of small wounds, regulates microcirculation, and normalizes the metabolism of the cells of connective tissues.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Frudia Avocado Relief Cream at the last step of your skincare routine. Apply the appropriate amount to the affected areas. Then, spread evenly from the inside to the outside.

description:
Frudia Blueberry Hydrating Cream is a lightweight cream with a hydration effect that lasts 48 hours. Due to its formula, rich in Blueberry Extract (77%), this moisturizer creates a moist layer that hydrates the skin without stickiness. Additionally, Betaine allows the cream to be gentle on dry skin, and Tomato Seed Oil keeps the skin healthy and vital. On top of that, this cream fortifies the skin's barrier and prevents further dehydration. At the same time, it absorbs quickly and its creamy gel texture makes it easy to spread evenly on the skin.
Frudia is a Korean skincare brand, the result of more than 30 years of development and research. Their products make maximum use of antioxidant-rich plants and fruit extracts. The patented R VITA W technology reduces the destruction of nutrients and vitamins from the fruits used in the products so that their effects are optimized!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Frudia Blueberry Hydrating Cream in the last step of the daily skincare routine, in the morning and the evening. Apply an appropriate amount to previously cleansed skin. Then pat gently until the skin fully absorbs the cream.

description:
It'S Skin Collagen Nutrition Cream+ 50ml provides a firming, replenishing and illuminating action to the skin before you go to sleep. In fact, this is a multipurpose formula that while counteracting sagginess, also leaves the skin more radiant, supple, and even. It does so, by harnessing the properties of its star ingredient – Marine Collagen.  From the scales of fish living in the depths of the sea, Marine Collagen has an identical molecular structure to collagen found in the skin of humans. As a result, its extensive list of benefits includes increased moisture and anti-aging action. Even more, the low molecular weight of this ingredient ensures fast absorption and optimal performance.
 
To complement all of this, the Collagen Nutrition Cream+ also resorts to Saussurea Laniceps Extract to achieve a more even complexion. Thanks to its replenishing and strengthening benefits, this ingredient creates a revitalized and uniform result. Lastly, the presence of Malt Extract and Bearberry Extract is responsible for providing more radiance and nourishment.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use It'S Skin Collagen Nutrition Cream+ 50ml as part of your evening routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the dry and clean skin of your face. Then, massage gently for optimal absorption.

description:
Revolution Skincare Ceramides Moisture Cream 177ml has a creamy texture designed for all skin types but is best suited to dry skin, sensitive or if your skin barrier is damaged. That said, this cream adheres effortlessly to the skin, providing a strong moisturizing and repairing action. In this case, as it belongs to a range powered by 5 Ceramides essential for building structures in the skin, this cream becomes a superhero! Namely, Ceramides become especially important when the skin barrier is damaged, the complexion is dry, irritated, or highly sensitized. In this way, this ingredient ensures that the skin barrier is protected, much more hydrated, soft and supple.
On the other hand, the presence of Hyaluronic Acid makes this cream especially moisturizing. By penetrating deeply into the different layers of the skin, it ends up making them much more hydrated, smooth, and even radiant. Furthermore, Shea butter still takes an important place in this composition by nourishing the skin in-depth, creating a feeling of comfort as a result. Finally, a slight percentage of Vitamin C helps to prevent and correct signs of aging, retain moisture in the skin and even increase the skin's luminosity. As a last note, this product has a vegan composition, fragrance-free, non-comedogenic, and hypoallergenic. It is also approved by PETA as a Cruelty Free product.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Revolution Skincare Ceramides Moisture Cream 177ml to the face morning and night. For best results use in a routine alongside the Revolution Skincare Ceramides cleanser range.

description:
Mádara Derma Collagen Night Source Sleeping Cream 70ml (2.37fl oz) is a night cream that energizes your skin while you sleep. In fact, this sleeping cream fights lines and wrinkles as well as loss of firmness. It does so thanks to a unique formula that contains biotechnologically derived natural peptides with a plumping effect. Furthermore, the formula also contains Hyaluronic acid that deeply hydrates the skin while plumping it. On the other hand, Alteromonas ferment extract and Spirulina enrich this product with anti-aging benefits. Overall, this cream promotes collagen synthesis for optimal levels of this essential matrix substance. Thus, it helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles as well as improve skin firmness.
As for the texture, this rich cream deeply hydrates and delivers comfort to the skin. In other words, this sleeping cream replenishes the skin with moisture overnight while working to fight aging signs. It lends the skin smoothness and suppleness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mádara Derma Collagen Night Source Sleeping Cream 70ml (2.37fl oz) on previously cleansed face, neck, and décolleté. Complement the routine with the other products from this range to achieve better results.

description:
YOUTH LAB Check Matte Refiller is a refill for YOUTH LAB Check Matte Solution; for this reason, it can only be used in combination with that product.
YOUTH LAB Check Matte Solution is an innovative skincare product that absorbs excess oil/sebum and creates a natural matte finish on the skin. The unique packaging contains a built-in cushion saturated with a lightweight translucent liquid that turns to powder on the skin, therefore creating a velvety soft finish. Also provided is a sponge applicator that is ideal to touch up the face throughout the day, without disturbing make-up or previous skincare products. At the same time, this product provides more than just the benefits of a blotting paper: it also minimizes the appearance of enlarged pores and provides a powerful anti-inflammatory and antioxidant action. Learn more about YOUTH LAB Check Matte Solution here.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Bioderma Sensibio Defensive Rich Active Soothing Cream 40ml (1.35fl oz) was specially developed to treat and improve sensitivity through a dual-action formula that not only soothes but also fortifies the skin. In fact, the Sensibio Defensive stands out from other moisturizers by also focusing on strengthening the skin's natural resistance system. It starts by providing instant relief to issues like dryness, tightness, or discomfort, and then it improves the skin's own ability to defend itself. Therefore, you will experience both immediate and long-lasting results since the irritation vicious cycle is broken.
In other words, the Sensibio Defensive acts on the biological mechanisms responsible for sensitivity with a globalized approach. On one side, it increases the skin’s antioxidant activity and, consequently, its ability to fight external aggressors like pollution and UV rays. Even more, it replenishes lipids, enzymes, and proteins in order to create a stronger natural barrier. Last but not least, it reduces the reactivity of the skin towards multiple stimuli. 
To finish, this specific version has a rich and velvety texture that is ideal for sensitive skin that also struggles with dryness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Bioderma Sensibio Defensive Rich Active Soothing Cream 40ml (1.35fl oz) as part of your morning and evening routine as your selected moisturizer. Apply an appropriate amount to the dry and clean skin of your face. Then, massage gently for maximum absorption.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products: 
 
Holika Holika Aloe Soothing Essence 80% Moist Firming Gel Cream 60ml 
Holika Holika Aloe Soothing Essence 80% Moist Firming Gel Cream 3x20ml 
 
Holika Holika Aloe Soothing Essence 80% Moist Firming Gel Cream Set combines the power of Aloe Vera Extract and nourishing oil capsules to create a multipurpose facial cream that promises to infuse your skin with countless benefits. To begin, this product is perfect for all skin types but especially suitable for dry or sensitive skin. This happens, on one side, thanks to its ultra-moisturizing properties. After a quick absorption process, the Aloe 80% Gel Cream leaves an invisible protective barrier behind that retains moisture for a long time. Additionally, this gel-type formula also contains cooling activators. In fact, with each application, you will enjoy a soothing effect that not only counteracts irritation but also slows down the aging process and restores freshness. Lastly, the Aloe 80% Gel Cream also contributes to smoother skin, improving its texture and elasticity, at the same time. 
All of these results are possible thanks to the star-ingredient of this composition – 80% Aloe Vera Extract. This component provides numerous benefits including a moisturizing, healing and protective action. Furthermore, it has bactericidal and bacteriostatic properties, stimulates blood circulation and relieves inflammation. To complement the work of Aloe Vera, this face cream also contains Oil Capsules of Idebenone, Collagen and Peptides.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Apply Holika Holika Aloe Soothing Essence 80% Moist Firming Gel Cream Set to clean the dry skin of the face and neck as your selected moisturizer.

description: Martiderm The Originals Pro-Reg Cream 8 is an innovative, new generation anti-age night care that reduces blemishes and hyperpigmentation spots while improving the brightness, firmness and evenness of the skin. Formulated with multiple Alpha Hydroxy Acids, such as glycolic, lactic, and mandelic acids, as well as probiotics, this product softens and smoothes the skin, all the while helping it adapt to external stress. The velvety gel-in-oil texture provides a deep sensation of well-being, creating a cool, smooth, and nutritive finish over the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Martiderm The Originals Pro-Reg Cream 8 to the face, neck and neckline. Massage gently until product has been fully absorbed. Avoid contact with the eyes. Use of a high sun protection factor (SPF 50+) is recommended during the day.

description: Sensilis Supreme Renewing & Antiaging Detox Day Cream SPF15 50ml (1.69 fl oz) is a regenerative and revitalizing day cream that helps improve wrinkles and loss of firmness. Infused with Argan Oil and Chondrus crispus, this product is able to not only hydrate and regenerate the skin but also prevent the formation of wrinkles. In association with Vitamin C and E, this cream is granted great antioxidant properties. Besides, the Vitamin C also helps improve radiance and reduce the appearance of dark spots. Lastly, the combination of Glycerin, Allantoin, Hyaluronic acid, and Panthenol is responsible for the soothing, hydrating, plumping, and protective abilities of this product. Also, due to the presence of sunscreens filters, this product is capable of offering some protection against UV rays (SPF15).
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sensilis Supreme Renewing & Antiaging Detox Day Cream SPF15 50ml (1.69 fl oz) onto clean and dry skin. Use soft and upward motions to apply the product onto your skin.

description: Filorga Nutri-Filler Nutri-Replenishing Cream is an extremely nourishing cream which deeply replenishes the skin, while redefining the contours of the face. With a volume booster effect, this cream is able to reshape the facial contours and have a lifting effect, perfect for people undergoing dieting or loss of firmness due to the aging process. The nourishing texture boosts the ceramide content and is adapted to mature skin which needs lipid replenishment.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Filorga Nutri-Filler Nutri-Replenishing Cream in the morning and evening onto facial skin, neck and décolleté. This balm can be used as a neck cream for its lifting effects.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Golden Age Cooling Night Cream lifts and firms saggy skin sections, refreshing one's appearance overnight. In fact, this formula has the same benefits as the Golden Age Day Cream, relying on botanical extracts as well as skin-strengthening ingredients. Furthermore, it both softens and stimulates microcirculation for a healthier, extra polished look. Besides, this tends to alleviate feelings of tightness, cooling down the epidermis, invigorating and moisturizing mature skin tissues deeply.
To the same extent, its improved formula features Calcium B5 which adds a newfound radiance while also increasing elasticity instantly. In addition, its fortifying qualities help to maximize the skin's resilience against harmful outside influences. By diminishing visible aging/fatigue signs, this option is likely to represent personal comfort. Finally, this cream is not only effortless to apply but also leads to quick absorptions, nourishing different areas of your face.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a suitable amount of L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Golden Age Cooling Night Cream all over your face on a daily basis. Make sure you've cleaned the facial and neck areas appropriately before each application. For optimal results, spread the formula in circular as well as upward motions to facilitate absorption. Stay away from the eye contouring sections as you allow the cream to define the rest of your face. Finally, pair this with the L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Golden Age Rosy Radiant Eye Cream and its matching hydrating day cream.

description:
La Roche-Posay Toleriane Dermallergo Cream 40ml (1.35fl oz) is perfect to target and fight signs of sensitivity on normal to dry skin, thanks to its efficient globalized action. By soothing, nourishing and fortifying the skin, the Toleriane Dermallergo Cream not only reduces the various marks of irritation but also prevents relapses. As it happens, sensitivity is caused by an imbalance in the microbiome. To address that, this rich cream contains Sphingobioma, a probiotic that compensates for that imbalance and fortifies the skin's natural defenses, as well.
Additionally, the presence of Neurosensine in the composition guarantees a powerful soothing action. This ingredient reduces redness, provides relief to itching and irritation, and eliminates overall discomfort. Lastly, in order to avoid future irritation, the Toleriane Dermallergo Cream equally ensures optimal levels of hydration for up to 48 hours. Even more, it does not include alcohol or fragrance in its composition.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use La Roche-Posay Toleriane Dermallergo Cream 40ml (1.35fl oz) as part of your morning and evening skincare routine as your selected moisturizer. Apply an appropriate amount to the clean and dry skin of your face, eye contour and neck. Then, massage gently for optimal absorption.

description: NUXE Nuxuriance® Ultra Replenishing Night Cream is an anti-aging cream that is suitable for all skin types. With the powerful anti-aging innovation of the Bi-Floral Cells of Saffron and Bougainvillea, this cream helps renew the skin from within, boost firmness, reshape facial contours and smooth the wrinkles. Furthermore, due to its prolonged-release technology, the effects last for several hours and the cream has a continuous anti-aging action that replumps the skin and attenuates wrinkles. In the morning the skin looks rested and replumped. Finally, with 7 registered patents in France, this innovative range is a must have for those who are fighting advanced signs of aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Nuxuriance® Ultra Replenishing Night Cream in the evening on clean skin of the face, neck and décolleté.

description:
Benton Aloe Propolis Soothing Gel is a fresh gel moisturizer that brings comfort and relief to sensitive and irritated skin. Made with a concentration of over 80% aloe vera and propolis, this gel harnesses the soothing action of trustworthy natural ingredients to create a calming, refreshing effect on the skin. Aloe vera is a tried-and-true ingredient in the quest to minimize signs of redness and sensitivity; propolis may not be as familiar, but it's just as rich in benefits. In fact, not only can propolis contribute to soothe irritated skin, it also provides a purifying, anti-inflammatory, and antioxidant action.
With its soothing formula and fresh gel texture, this moisturizer is suitable for all skin types. However, it is particularly ideal for oily and acne-prone skin types, as they can benefit the most from the soothing and purifying properties of the propolis extract. Due to its lightweight formula, this moisturizer can also be used in multiple ways: use it as a full-face moisturizer for daily care and comfort, or apply it as a spot treatment to particularly dry and irritated areas.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Benton Aloe Propolis Soothing Gel after cleansing, toning, and/or applying specific treatment products. Dispense the gel into the palm of your hand, then smooth over the skin until absorbed. You can also stimulate absorption using soft patting motions. If you're using this product in the morning, follow with sunscreen; if you're it in the evening, it can be the last step in your skincare routine.
Please keep in mind that, depending on the original scent and color of the natural ingredients that make up the formula, this gel moisturizer may vary in appearance from batch to batch.

description:
Mádara SOS Rich Hydra-Barrier CICA Cream is a deeply moisturizing cream that immediately hydrates and calms very dry or dehydrated skin. This is an ultra-rich formula that fights dryness and all the discomfort and harm that comes with it, without leaving a greasy feeling behind. With the SOS Rich Hydra-Barrier CICA by Mádara, you will no longer experience sensitivity, redness, toughness, or taut skin. 
All of this thanks to a cocktail of moisturizing ingredients such as Hyaluronic Acid, Bisabolol, Shea Butter, and, of course, let’s not forget the star of this cream’s composition: the CICA Plant. The wonderful Centella Asiatia (CICA) is a powerful component that soothes and restores the skin delivering antioxidant properties, as well. Rich in polyphenols and triterpenes, this ingredient will leave your skin smoothed and protected.  
Besides helping to replenish instantly the skin’s level of hydration, this hydra-barrier cream goes on a step further. The Mádara SOS CICA Cream creates a protective layer on the skins that retains and locks the moisture in preventing dryness and making sure your skin stays nourished for longer.
In conclusion, the Mádara SOS Rich Hydra-Barrier CICA Cream promotes a healthy radiant skin, fully nourished and without any sign of dryness-induce discomfort or premature aging. You can use it regularly, applying it at day or night-time, or whenever your skin feels particularly stressed.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Apply Mádara SOS Rich Hydra-Barrier CICA Cream directly on the skin at day or night time following up with SPF. You can also use this product whenever your skin feels tight, dehydrated or equally exposed to extreme damaging environmental conditions.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Classic Moisturizing Day Cream SPF30 provides an intense and instant anti-wrinkle action and extra-firmness. Thus, this day cream contains UVA and UBV protection with SPF30 that penetrates the skin through its rapid absorption leaving it protected, hydrated and more toned. In addition, this formula provides advanced anti-wrinkle efficacy by filling them, moisturizing the skin and visibly smoothing it.  
The formula of this day cream is enriched with Advanced Pro-Retinol which helps to improve the structure of the epidermis and promote its regeneration. In this way, this formula reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines of expression while reducing dark spots as well. In addition, this cream is enriched with Fibrelastyl, a firming complex to help reinforce skin elasticity for firmer skin. Furthermore, the SPF30 filtering system effectively combats the rays responsible for premature skin aging and prevents the formation of blemishes. All in all, it provides long-lasting hydration, leaves the face firmer and smoother while plums the skin filling fine lines and wrinkles. It is also suitable for all skin types looking for a younger, smoother looking skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Classic Moisturizing Day Cream SPF30 every morning on a perfectly cleansed face and neck using circular motions for better absorption. Avoid eye area.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Day Cream provides anti-sagging action and combats appearance of age spots. Thus, this luxurious moisturizing cream is a source of intense hydration for mature and menopausal skin, leaving it hydrated and more elastic. After a period of daily use, age-related dark spots are reduced and the skin becomes more dense.
The luxurious formula of this cream is enriched with Collagen, one of the biggest structural components of our skin and that diminishes after menopause. In this way, this cream contains the ideal amount of this property for mature skin, helping them to reduce sagging. In addition, this moisturizer is enriched with Soya Peptides and UV filters that helps to firm facial contours. Therefore, the skin feels hydrated, smoother and more comfortable. Furthermore, the exclusive formula contains Melanin-Block that helps reduce the appearance of existing age spots while deeply moisturizing the skin. All in all, this daily cream contains a combination of properties ideal for skins with signs of aging leaving it more defined and with a softer and hydrated touch.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Day Cream every morning on the face and neck with circular movements. For best results, use the night or eye cream together.

description: Esthederm Esthe-White Brightening Youth Moisturizing Day Care is an anti-wrinkle and anti-hyperpigmentation moisturizing cream that brightens the skin and helps to erase imperfections. Specifically, this cream instantly erases imperfections and within a few weeks the complexion is clearer, the skin is protected from environmental hazards like the oxidative stress and the wrinkles are smoothed. Regarding its composition, the UV InCellium acts as a shield from pollution and other city life hazards and help protect the skin. Finally, this cream has a luxuriously velvety and refreshing texture on the skin, which merges with it until it is fully absorbed. The skin is not sticky, but is visibly more hydrated, strengthened and protected.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Esthederm Esthe-White Brightening Youth Moisturizing Day Care to the face, neck and décolleté in the morning with a gentle massage. This cream can be used for itself or in combination with the rest of the Esthe-White range.

description: Dr. Hauschka Rose Day Cream is the classic skincare solution from Dr. Hauschka for those suffering with a mature skin which shows signs of redness and sensitivity. Thanks to the botanical blend of medicinal plants, this cream is able to restore the skin barrier in order to reduce redness and hypersensitivity. In essence, this is the cream for those who are in search of nutrition and trying to minimize feelings of discomfort. Awarded multiple times, this precious rose-scented and luxurious care will envelop the skin in a protective layer, gently balancing it and providing comfort and radiance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Hauschka Rose Day Cream each morning after cleansing and toning, just after the serum.

description: Pestle & Mortar Hydrate Moisturizer is a lightweight moisturizer for all skin types, particularly those who suffer with lack of firmness, wrinkles and damaged skin. Squalane coupled with firmness-boosting peptides is able to increase the skin's collagen production, as well as providing maximum levels of hydration in order to achieve a properly balanced and radiant skin. In addition, the packaging is airless, which ensures that the formula is not degraded by contact with the atmosphere. In the long run, this fluid cream is capable of increasing the skin's firmness, increasing the skin's hydration levels and reducing the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines, thus providing a smooth and firm skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Pestle & Mortar Hydrate Moisturizer in the morning and evening as the last step in your skincare routine. In order to achieve better results, use the Pestle & Mortar Pure Hyaluronic Serum before applying this moisturizer.

description: Ducray Keracnyl Mat Cream hydrates and mattifies the skin being the perfect daily moisturizer to neutralize excess shine. Its unique formula is rich in Glycerin that helps keep the skin hydrated. Contains Mattifying Powders that can immediately reduce excess shine. Contains Monolaurin that helps regulate sebum production. And also contains X-Pressin. With both astringent and keratolytic actions X-Pressin helps reduce enlarged pores and refine the skin texture. In essence, this daily moisturizer can instantly neutralize excess shine, tighten the pores and also lend the skin a smooth and mattified finish. Excellent as a makeup base its pleasant light texture mattifies the skin for up to 12 hours and also refines, day after day, the skin texture. After 28 days of use, 98% of the users noticed excess sebum and shine were reduced and also that the surface of the skin was smoothed.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Ducray Keracnyl Mat Cream morning and/or evening to previously clean and dry skin. Apply with a gentle massage until fully absorbed. Avoid contact with the eyes. Excellent as a makeup base.

description: Erborian Ginseng Royal Supreme Youth Cream is a sumptuous anti-aging cream that targets the top 6 signs of skin aging. Infused with the properties of 6-year-old Panax ginseng, this luscious formula envelops the skin in a cocoon of youth; in a single, simple gesture, it nourishes dry skin while visibly improving the appearance by correcting wrinkles and fine lines, skin sagging, and loss of density. Furthermore, it helps even out dark spots and hyperpigmentation marks, all the while restoring radiance to dull, tired skin. Like an elixir of youth, this cream provides a global anti-aging action, thus leaving the skin with a refined appearance that radiates health and beauty.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Erborian Ginseng Royal Supreme Youth Cream to the clean and dry skin of the face and neck. Massage gently, in order to stimulate absorption.

description: Uriage Hyséac Hydra Restructuring Skincare is the perfect ally for skin that has been dried out by anti-acne treatments. Formulated with Uriage exclusive Cerasterol-2F, TLR2 REGUL and thermal water, the cream delivers the best care to repair the skin. Cerasterol-2F rebuilds and reinforces the skin barrier while Uriage Thermal Water, an all-natural ingredient, calms the skin and relieves sensations of discomfort. At the same time, Uriage patent TLR2 REGUL together with Indian fig extract soothes the skin and provides both immediate and long-lasting comfort. Each application contributes to replenish, minimize tightness, moisturize and soothe the skin to its natural comfort and health.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with, thoroughly cleanse and tone the skin. The following step is to apply Uriage Hyséac Hydra Restructuring Skincare. Massage it gently in circular motions in order to improve absorption. Avoid contact with the eyes.

description:
Evolve Multi Peptide 360 Anti-Ageing Cream 60ml (2.03fl oz) is a silky, deeply nourishing cream that provides 360º, all-encompassing care for mature and aging skin. This cream works proactively with the skin to support and promote graceful aging: not only does it correct visible signs of aging, but it also supports the structure of the skin so that it may remain healthy for longer. This product not only helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and improves firmness and radiance, but also helps restore the skin barrier and deeply hydrate the skin.
Packed with Peptides and Cacay Oil this product improves firmness, reduces the appearance of wrinkles, and restores the skin barrier, which helps lock moisture on the skin. Besides, combined with Cupuacu Butter, it enhances collagen production and improves elasticity, while also deeply hydrating the skin. In essence, this cream helps the skin age with candor and grace, making it an invaluable ally for mature skin types.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Evolve Multi Peptide 360 Anti-Ageing Cream 60ml (2.03fl oz) to the previously cleansed skin of the face and neck. Use upward circular movements in order to stimulate absorption. You may also use this product as a deeply nourishing overnight mask; simply apply a generous layer before bed, then rinse off gently in the morning.

description: Evolve True Balance Gel Cream 50ml (1.69floz) is a mattifying moisturizer specially designed to re-balance combination and oily skin types. When the skin produces excess oil, it can end up looking too shiny, with enlarged pores that disrupt the appearance of the skin texture and keep your complexion from looking its best. This lotion, with its weightless texture and comprehensive formula, will help you tackle all of those issues at once. A unique combination of natural ingredients, which includes Noni Plant Stem Cells, and Moringa Peptides, not only regulates oil production but also has anti-pollution properties. At the same time, it works to tighten the appearance of large pores and refine the skin texture, restoring uniformity to the complexion. Last, but not least, hyaluronic acid provides much-needed hydration without overloading the skin—and, as a bonus, helps you prevent the first signs of aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Evolve True Balance Gel Cream 50ml (1.69floz) to the previously cleansed skin of the face and neck. Use upward circular movements in order to stimulate absorption.

description: Filorga Lift-Structure Radiance Ultra-Lifting Rosy-Glow Fluid is a beautiful lightweight pinkish fluid that fights aging signs and restores your complexion a younger, radiant and healthy look. Starring CHROMA-YOUTH 3T Technology, this fluid corrects complexion irregularities while activating the natural pink luminosity of the skin. It is able to even out the skin tone and instantly illuminate the complexion. In addition, enriched with powerful moisturizing and anti-aging ingredients, it can also provide a tensing action, firming and redensifying the skin and smoothing out fine lines and wrinkles. All in all, with a pleasant universal rosy texture, this fluid can firm and illuminate the complexion for an even, radiant and revitalized look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Filorga Lift-Structure Radiance Ultra-Lifting Rosy-Glow Fluid in the morning, onto previously clean and dry skin. Gently massage until fully absorbed.

description:
NUXE Nuxuriance Ultra The Global Anti-Aging Cream SPF30 50ml (1.7floz) is particularly formulated to address the comprehensive needs of aging skin with the added benefit of sun protection. At the core of this cream is ALFA [3R] technology which harnesses the power of three key ingredients: alfalfa seed extract, hyaluronic acid, and Hemerocallis fulva extract. These components work synergistically to provide a comprehensive anti-aging action. It revitalizes, renews, and resurfaces the skin while the SPF30 formula guards against sun exposure. As such, this cream not only visibly corrects the main signs of aging but also protects from UVA and UVB rays. With regular use, wrinkles are smoothed for 73% of women, and the skin seems more toned for 77% of women.
This product stands out not only for its formula but also for its unique sensorial experience. The rich texture suits all skin types while its modern and elegant feminine scent enhances the application experience. In summary, this cream offers a global anti-aging action to visibly correct the main signs of aging while offering essential protection against UVA/UVB.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Nuxuriance Ultra The Global Anti-Aging Cream SPF30 50ml (1.7floz) to the face, neck, and décolleté.
Notes
This product has a new packaging and formula.

description:
Holika Holika Aloe 99% Soothing Gel is a weightless body and face moisturizer designed to alleviate irritated as well as sensitive skin. Thus, it shields one's complexion from all sorts of environmental threats, such as dehydration or harmful free radicals. Moreover, the formula is instantly absorbed and enters deeply into the epidermis, helping you to avoid greasiness. Non-sticky, its selection of natural ingredients suits all skin types and ages thanks to the healing qualities of Aloe Vera juice. In fact, not only is this option deeply hydrating but also speeds up the skin's regeneration process, sealing minor injuries.
All in all, this increases personal comfort, calming the irritation that comes after shaving and relieving the skin from burns. Besides, this gel diminishes inflammation and targets painful sunburns as well as more abrasive peelings. Within a few minutes, the skin becomes extra soft and almost feather-like due to its unprecedented refreshing finish. Finally, this skincare essential also features Lotus, Bamboo, Cucumber, Cabbage and Centella Asiatica Extracts!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous amount of Holika Holika Aloe 99% Soothing Gel directly on sensitive or dry facial and body areas. Then, wait for the gel-type formula to be completely absorbed. Finally, explore the rest of the brand's soothing as well as moisturizing options to see if these also appeal to you!

description:
Clarins Multi-Active Glow Boosting Night Cream Dry Skin 50ml (1.69floz) specifically meets the demands of skin exposed to the stresses of daily life. With 94% ingredients of natural origin, this smoothing and radiance-boosting formula features the [Skin Charger Complex], a dynamic duo of niacinamide and sea holly extract. This powerful combination works diligently to reduce the visible signs of aging and fatigue, enhance skin radiance, and smooth its texture. Additionally, the cream is enriched with an anti-aging tetrapeptide, which boosts skin renewal overnight, and strawberry tree extract, known for its ability to refine skin texture and minimize the appearance of pores. In addition, the formula contains Clarins exclusive Anti-Pollution Complex to protect the skin from environmental aggressions such as pollution and blue light.
Furthermore, the rich yet quick-absorbing texture with cocoa butter, particularly meets the needs of dry skin. And equally important, the fragrance of this cream is specially designed to improve sleep quality, featuring a soothing scent. In summary, this night cream offers an anti-aging action to revive skin luminosity, smooth wrinkles and refine skin texture.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, take a small amount of Clarins Multi-Active Glow Boosting Night Cream Dry Skin 50ml (1.69floz) and warm the product between your palms. Then, apply light pressing motions to the face and neck, starting from the center of the face outwards.

description:
Dermalogica Intensive Moisture Balance is a nourishing moisturizer for dry skin. This skin type usually lacks not only water but also lipids, so the skin barrier is compromised. In fact, when the skin barrier isn't intact, water loss happens. In this way, this moisturizer has BioReplenish Complex™ which delivers lipids to the skin, restoring the skin's lipid layer and barrier function. Furthermore, Hyaluronic acid, along with Echinacea, Centella asiatica, and Aloe vera, maintain good moisture levels. Last but not least, a prebiotic Chlorella algae complex balances the skin's microbiome which is also key to maintaining healthy skin. 
All in all this ultra-rich formula is the solution for dry skin, nourishing the skin and helping to replenish its lipid barrier.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dermalogica Intensive Moisture Balance onto clean and dry skin on both face and neck. Apply twice a day, morning and evening.

description:
Sensilis Skin Rescue [Barrier] Repair Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) visibly and deeply repairs the skin's barrier function, offering high hydration and soothing effects. It suits all types of sensitized, including those sensitive and sensitized following medical aesthetic procedures like CO2 and Q-Switched laser, IPL, microneedling, and peelings. It is also suitable for those with rosacea or redness-prone skin. For that purpose, the formula features a blend of ingredients specifically chosen for their reparative, hydrating, and calming properties. On one hand, a mixture of 5 different ceramides works to recover and strengthen the skin's barrier. Simultaneously, a combination of 4 types of hyaluronic acid provides intense hydration.
Essential fatty acids enrich the formula, nourishing the skin and enhancing its hydration and smoothness. As a result, this cream boosts skin hydration not only in the short term but also in the long term. Prebiotics are included to maintain the balance of the skin's microbiota while licorice Extract, known for its calming properties, helps in reducing redness and irritation. In summary, this lightweight cream is ideal for anyone needing to recover their skin's barrier.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sensilis Skin Rescue [Barrier] Repair Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to the face, neck, and neckline.

description:
Dr. PawPaw Your Gorgeous Skin Rejuvenating Night Cream 45ml (1.52floz) is designed to rejuvenate your skin overnight. This nourishing night-time ritual promises to firm and smooth your complexion, effectively preventing or reducing the appearance of fine lines. Its soothing and hydrating formula, infused with a calming chamomile aroma, encourages a peaceful night's sleep, ensuring you wake up to revitalized skin. The formula distinguishes itself by including the hero ingredient, Papayaluronic™. In detail, this ingredient harnesses the nourishing and soothing properties of papaya extract, alongside a potent blend of eight types of hyaluronic acids. This powerful combination ensures deep hydration, offering both instant and long-lasting moisturization. Additionally, the inclusion of retinol in the formula delivers age-renewal benefits, smoothing the skin to reduce the appearance of fine lines. Furthermore, the formula contains Aloe Vera, known for its hydrating and soothing properties.
This cream hydrates and smooths the skin while fighting aging signs. In summary, this night cream is an essential addition to your evening skincare routine, to rejuvenate, and hydrate, all while you enjoy a restful sleep.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. PawPaw Your Gorgeous Skin Rejuvenating Night Cream 45ml (1.52floz) to the face and neckline in the evening.

description:
Dr. PawPaw Your Gorgeous Skin Day Cream SPF50 45ml (1.52 fl oz) is a multifaceted skincare solution that offers protection and hydration for the skin. This vegan day cream is uniquely formulated with the innovative Papayaluronic™. In detail, this ingredient harnesses the nourishing and soothing properties of papaya extract, alongside a potent blend of eight types of hyaluronic acids. The incorporation of multiple hyaluronic acids in the cream's formulation is a key feature, enabling it to penetrate deeply into the skin, thus ensuring both immediate and long-lasting hydration. Besides that, this day cream also offers protection against the sun with an SPF50+ PA++++ rating. Additionally, vitamin E in the formula not only contributes to the nourishment and softening of the skin but also offers antioxidant protection.
The lightweight texture is another key point, granting quick absorption without leaving any white cast. Suitable for all skin types, it can be used alone or on top of your moisturizer. In summary, this day cream combines the dual benefits of advanced hydration and superior sun protection for a healthy and rejuvenated complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. PawPaw Your Gorgeous Skin Day Cream SPF50 45ml (1.52 fl oz) to the skin and massage into the face and neck until complete absorption.

description:
Mádara SOS+ Sensitive Moisturizer 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is an expertly formulated facial moisturizer designed specifically for those with sensitive, redness-prone skin. For that purpose, the fragrance-free formula features specific ingredients to provide sensitive skin with the utmost care. This organic-certified, lightweight moisturizer combines the hydrating powers of sodium hyaluronate and hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid to ensure your skin remains moisturized. At the same time, the inclusion of red algae extract provides an immediate soothing effect. Moreover, this extract helps to balance the skin's microbiome, thereby enhancing its resilience. Suitable for all skin types, especially those prone to sensitivity, redness, and reactivity, this moisturizer works to relieve discomfort and minimize the appearance of redness as well as relieve discomfort, burning, and flushing. Its dermatologically proven formula makes it a great choice for anyone looking to calm, soothe, and deeply hydrate their skin while ensuring lasting comfort.
Lastly, this product was developed in cooperation with the Finnish Allergy, Skin, and Asthma Federation. In short, this moisturizer offers calming, soothing hydration for sensitive and redness-prone skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mádara SOS+ Sensitive Moisturizer 50ml (1.7 fl oz) to clean, dry skin daily.

description:
Juice To Cleanse Vinegar Kombucha Vegan Cream 75ml (2.53 fl oz) is a versatile skincare solution that addresses a variety of skin concerns, particularly dullness, dryness, and loss of elasticity. With this in mind, one of the key ingredients in this cream is 35% Kombucha, celebrated for its anti-aging, probiotic, and antioxidant properties. Furthermore, the formula includes vegetable collagen and hydrolyzed protein which boost skin firmness and elasticity while also playing a role in moisturizing the skin. To further enhance its moisturizing capabilities, the cream features a Deep Hydration List that includes Fucoin-100, Amino 6 complex, and a patented combination of three types of hyaluronic acid. This blend ensures deep hydration of the skin, catering to its nourishment needs.
On the other hand, for skin texture improvement and complexion brightening, the cream utilizes a combination of PHA, LHA, vinegar, and apple extract. This mix offers a mild peeling effect, thus helping to refine the skin’s texture and enhance its natural brightness. In summary, this moisturizer is a comprehensive skincare product that deeply moisturizes, improves skin texture, brightens the complexion, and enhances elasticity and firmness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Juice To Cleanse Vinegar Kombucha Vegan Cream 75ml (2.53 fl oz) to clean dry skin of the face.

description:
Barr Super Green Deep Energy Cream 60ml (2 fl oz) is a lighwetight moisturizer that soothes and calms redness. To begin with, central to its formulation is a 58% concentration of organic heart leaf extract and 19% mugwort extract. These core components work synergistically to address various skin concerns, providing soothing and hydrating benefits at the same time. On one hand, heart leaf extract, with soothing properties, is particularly beneficial for skin that tends to be irritated or shows signs of redness. On the other hand, mugwort extract not only calms the skin but also plays a vital role in hydrating sensitive and acne-prone skin. Equally important, panthenol in the formula contributes to hydrating the skin while allantoin offers soothing benefits. 
The texture of the cream is also a notable aspect. Its gel-cream consistency ensures that it feels light on the skin and absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue. This makes it an ideal choice for those who prefer a moisturizer that feels light and fresh, yet is potent in delivering hydration. In summary, this cream soothes and hydrates the skin, being particularly suitable for combination to oily sensitive skin, blemish and acne prone.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Barr Super Green Deep Energy Cream 60ml (2 fl oz) to the face and neck.

description:
This gift set contains the following products:

1x Sensilis Supreme Renewing & Antiaging Detox Day Cream SPF15 50ml
1x Sensilis Supreme [Eyes] Detox Eye Contour 20ml


Sensilis Supreme Renewing & Antiaging Detox Day Cream SPF15 is a regenerative and revitalizing day cream that helps improve wrinkles and loss of firmness. Infused with Argan Oil and Chondrus crispus, this product is able to not only hydrate and regenerate the skin but also prevent the formation of wrinkles. In association with Vitamin C and E, this cream is granted great antioxidant properties. Besides, the Vitamin C also helps improve radiance and reduce the appearance of dark spots. Lastly, the combination of Glycerin, Allantoin, Hyaluronic acid, and Panthenol is responsible for the soothing, hydrating, plumping, and protective abilities of this product. Also, due to the presence of sunscreen filters, this product is capable of offering some protection against UV rays (SPF15).

Sensilis Supreme [Eyes] Detox Eye Contour is a regenerating and decongesting eye cream. Thanks to the presence of Hyaluronic Acid, Caffeine, Argan Oil, and Peptides, this cream helps fight wrinkles and expression lines, while working to reduce the appearance of eye bags. It also features reflective pigments to enhance the radiance of the eye area.

description:
Ziaja Manuka Tree Purifying Normalising Day Cream SPF10 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a light, moisturizing, and balancing cream for acne-prone skin. This vegan formula combines purifying ingredients such as antibacterial manuka leaf extract and astringent zinc gluconate. These ingredients work together to reduce acne blemishes such as pimples and blackheads, and minimize excess sebum, providing a mattifying effect. Additionally, hyaluronic acid and brown algae extract add moisturizing benefits to the cream, so that the skin remains supple and smooth throughout the day. Brown algae extract also has soothing properties, further enhanced by oleanolic acid, making the skin feel more comfortable.
In addition to its purifying and moisturizing properties, the cream contains UVA and UVB filters that deliver low sun protection with an SPF of 10. This sun protection helps to guard the skin against everyday exposure, supporting overall skin health. All in all, this cream is designed for everyday care of acne-prone skin. It not only helps reduce blemishes and control oil but also ensures the skin is well-hydrated and calm.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Manuka Tree Purifying Normalising Day Cream SPF10 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto the skin of the face, avoiding the eye area. Then, gently massage the skin until the product completely absorbs.

description:
Clarins My Clarins Re-Charge Hydra-Replumping Night Mask 50ml (1.7 oz) is a refreshing overnight mask suitable for all skin types. In detail, with a focus on rehydrating, plumping, and recharging the skin, this mask is akin to the effects of a good night's sleep. For that purpose, it features the unique Healthy Plant Complex which includes coconut water and alpenrose extract. This blend offers nutrition and antioxidant benefits thus promoting a healthy-looking complexion. In addition, the formula includes Huang Qi extract that works to fight oxidative stress and promote a radiant complexion. Furthermore, the inclusion of organic fig extract is key to providing intense hydration while organic acerola contributes to enhancing skin radiance. As a result, the skin feels fresh, supple, soft, and plumped after use, with each morning bringing a visibly enhanced complexion.
The mask's light gel-cream texture, which melts effortlessly into the skin, is particularly noteworthy. This texture provides a fresh feeling upon application and leaves a silky finish at the same time, thus making the mask both a pleasant and soothing nighttime skincare step. In summary, this mask offers a solution to recharge and rejuvenate the skin overnight.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins My Clarins Re-Charge Hydra-Replumping Night Mask 50ml (1.7 oz) to clean, dry skin of the face and neck in the evening, 1 to 3 times a week.

description:
Clarins My Clarins Pure-Reset Matifying Hydrating Blemish Gel 50ml (1.7 oz) is particularly designed for oily skin with imperfections. This mattifying gel serves as a go-to ally for managing skin shine and combating visible imperfections. To begin with, at the heart of the formula is the innovative Healthy Plant Complex, which includes coconut water and alpenrose extract. This unique blend offers nutrition and antioxidant benefits thus promoting a healthy-looking complexion. Additionally, the inclusion of Hibiscus sabdariffa flower acids plays a crucial role in refining the skin's texture. At the same time, the formula includes plant extracts that help reduce excess shine such as meadowsweet and strawberry tree fruit extract. As such, this moisturizer works to reduce skin shine, lending a matte appearance, while also fighting skin imperfections and refining the skin texture.
The gel texture of this moisturizer is another noteworthy aspect, feeling fresh and light upon application while also providing an immediate blurring effect. In summary, this product provides a smoother, mattified skin appearance while visibly reducing imperfections and pores.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins My Clarins Pure-Reset Matifying Hydrating Blemish Gel 50ml (1.7 oz) to clean, dry skin.

description:
Clarins My Clarins Re-Boost Matte Hydra-Matifying Cream 50ml (1.7 oz) is specifically formulated for combination to oily skin types. This moisturizer is designed to offer an immediate matte effect while working to significantly and sustainably reduce skin shininess. For that purpose, it features plant extracts that help reduce excess shine such as meadowsweet and strawberry tree fruit extract. Additionally, this cream has been shown to make a noticeable difference in the visibility of imperfections and pores, with women reporting a 22% reduction. This contributes to a clearer and more refined skin texture. On the other hand, this moisturizer boosts the skin's radiance, with a reported increase of 41% in radiance, showcasing its efficacy in enhancing the overall vitality and luminosity of the skin. This is possible thanks to the inclusion of goji berry and acerola in the formula.
Equally important, the unique [Healthy Plant Complex], featuring coconut water and alpenrose, offers nutrition and antioxidant benefits thus promoting a healthy-looking complexion. The texture of this product is another notable aspect. It boasts a light and fresh gel-cream consistency that feels pleasant on the skin, leaving a matte finish without any greasy residue. This makes it an ideal choice for those with combination to oily skin, as it provides essential hydration without contributing to additional oiliness. In summary, this moisturizer works effectively to reduce shininess, minimize the appearance of imperfections and pores, and enhance skin radiance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins My Clarins Re-Boost Matte Hydra-Matifying Cream 50ml (1.7 oz) to clean, dry skin.

description:
This gift set contains the following products:

1x Filorga Lift-Structure Ultra-Lifting Cream 50ml
1x Filorga Sleep & Lift Ultra-Lifting Night Cream 15ml

description:
Sensilis Skin Glow [Juicy Cream] Instant Glow Moisturizing Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) is designed to bestow immediate luminosity to counteract dullness, illuminating and rejuvenating the complexion. At the heart of the formula is a Revitalizing complex that stimulates skin vitality, consequently reducing the appearance of fatigue signs. In addition, the formula features vitamin F which plays a pivotal role in fortifying the barrier function of the skin. Alongside Vitamin F, the inclusion of low molecular weight hyaluronic acid ensures deep and lasting hydration.
In addition to hydration, this cream boasts an illuminating effect above all. This is due to the inclusion of niacinamide and two soft-focus pearl pigments. Niacinamide is an antioxidant renowned for its skin-brightening properties, thus reducing the appearance of dullness and dark spots as well. The pearl pigments, on the other hand, impart instant luminosity and help disguise imperfections. This combination enhances the skin's luminosity, lending radiance to the complexion. In conclusion, this cream revitalizes the skin with hydration and luminosity.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sensilis Skin Glow [Juicy Cream] Instant Glow Moisturizing Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to clean, dry skin of the face and neck.

description:
Elizabeth Arden Superstart Skin Renewal Booster is an award-winner product to boost your skin to its best appearance. In other words, this innovative skincare product is designed to boost the natural ability to repair and renew itself, giving you a luminous and youthful appearance. The secret of this formula is the combination of powerful ingredients, thoughtfully combined to achieve the best results. To begin with, Flaxseed reduces water loss and locks hydration onto the skin. In addition, Sea Fennel helps reinforce the skin's moisture barrier, increasing luminosity and radiance. Equally important, Probiotic Complex helps strengthen the skin's natural defenses. By reinforcing the skin's defenses and moisture barrier, this booster improves the skin's ability to renew. As a result, you get a more radiant and healthy-looking complexion.
Besides, this product also boosts the effectiveness of all your skincare products so it is ideal to apply before your serum and moisturizer.  In conclusion, this product is a great addition to any skincare routine to achieve reinforced, more hydrated, and luminous skin as it helps repair and renew. Ultimately, it's a great solution for a revitalized and radiance complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Elizabeth Arden Superstart Skin Renewal Booster as the first step of your skincare routine, after cleansing. Use before a serum and/or moisturizer.

description:
Dr. Ceuracle Vegan Kombucha Tea Gel Cream 75g (2.64 oz) gives a boost of hydration to your skincare routine. This product delivers deep hydrating and moisturizing effects, especially for dehydrated skin. Its formula contains Vegan Tea Complex, delivering many benefits to the skin. It's packed with green tea leaf water and kombucha tea extract, not only nourishing the skin but also protecting it from oxidative stress, thanks to their high content in antioxidants. Green tea leaf water also balances the skin and has soothing effects. Kombucha tea extract, rich in probiotics, supports a healthy microbiome and fortifies the skin's natural barrier. Additionally, Schisandra chinensis enhances the antioxidant and soothing benefits, and sunflower seed oil delivers nourishing and moisturizing effects. 
With its lightweight gel-cream texture, this moisturizer quickly sinks into the skin, wrapping it in a layer of hydration and freshness. All in all, your skin will feel moist, supple, and glowing, thanks to the replenishing moisture and long-lasting hydration provided by this cream.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Ceuracle Vegan Kombucha Tea Gel Cream 75g (2.64 oz) onto previously cleansed skin of the face. Gently massage the skin using circular motions, until the product is completely absorbed.

description:
Dr. Ceuracle Royal Vita Propolis 33 Cream 50g (1.76oz) provides nourishment and hydration while brightening dull skin and helping to decrease the visibility of aging signs. In fact, its formula combines propolis with vitamins C, B3, and B5, for a powerful blend that not only strengthens the skin but also supports its natural glow. So, 33% of propolis extract delivers hydration and nourishment, and its antioxidant properties help to protect the skin against damage caused by free radicals. Moreover, the three vitamins further help to boost the skin's hydration, vitality, and radiance, enhance the antioxidant effects, and help to support collagen production. Additionally, royal jelly extract complements the formula with its moisturizing, soothing, and anti-aging effects.
This cream has a soft texture that is quickly absorbed, leaving the skin feeling soft and glowing. All in all, it is a great choice if your skin is feeling dull and tired, delivering a boost of nourishment and radiance!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Ceuracle Royal Vita Propolis 33 Cream 50g (1.76oz) onto previously cleansed and toned skin of the face. Gently massage the skin using circular motions, until full absorption of the product.

description:
Chasin' Rabbits All About Glow Multi-Balm 7.5g (0.26 oz) is a versatile skincare product that addresses various skin needs while enhancing the skin's natural radiance. This multi-balm, enriched with a blend of potent ingredients, provides targeted care for areas prone to dryness, such as the face, eyes, lips, and cuticles, and doubles as a subtle highlighter that can be applied over makeup for a natural-looking glow. At the heart of its formulation is a blend of Sacha Inchi seed oil, St. Paul’s Wort extract, and madecassoside. The balm's richly nourishing formula is designed to soothe and hydrate the skin. Moreover, it has the ability to visibly soften fine lines and wrinkles. Equally important, this balm imparts a natural glow, increasing the skin's radiance.
Practicality and ease of use are also key aspects of this product. The balm is conveniently portable, making it a must-have item for on-the-go applications. Its fresh but sweet scent, derived naturally from its ingredients, adds to the overall user experience. In summary, this product boosts skin's radiance while ensuring long-lasting hydration.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Chasin' Rabbits All About Glow Multi-Balm 7.5g (0.26 oz) on dry skin or lips, or use it as a highlighter to bring a glow to your face.
