description:
Rilastil Progression (+) Anti-Wrinkle Filling And Plumping Cream 40ml (1.35 fl oz) is specifically for mature skin and menopausal women. With this in mind, this cream works to counteract signs of aging, particularly those that come from hormonal changes, such as dryness, loss of firmness and elasticity, and a dull complexion. For that purpose, this product offers the power of a unique formulation that resorts to biotech collagen, hyaluronic acid, biotech exopolysaccharide, and a glowing complex. In this way, the formula provides optimal hydration, reduces the appearance of deep wrinkles, improves firmness and elasticity, and restores skin's radiance.
In particular, this moisturizer is indicated for normal to combination skin. With high tolerance and a hypoallergenic formula, this cream is suitable for even the most sensitive skin types. Furthermore, special care has been taken to test the cream's safety around the eyes, minimizing the risk of irritation. All in all, this moisturizer goes beyond wrinkle-filling, offering a plumping effect and unifying action as well. Is an all-encompassing solution to your skin's aging concerns.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Rilastil Progression (+) Anti-Wrinkle Filling And Plumping Cream 40ml (1.35 fl oz) to the face and neck.

description: Vichy Minéral 89 72h Moisture Boosting Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a moisturizer specifically formulated to fight the effects of daily environmental aggressions. With this in mind, this moisturizer has a super powerful formula that boosts skin hydration! On one hand, Squalane and Hyaluronic acid hydrate and plump the skin. On the other hand, Niacinamide and Vichy volcanic water strengthen the skin barrier. As a result, this formula intensely hydrates the skin for 72 hours and reinforces the skin barrier. With a light melting texture, this cream is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive ones. To sum up, this moisturizer provides the skin with water, minerals, lipids, vitamins, and hyaluronic acid to keep it protected and hydrated. All in all, is the ideal boost of hydration your skin might need!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Vichy Minéral 89 72h Moisture Boosting Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) morning and evening to clean, dry skin of the face.

description:
Rilastil Hydrotenseur Matt Restructuring Anti-Wrinkle Gel-Cream 40ml (1.35 fl oz) is an anti-aging moisturizer that fights both wrinkles and lack of firmness. With this in mind, this product is especially suitable for people over 40 years old, as it targets mainly gravitation wrinkles that are typical of this age. For that purpose, the formula features a combination of Hyaluronic acid, Ceramides, Lupeol, and Miolift. To begin with, Hyaluronic acid present in the formula has three molecular weights to intensely hydrate and fill in wrinkles. Then, Ceramides help restore the skin barrier whereas Lupeol and Miolift improve skin elasticity and firmness. In this way, this moisturizer is able to reduce the appearance of wrinkles with a filling effect while hydrating and repairing the skin at the same time.
In particular, this moisturizer has a lightweight texture that absorbs quickly and provides a mattifying effect at the same time. Therefore, it is suitable for combination to oily skin. As a last note, this cream is non-comedogenic and hypoallergenic. All in all, it's the ideal moisturizer to target aging signs like gravitational wrinkles as it offers a firming, filling, and repairing effect for an overall younger and plumper look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Rilastil Hydrotenseur Matt Restructuring Anti-Wrinkle Gel-Cream 40ml (1.35 fl oz) to clean, dry skin of the face and neck in the morning and evening routines.

description:
Dr. PawPaw x Teenage Cancer Trust Shimmer Balm 10ml (0.33 fl oz) has a formula with iridescent pearls to add shimmer. First and foremost, this product features the incredible formula of the original balm. On one hand, the star ingredient Pawpaw (Papaya Fruit) rejuvenates, hydrates, and soothes the skin and lips. Furthermore, the formula contains Aloe vera with hydrating and soothing properties as well as Olive oil and Castor oil, nourishing oils that deliver intense nourishment. But the difference with this product is the shimmery formula!
It has a pearlescent effect that just makes your skin glow and you can wear it anywhere you want, whether on the lips, cheekbones, decolletage, eyes, legs, etc. In addition, you can build its intensity by applying as much or as little as you like going from a subtle glow to a full-on glam look. Even more, it goes well on its own or on top of a tinted balm for creating a glowing lip and cheek color! All in all, this product is versatile and can be used in so many different ways. As so, it allows for creating unique looks that are perfectly suitable whether for day or night occasions. Suitable for all skin types and all ages, this product is a true multitasker, perfect to create multiple looks and this mini version is convenient to carry anywhere with you.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. PawPaw x Teenage Cancer Trust Shimmer Balm 10ml (0.33 fl oz) to anywhere you want to shimmer, and blend. Use it on its own or on top of lipstick, eyeshadow, or blush.

description: Filorga Hydra-Hyal Hydrating Plumping Water Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) replaces Filorga Hydra-Filler Mat. This luxurious formula offers powerful anti-aging hydration. For this purpose, this moisturizer features a complex with two types of Hyaluronic acid. Low molecular weight Hyaluronic Acid plumps the skin whereas cross-linked Hyaluronic Acid lastingly hydrates the skin and prevents dehydration while improving skin barrier function and elasticity. In this way, this product deeply and lastingly hydrates the skin and has a plumping effect at the same time. Additionally, the formula contains a plant-based astringent that refines pores and mattifies the complexion. As so, this moisturizer is ideal for combination to oily skin. Besides, this cream, in particular, has a light and refreshing sorbet texture. All in all, this moisturizer helps reduce fine lines and hydrate the skin while providing a mattifying result. In other words, it restores the skin's ideal moisture levels while acting to prevent skin aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Filorga Hydra-Hyal Hydrating Plumping Water Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to a cleansed and dry skin of the face, neck, and décolleté. Use in the morning and/or evening.

description:
Payot Source Adaptogen Moisturizing Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) is a moisturizer with a unique biomimetic skincare formula. In detail, this moisturizer features a powerful combination of Hyaluronic acid and two adaptogen plants to provide the skin with intense moisture. Composed of a Breton Algae and Reishi Mushroom, this formula resorts to the power of these plants to resist and adapt to environmental changes. In this way, this moisturizer recharges the skin with moisture and helps it fight daily environmental stress. As a matter of fact, it delivers lasting hydration for 48 hours. At the same time, it strengthens the skin's ability to adapt to a constantly changing environment.
Equally amazing, enriched with Shea butter, it has a rich creamy texture that envelops the skin in softness and comfort, being ideal for normal to dry skin. In conclusion, with 95% ingredients of natural origin, this incredible moisturizer quenches thirsty skin and provides a feeling of suppleness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Payot Source Adaptogen Moisturizing Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) to the face in the morning and/or evening routine.

description: Allegro Natura Hydrating And Nourishing Organic Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a nourishing cream that softens and restores the skin's moisture. This cream contains a blend of emollient and nourishing ingredients, such as organic olive oil, argan oil, and shea butter. So, these ingredients help to moisturize the skin, making it soft and smooth. Additionally, organic lemon balm water and organic rosehip and cornflower extracts provide soothing and antioxidant benefits, helping to calm the skin and protect it from free radical damage. Even more, this cream has a light texture that quickly absorbs and melts into the skin. All in all, this cream is ideal for fighting dryness, leaving the skin nourished, soft and healthy-looking.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an adequate amount of Allegro Natura Hydrating And Nourishing Organic Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto previously cleansed skin of the face, neck, and décolleté. Gently massage the skin, using circular motions, until the product quickly absorbs.

description:
Clarins Hydra-Essentiel [HA²] Émulsion Désaltérante 75ml (2.6 fl oz) is a hydrating emulsion that quenches every skin type. For this purpose, this new formula features a Hyaluronic Power Complex that provides a triple action thanks to a Hyaluronic acid duo combined with Leaf of Life extract. Consequently, this moisturizer immediately hydrates and re-densifies the skin for a smoother complexion. Equally important, it also provides long-term hydration, and day by day the skin is fortified and visibly more hydrated. In this way, this emulsion plumps and smoothes the skin while also providing a luminous complexion and reducing the appearance of fine lines. It is ideal for everyone who struggles with dehydrated skin, no matter the skin type.
In addition to these hydrating benefits, the texture and scent will captivate your senses. With a fresh and liquid texture that melts on the skin, this emulsion is suitable for all skin types. It limits shine while hydrating the skin and providing it with comfort. In conclusion, this product is the perfect ally to keep the skin healthy and luminous all day.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins Hydra-Essentiel [HA²] Émulsion Désaltérante 75ml (2.6 fl oz) to the face and neck in the morning routine.

description:
This gift set contains the following products:

Nivea Hydra Skin Effect Wake-Up Day Gel 50ml x1
Nivea Hydra Skin Effect Regeneration Night Gel-Cream 50ml x1

Nivea Hydra Skin Effect Wake-Up Day Gel is a lightweight moisturizer specifically for the morning routine. For the purpose of replenishing the skin with moisture, this cream features PURE HYALURON [HA], which activates the skin's own production of hyaluronic acid at deeper skin layers for a plumping effect. In this way, it provides intense hydration that keeps your skin hydrated for up to 72 hours. Like so, it leaves the skin feeling smoother and lends a vibrant complexion. In addition to these benefits, this moisturizer has an invigorating scent and a lightweight gel texture that doesn't leave any greasy residue and is suitable for all skin types. As so, it melts on the skin and gives you a fresh sensation that wakes you up. To sum up, this moisturizer replenishes the skin with moisture for healthy glowy skin.
Nivea Hydra Skin Effect Regeneration Night Gel-Cream is a regenerating moisturizer specifically for the evening routine. For the purpose of replenishing the skin with moisture, this cream features PURE HYALURON [HA], which activates the skin's own production of hyaluronic acid at deeper skin layers for a plumping effect. In this way, it provides immediate and intense hydration that keeps your skin hydrated for up to 72 hours. Like so, it leaves the skin feeling softer and boosts its regeneration overnight.  In addition to these benefits, this moisturizer has an invigorating scent and a creamy light gel texture that doesn't leave any greasy residue and is suitable for all skin types. As so, it melts on the skin and works overnight so you wake up with supple skin. To sum up, this moisturizer replenishes the skin with moisture for plumped and healthy skin.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description: HAAN Niacinamide Mattifying Face Gel-Cream controls excess oil production and provides a matte finish to the skin. Due to its key ingredient, Niacinamide, a form of vitamin B3, it regulates sebum production, reduces inflammation, and improves the overall texture of the skin. In fact, it reduces the appearance of pores, dark spots and hyperpigmentation. Additionally, it calms redness which results in a more even skin texture and tone. On top of that, it has a lightweight and non-greasy texture that keeps the skin moist. Lastly, with 89% ingredients of natural origin, this balancing cream strengthens the skin barrier. Hence, it is ideal for those with oily skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply HAAN Niacinamide Mattifying Face Gel-Cream in the morning and/or evening to previously cleansed skin. Then, massage gently all over the face.

description: HAAN Hyaluronic Moisturizing Face Cream deeply hydrates and nourishes the skin. Moreover, its key ingredient, Hyaluronic Acid, is a potent humectant that attracts and retains moisture in the skin, keeping it plump and hydrated. Besides providing deep hydration, it improves skin elasticity and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. On top of that, with 98,3% ingredients of natural origin, it protects the skin from external aggressions.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply HAAN Hyaluronic Moisturizing Face Cream in the morning and/or evening to previously cleansed skin. Then, massage gently all over the face.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description: Revolution Skincare Sali Hughes Gel Quench Light Anytime Moisturiser 60ml (2.02 fl oz) was developed in collaboration with renowned beauty expert Sali Hughes to provide the skin with lightweight moisture. Despite that, this moisturizer is incredibly quenching and offers optimal hydration! For that purpose, this product combines a gel texture with a hydrating and soothing formula. Indeed, at the heart of this formula is Hyaluronic acid, a well-known ingredient for its ability to retain water and, as such, replenish the skin with hydration. Additionally, the formula features Niacinamide which not only hydrates and strengthens the skin barrier but also soothes the skin, minimizes the appearance of pores, and evens out the skin tone. At the same time, Inuline works to preserve the skin microbiome while Polypeptides promote skin resilience. Due to its lightweight gel texture, this moisturizer works best for combination to oily skin in need of a hydration burst.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Revolution Skincare Sali Hughes Gel Quench Light Anytime Moisturiser 60ml (2.02 fl oz) to the face in the morning and/or evening routine. Additionally, you can apply it to the eye contour.

description:
Klorane Soothing Light Cream with Peony 40ml (1.3 fl oz) is a light moisturizer that resorts to a soothing formula to suit the specific needs of sensitive skin. That said, this product features soothing Peony extract that reduces skin sensitivity and calms the skin. At the same time, nourishing Argan oil in the formula strengthens the skin barrier thus protecting the skin from external aggressions. Evidently, the formula is enriched with hydrating ingredients such as Glycerin in order to effectively and lastingly moisturize the skin. In short, this cream soothes, protects, and moisturizes the skin.
Equally important, despite being lightweight, the texture leaves the skin comfortable and supple. Most importantly, it soothes the skin from discomfort feelings such as tightness and heat, keeping it calm all day long. As a last note, the formula is vegan and organic certified with 99% ingredients of natural origin. All in all, this high-tolerance moisturizer is perfect for sensitive skin, immediately and lastingly soothing it.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Klorane Soothing Light Cream with Peony 40ml (1.3 fl oz) to the face and neck in circular motions. Use once or twice a day.

description:
Clarins Hydra-Essentiel [HA²] Rich Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) is a nutritive cream specifically formulated to quench very dry skin. For this purpose, this new formula features a Hyaluronic Power Complex that provides a triple action thanks to a Hyaluronic acid duo combined with Leaf of Life extract. Consequently, this moisturizer immediately hydrates and re-densifies the skin for a smoother complexion. Equally important, it also provides long-term hydration, and day by day the skin is fortified and visibly more hydrated. In this way, this moisturizer plumps and smoothes the skin while also providing a luminous complexion and reducing the appearance of fine lines. Besides, this moisturizer features nourishing Shea butter which provides deep nutrition to the skin.
In addition to these hydrating benefits, the texture and scent will captivate your senses. With a creamy rich texture, this moisturizer restores immediate comfort in very dry skin, without leaving an oily finish. In conclusion, this product is the perfect ally to keep the skin healthy and luminous all day.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins Hydra-Essentiel [HA²] Rich Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) to the face and neck in the morning routine.

description: Babé Hydro 24h Light Cream SPF20 is ideal for normal to combination skin because of its fluid texture that is easily absorbed and leaves no skin shine. Formulated with ingredients that deeply hydrate and enhance the skin regeneration process this light cream is a daily moisturizer that, in essence, protects the skin from external aggressions while leaving it hydrated all day long. Besides, Allantoin, Panthenol and Squalane have different properties that in summary provide elasticity, flexibility and softness to the skin. Plus, solar filters also prevent photoaging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Babé Hydro 24h Light Cream SPF20 to the face and neck with a gentle massage until fully absorbed.

description: Babé Stop AKN Keratolytic Fluid is an innovative gel suitable for oily skin types, including sensitive. Rich in glycolic acid and cytobiol iris, this formula regenerates and renovates the skin from the inside out, all the while minimizing the appearance of acne imperfections and scars and regulating oil production to prevent breakouts. The skin recovers its smooth and even appearance by 75%, as confirmed by clinical trial volunteers.
how_to_use:
How to use
Massage Babé Stop AKN Keratolytic Fluid onto clean and dry skin, until fully absorbed. Apply every other night for 3 weeks, rest on 4th week.

description:
Clarins Hydra-Essentiel [HA²] Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a hydrating cream specifically formulated for the evening routine. This new formula features a Hyaluronic Power Complex that provides a triple action thanks to a Hyaluronic acid duo combined with Leaf of Life extract. Consequently, this moisturizer immediately hydrates and re-densifies the skin for a smoother complexion. Equally important, it also provides long-term hydration, and day by day the skin is fortified and visibly more hydrated. In this way, this moisturizer plumps and smoothes the skin while also providing a luminous complexion and reducing the appearance of fine lines. It is ideal for everyone who struggles with dehydrated skin.
In addition to these hydrating benefits, the texture and scent will captivate your senses. With an airy and creamy texture, it envelops the skin in a veil of softness and restores immediate comfort for all skin types. In conclusion, this product is the perfect ally to wake up with healthy and luminous skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins Hydra-Essentiel [HA²] Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) to the face and neck in the evening routine.

description: Sophieskin Hydra Boost Summer Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a vegan cream that deeply moisturizes both the surface and the depths of the skin while you are sleeping. Due to the two types of Hyaluronic Acid and the Hyalufresh system in its formula, this serum keeps the face nourished and hydrated. On top of that, the serum improves the skin complexion as it conceals small wrinkles, repairs deep wrinkles and smooths expression lines. While it is suitable for all skin types, it works especially well with dry skin thanks to its moisturizing properties. In the end, the skin feels fresh and renewed.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sophieskin Hydra Boost Summer Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) in the evening to a previously cleansed skin. Firstly, gently massage it into the face, neck and décolleté. Then, let it absorb.

description:
Sophieskin Be Young Majesty Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a vegan moisturizer that fills the skin with nourishment while freeing it from expression lines and tackling signs of aging. As such, it restores skin firmness and elasticity while plumping it up and filling it with volume. Moreover, it is great to diminish first wrinkles but also repair deep ones.
Due to the RETIXPERT active-ingredient complex present in its formula, it provides antioxidant action and boosts collagen production. As we age, the production of collagen, an essential vitamin for keeping our complexion plump, slows down. Thus, it is important to stimulate its synthesis. Additionally, this moisturizer provides a healthy glow and radiance to the skin so that it feels renewed and revitalized. In the end, it is water resistant so it can be used by the pool or when practicing sports.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sophieskin Be Young Majesty Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) in the morning and evening, to previously cleansed and dry skin. Then, gently massage the face, neck and décolleté until the skin completely absorbs it.

description:
Benton Ceramide Cream 10000ppm 80ml (2.70 fl oz) is a powerful moisturizer that reinforces the skin barrier. An impaired skin barrier can be caused by a lack of Ceramides, which are important lipids in our skin. Subsequently, this leads to itching, flaking, and sensitivity. With this in mind, this cream stars a Ceramide complex with more than 10,000ppm to replenish these lipids' content on the skin. Additionally, the formula also contains a Lipid complex of botanical origin and moisturizing ingredients that work in synergy with ceramides. As a result, this cream reinforces the skin barrier and, consequently, helps protect the skin against external irritations and prevent moisture loss.
Dermatologically tested and with a slightly acidic pH, this product respects the skin barrier and suits the needs of sensitive skin. In spite of being a powerful moisturizer, this cream has a lightweight texture and is non-comedogenic, being suitable even for acne-prone skin. As a last note, it features a delicate and subtle Neroli oil scent. It is the perfect all-year-round moisturizer for all skin types to achieve a healthy skin barrier.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a suitable amount of Benton Ceramide Cream 10000ppm 80ml (2.70 fl oz) to the face both morning and evening.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Collagen Re-Tightening Cream SPF30 50ml (1.7 fl oz) helps tone both the skin texture and overall facial contours, for a younger-looking and radiant complexion. In order to achieve these outstanding results, this luxurious moisturizer relies on a rich formula that includes collagen. Naturally found on the skin, collagen helps reduce and prevent aging signs such as hyperpigmentation or loss of firmness. And, since the body lowers the production levels of collagen after menopause, including it in any daily routine is a must.
From day one the skin feels more hydrated and elastic. Slowly, dark spots and uneven skin tones disappear, revealing a youthful complexion that radiates from within. With continuous use, wrinkles and fine lines are softened while the facial contours look sharper. And, due to the 30 SPF in its formula, this moisturizer also shields the skin against damaging UV light, for visible, long-lasting, and healthy results.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Collagen is a protein molecule with emollient properties. It is a great moisturizer and humectant since it helps the skin hold onto water by creating a film on the uppermost layer of the skin. In addition, it also helps reduce water loss through evaporation.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Collagen Re-Tightening Cream SPF30 50ml (1.7 fl oz) as one of the last steps of the skincare routine. Gently apply it onto already clean skin with circular, upward motions. Avoid the eye area. Lastly, finish off with adequate sunscreen to boost UV protection levels.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products:

NUXE Crème Prodigieuse Boost Multi-Correction Silky Cream 40ml
NUXE Very Rose 3-in-1 Soothing Micellar Water 50ml

Nuxe Crème Prodigieuse Boost Multi-Correction Silky Cream is a day cream for people who feel their skin is dull and starting to show its first wrinkles, with a refreshing texture and a delicate fragrance that boosts the skin's radiance and fights the first signs of premature aging. The daily life of women between 25 and 39 years old is usually dull and with signs of fatigue due to constant stress, lack of sleep, and environmental hazards like pollution. Nuxe has developed a solution for the first wrinkles that contains a powerful antioxidant cocktail of botanical origin and cell activity boosters in order to fight fatigue and erase the first signs of aging.
NUXE Very Rose 3-in-1 Soothing Micellar Water was specially formulated to gently but effectively cleanse the skin. Being an important step in our daily skincare routine, it is important to use a cleanser that respects the natural balance of the skin. With a unique formula that suits all skin types, including sensitive skin, this soothing micellar water can not only remove impurities and makeup but also soothe and comfort the skin. It contains a combination of botanical origin elements such as Rose Floral Water and the Skin-Respect Complex. These ingredients, besides perfectly cleansing the skin, can also strengthen the skin barrier while soothing and comforting.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Evolve Hydrate & Protect Facial Cream 60ml (2 fl oz) is a moisturizer that specifically targets the first signs of aging thanks to its natural formula enriched with organic ingredients. To begin with, Wild Butterfly Ginger protects the skin from ultraviolet radiation, blue light, infrared radiation, and pollution. This complete protective action helps prevent the appearance of aging signs such as fine lines and wrinkles. Besides, this ingredient boosts skin radiance for a luminous complexion.
Then, the formula contains Squalane which helps to moisturize the skin, and Pink Indigo to provide it with softness and suppleness. Overall, this moisturizer not only hydrates the skin but also protects it. With a lightweight texture that absorbs quickly and leaves no greasy residue, it is perfect for normal to combination skin. Furthermore, it leaves a perfect matte finish. In conclusion, this cream improves the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while providing a radiant and more even complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Evolve Hydrate & Protect Facial Cream 60ml (2 fl oz) to clean and dry face and neck, both in the morning and evening.

How to use
Apply Uriage Age Absolu Redensifying Rosy Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) in the morning on clean and dry face and neck.

description: Dr. Hauschka Melissa Day Cream is the solution for unbalanced combination skin which also suffers from sensitivity. To this end, this formula combines both hydrating and mattifying ingredients in order to achieve the two goals every person with combination skin wants to achieve: hydrated skin with a matte finish. In order to deeply soothe the skin, it contains botanical extracts from medicinal herbs such as melissa. Equally important is the tapioca starch, an extremely absorbing fine powder which helps to keep the skin balanced by absorbing excess oil. The skin becomes balanced and redness is dramatically reduced, resulting in a radiant and matte skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Hauschka Melissa Day Cream in the morning after the hydrating serum, as the last step of your skincare routine, before applying sunscreen. Ideal as a make-up base primer.

description: B-Lift Age Supreme Active Collagen Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a fast-absorbing cream, formulated for skin with loss of elasticity, expression wrinkles and signs of aging. In addition, it helps to prevent aging, and restore skin tone, firmness and elasticity. As we age, the production of collagen, an essential vitamin for keeping our complexion plump, slows down. Thus, it is important to stimulate its synthesis. So, as a result, the serum efficiently gives the skin homogeneity, firmness, and elasticity because its recipe contains Hydrolyzed Marine Collagen. Additionally, also present in the complex formula of the B-Lift Age Supreme Active Collagen Face Cream, hyaluronic acid hydrates and revitalizes, borage oil contains regenerative properties and Cedar phytoextracts help fight aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply B-Lift Age Supreme Active Collagen Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) in the morning and evening on a previously cleansed face, after applying the Blift Active Collagen serum. Then, massage gently until the skin completely absorbs the cream. You can also use this product as a make-up base. You should avoid contact with the eyes

description:
Frudia Pomegranate Nutri-Moisturizing Cream gives the skin a youthful look and feel. Due to the Pomegranate Extract (63%) rich in polyphenol, dry skin becomes moist. At the same time, the cream restores resilience and volume to the skin, fighting fine wrinkles and oxidation. As a result, the skin regains elasticity and becomes smooth. Additionally, this moisturizer reinforces the skin's barrier preventing moisture and nutrient losses. In four weeks, the results are noticeable. Finally, with a soft texture and ingredients that pass the skin irritation test, it can be used daily on sensitive skin. 
Frudia is a Korean skincare brand, the result of more than 30 years of development and research. Their products make maximum use of antioxidant-rich plants and fruit extracts. The patented R VITA W technology reduces the destruction of nutrients and vitamins from the fruits used in the products so that their effects are optimized!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Frudia Pomegranate Nutri-Moisturizing Cream at the last step of your skincare routine. Apply the appropriate amount to the affected areas. Then, spread evenly from the inside to the outside.

description: TONYMOLY TONY LAB AC Control Pink Deep Spot 25ml (0.85 fl oz) is an acne spot treatment which heals blemishes and attenuates the appearance of breakouts. As such, it deeply soothes the skin and calms the redness. Due to the Sciadopitys Root Extract in its formula, it tightens pores and controls the levels of sebum.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, apply a thin layer of TONYMOLY TONY LAB AC Control Pink Deep Spot 25ml (0.85 fl oz) in the evening on the targeted areas. Then, in the morning wash off.

description:
Frudia My Orchard Aloe Real Soothing Gel 300ml (10.1 fl oz) is a gel that moisturizes and cools the skin. Due to its weak acidity, it is suitable for sensitive skin. Besides controlling the pH levels that are disturbed by external aggressions, due to the pure Aloe (92%) present in the formula, it soothes and refreshes your skin. Additionally, its texture makes for an easy and even application that confers immediate cooling effects, without stickiness.
You can use this gel in many ways and apply it to both your face and body. For instance, you can apply it before going to bed so that you can sleep with cool and relaxed skin. You can also use it as an after-shave to relieve the skin from irritation. Or you can mix it with BB cream or foundation so that your skin keeps moist.
Frudia is a Korean skincare brand, the result of more than 30 years of development and research. Their products make maximum use of antioxidant-rich plants and fruit extracts. The patented R VITA W technology reduces the destruction of nutrients and vitamins from the fruits used in the products so that their effects are optimized!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a suitable amount of Frudia My Orchard Aloe Real Soothing Gel 300ml (10.1 fl oz) on the dry or sensitive areas of the face and body. Then, tap gently for rapid and better absorption. For optimum results, keep the soothing gel refrigerated before applying it.

description:
It'S Skin Collagen Nutrition Emulsion+ 150ml is a firming formula that increases levels of radiance while contributing to a more even texture, as well. As it happens, this is a multipurpose product that promises to restore skin vitality through its plumping and rejuvenating properties. It does so by resorting to Marine Collagen as its star ingredient. From the scales of fish living in the depths of the sea, Marine Collagen has an identical molecular structure to collagen found in the skin of humans. As a result, its extensive list of benefits includes increased moisture and anti-aging action. Even more, the low molecular weight of this ingredient ensures fast absorption and optimal performance. 
To complement all of this, the Collagen Nutrition Emulsion+ also resorts to Saussurea Laniceps Extract to achieve a more even complexion. Thanks to its replenishing and strengthening benefits, this ingredient creates a revitalized and uniform result. Lastly, the presence of Malt Extract and Bearberry Extract is responsible for providing more radiance and nourishment.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use It'S Skin Collagen Nutrition Emulsion+ 150ml as part of your morning and/or evening routine, after cleansing and toning. Gently pat the fluid formula into the skin as evenly as possible until it is fully absorbed.

description:
mccosmetics GSH Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) has a luxuriously created composition for various types of skin problems, namely for dark spots, acne scars, signs of age, and dullness. That said, this cream with whitening components helps reduce darkened skin and dark spots that appear naturally on the skin over time. In turn, this becomes more uniform, radiant, and even healthy. On the other hand, it also helps to regenerate damaged skin and reduce acne, in addition to preventing facial skin from gaining marks and scars derived from it. Furthermore, signs of age such as wrinkles and loss of firmness are also gently reversed giving the skin a more youthful appearance.
The main star of this cream is undoubtedly Glutathione. Also known as vitamin G, it reduces oxidative stress in the skin to improve its overall complexion. In other words, it helps to lighten dull skin, evens out its tone, and visibly reduces dark spots. Furthermore, for a regenerating action on the complexion, this cream has the presence of Onion Extract. Namely, it has properties that help to regenerate the skin and improve blood circulation. It has also antibacterial and antifungal activity and can help to reduce acne and prevent scarring. Moreover, for a more radiant complexion, Myrtle extract contains a large number of phenolic compounds, which are well-known for their antioxidant properties. It also helps to boost cellular oxygenation, creating a more glowy complexion as a result. Last but not least, Myrrh extract grants an immediate lifting effect while soothing the skin.
All in all, this cream offers a luxuriously formulated texture that effortlessly adheres to the skin and evens out its tone. On the other hand, it regenerates the skin and prevents it from getting acne marks. Finally, the skin gains a new glowing radiance, ending dullness and tired appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply mccosmetics GSH Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) after cleansing the skin. Apply on face and neck, in the morning and evening. Can be used in combination with another mccosmetics creams.

How to use
As a moisturizer: Apply NUXE Crème Fraîche de Beauté 3-in-1 Cream 100ml in the morning and/or evening to the face, eye contour area, neck, and décolleté.As a makeup remover: use the equivalent of two drops and massage into the skin over the face and eyes to dissolve makeup. Rinse with water or a damp reusable cleansing pad.As a mask: apply a thick layer to clean skin and leave for 5 minutes. Remove the excess product with a damp cleansing pad. For better results, do this once or twice a week.

description:
Shiseido WASO Shikulime Color Control Oil-Free Moisturizer SPF30 50ml (1.69fl oz) is an oil-free, tinted moisturizer that matches your natural skin tone while blurring imperfections and protecting against UV with SPF30. That said, this moisturizing cream has a unique sustainable formula that helps promote a healthy skin condition and strengthens resistance against skin concerns. On the other hand, even though it is moisturizing, its oil-free nature is suitable for all skin types, especially the oiliest ones that need to control excess shine and sebum production. In this way, this fluid cream prevents dehydration while balancing the microbiome. Furthermore, this cream has a silky, breathable texture that glides smoothly onto the skin without feeling heavy. In addition, it adapts to each skin tone, creating a natural finish and improving uneven complexions through sheer coverage.
This entire Shiseido WASO range has a sustainable concept, a fact that can also be seen in the composition of its products. Namely, this cream contains Japanese Shikuwasa Extract which hydrates and preserves moisture levels while preventing skin problems. On the other hand, Hydro-Balancing Complex composed of Trehalose and Glycerin helps reinforce the skin's moisture barrier. This combination is designed to lock in moisture to provide skin with long-lasting hydration and avoid dryness. Finally, Botanically Derived Cornstarch Powder is a key factor in helping visibly improve the look of pores in the skin to help you achieve a more radiant and smooth skin. Specifically, it soaks up excess sebum to prevent the look of shine and allow the skin to be comfortably dry. As a final note, this entire range is about fundamentals, focusing on maximizing the benefits of what’s proven to work and leaving out unnecessary bells and whistles.
how_to_use:
How to use
After cleansing, use Shiseido WASO Shikulime Color Control Oil-Free Moisturizer SPF30 50ml (1.69fl oz) as the last step of your morning skincare routine. Take two pearl-sized drops onto your fingertips and smooth gently over your face, distributing product evenly and incorporating into skin effortlessly to achieve a natural finish.

description: Pestle & Mortar Balance Spritz is the go-to mist for your day-to-day life. Misting throughout the day offers so many benefits that people are embracing it as a lifestyle, carrying the mist with them and spritzing to hydrate the skin on the go and to fight off pollution. On one hand, with one single gesture, you get all the benefits of deep-sea Irish magnesium, a unique blend of herbal extracts and a combination of balancing amino acids. On the other hand, you also benefit from the zen gesture in which you take a deep breath and just enjoy the moment. In other words, this product provides a mini-break from the agitated urban life. As a result, the skin becomes radiant and hydrated, with a true pollution shield being kept active at all times in order to protect your skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Spritz Pestle & Mortar Balance Spritz according to your skin's needs. Use it under your moisturizer to increase its absorption or apply it during the day to fight off pollution. Alternatively, use this product throughout the day for a hydration boost or to prevent your skin from drying out from very dry environments or air conditioning.

description:
Klorane Cornflower Water Cream with Organic Cornflower is a deeply moisturizing water cream that helps to keep the skin fresh and plump. In fact, after just one hour, the skin becomes 83% more hydrated and 82% of users state that the skin is denser and more luminous. Moreover, this vegan formula contains both eco-responsibly sourced organic cornflower water and botanical hyaluronic acid. 
In order to achieve optimal results, perform a simple yet effective massage when applying this cream. This will help to stimulate the skin and, like so, boost radiance levels.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Klorane Cornflower Water Cream with Organic Cornflower after cleansing and applying the serum. Then, massage gently for maximum absorption and optimal results. Make sure to apply both on the face and neck, avoiding the eye contour.

description:
Martiderm Rosarepair Fluid Emulsion SPF30 40ml (1.35fl oz) was specially developed to offer daily care to redness-prone and sensitive skin. In fact, this unique cream is able to target all the special needs of this specific type of skin, improving its overall condition.  
First and foremost, the Rosarepair Fluid Emulsion acts as a powerful moisturizing and soothing agent. With hydrating and calming properties, this cream helps to restore the skin’s natural barrier function in order to stop future dryness and irritation. Connected to this action is the fact that the Rosarepair Fluid Emulsion also addresses and prevents redness and feelings of skin warmth. Thanks to its soothing benefits, this product supplies instant relief alleviating signs of sensitivity. 
As a last note, the Rosarepair Fluid Emulsion is equally responsible for shielding the skin from harmful UVA and UVB radiation. With SPF30, this cream provides efficient protection against sun exposure and its damages.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Martiderm Rosarepair Fluid Emulsion SPF30 40ml (1.35fl oz) as part of your morning and/or evening routine as your selected moisturizer. Apply an appropriate amount of the formula to the dry and clean skin of your face, neck and décolleté. Then, massage gently for maximum absorption.

description: D'AVEIA Moisturizing Cream 100ml (3.38fl oz) provides extra help in combating dry skin, especially on the face and hands. It is normal with external agents such as cold, heat, wind or even air conditioning for our skin to suffer from dryness and irritation. That said, this cream not only helps to intensely hydrate your fragile skin, but also restores the skin's physiological balance. On the other hand, it helps to soothe irritation, protect the skin and strengthen its natural defenses. All this is only possible thanks to a formula rich in Colloidal Oatmeal, Corn and Omegas 3 and 6. Basically, these ingredients provide a boost of hydration to your skin. At the same time, the presence of antioxidants, Bisabolol and Allantoin also allows an important skin regenerating, soothing and anti-irritating action. All in all, this cream is ideal for really dry, chapped, irritated and very sensitive skins on the face and hands. In addition to hydrating them, it restores all their health and vitality.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply D'AVEIA Moisturizing Cream 100ml (3.38fl oz) in the areas of the body that most need help, being on the skin of the face, hands or specific parts of your body. Gently massage until the cream is completely absorbed.

description:
Mádara Acne Hydra-Derm Balancing Fluid 40ml (1.35fl oz) is a lightweight moisturizer that was developed to fit the special needs of problem-prone skin. As it happens, this silky smooth fluid focuses simultaneously on hydration, balancing and prevention. First and foremost, the Acne Hydra-Derm Balancing Fluid contains Hyaluronic Acid, an ingredient that not only hydrates the skin but also prevents epidermal water loss. In addition to this, the balancing effect of this formula protects and regulates the microbiome, ensuring long-lasting comfort and preventing irritation, as well.
On another side, the Acne Hydra-Derm Balancing Fluid works towards smoother and overall improved skin. Components like Jupiter Stem Cells and Fermented Polysaccharides contribute to tightening the pores, minimizing the appearance of breakouts and controlling sebum production. Even more, the Acne Hydra-Derm Balancing Fluid has a non-comedogenic composition. This means that this moisturizer has a light consistency and does not contribute to the clogging of pores.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mádara Acne Hydra-Derm Balancing Fluid 40ml (1.35fl oz) to the clean and dry skin of your face and neck as part of your morning and evening routine. Then, massage gently for maximum absorption. Complement its use with other products from the same range in order to obtain maximum results.

description: Dr. Hauschka MED Ice Plant Face Cream 40ml (1.35 fl oz) is a highly hydrating cream designed especially for dry, very dry skin, or atopic skin. With a unique combination of ingredients, this product is able to hydrate, nourish, calm, and repair the skin. Enriched with Jojoba and Avocado Oil, this cream provides nourishing properties, while also protecting the skin from external aggressors and preventing loss of water. Allied with Glycerin, this product provides a humectant and protective effect on the skin, while the Cocoa Seed Butter helps improve moisture levels, evens the skin tone, and improves elasticity. Lastly, the Rosemary Leaf Extract provides antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties, which helps protect the skin from free radicals and oxidative stress while also having a soothing effect on the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Hauschka MED Ice Plant Face Cream 40ml (1.35 fl oz) in the morning and/or evening onto the face and neck after cleansing. Use soft motions to apply the product until it is fully absorbed.

description: Filorga NCEF-Reverse Mat Supreme Multi-Correction Fluid is a mattifying fluid that tackles signs of aging and fatigue being ideal to help repair and revitalize the complexion during stressful periods. With Hyaluronic Acid, it helps hydrate and also visibly plump the skin. With Collagen, it enhances the skin's collagen production for firmer and smoother skin. Enriched with Vitamins, it helps protect the skin and instantly illuminate the complexion. And, also ultra-concentrated in NCEF, it is able to enhance the overall appearance of the skin, rejuvenating and reviving the complexion. In addition, enriched with Oleanolic Acid, it also helps regulate sebum production and mattify the complexion. In essence, it helps renew and repair the skin and lend the complexion a luminous, mattified and younger look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Filorga NCEF-Reverse Mat Supreme Multi-Correction Fluid both morning and evening onto previously clean and dry skin. Gentle massage until fully absorbed.

description:
DR GRANDEL Vitamin Infusion Cream Gel 50ml (1.69fl oz) is a refreshing moisturizer that focuses on strengthening and smoothing the skin through the power of a vitamin-loaded formula. As part of the DR GRANDEL Vitamin Infusion range, this product has a composition that contains a blend of beauty vitamins and fruit extracts with a revitalizing action. 
On one side, Vitamin A softens, regenerates, and refines. At the same time, a mix of Vitamin B3, B5, and B7 contributes to optimal levels of moisture and improves the skin's regeneration and protective mechanisms. Furthermore, Vitamin C ensures protection from external aggressors, brightening the skin, as well. All of these benefits are provided through the ABC Beauty Complex, an exclusive technology that boosts absorption and, therefore, effectiveness. This technology offers an advanced encapsulation of these vitamins protecting their benefits and increasing their distribution.
Besides harvesting its power from this potent combination of Vitamins, the DR GRANDEL Vitamin Infusion Cream also stimulates collagen synthesis and protects existing collagen fibers thanks to a Complex of Pomegranate Flowers and Vitamin C. Therefore, it reduces wrinkles and improves skin texture. Even more, the presence of Mango Kernel in the composition provides a velvety and luxurious consistency that melts pleasantly on the skin, leaving it nourished and moisturized. The result? Radiant, replenished and younger skin, that looks and feels overall healthier after each application.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use DR GRANDEL Vitamin Infusion Cream Gel 50ml (1.69fl oz) as part of your morning and evening routine on clean and dry skin. Apply it to the skin of your face, neck and décolleté. Complement its use with other products of the same range for optimal results.

description:
A-Derma Biology Nutri Nourishing Cream 40ml (1.35fl oz) is a facial moisturizer that nourishes, replenishes all the while protecting fragile skin. Ideal for dry skin types, including skin prone to atopic eczema, the formula is so gentle that is also suitable for the eye area.
Combining 99% of ingredients of natural origin, this formulation offers the nourishing properties that dry, eczema-prone skin needs. Organic Rhealba® oat offers hydration and helps to bring skin back to balance. In addition, dandelion extract protects the skin with a powerful anti-pollution action while organic safflower oil nourishes and strengthens the skin barrier at the same time. Apply it every day to bring itchy prone, tight and eczema-prone skin back to balance. It leaves the skin feeling comfortable and looking radiant!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of A-Derma Biology Nutri Nourishing Cream 40ml (1.35fl oz) directly onto the face and neck. Then, massage gently to improve absorption. You may apply it also to the eye area.

description: Mádara Time Miracle Radiant Shield Day Cream SPF15 40ml (1.35fl oz) hydrates your face deeply while also shielding from prolonged sun exposure and leading to great softness/radiance. Thanks to the inclusion of Hyaluronic Acid, Polymers, and Plankton Extract, this adds an invigorating push-up effect, firming the skin. Thus, issues such as photoaging become less of a concern as this option aims to even skin tone, reducing fine lines as well as wrinkles. Meanwhile, Zinc Oxide continues to deliver broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection, allowing this SPF 15 enriched cream to produce glowing results. Rich yet lightweight and gentle on all skin types - relying on 99% natural ingredients - this plant-based moisturizer features a delicate rose scent. At the same time it locks in moisture, enhancing the skin's defensive barrier, it also gives you the best summer glow, regardless of the season. Finally, due to a non-pasty finish, its protective film will look as discreet and polished as possible.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with, cleanse and moisturize your face with the appropriate products. Then, apply a generous portion of Mádara Time Miracle Radiant Shield Day Cream SPF15 40ml (1.35fl oz) preparing your skin for different kinds of environmental threats. Spread the formula as evenly as possible, massaging in circular as well as upward motions until full absorption. Finally, explore the rest of Mádara's Time Miracle anti-aging range in order to complete your beauty ritual.

description: Sensilis Supreme [Night Cream] Detox Gel Cream is a repairing night treatment based on regenerative and antioxidant properties. Now with a new packaging made from 100% sustainable glass, this unique product has an improved composition rich in natural plant extracts, sodium hyaluronate and dimethicone. Thus, this product intensifies the skin's nightly renewal, enhances cell longevity, and regenerates the skin in-depth. It contributes to prevent signs of both aging and fatigue, such as wrinkles and fine lines. In addition, the skin is extremely hydrated and with no signs of dryness or any kind of discomfort. After 4 weeks of use, the depth of wrinkles and lines is reduced by 30%. The exclusive gel-oil texture provides immediate comfort and well-being; it is also easily absorbed, which boosts the action of the ingredients through the night.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sensilis Supreme [Night Cream] Detox Gel Cream to the face, neck, and decollete. Then, massage gently to promote absorption.

description: ISDIN Ureadin Intense Hydration Cream SPF20 is ideal for the daily care of dry to very dry skin. It contains Ceramides and Omega 6, which not only promote a healthier skin barrier but also comfort, nourish and soften the skin. It is also rich in Urea, which is essential to regulate the levels of moisture in the skin. And, due to the presence of antioxidants and sunscreen filters, it also helps protect the skin from solar radiation. All in all, with a unique formula, it deeply hydrates and nourishes the skin, promotes a healthier skin barrier, and also protects the skin. With a pleasant nourishing texture that melts into the skin, it is able to daily comfort, hydrate, and also protect the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply ISDIN Ureadin Intense Hydration Cream SPF20 onto previously clean and dry skin. Apply both morning and evening with a gentle massage.

description: Noreva Lipoleum Hydraplus Moisturizing Cream 1Kg (35.27oz) is a hydrating cream that deeply moisturizes the skin and is suitable to be used by the whole family. With a formulation that is suitable for dry to very dry, dehydrated, and atopic-prone skin, this cream surprises with its lightweight texture that absorbs quickly and immediately soothes the skin. Thanks to a winning combination of ingredients, the cream grants comforting hydration and healthy skin. The presence of glycerin draws moisture from the air and binds it to the skin. Therefore, this ingredient not only keeps it moisturized but also shielded it from environmental sources of irritation. At the same time, Hyaluronic Acid hydrates and plumps the skin due to its ability to retain water. Apply it to prevent dehydration as well as to replenish the skin with immediate and long-lasting hydration, with a formula that's so gentle that is suitable even for newborns and atopic-prone skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous amount of Noreva Lipoleum Hydraplus Moisturizing Cream 1Kg (35.27oz) onto clean and dry skin on the face and/or body. Massage it delicately onto the skin in order to improve absorption. You can apply more that one time a day if you feel the need to replenish hydration.

description: Dr. Hauschka Revitalizing Day Lotion is a moisturizing product that stimulates the skin’s natural oil and moisture production. Undoubtedly, pale and dehydrated skin requires extra care and protection. Thus, Dr. Hauschka developed this day lotion, with a silky-smooth texture, to protect the skin throughout the day and bring out a radiant complexion. Besides, Revitalizing Day Lotion is lightweight and easily absorbed, making it an ideal base for make-up. Not only has an active moisturizing effect, but also helps to enliven and revitalize pale skin for a supple and fresh complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Hauschka Revitalizing Day Lotion evenly to the face, neck and décolleté, every morning after cleansing and toning.

description: LETI SR Sensitive & Red Skin Anti-Redness Cream SPF20 is a special formula designed specifically for the daily care of sensitive skin with redness. Also, it provides medium sun protection factor (SPF20) and UVA, protecting against daily radiation. In truth, if you deal with conditions such as erythrosis, couperose, and/or rosacea grade I, then you should protect your face from sun exposure daily, even on cloudy days. With this intention, LETI created this non-comedogenic, dermatologically tested ally for you to carry every day. All skin types will tolerate it excellently, while for the ones with sensitive skin this is an effective option. Besides, its rich components will reinforce the support structure of the micro-capillaries, creating a skin densifier effect.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply LETI SR Sensitive & Red Skin Anti-Redness Cream SPF20 on face and neck, massaging gently until full absorption.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Laser X3 Day Care Cream is an intensive anti-aging moisturizing cream that will re-densify your skin and smooth your face contours. Its enriched formula with 3% of Pro-Xylane™ a patented active ingredient penetrates deeply into the skin and energizes the molecules accountable for protecting the skin against water loss by reinforcing the extracellular matrix. By doing so, this cream will keep your skin hydrated and will minimize its natural aging signs. Moreover, the LHA present confers exceptional exfoliating properties, which will lift off dead skin cells to renew, refresh and smooth the complexion; thus resulting in a radiant, unified appearance. Also, the fragmented hyaluronic acid in its composition is able to deeply moisturize the skin, thus reducing wrinkles and fine lines. This combination of active ingredients will lead to visible wrinkle reduction, a re-densified skin, and a renewed firmness.
Furthermore, its dermatologically tested formula is also suitable for sensitive skin. After a week of use, it is possible to see a significant improvement in the lion's wrinkle as well as in the fine lines of crow's feet. After 4 weeks, the skin looks firmer, resulting in a more invigorated and rejuvenated appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Laser X3 Day Care Cream every morning after cleansing the complexion. Massage into the skin of both face and neck in circular motions.

description:
Collistar Men Hydra Daily Protective Moisturizer provides a rich, ultra-comfortable daily moisturizing cream specially designed for men. It is ideal for any skin type, however it is ideal for dry and sensitive skin. In addition, this cream provides a 2 in 1 action. It leaves the skin of the face hydrated instantly and throughout the day. On the other hand, it protects you from everyday stress, pollution and blue light, that is, against digital aging. Furthermore, it should be applied all over the face and also around the eyes as it helps in signs of fatigue and reduces puffiness. 
This moisturizing cream is formulated with Hydra Face & Eye Complex® which contains a combination of active ingredients that work in synergy. First, it has an extremely moisturizing action on the skin. Contains the help of a special algae that creates a long-lasting hydration effect and also provides an indirect anti-dryness effect. Furthermore, this cream protects the skin from external agents through a mix of ingredients such as Peptides and extracts from Red Vine leaves. Thus, the skin is protected from indoor and outdoor pollution, this cream helps in the prevention of oxidative stress and helps your skin's self-defense system. All in all, this cream is ideal for men who need extra care for their skin.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Peptides are amino acids that help the skin to obtain more firmness and a more rejuvenated appearance. In addition, it improves skin barrier, helps in the reduction of wrinkles and leaves the skin more elastic.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Collistar Men Hydra Daily Protective Moisturizer in the morning right after shaving, at night or at any time during the day. Apply to the face and around the eyes with a gentle massage or by tapping over the fingers.

description:
ClarinsMen Energizing Gel is an energizing moisturizer that revives and invigorates the skin with long-lasting hydration. The texture is cooling and light-weight, absorbs quickly and also contributes to mattify the complexion. When it comes to the packaging, it is practical and convenient, featuring a built-in airless pump that preserves the purity of the formula.
Clarins plant-based experience and expertise is the secret for an invigorating formula. The new and exclusive G-Red Complex resorts to powerful botanicals such as organic red ginseng extract and bison grass to boost the energy of the skin, instantly revitalizing and moisturizing the skin. Similarly, houseleek extract deeply hydrates the skin while bamboo extract works to mattify the skin and reduce excess shine. At the same time, white horehound, furcellaria and succory dock-cress - part of Clarins anti-pollution complex - shield the skin from both indoor and outdoor pollutants, including skin-aging blue lights from electronic devices. Each application grants an immediate and visible revitalizing result, with matte luminosity and energy. In addition, the skin is instantly replenished with hydration and freshness.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with, gently cleanse and tone the skin of the face and neck. Then, apply a generous amount of ClarinsMen Energizing Gel onto the hands and press over the skin.

description: Noreva Sensidiane Cream Combination Skin is suitable for sensitive skin mixed with oily trend.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Noreva Sensidiane Cream Combination Skin daily, morning and evening onto clean, dry skin.

description: Mádara Acne Intense Blemish & Pore Treatment is a great ally if you are struggling with excess oiliness, clogged pores, blackheads, or regular breakouts. In fact, this innovative formula based on a biotechnological skin-clarifying complex is good both for teenagers and adults. Unquestionably useful for acne-prone oily skin, this product has 2% of the well-known keratolytic Salicylic Acid. Therefore, Mádara Acne Intense Blemish & Pore Treatment will improve the condition of your skin by minimizing the appearance of blackheads and breakouts. Additionally, the Hemp, Argan, and Tea Tree oils will balance the skin with their non-comedogenic properties. In conclusion, this intense treatment helps to keep your complexion pure and balanced.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mádara Acne Intense Blemish & Pore Treatment to the blemish-prone areas with a thin layer, both morning and evening. Follow with a moisturizer. Use regularly or as a 6-week treatment. Use in combination with ACNE Acute Spot Roll-On for the best results.

description:
Mádara Deep Moisture Regenerating Night Cream suits all skin types and tackles undernourished, damaged skin that has lost its natural radiance and elasticity. Furthermore, it relies on specific ingredients to provide healthier-looking skin, capable of fighting environmental aggressions. By neutralizing free radicals, this rich cream penetrates extra sensitive and irritated areas and shields them, replenishing/restoring skin cells. In the end, the goal is to smooth, detoxify and awaken your complexion's full potential while you sleep. Healing localized imperfections and riding your face of impurities, despite its thicker texture, it still enables quick absorption. 
Mádara believes simple formulas with fewer chemicals go a long way and produce effective, long-lasting results. In other words, the philosophies of less is more, transparency, and sustainability are ideals one should live by. Thus, skincare products should reflect and maximize an individual's quality of life, while also preserving naturally extracted resources. With a larger than life attitude, its female founders proudly lead an organic brand known for its ethics and global presence. In short, you won't have to relinquish any of the quality of previously tested cosmetics and can continue to fight for Earth's well-being. Finally, this is a must-have to enhance your skin's defenses and achieve a more youthful, brighter look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Clear your face and neck with your preferred cleanser and apply a good amount of Mádara Deep Moisture Regenerating Night Cream as evenly as possible. Pay special attention to your forehead, cheekbones, nose, and chin. Spread the product with your hands, in circular and upward motions. Make sure you enable full absorption. Incorporate it as part of your daily nighttime beauty regime for optimal results.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Classic Energizing Red Day Cream provides an intense and instant anti-wrinkle action while naturally illuminating the skin. Thus, this day cream is ideal for all skin types looking for a solution for wrinkles, fine lines and a more energized look. In addition, this formula provides advanced anti-wrinkle efficacy by filling them, moisturizing the skin and visibly smoothing it.  
The formula of this day cream is enriched with Advanced Pro-Retinol which helps to improve the structure of the epidermis and promote its regeneration. In this way, this formula reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines of expression while reducing dark spots as well. In addition, this cream is enriched with Red Ginseng, a powerful ingredient that imparts red pigments to the cream. Through this formulation and its stimulating properties, the skin gains an energy boost for fight signs of fatigue. On the other hand, the skin ends up gaining a natural and healthy glow. All in all, it provides long-lasting hydration and leaves the skin firmer and more defined as a lifting effect. It also instantly reactivates the skin's luminosity while plums the skin filling fine lines and wrinkles for a more rejuvenated and radiant look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Classic Energizing Red Day Cream every morning on a perfectly cleansed face and neck using circular motions for better absorption. Avoid eye area.

description: Esthederm Intensive Spiruline Cream is a mesotherapy cosmetic that enhances the skin's radiance thanks to the content in spiruline, an incredible blue micro-algae that has been on Earth for 3 billion years and contains more than 220 essential nutrients to regenerate dull and tired skins. The skin becomes brighter, more radiant and signs of fatigue are reduced. This vitality concentrate reenergizes the skin and can be used as a complement to aesthetic or surgical treatments and is ideal after pregnancy to restore the radiance.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Spiruline is a micro-algae which contains more than 220 essential nutrients, including 10 Vitamins, 10 Minerals, 18 aminoacids, antioxidants and essential fatty acids.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Esthederm Intensive Spiruline Cream in the morning and evening, onto cleansed skin on the face, neck and chest.

description: Dr. Hauschka Quince Day Cream is the fuss-free hydrating moisturizer from Dr. Hauschka, which is a true bestseller within the male customers of the brand. The formula contains botanical extracts in order to help maintain the hydration levels of the skin. Quince has long been known for its high content in functional ingredients such as Vitamin C, so the formula helps to quickly revitalize the skin, hence keeping it toned and healthy-looking.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Hauschka Quince Day Cream in the morning, after cleansing and toning the skin. Apply it evenly onto the face, neck and décolletage.

description:
Clarins Nutri-Lumière Nourishing Rejuvenating Night Cream is an intensely nourishing moisturizer that revitalizes mature skin during the night. The nutrient-rich formula offers the best of plant-based skincare expertise, all in order to nourish, revitalize and brighten agin skin that has taken on a dull, tired appearance. Silky smooth, the enveloping texture melts beautifully upon application, preparing the skin for a night of rest and regeneration. After just 28 days of use, 86% of women find their skin looks fresher and more luminous upon waking, as if enveloped in a youthful glow.
Clarins Nutri-Lumière is an innovative, pro-aging skincare range that nourishes, revitalizes, and illuminates mature skin. As the skin ages, it begins to lose its youthfulness and vigor; at the same time, the skin barrier function grows weaker, resulting in dry skin and a dull, uneven skin tone that no longer reflects your inner glow. In order to counteract these effects, Clarins has especially developed the Nutri-Lumière range, using an exclusive synergy of plant-based extracts that will help you achieve a luminous, healthy-looking complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins Nutri-Lumière Nourishing Rejuvenating Night Cream after cleansing and preparing the skin with Clarins Nutri-Lumière Renewing Treatment Essence. Begin by warming a small amount of the night cream between your palms. Then, using the natural weight of your hands, distribute the product evenly over the face and neck. Finally, using the exclusive Clarins Draining Pressure Method, apply pressure to the face in order to stimulate circulation, boost radiance, and restore firmness to the skin: press three times on the cheeks, three times on the forehead, and five times on the neck and décolleté.

description:
Clarins Nutri-Lumière Nourishing Revitalizing Day Cream is a nutrient-rich day cream for mature skin. Formulated with a luscious, oil-infused melting texture, this moisturizer sinks deep into the skin in order to restore its youthful radiance. The plant-based formula harnesses the properties of organic ingredients to revive a tired and aging complexion; as a result, it visibly improves the appearance of deep-set wrinkles, age spots, and slackening skin. After just two weeks of use, the skin is better nourished; after four weeks, it looks healthier, acquiring a rosy, youthful glow that significantly improves the well-being of 93% of women who try it.
Clarins Nutri-Lumière is an innovative, pro-aging skincare range that nourishes, revitalizes, and illuminates mature skin. As the skin ages, it begins to lose its youthfulness and vigor; at the same time, the skin barrier function grows weaker, resulting in dry skin and a dull, uneven skin tone that no longer reflects your inner glow. In order to counteract these effects, Clarins has especially developed the Nutri-Lumière range, using an exclusive synergy of plant-based extracts that will help you achieve a luminous, healthy-looking complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins Nutri-Lumière Nourishing Revitalizing Day Cream after cleansing and preparing the skin with Clarins Nutri-Lumière Renewing Treatment Essence. Begin by warming a small amount of the day cream between your palms. Then, using the natural weight of your hands, distribute the product evenly over the face and neck. Finally, using the exclusive Clarins Draining Pressure Method, apply pressure to the face in order to stimulate circulation, boost radiance, and restore firmness to the skin: press three times on the cheeks, three times on the forehead, and five times on the neck and décolleté.

description: Vichy Liftactiv Supreme Day Cream SPF30 is an antiaging day cream that hydrates, firms and smooths the skin while protecting from solar radiation. With a unique formula, this daily moisturizer contains Hyaluronic Acid of low and high molecular weight. It can deeply moisturize the skin, hydrating, plumping, and enhancing elasticity while reducing fine lines and wrinkles. With a lightweight creamy texture, it is also enriched with Niacinamide and solar filtres. It strengthens the skin barrier and offers SPF30 protecting the skin from external aggressions and the harmful effects of solar radiation. All-in-all, it is a daily moisturizer that fights aging signs while protecting the skin for a radiant and youthful look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Vichy Liftactiv Supreme Day Cream SPF30 in the morning, onto previously cleansed and dry skin, with a gentle massage.

description:
DR. GRANDEL Elements Of Nature Anti Age Cream is the ideal cream for those who are particularly interested in preventing premature signs of aging. From fine lines to first wrinkles, this cream has a visible smoothing effect and makes the skin more even and younger. Additionally, it offers a delicate 24-hour care thanks to its rich formulation with carotene and calcium. Both promote and support collagen synthesis and the development and maintenance of its fibers. Furthermore, these ingredients promote cell regeneration, helps to repair damage caused to the skin by environmental influences, and smooth fine lines and wrinkles for supple and younger skin.
This cream also helps to keep the skin moisturized to further enhance its appearance with the argan and wheat germ oils used in the formulation. Overall, this product is the perfect addition to the skincare routine of those who want to keep their skin youthful and healthy-looking for longer.
The DR. GRANDEL Elements of Nature range bears the ECO Control seal of approval thus meeting high standards of quality, sustainability, and environmental protection.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply DR. GRANDEL Elements Of Nature Anti Age Cream in the evening, after cleansing, to the face, neck, and décolleté.

description: ISDINCEUTICS Glicoisdin 25 Intense Facial Gel With Peeling Effect is the perfect night cream to help your skin regain a healthy and revitalized look. With intense exfoliating action, it can refine the skin texture and renew the complexion lending you a smoother, even, and also radiant skin. Starring Glycolic Acid, this night cream will help remove the outermost layer of dead cells and stimulate cell renewal. So, besides reducing imperfections, it will provide anti-aging benefits helping reduce fine lines and wrinkles. Specially formulated for oily to combination skin with imperfections, it has a pleasant gel texture enriched with Aloe Vera. With moisturizing and also anti-inflammatory properties it is ideal to calm irritations, and keep your skin hydrated and soothed. All-in-all, it is the ideal night cream for those who have oily skin with imperfections and are worried about the appearance of aging signs.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply ISDINCEUTICS Glicoisdin 25 Intense Facial Gel With Peeling Effect in the evening to cleansed skin. Gently massage until fully absorbed. If you don't use products with exfoliating acids you should start with low concentrations and increase as tolerated. Keep in mind that when applying a product with exfoliating acids it is also important to apply sunscreen during the day to protect the skin from solar radiation.

description:
DR. GRANDEL Nutri Sensation Revitalizer is a regenerating facial cream that firms and invigorates the skin with energy. The texture is refreshing and lightweight, suitable for normal to oily skin types, including sensitive and reactive skin.
The formula is enriched with powerful ingredients that not only promote comfort but also rejuvenating results. Lifting Peptide Complex helps to redefine the facial contours while improving firmness. At the same time, the Age corrector complex works to minimize the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, contributing to youthful-looking skin. In addition, Raspberry Seed Oil - rich in Vitamin E and Omega-6 - contributes to regenerate the skin and to keep the skin hydrated. Including this cream onto your skincare regimen, the skin is instantly replenished with vitality and radiance. Day after day, the skin looks firmer, smoother and refreshed with renewed energy.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with, thoroughly cleanse and tone the skin. The following step is to apply your favorite eye cream and/or serum, and then apply the DR. GRANDEL Nutri Sensation Revitalizer. Smooth the cream from the center of the face outwards, massaging it gently onto the face and neck.

description:
DR. GRANDEL Hydro Active Balancer is a refreshing and hydrating moisturizer that instantly replenishes your skin. Suitable for normal to oily skin types, this facial cream has a lightweight texture that is easily absorbed. This smart formula helps to balance excess oil all the while deeply hydrating the skin.
A thoughtful blend of complementary ingredients is the secret for visible results. To begin with, Algae Sea Water Complex not only refreshes but also hydrates the skin. In order to balance the skin and reduce excess sebum, the formula combines Squalane and Jojoba oil. Additionally, Babassu oil instantly soothes and moisturizes the skin. Equally important, the formula doesn't contain alcohol. This facial cream works as a hydration source to the skin, essential to balance excess oil and dehydration. Use it every day after cleansing and applying your favorite eye cream to achieve luminous and hydrated skin!
how_to_use:
How to use
Smooth a small amount of the DR. GRANDEL Hydro Active Balancer onto the face and neck after cleansing the skin and applying your favorite eye cream.

description: Uriage Eau Thermale Water Cream SPF20 is a light nourishing care for normal to combination skin exposed to sun and pollution. Its non-greasy texture is rapidly absorbed, leaving the skin soft, hydrated and radiant. The Hydro-Thermal Complex is responsible for moisturizing gradually the skin through the day and rebuilding the skin barrier, acting on the corneocyte cement, and so limiting the dehydration. The SPF20 anti-pollution filter and Vitamins C and E forms a shield that protects the skin from the UVA and UVB rays and from the urban pollution.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Eau Thermale Water Cream SPF20 daily in the morning on the face and neck clean skin.

description:
MISSHA Bee Pollen Renew Cream is a daily cream for normal to dry skin types. This cream has renewing and strengthening properties that help to completely revitalize the complexion. With Bee Pollen, rich in proteins, vitamins, and minerals, the formula has antioxidant benefits that tackle dull and tired skin. It will also improve skin elasticity and firmness by filling in skin cells with moisture. All in all, this cream is sure to visibly improve not only skin density and fine lines but also its vitality and radiance. The powerful active ingredients will further improve the skin condition by restoring the protective layer of the skin and strengthening cell metabolism and regeneration. On one hand, Propolis Extract improves blood circulation and provides a restorative and tonic effect. On the other hand, Edelweiss Callus Extract helps to improve the skin appearance by diminishing signs of fatigue and evening out the skin tone.
The dense formula of this cream provides intense moisture and is mild enough for sensitive skin. Additionally, it tightly adheres to the skin providing a pleasant application. It will leave the skin fresh, healthy, and glowing.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take the necessary amount with the built-in spatula. Then apply MISSHA Bee Pollen Renew Cream over the face and gently pat until fully absorbed.

description: Vichy Neovadiol Rose Platinum Night Cream is a cream specifically designed for post-menopausal women who tend to suffer from both pillow lines and dullness of the skin. With the process of aging, the skin loses its ability to recover its shape and gets thinner and more fragile. Enriched with fortifying calcium, nourishing beeswax and invigorating plant sugars, this cream boosts the skin's radiance and provides a healthy apperance. All the while, it smoothes pillow lines and offers an intense comfort sensation. Furthermore, the fresh cream has a delightful rosy scent and has a very pleasurable application. Lastly, within 1 month, the skin becomes smoother and visibly radiant.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Vichy Neovadiol Rose Platinum Night Cream onto previously cleansed skin with a light massage. Apply on the face and neck, in the evening.

description: Vichy Aqualia Thermal Rehydrating Cream Gel is a refreshing gel cream for normal to combination skin which helps to deeply hydrate the skin. Its anti-pollution protection helps to ensure that the skin is protected against external aggressors. Inspired by high-performance athletes, this new formulation of the Aqualia range grants up to 48 hours of hydration in a modern-looking new packaging, thanks to the isotonic hydration it provides. The skin becomes able to withstand thermal shocks of up to 15 degrees without losing the hydration levels. Tested on sensitive skins, the formulas guarantee a hypoallergenic treatment that has undergone dermatological tests with zero reactions.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Vichy Aqualia Thermal Rehydrating Cream Gel in the morning and evening, onto cleansed skin, with a light massage. Suitable for the face, neck and chest.

description: Vichy Neovadiol Rose Platinum Cream is a cream specifically designed for post-menopausal women who tend to suffer density and colour loss. With the process of aging, the skin loses its ability to recover its shape and gets thinner and more fragile.
