This cream boosts in 89% the skin nourishment, unifies the skin tone by 83% and reduces the yellow undertone by 74%. The fresh cream has a delightful rosy scent and has a very pleasurable application. Within 1 month the skin becomes more flexible and is thicker and more resistant.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Vichy Neovadiol Rose Platinum Cream onto previously cleansed skin with a light massage. Apply on the face and neck, in the morning.

description:
SVR Xerial DM Psoriasis Treatment Face And Body Cream 200ml (6.8floz) is a medical device specifically designed to address the symptoms associated with psoriasis, including plaques, scales, itching, and redness. Suitable for use on both the face and body, including joints and flexible areas, this cream works by exerting a keratolytic action on the skin. For that purpose, the formula boasts a high-dose dermatological active complex, including 15% pure urea and a marine exopolysaccharide derived from Breton red algae. This combination offers a keratolytic action that targets thick plaques and scales while providing hydration, further increased by emollient ingredients.
As a result, this product helps reduce scaly plaques and the thickness of red and hardened plaques while diminishing redness and itching. Its film-forming cream texture provides added protection while ensuring a comfortable, non-greasy, and non-sticky finish. In summary, this product stands as a solution for managing the symptoms of psoriasis. With clinically proven efficacy and a user-friendly texture, it provides relief for individuals dealing with this condition.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply SVR Xerial DM Psoriasis Treatment Face And Body Cream 200ml (6.8floz) twice a day in a thick layer to the affected areas of the face and body and massage gently. Do not use it for more than 30 days.

description:
NUXE Nuxuriance Ultra The Global Anti-Aging Night Cream 50ml (1.7floz) is particularly formulated to address the comprehensive needs of aging skin, specifically during the nighttime. At the core of this night cream is ALFA [3R] technology which harnesses the power of three key ingredients: alfalfa seed extract, hyaluronic acid, and Hemerocallis fulva extract. These ingredients work in harmony to offer a potent anti-aging action that revitalizes, renews, and resurfaces the skin. This night cream deeply nourishes and comforts the skin while also boosting skin's firmness by 38% after consistent nighttime use. In the morning, users can expect to see visible improvements in their skin's condition. For 75% of women, skin appears repaired, while 70% report smoothed wrinkles, and 80% feel their skin is rested and refreshed.
This product stands out not only for its formula but also for its unique sensorial experience. The unctuous texture suits all skin types while its modern and elegant feminine scent enhances the application experience. In summary, this cream offers a global anti-aging action to visibly correct the main signs of aging while sleeping.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Nuxuriance Ultra The Global Anti-Aging Night Cream 50ml (1.7floz) to the face, neck, and décolleté.
Notes
This product has a new packaging and formula.

description:
Clarins Multi-Active Glow Boosting Emulsion 100ml (3.4floz) specifically meets the demands of skin exposed to the stresses of daily life. With 93% ingredients of natural origin, this smoothing and radiance-boosting formula features the [Skin Charger Complex], a dynamic duo of niacinamide and sea holly extract. This powerful combination works diligently to reduce the visible signs of aging and fatigue, enhance skin radiance, and smooth its texture. Additionally, the formula is enriched with revitalizing teasel extract, which energizes the skin, strawberry tree extract, known for its ability to refine skin texture and minimize the appearance of pores, and tapioca starch which provides a mattifying effect. In addition, the formula contains Clarins exclusive Anti-Pollution Complex to protect the skin from environmental aggressions such as pollution and blue light.
Furthermore, the lightweight and fresh texture is ideal to suit the needs of normal to combination skin. And equally important, the fragrance of this emulsion is specially designed to relieve stress, featuring an energizing scent. In summary, this product offers an anti-aging action to revive skin luminosity, smooth wrinkles and refine skin texture.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, take a small amount of Clarins Multi-Active Glow Boosting Emulsion 100ml (3.4floz) and warm the product between your palms. Then, apply light pressing motions to the face and neck, starting from the center of the face outwards.

description:
Frezyderm Ac-Norm Total Control Cream 50ml (1.69floz) is a specialized cream designed to address the full spectrum of acne symptoms, ranging from mild to severe. This innovative product stands out with its blend of ingredients, targeting acne and inflammation. At the core of its effectiveness is a unique combination of bakuchiol, niacinamide, and salicylic acid. This trio works in harmony to regulate oil production, combat acne and reduce inflammation. Additionally, the cream contains Nigella sativa and Cucurbita pepo contribute with sebum adsorbing properties while Magnolia extract and Epilobium angustifolium bolster the anti-bacterial, anti-inflammatory, anti-irritant, and antioxidant action. Moreover, β-glucan improves the skin barrier and the emollient action is supported by linoleic acid and vitamin F. Lastly, this cream leaves a matte finish.
Equally important, in addition to tackling acne this cream grants optimal hydration, promoting skin comfort and well-being. It is suitable to be used in conjunction with medications and is an excellent option for maintenance following medical treatments for acne.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Frezyderm Ac-Norm Total Control Cream 50ml (1.69floz) to clean, dry skin one to three times a day.  Wait for at least 5 to 7 minutes before applying sunscreen.

description:
Teaology Kombucha Tea Revitalizing Face Cream is a skincare formulation dedicated to preventing and correcting the first signs of aging. It combines two natural and antioxidant-rich ingredients: Kombucha and Black tea. So, Kombucha, a fermented tea, plays an important role in the cream's formulation. It is rich in probiotics and B vitamins, which help to strengthen the skin's defenses and visibly improve its quality. Kombucha nourishes the skin and helps to fortify it against external stressors. The cream also features an infusion of black tea sourced from Kinihira, in the Rulindo District of Rwanda. It is obtained by utilizing Teaology's patented Tea Infusion Skincare technology, to harness the maximum beneficial properties of the tea. This infusion is particularly rich in antioxidants like epigallocatechin (EGCG), which are crucial in protecting the skin from free radical damage, one of the key factors in skin aging. ECGC also helps promote collagen production in the skin. 
Moreover, hyaluronic acid delivers its moisturizing properties. This ingredient is known for its ability to retain water, thereby keeping the skin hydrated and plump. So, the combination of these ingredients contributes to protect the skin from environmental damage and slow down the appearance of aging signs. An interesting aspect of this cream is its yellow color, which offers a corrective action on discolorations like the purple of capillaries and dark circles, leaving the face with a brighter, more even tone. last but not least, in line with Teaology's commitment to eco-responsible beauty, the Kombucha Revitalizing Cream comes in a refillable jar. This design allows users to limit their environmental impact without compromising on their beauty routine.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Teaology Kombucha Tea Revitalizing Face Cream onto clean skin of the face and neck. Then, gently massage it using light, circular movements.

description:
DR. GRANDEL High Excellence The Cream 24-Hour High-Tech Anti-Aging Cream 50ml (1.69floz) is a global anti-aging solution that addresses a spectrum of concerns including wrinkles, age spots, moisture loss, and dullness. For that purpose, the formula features a blend of high-tech active ingredients that not only smooth, firm, and tighten the skin but also ensure more moisture, evenness, and radiance. To begin with, Retin Royal, an ester of retinol, smooths lines and wrinkles while promoting a smoother complexion. Moreover, the serum's Multiple Hyaluron delivers a profound moisturizing boost for lasting hydration. In addition, an Even Glow complex works to enhance the skin's evenness and radiance.
Suitable for individuals with normal to dry skin seeking a comprehensive solution to the myriad signs of aging, this cream offers a harmonious blend of moisture, evenness, and radiance with a softly melting texture. In summary, this cream is a great ally in the quest for a smooth, firm, and youthful complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a hazelnut-sized amount of DR. GRANDEL High Excellence The Cream 24-Hour High-Tech Anti-Aging Cream 50ml (1.69floz) to the face, neck, and décolleté in the morning and evening.

description:
Mizon Phyto Plump Collagen Night Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) is specifically for nighttime use, aiming to rejuvenate and repair the skin while you sleep. This rich cream is formulated to soothe and freshen your skin, recovering it from the day's stresses and ensuring it remains hydrated throughout the night. Its key function is to provide intensive moisture while calming and soothing the skin, helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The cream boasts a blend of ingredients with anti-aging and hydrating properties. The formula includes Tremella Fuciformis polysaccharide, which helps to plump and firm the skin, reducing the appearance of aging signs such as loss of elasticity and fine lines. Further enriching the cream's anti-aging properties are adenosine and niacinamide which brightens the complexion. Moreover, a brown algae complex alongside panthenol, betaine, and squalane soothes and moisturizes the skin to leave it soft and supple.
In summary, this night cream is ideal for anyone looking to address signs of aging and maintain a youthful, radiant complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mizon Phyto Plump Collagen Night Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to the face and neck in the evening routine.

description:
Mádara SOS+ Sensitive Night Cream 70ml (2.36 fl oz) is an expertly formulated facial moisturizer designed specifically for those with sensitive, redness-prone skin. For that purpose, the fragrance-free formula features specific ingredients to provide sensitive skin with the utmost care. This deeply moisturizing night cream combines the hydrating powers of hyaluronic acid and jojoba oil to ensure your skin remains moisturized. At the same time, the inclusion of red algae extract provides an immediate soothing effect. Moreover, this extract helps to balance the skin's microbiome, thereby enhancing its resilience. Suitable for all skin types, especially those prone to sensitivity, redness, and reactivity, this night cream works to relieve discomfort and minimize the appearance of redness as well as relieve discomfort, burning, and flushing. Its dermatologically proven formula and rich texture make it a great choice for anyone looking to calm, soothe, and deeply hydrate their skin while ensuring lasting comfort overnight.
Lastly, this product was developed in cooperation with the Finnish Allergy, Skin, and Asthma Federation. In short, this night cream offers calming, soothing hydration for sensitive and redness-prone skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mádara SOS+ Sensitive Night Cream 70ml (2.36 fl oz) to clean, dry skin in the evening.

description:
One Thing Centella Soothing Cream 100ml (3.38 fl oz) is a moisturizer that caters to the specific needs of sensitive skin. The star ingredient of this product, Centella asiatica extract, offers incredible soothing and anti-inflammatory properties. The formulation of this cream is not just about providing lightweight hydration, it also leverages the soothing benefits of Centella asiatica to leave the skin feeling soft and calm. This ingredient is celebrated for its ability to soothe the skin, strengthen the skin's barrier, aid in repair, and diminish inflammation and irritation. The formula is further enhanced by the inclusion of beta-glucan, with soothing and moisturizing properties. Given that, this cream is a great addition to the routine for those who often experience skin irritation or redness.
A standout feature of this product is its ultra-lightweight gel-like texture. It absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue, which makes it an ideal choice for all skin types, even oily and combination. Likewise, this cream provides a sense of freshness and leaves the skin with a healthy glow, making it a perfect addition to your skincare routine!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply One Thing Centella Soothing Cream 100ml (3.38 fl oz) to the skin and spread it evenly.

description:
Barr Centella Calming Barrier Cream 80ml (2.7 fl oz) caters to a wide range of skin types, from normal to dry, and is particularly beneficial for sensitive, hypersensitive, combination, oily, redness-prone, and dehydrated skin. At the heart of its composition lies 64% Centella Asiatica, a revered ingredient known for its calming properties, making it an ideal choice for skin that is easily irritated. In addition to Centella Asiatica, the cream is enriched with 1% panthenol, 1% squalane, and 1% jojoba seed oil. On one hand, panthenol aids in reducing redness and inflammation while also hydrating the skin. On the other hand, squalane and jojoba seed oil deeply hydrate the skin.
This cream distinguishes itself with a unique white buttery texture that, despite appearing thick and heavy, surprises with its non-greasy finish upon application. It leaves the skin feeling soft and smooth without any stickiness. Designed to soothe and hydrate, the cream is particularly effective as a calming care treatment after exfoliating, when the skin is most in need of gentle, restorative care. In summary, this cream offers a soothing and hydrating experience, ideal for anyone with dehydrated skin that tends towards irritation or needs barrier care.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Barr Centella Calming Barrier Cream 80ml (2.7 fl oz) to the face and neck.

description:
Mizon Phyto Plump Collagen Day Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) is specifically designed for daytime use, aiming to refresh and hydrate the skin throughout the day. This lightweight gel cream is formulated to fight aging signs, hydrate, and invigorate the skin, maintaining optimal moisture levels. Its key function is to provide continuous hydration while helping to diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The cream features a blend of ingredients known for their anti-aging and hydrating properties. The formula includes Tremella Fuciformis polysaccharide, which helps to plump and firm the skin, reducing visible signs of aging such as loss of elasticity and fine lines. The cream's rejuvenating properties are further enhanced by adenosine and niacinamide which brightens the complexion.
Additionally, a brown algae complex alongside panthenol and betaine soothes and moisturizes the skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and ready to face the day. In summary, this day cream is ideal for anyone looking to address signs of aging and maintain a youthful, radiant complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mizon Phyto Plump Collagen Day Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to the face and neck in the morning routine.

description:
Mizon Cicaluronic Gel Treatment 50ml (1.69 fl oz) features the Cicaluronic Complex™, a blend that leverages the soothing and moisturizing properties of Centella asiatica and hyaluronic acid. As a result, the formula offers a dual action of calming the skin while delivering essential hydration. Additionally, the formula contains panthenol, a well-known skincare ingredient for its moisturizing and soothing properties. This helps in maintaining the skin’s softness and elasticity. Last but not least,  Melia Azadirachta flower extract is rich in antioxidants, which play a vital role in protecting the skin from oxidative stress, contributing to the maintenance of a healthy and balanced complexion.
One of the key characteristics of this gel treatment is its texture. Easily absorbed, it provides moisture without leaving a sticky residue, making it particularly suitable for those with oily skin. That said, even though this product is suitable for all skin types, it is particularly recommended for sensitive, dehydrated, and oily skin. In summary, this gel treatment serves as a rescue product that you can apply whenever your skin needs to calm down!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mizon Cicaluronic Gel Treatment 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to the skin and tap gently as you apply for better absorption. Reapply as necessary.

description:
Ziaja Lifting Solution Anti-Wrinkle Day Cream SPF10 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is an anti-wrinkle and lifting cream with a moisturizing formula. It is especially recommended for those aged 40 and above. This cream boasts a vegan formula that contains peptides and ursolic acid, which promote collagen production, help smooth wrinkles, and enhance skin firmness. In addition to its anti-wrinkle and firming effects, this cream offers a unique lifting action thanks to a polymer derived from sweet almond proteins. This ingredient forms an elastic film on the skin, giving an instant effect that helps to lift the facial features. 
The cream also contains an SPF 10 filter, offering protection against sun radiation. All in all, this product delivers a comprehensive approach to anti-aging, addressing multiple signs of aging while keeping the skin hydrated and protected.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Lifting Solution Anti-Wrinkle Day Cream SPF10 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto previously cleansed skin of the face, avoiding the eye area. Then, gently massage until the product fully absorbs.

description:
Ziaja Lifting Solution Anti-Wrinkle Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is an anti-wrinkle and lifting cream especially recommended for those aged 40 and above. This cream boasts a vegan formula with 90% ingredients of natural origin. It contains peptides that promote collagen production, helping to smooth wrinkles and enhance skin firmness. Moreover, ursolic acid enhances this effect, helping to maintain the skin's elasticity. Last but not least, panthenol helps maintain the skin's hydration levels.
This cream's texture is rich, providing hydration and comfort to dry skin types. All in all, this product helps address signs of aging such as wrinkles and loss of firmness during a restful night of sleep.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Lifting Solution Anti-Wrinkle Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto previously cleansed skin of the face. Then, gently massage until the product fully absorbs. For best results, pair this product with the day cream of the same range.

description:
Clarins My Clarins Re-Boost Rich Hydra-Nourishing Cream 50ml (1.7 oz) is a rich, creamy formula particularly designed to intensely nourish dry skin, offering a comforting, cocoon-like effect. This ultra-nourishing cream stands out for its unique composition, featuring the Healthy Plant Complex which includes organic coconut water and organic alpenrose extract. This complex offers nutrition and antioxidant benefits thus promoting a healthy-looking complexion. In addition, the cream includes organic goji berry extract, a component especially renowned for its energy-boosting properties. Given that, this natural ingredient plays a crucial role in revitalizing the skin, contributing to a more vibrant and energetic complexion. Furthermore, the inclusion of acerola seed extract boosts skin radiance as well. Last but not least, organic fig extract boosts skin hydration whereas shea butter offers nourishing benefits.
The rich, comforting texture is another highlight, delivering a cloud of softness upon application. Notably, 31% of women reported that their skin feels more comfortable after using this cream. This is a significant indicator of the product's ability to enhance skin comfort. Additionally, there is a 29% decrease in skin dryness as reported by the users, further affirming the cream’s hydrating properties. In summary, this moisturizer is particularly suitable for dry skin, presenting a hydrating formula and luxurious texture to provide intense nourishment and comfort.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins My Clarins Re-Boost Rich Hydra-Nourishing Cream 50ml (1.7 oz) to clean, dry skin.

description:
coxir Ceramide Milk Drop Cream 50ml (1.69floz) is a daily moisturizer that helps hydrate, soothe, and protect the skin. As the name of the product suggests, ceramides are a key ingredient in this formula. This ingredient delivers its moisture-retention capabilities and vital role in maintaining a healthy skin barrier. So, by incorporating ceramides, the cream ensures the skin stays hydrated and protected throughout the day. Adding to the cream's properties are lactose and avocado, offering further protection and nourishment and contributing to the skin's overall health and resilience.
Moreover, this moisturizer has an innovative cream texture that transforms into tiny water droplets upon application. This unique transformation allows for quick hydration and nutrient delivery to the skin without leaving any sticky residue behind. So, the result is skin that remains soft, naturally glowy, and thoroughly moisturized. All in all, this moisturizer is an ideal choice for anyone looking to maintain hydrated, soothed, and protected skin. Suitable for daily use on all skin types, its formulation and transformative texture provide a refreshing and soft finish that anyone can enjoy.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of coxir Ceramide Milk Drop Cream 50ml (1.69floz) onto the skin of the face. Then, gently massage in circular motions until the product fully absorbs.

description:
coxir Intensive EGF Peptide Emulsion 100ml (3.38floz) is a lightweight moisturizer imbued with anti-aging properties, helping to diminish the appearance of wrinkles and enhance skin elasticity and firmness. At the heart of its formula lies EGF (Epidermal Growth Factor), an ingredient with the ability to stimulate cell proliferation. This feature supports the skin’s revitalization and renewal processes, therefore promoting a more youthful and rejuvenated complexion. Complementing the action of EGF, this emulsion also incorporates a peptide that helps boost the production of collagen and elastin within the skin. These proteins are important for maintaining skin elasticity, contributing to a smoother and firmer complexion. 
Collagen plays a further role in the formula, offering hydration to ensure a plumper appearance. So, this helps to keep the skin smooth, supple, and hydrated. All in all, this product is a great option for those seeking a lightweight moisturizer that addresses signs of aging, in order to maintain their skin’s youthful elasticity and firmness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of coxir Intensive EGF Peptide Emulsion 100ml (3.38floz) onto clean and toned skin of the face. Then, gently massage the skin until the product fully absorbs.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products:

Martiderm Acniover Active Cremigel Anti-Imperfections 40ml
Martiderm Acniover Cicavent 40ml
Martiderm Acniover Purifying Gel 14ml

Martiderm Acniover Active Cremigel Anti-Imperfections is a gel cream that regulates sebum production and minimizes pores, blackheads, and pimples. Due to the presence of Salicylic Acid, this product is not only able to regulate the production of sebum but also provides a keratolytic and antimicrobial action. Combined with Niacinamide, it also helps soothe the skin and improve the appearance of acne marks, giving the skin a more even tone. Lastly, with Botanical Bioactive Ingredients, this gel cream also helps restore the skin barrier and mattify the skin.
Martiderm Acniover Cicavent was specifically formulated to prevent and reduce post-acne marks. In this way, this cream is ideal for combination to oily skin, especially acne-prone, with post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation. On one hand, the formula contains an extract from Centella Asiatica with ingredients that promote skin repair. On the other hand, a depigmenting complex containing both Tranexamic acid and Niacinamide, not only prevents but also reduces the appearance of hyperpigmentation as well as redness. At the same time, Prebiotics strengthen the skin barrier.
Martiderm Acniover Purifying Gel is a cleansing gel for oily skin that is prone to acne. This formula respects the skin's balance and doesn't dry the skin, but it still removes excess sebum and purifies the skin. This gel has a 100% antibacterial effect and in combination with Cremigel reduces blemishes by 83% and reduces sebum by 70% according to a test performed by the Dermatology Service of Gregorio Marañón Hospital in Madrid. This gel has an incredibly fresh scent and doesn't give a pulling sensation, making the skin comfortable and properly cleansed.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Poremizing Light Gel Cream 75ml (2.53 fl oz) is designed to soothe the skin while helping to decrease the visibility of enlarged pores. At its core, a combination of ingredients works together to deliver these benefits. First, Himalayan pink salt, rich in mineral contents, creates an osmotic pressure that helps to draw out dirt and impurities from within the pores. So, this gel-cream ensures that pores remain clean, therefore minimizing their appearance. Moreover, the combination of adenosine and U-active® Real Vera steps in to boost the skin's elasticity, so that pores are tighter and less noticeable. Additionally, niacinamide delivers a brightening effect, further decreasing the pores' visibility. Last but not least, the inclusion of soothing ingredients delivers a calming effect to decrease skin irritation. One of these is Centella asiatica sourced from Madagascar, recognized for its soothing attributes.
This cream's texture has a light gel consistency that delivers a soothing and cooling sensation, revitalizing the skin. In sum, this product helps to soothe the skin while purifying and boosting the skin's elasticity, therefore decreasing the visibility of pores.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Poremizing Light Gel Cream 75ml (2.53 fl oz) to clean, dry skin. Gently massage the skin until the product fully absorbs.

description:
SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Cream 75ml (2.53 fl oz) steps in as a reliable ally for your skin's daily challenges. When your skin is faced with the brunt of external aggressors, this lightweight moisturizer is a great choice. It focuses on calming, hydrating, and nourishing the skin, thanks to its formula with ingredients that deliver many beneficial effects. So, Centella asiatica extract from Madagascar brings its renowned soothing and moisturizing benefits. Additionally, squalane helps to minimize moisture loss, acting as an efficient emollient. When applied, this cream creates a protective hydration layer. This ensures that, throughout the day, the skin retains its essential hydration, staying resilient and soft. 
This cream's texture is also noteworthy. It is smooth yet lightweight, so it doesn't feel heavy on the skin. Post-application, it leaves behind skin that feels calm, touchably soft, and smooth. In summary, this product presents a great solution for skin seeking calmness, hydration, and protection from external aggressions, making it soft, soothed, and resilient.
how_to_use:
How to use
First, apply an appropriate amount of SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Cream 75ml (2.53 fl oz) onto previously cleansed skin. Then, gently massage the skin until the product fully absorbs.

description:
Teaology Matcha Tea Ultra-Firming Face Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) helps to firm and redensify the skin while providing a smoothing and concealing effect, making it a multifaceted solution for those seeking firmer, more refined skin. 
To begin with, it contains Matcha, a type of green tea. Matcha boasts a deep green color and a rich concentration of natural antioxidants, minerals, and vitamins. The Organic Matcha Tea infusion in this product is created using Teaology's patented Tea Infusion Skincare® technology. This process preserves a high amount of nutrients from the tea leaves, such as antioxidant catechins, minerals, vitamins, and amino acids. This extract then replaces water in the formula, to maximize its antioxidant benefits for the skin. The cream is then enhanced with a specially selected complex of nine ingredients, which work together to deliver lifting, redensifying, and smoothing properties to the complexion. This includes Cellynkage®, micro-seaweed polysaccharides, omega 3 and 6 fatty acids, green tea extract, marula oil, watermelon extract, apple extract, and lentil extract. 
The texture of this cream is velvety and blends seamlessly into the skin. The green color of Matcha Tea also offers a concealing action, reducing the appearance of redness and blemishes. Additionally, mineral pigments and powders in the cream create a "soft focus effect," helping to smooth and even out the complexion for a more refined look. Comprising 97% ingredients of natural origin, this firming face cream shows Teaology's commitment to blending effective skincare with natural ingredients. Using it is a daily ritual that nourishes the skin while providing a visible refining, lifting, and smoothing effect.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Teaology Matcha Tea Ultra-Firming Face Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) onto clean skin of the face and neck. Then, gently massage it using light, circular movements.

description:
Dr. Ceuracle 5a Control Clearing Cream 50g (1.76oz) is the go-to moisturizer for those with oily skin. Expertly formulated to regulate the oil-moisture balance, this cream works to reduce excess shine and sebum while simultaneously providing hydration to the skin. Powered by its active 5α Complex, the cream diligently targets and diminishes excess oil production, ensuring your skin remains balanced throughout the day. And, a blend of hydrating ingredients such as aloe vera provides a boost of hydration, helping to restore the moisture levels of dehydrated skin. Moreover, beyond its oil-control and hydrating properties, this cream offers soothing benefits that calm irritated skin, for example during acne breakouts. The result is skin that feels soft, refreshed, and comfortably balanced. 
Say goodbye to heavy, greasy formulas, as the lightweight jelly texture of this product melts seamlessly into the skin, providing all-day comfort without unwanted shine. All in all, choose it for a clearer, softer, and more balanced complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Ceuracle 5a Control Clearing Cream 50g (1.76oz) onto previously cleansed skin, gently massaging until full absorption of the product. You can also use it as an overnight soothing mask, by applying a thicker layer onto the skin.

description: Dr. Ceuracle Cica Regen 95 Soothing Gel 110g (3.88 oz) is formulated to address the needs of red, irritated, and damaged skin. In fact, at its core, a Cica Complex containing 95% Centella asiatica, madecassoside, asiaticoside, madecassic acid, and asiatic acid works synergistically to moisturize, soothe, and repair damaged and irritated skin. Moreover, this gel is enhanced with the attributes of kiwi berry extract, which helps to safeguard the skin from environmental aggressors, including fine dust. This is fortified with antioxidant-rich hibiscus extract and lotus flower extract, ensuring protection against free radical damage. Last but not least, it delivers long-lasting moisture, ensuring that the skin remains hydrated and comforted throughout the day. This gel has a lightweight and refreshing texture that quickly blends into the skin without leaving any sticky feeling. Lastly, it is fragrance-free. All in all, this product is a great option for anyone in search of a solution for their stressed skin!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an even layer of Dr. Ceuracle Cica Regen 95 Soothing Gel 110g (3.88 oz) to previously cleansed skin and leave it on like a mask.

description:
Sensilis Pure Age Perfection [Retinal] Redensifying & Perfecting Treatment 50ml (1.69 fl oz) combines anti-acne and anti-aging properties. This treatment is indicated for oily, acne-prone skin, including in cases of adult acne and sensitive skin. In other words, this product addresses the needs of sensitive skin while tackling acne concerns and, simultaneously, skin aging. This is because of an incredible formula that features Retinal, Prebiotics, and a Growth factor. On one hand, Retinal is an anti-aging ingredient by excellence while also having antibacterial properties. As such, it helps with both skin aging and acne. On the other hand, Prebiotics keep the microbiome balance while TGFB2 is a growth factor that stimulates collagen synthesis to provide an anti-aging action.
As a matter of fact, this product is able to increase collagen synthesis by 69%! In just one month, it reduces wrinkles by 40% and imperfections by 50%. At the same time, it leaves the skin softer and more even. In conclusion, this treatment will fight acne and skin aging, even if you have sensitive skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sensilis Pure Age Perfection [Retinal] Redensifying & Perfecting Treatment 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to clean, dry skin of the face in the evening routine.

description:
Dr. Botanicals Unique Treatments Seaweed Repairing and Restoring Anti-Ageing Day Moisturiser 60ml (2.0floz) is a nourishing moisturizer that helps restore the skin. With a strong belief that natural plant extracts and oils can make a visible difference to the skin, this moisturizer is enriched with Seaweed. This ingredient provides an anti-aging action thanks to its ability to protect the skin from external aggressions. At the same time, it balances and hydrates the skin. In addition, the formula features Aloe Vera and Hemp Seed oil with excellent hydrating and nourishing properties. And lastly, Cucumber extract is rich in vitamins, including vitamin K which will help reduce puffiness and dark circles in the eye area.
Also important to note, this moisturizer contains a vegan and natural formula with 99,7% ingredients of natural origin. All in all, is the ideal moisturizer to add to your morning routine to protect, hydrate and nourish the skin. It will replenish the skin with nutrition and fight skin aging, leaving your complexion refreshed.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Botanicals Unique Treatments Seaweed Repairing and Restoring Anti-Ageing Day Moisturiser 60ml (2.0floz) to clean, and dry skin of the face every morning.

description:
Eve Lom TLC Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) is a cream that deeply nourishes and soothes the skin. TLC means "tender loving care", and this cream will make your skin feel soft, smooth, and comfortable, while providing a relaxing moment during application. Indeed, due to its emollient and hydrating ingredients, it nourishes and hydrates the skin for up to eight hours after its application. Bulgarian rose oil, crafted from delicate Bulgarian rose petals, gives this cream an enticing aroma, for a relaxing and luxurious experience. Even more, extracts of Calendula and Arnica help to soothe the skin.  
This cream comforts and nourishes the skin, making it excellent for nightly use on dry or mature skin. It can also be used as a nourishing daily cream for all skin types' neck and cleavage areas.
how_to_use:
How to use
Warm up a small amount of Eve Lom TLC Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) between the hands. Apply onto previously cleansed skin of the face, neck, or cleavage areas, gently massaging the skin. For better hydrating results, also add the Eve Lom Moisture Mask to your routine.

description:
Eve Lom Time Retreat Intensive Night Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) is a luxurious night cream designed for targeting wrinkles and fine lines, while nourishing and hydrating the skin. This cream's rich texture melts onto the skin, providing comfort and nourishment without leaving the skin greasy. A blend of anti-aging ingredients such as retinol and peptides helps to visibly reduce wrinkles and fine lines. In fact, liposome-encapsulated retinol is one of this cream's actives. Liposomes allow retinol to penetrate more effectively into the skin. So, retinol stays on the surface of the skin for less time, not irritating the skin. Therefore, you'll be able to access the benefits of this well-known ingredient in a gentle way. 
Even more, this cream nourishes the skin and hydrates it up to 24 hours after application. The addition of ingredients such as aloe vera and allantoin provides soothing effects. The skin becomes softer, smoother, and plump, with less visible signs of aging. This cream is suited for all skin types, especially for dry and mature skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Eve Lom Time Retreat Intensive Night Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) onto dry skin of the face, after the cleansing ritual. Gently massage the skin using circular motions, until the product is fully absorbed. Apply sunscreen on the following morning, before and during sun exposure.

description:
Collistar Lift HD+ Lifting Eye And Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) offers a revolutionary solution for rejuvenating the skin around the eyes and lips. The key to this remarkable product lies in its unique ingredients and approach. That said, this range takes inspiration from muscle memory to provide you with a lifting and firming action. The formula stars 100% Italian Tea Rose Water coupled with Tens-Activ® and Lift HD+ Complex. These ingredients work synergically to boost the production of elastin and collagen and consequently, help firm and lift the skin. As such, this cream restores firmness in the eye and lip contour areas, while also reducing eye bags and dark circles. The overall effect is a more youthful-looking complexion.
Besides the powerful formula, the texture is incredible as well. This luxurious cream has a melting and velvety texture that provides an instant feeling of comfort while providing a pleasant sensory experience. As a last note, the formula is vegan and silicone-free. To sum up, with its advanced formula and cutting-edge technology, this cream provides a firming anti-aging action.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Collistar Lift HD+ Lifting Eye And Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) to the eye contour area and lip contour.

description:
Evolve Pro+ Ectoin Soothing Cream 60ml (2floz) is specially formulated for sensitive skin, offering the epitome of skin tolerance and soothing effectiveness. For that purpose, this moisturizer blends natural ingredients in an organic vegan formula that calms the skin. This formula stars ectoin, a multi-targeted ingredient that offers a protective barrier to shield the skin from environmental stressors, such as pollutants and UV radiation. At the same time, this ingredient hydrates and soothes the skin in addition to providing anti-aging benefits. Furthermore, Chaga mushroom extract strengthens the skin barrier and reinforces skin protection. In this way, this moisturizer reinforces the skin barrier, protecting the skin from sensitivity. Last but not least, camellia oil in the formula restores moisture and nourishes the skin, relieving it from dryness and flakiness.
The result is soothed skin, with less irritation and minimized redness. As a last note, this moisturizer features a hypoallergenic and fragrance-free formula. In summary, this product takes care of the needs of sensitive skin, providing soothing hydration that brings ultimate relief.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Evolve Pro+ Ectoin Soothing Cream 60ml (2floz) to clean, dry skin of the face and neck.

description:
TONYMOLY Triple Collagen Total Tension Cream 80ml (2.70 fl oz) offers a harmonious trifecta of benefits - hydration, anti-aging, and radiance. What sets this cream apart is the innovative triple collagen complex, an exceptional blend of three different types of collagen that work in harmony to restore elasticity, structure, and suppleness to the skin. In fact, this collagen trio comprises vegan collagen, soluble collagen, and atelocollagen to ensure the maximum potency of collagen's benefits, delivering visibly plumper and firmer skin. At the same time, the patented Collagen Boom™ also works to improve skin elasticity. In addition, the formula is incredibly moisturizing due to a Moist-7 complex with hyaluronic acid, alongside aquaporin.
Last but not least, glutathione, vitamin C and niacinamide help achieve a brighter, even-toned complexion. As a result, this moisturizer counteracts dull skin with a lack of elasticity for a brighter, firmer, plumper complexion. Ultimately, this product helps to counteract the effects of reduced collagen production that happens with skin aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply TONYMOLY Triple Collagen Total Tension Cream 80ml (2.70 fl oz) to clean, dry skin of the face in the morning and evening routine.

description:
Dr. PawPaw Peach Pink Balm 10ml (0.33 fl oz) is a multipurpose product that can be used in many different ways! This is because this product features an incredible formula that delivers multiple benefits. On one hand, the star ingredient Pawpaw (Papaya Fruit) rejuvenates, hydrates, and soothes the skin and lips. Furthermore, the formula contains Aloe vera with hydrating and soothing properties as well as Olive oil and Castor oil, nourishing oils that deliver intense nourishment. Because it is tinted, this product is perfect to apply to the lips, cheeks, and eyes. It gives a pop of color and instantly brightens the complexion! Besides, you can build its intensity by applying as much or as little as you like. Therefore, this product allows for creating unique looks that are perfectly suitable whether for day or night looks.
To sum up, this balm not only nourishes, soothes, and hydrates but also adds color to your complexion. Suitable for all skin types and all ages, this product is a true multitasker and this mini version is perfect to carry anywhere with you.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. PawPaw Peach Pink Balm 10ml (0.33 fl oz) using the applicator to lips, cheeks, or eyes. Then, blend with your fingers or a makeup brush.

description:
COSRX The Retinol 0.1 Cream 20ml mainly targets the early signs of aging. For this purpose, this cream features a powerful formula with 0,1% Retinol. This ingredient is highly effective at fighting skin aging, minimizing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles as well as improving skin elasticity. In addition, Super Vitamin E and Adenosine in the formula work in synergy with Retinol to provide high anti-aging efficacy. As a matter of fact, in just four weeks, this cream visibly improves wrinkles and elasticity, delivering a full lifting effect. On the other hand, in the same time period, this cream can also minimize acne blemishes and reduce excess sebum. This is because Retinol can also target acne. In this way, this cream is suitable for acne-prone skin too. 
At the same time, this cream delivers retinol with low irritation and, as such, is suitable for retinol beginners. You can start by applying it only on the concerned areas such as the forehead, eye area, or nasolabial fold, where wrinkles are most visible. In conclusion, it will lend the skin a youthful and radiant appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Start by applying COSRX The Retinol 0.1 Cream 20ml on the concerned areas (forehead, eye area, nasolabial fold, neck, etc.) every other night. After building tolerance, apply a pea-sized amount to the entire face every night.

description:
Payot Source Adaptogen Moisturizing Gel 50ml (1.6 fl oz) is a moisturizer with a biomimetic skincare formula. In detail, this moisturizer features a powerful combination of Hyaluronic acid and two adaptogen plants to provide the skin with intense moisture. Composed of a Breton Algae and Reishi Mushroom, this formula resorts to the power of these plants to resist and adapt to environmental changes. In this way, this moisturizer recharges the skin with moisture and helps it fight daily environmental stress. As a matter of fact, it delivers lasting hydration for 48 hours. At the same time, it strengthens the skin's ability to adapt to a constantly changing environment.
Equally amazing, the texture is a lightweight gel that is non-sticky and anti-shine, being ideal for normal to combination skin. In conclusion, with 94% ingredients of natural origin, this incredible moisturizer quenches thirsty skin and provides a feeling of freshness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Payot Source Adaptogen Moisturizing Gel 50ml (1.6 fl oz) to the face in the morning and/or evening routine.

description: Allegro Natura Purifying And Rebalancing Organic Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is specifically designed to nourish acne-prone skin, while helping to control the appearance of blemishes and regulate the production of sebum. To achieve this, the formula contains a blend of onion and organic hyssop extracts, that help to decrease excess oil, soothe the skin and limit the appearance of blemishes. Furthermore, celery and organic hops extracts provide additional soothing, toning, and antioxidant benefits. Last but not least, sesame and macadamia oils help to nourish and moisturize the skin, leaving it soft. This cream has a light texture, easily absorbing into the skin to deliver all of its benefits. In summary, this product helps to rebalance and improve the appearance of acne-prone skin, while decreasing excess oil.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an adequate amount of Allegro Natura Purifying And Rebalancing Organic Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto previously cleansed the skin of the face. Gently massage the skin, using circular motions, until the product completely absorbs.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description: Revolution Skincare Sali Hughes Cream Drench Rich Anytime Moisturiser 50ml (1.69 fl oz) was developed in collaboration with renowned beauty expert Sali Hughes to drench the skin in moisture. For this purpose, this product combines a rich cream texture with a powerful moisturizing formula. Indeed, at the heart of this formula is Hyaluronic acid, a well-known ingredient for its ability to retain water and, as such, replenish the skin with hydration. Additionally, Ceramides, Niacinamide, Squalane, and Glycerin work in synergy to deeply hydrate and lock in moisture. As a result, this moisturizer quenches even the thirstiest of skin and offers optimal hydration. Due to its rich creamy texture, this moisturizer works best for normal to dry skin in need of a hydration and comfort burst. All in all, this vegan moisturizer is a great addition to your routine whenever your skin feels parched.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Revolution Skincare Sali Hughes Cream Drench Rich Anytime Moisturiser 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to the face in the morning and/or evening routine. Additionally, you can apply it to the eye contour.

description:
Evolve Nightly Renew Facial Cream 60ml (2.0 fl oz) is a night cream that helps to hydrate, detoxify, and renew your skin while you sleep. Due to its creamy texture, the product effortlessly glides onto the skin. Formulated with Bio Retinol, it stimulates the production of collagen, giving your skin a plumper appearance while reducing fine lines and wrinkles. Also, Hyaluronic Acid works in synergy to provide intense hydration, thanks to its excellent water-retaining properties. Besides, enriched with Peony Extract, this facial cream promotes cell renewal and helps detoxify your skin, leaving it refreshed and revitalized. Vitamin E fortifies your skin's natural barrier against free radicals and oxidative stress, offering added protection and resilience.
 In addition, due to its Natural Fragrance Blend this product helps you to fall asleep quicker while also providing better quality sleep, making this the perfect addition to your nighttime routine.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Evolve Nightly Renew Facial Cream 60ml (2.0 fl oz) onto cleansed skin. Apply onto the face, neck, and decoleté with soft circular motions.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Clarins Extra-Firming Day Cream SPF15 is an anti-aging cream that reduces multiple signs of aging while protects the skin from the sun and the harmful effects of pollution. The cream has a silky and refreshing texture that instantly comforts and replenishes the skin with radiance. In order to achieve a pleasant texture and visible anti-aging results, the formula combines powerful botanicals. To begin with, Mitracarpus and Kangaroo Flower help to minimize the appearance of wrinkles and improve the skin's firmness. To further improve anti-aging results, Oat smoothes wrinkles and softens the skin. Additionally, Acerola Fruit enhances the skin's natural oxygenation while Desert Date helps to even the complexion. Equally important, the formula excludes alcohol and parabens.
The moisturizer is fundamental in your skincare routine. If you want to go beyond the basics, an anti-aging moisturizer with sun protection is the best solution. Not only it replenishes the skin with hydration and comfort but also rejuvenates and protects from the sun and other external aggressors. Ultimately, this unique moisturizer comforts the skin, improves radiance and firmness, diminishes the wrinkles' depth while softens the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, cleanse and tone the skin. Secondly, apply your favorite serum. Lastly, apply the Clarins Extra-Firming Day Cream SPF15. To achieve better results, warm the product onto the hands before applying. Then, massage it gently to the face and neck, starting from the center of the face and working it outward.

description:
Shiseido Vital Perfection Overnight Firming Treatment is a restorative face cream that fights aging signs and other localized imperfections while you sleep. Due to the advanced science behind this light-textured cream, your skin will gain back its elasticity, without relinquishing any of the necessary protection. Furthermore, it minimizes issues like dull skin, dryness, loss of firmness, and the appearance of wrinkles. The path towards an invigorated, more youthful complexion is just a few small portions away.
Lastly, Shiseido's innovative V8 and ReNeura technologies form an alliance that reduces dark spots and evens skin tone. All in all, they offer a perfect match for cell regeneration.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Shiseido Vital Perfection Overnight Firming Treatment to finish your beauty regime, at nighttime. Take the spatula that comes in the package and retrieve two tiny portions. Using your ring finger, spread the cream across four specific zones: your forehead, cheekbones, nose, and chin. Ideally, the direction of each motion should be from the center of your face outwards. Massage delicately until the product is fully absorbed.

description: Weleda Almond Soothing Facial Cream is a rich, deeply calming product for dry skin with signs of sensitivity. Sensitive dry skin is easily upset and, therefore, needs the most delicate and supportive care. With this in mind, Weleda has formulated this rich daily cream, which is suitable for use in the morning and evening. Infused with the properties of sweet almond oil, this rich, enveloping care product moisturizes the skin and stabilizes its protective layer. Moreover, it acts on the main signs of skin sensitivity; it relieves dryness, redness and itching in order to restore balance and comfort to the complexion. Rapidly-absorbed and fragrance-free, this cream leaves the skin feeling soft and pampered, ready to face the day with newfound balance and serenity.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Sweet almond oil is a fine, light oil which is ideal for the care of sensitive skin. Rich in unsaturated fatty acids, this emollient oil is also rich in antioxidants, such as vitamins B and E. In order to use this nurturing ingredient in its formulas, Weleda works with the Manan cooperative in the Valencia region of Spain, where almonds are sustainably grown.
how_to_use:
How to use
Every morning and evening, after cleansing, apply Weleda Almond Soothing Facial Cream to the face, neck, and decolletage. Massage gently in order to stimulate absorption. Leave on for a few moments, then apply make-up if desired. If you're looking for a lighter moisturizer for normal to combination skin, try Weleda Almond Soothing Facial Lotion.

description:
Dr. Botanicals Hemp Seed Oil Renewing Night Moisturiser is a rejuvenating cream that smoothes, relaxes and regenerates the skin overnight. This cream has a unique vegan formula made exclusively from natural ingredients, with a strong belief in the unlimited power of botanicals. The key ingredients that empower this moisturizer are Hemp seed oil, Coconut oil and Retinol. The Hamp seed oil intensely nourishes and moisturizes the skin while also protects from free radicals damage. Similarly, Coconut oil offers antioxidant protection and helps both to restore and hydrate the skin. Also, Retinol helps to minimize the appearance of signs of premature aging and pores. Equally important, the brand doesn't test on animals and excludes alcohol, parabens and silicones from the ingredients list.
A night cream is an important step of your evening routine to immediately replenish the skin with comfort and to boost the natural overnight renewal process. With this natural solution, you are not only offering a boost of hydration to your skin but also incorporating your eco-friendly beliefs into your skincare routine. With continued use, the skin is more hydrated and signs of premature aging are minimized. The skin looks more radiant, healthy and rejuvenated.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, cleanse and tone the skin. Secondly, apply the Dr. Botanicals Hemp Seed Oil Renewing Night Moisturiser onto the face and neck, and smooth it gently from the center of the face, working it outwards.

description: Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream Skin Protectant is an award-winning skin protectant that deeply moisturizes and protects the skin any time, anywhere. This legendary formula is an incredibly complete moisturizer: it doubles as an emergency hand cream, lip balm, eyebrow gel, highlighter, and so much more! An instant success when it was launched, this product remains an essential part of the beauty rituals of make-up artists and beauty influencers worldwide. Moreover, clinical studies show it hydrates and protects the skin for eight hours!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream Skin Protectant anywhere on the body in order to obtain hydrated, healthy-looking skin.

description: Noreva Sedax Cream is indicated to relieve the sensation of itching of irritated skin: chicken pox, insect bites, allergies and other irritations.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Noreva Sedax Cream locally whenever you want, massaging until completely absorbed.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Laser X3 Night Care Cream is an intensive anti-aging moisturizing night cream that will help reduce overall wrinkles and provide radiance to the complexion. Its enriched formula with 3% of Pro-Xylane™ a patented active ingredient penetrates deeply into the skin and energizes the molecules accountable for protecting the skin against water loss by reinforcing the extracellular matrix. By doing so, this cream keeps your skin hydrated and minimizes its natural aging signs. Moreover, the Centella asiatica present confers exceptional antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties, hence boosting the natural skin repair process while you sleep all the while conferring a brighter and radiant appearance in the morning. Also, the fragmented hyaluronic acid in its composition is able to deeply moisturize the skin, thus reducing wrinkles and fine lines. This combination of active ingredients will lead to visible wrinkle reduction, a re-densified skin, and a renewed firmness.
Furthermore, its dermatologically tested formula is also suitable for sensitive skin. After a week of use, it is possible to see a significant improvement in overall wrinkles. After 4 weeks, the skin looks repaired with a smoother texture, resulting in a more radiant and rejuvenated appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Laser X3 Night Care Cream every evening after cleansing the complexion. Massage into the skin of both face and neck in circular motions. Its texture allows you to apply the cream like a face mask.

description:
Sophieskin Be Young Gem Filler Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a vegan moisturizer that fills the skin with nourishment while freeing it from expression lines and tackling signs of aging. As such, it restores skin firmness and elasticity while plumping it up and filling it with volume. Moreover, it is great to diminish first wrinkles but also repair deep ones.
Due to the RETIXPERT active-ingredient complex present in its formula, it provides an antioxidant action and boosts collagen production. As we age, the production of collagen, an essential vitamin for keeping our complexion plump, slows down. Thus, it is important to stimulate its synthesis. Additionally, this moisturizer has an anti-fatigue effect so that the skin feels renewed and revitalized. In the end, it is water resistant so it can be used by the pool or when practicing sports.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sophieskin Be Young Gem Filler Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) in the morning and evening, on previously cleansed and dry face, neck and décolleté. Firstly, spread the cream evenly and gently massage it. Then, let it absorb completely.

description:
COSRX Full Fit Propolis Light Cream 65ml (2.19 fl oz) nourishes the skin, being suitable for all skin types. With this in mind, this moisturizing cream has a rich formula that stars Black Bee Propolis but a lightweight texture that easily absorbs into the skin. That said, Black Bee Propolis is responsible for hydrating and strengthening the skin barrier. At the same time, Royal Jelly and Honey extracts also contribute to nourishing the skin and provide it with antioxidant benefits. As a result, this moisturizer deeply hydrates the skin, lending it plumpness and suppleness. All this, while boosting skin radiance thus delivering a glowing complexion.
In conclusion, this dermatologist-tested moisturizer targets dullness and dehydration as well as rough skin and fine lines.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply COSRX Full Fit Propolis Light Cream 65ml (2.19 fl oz) to clean and dry face both in the morning and evening routine. Massage until complete absorption.

description:
Collistar Pure Actives Salicylic Acid + Niacinamide Lotion 100ml (3.3 fl oz) is a liquid solution that complements your anti-blemish routine. As a matter of fact, this lotion features Salicylic acid and Niacinamide, which work together to fight blemishes and excess sebum. On one hand, Salicylic acid is known for its purifying properties. Consequently, it helps to reduce blemishes and also regulates excess sebum. In addition, it provides a mild exfoliation that will enhance other products and actives penetration into the skin for a powerful effect. On the other hand, Niacinamide is a multi-tasker ingredient that is added here in the formula mainly to reduce pore size and enhance the luminosity of the complexion. Besides, this ingredient also helps control excess sebum while hydrating the skin.
Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive ones, this lotion has a pleasant non-greasy texture that is quickly absorbed. In short, it provides multiple benefits. It helps minimize blemishes and pores, enhances other products' penetration, and boosts the radiance of the skin. In the end, the skin is luminous and purified. So, if you have occasional blemishes, large pores, or even dullness, this is a great step to add to your routine.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Collistar Pure Actives Salicylic Acid + Niacinamide Lotion 100ml (3.3 fl oz) with a cotton pad or reusable alternative to the face both morning and evening, after cleansing.

description:
Clarins Extra-Firming Regenerating Night Rich Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) nourishes and revitalizes your skin while you rest. With ingredients such as Kangaroo Flower Extract or Shea Butter, this unique moisturizer will plump and tone your skin, resulting in a more sculpted and youthful visage. Moreover, with consistent use, it will even reduce aging signs such as fine lines or wrinkles.
Suitable for all skin types, from dry to oily or combination, this night cream absorbs easily into the skin without leaving a greasy residue. You may rest easy, knowing that as you sleep, your skin is being treated to the finest ingredients nature has to offer. Come the morning, and your skin will look and feel refreshed, rejuvenated, and revitalized. And so will you.
how_to_use:
How to use
After cleansing your face and removing all makeup traces, apply Clarins Extra-Firming Regenerating Night Rich Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) to your skin. Start on the nose and cheeks and move outwards with gentle, circular, and upward motions.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products:

NUXE Crème Prodigieuse Gel Cream 40m
NUXE Very Rose 3-in-1 Soothing Micellar Water 50ml

Nuxe Crème Prodigieuse Boost Multi-Correction Gel Cream is a day cream for people who feel their skin is dull and starting to show its first wrinkles, with a refreshing texture and a delicate fragrance that boosts the skin's radiance and fights the first signs of premature aging. The daily life of women between 25 and 39 years old is usually dull and with signs of fatigue due to constant stress, lack of sleep, and environmental hazards like pollution. Nuxe has developed a solution for the first wrinkles that contains a powerful antioxidant cocktail of botanical origin and cell activity boosters in order to fight fatigue and erase the first signs of aging.
NUXE Very Rose 3-in-1 Soothing Micellar Water was specially formulated to gently but effectively cleanse the skin. Being an important step in our daily skincare routine, it is important to use a cleanser that respects the natural balance of the skin. With a unique formula that suits all skin types, including sensitive skin, this soothing micellar water can not only remove impurities and makeup but also soothe and comfort the skin. It contains a combination of botanical origin elements such as Rose Floral Water and the Skin-Respect Complex. These ingredients, besides perfectly cleansing the skin, can also strengthen the skin barrier while soothing and comforting.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Estée Lauder Re-Nutriv Ultimate Lift Regenerating Creme Rich is an exquisite anti-aging treatment that minimizes lines and wrinkles, while improving firmness and contours definition. A golden packaging is the beginning of an inspiring and luxurious sensation. Accordingly to the packaging, the texture is rich and nourishing to offer the ultimate moisturizing experience. When it comes to results, the ingredients are the key to unluck youth. To begin with, Argireline efficiently decreases lines and wrinkles depth, with such successful results that are often compared with a cosmetic procedure. Together with Arginine, Milk Peptide Complex and Acetyl Glucosamine work to reduce the wrinkles' appearance. Additionally, the Milk Peptide Complex is a powerful ingredient to improve firmness and to redefine the face contours. Equally important, Hyaluronic Acid deeply hydrates, protects the skin and helps water-soluble actives to penetrate deeper to achieve better results.
A moisturizer is an essential daily step to hydrate and provide comfort to dry skin. Using this unique treatment, the skin is more hydrated, radiant, the wrinkles' depth is minimized and the skin looks more firm with redefined contours, day after day.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, thoroughly cleanse and tone the skin. Secondly, apply your favorite serum. Lastly, gently massage Estée Lauder Re-Nutriv Ultimate Lift Regenerating Creme Rich over the face and neck, working from the center of the face, out and upwards.

description:
Uriage Age Lift Peel New Skin Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is the new Uriage Age Protect Multi-Action Peeling Night Cream, keeping the same formula. This renewing cream acts during the night for a peeling effect thus revealing glowing radiance in the morning. That said, this cream contains AHA, responsible for exfoliating the skin, along with Hyaluronic acid for an intensive anti-aging action. On one hand, AHAs remove dead skin cells and promote skin renewal which will result in a smoother and brighter complexion. On the other hand, Hyaluronic acid is capable of deeply hydrating and plumping the skin. As a result, this night cream reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while improving skin texture and tone.
Furthermore, the formula also protects from blue light and pollution damaging effects. In conclusion, night after night this cream improves wrinkles and firmness while providing a gentle peeling effect for a smoother and brighter complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Age Lift Peel New Skin Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) in the evening, once or twice a week, on cleansed and dry skin. Avoid contact with the eyes. In case of tingling sensations, space out the application.

description:
Uriage Age Lift Firming Smoothing Day Cream 40ml (1.35 fl oz) replaces Uriage Age Protect Multi-Action Cream, keeping the same formula. That said, this rich cream is ideal for normal to dry skin. It acts on both wrinkles and firmness while protecting the skin from daily external aggressions namely blue light, UV rays, pollution, stress, and fatigue. Firstly, the formula contains a Retinol derivative coupled with Hyaluronic acid for an intensive anti-aging effect. Together these ingredients work synergically to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while improving skin firmness. Then, Blue Light Barrier complex protects from blue light damaging effects while Filmexel avoids the adhesion of pollution particles. Lastly, Shea butter provides nourishment and suppleness to the skin.
In conclusion, this moisturizer provides firmer and smoother skin, visibly reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles at the same time it improves skin firmness for more defined contours.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Age Lift Firming Smoothing Day Cream 40ml (1.35 fl oz) in the morning to clean and dry skin. Avoid contact with the eyes. In case of tingling sensations, space out the application.

description:
Frudia Citrus Brightening Cream will leave your skin glowing. Due to a vitamin-rich formula with 61% of Citrus Extract, this cream brightens up dark spots such as blemishes and freckles and revives dull skin while evening the tone. On top of this, this tangerine brightening cream has a texture that makes for an easy application that leaves the skin feeling smooth and moist. Within four weeks, you'll be able to see the results: improved brightness and decreased melanin and pigmentation effects! 
Frudia is a Korean skincare brand, the result of more than 30 years of development and research. Their products make maximum use of antioxidant-rich plants and fruit extracts. The patented R VITA W technology reduces the destruction of nutrients and vitamins from the fruits used in the products so that their effects are optimized!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Frudia Citrus Brightening Cream at the last step of your skincare routine. Apply a suitable amount and gently tap it until the skin absorbs it completely.

description:
L'Occitane Shea Butter Ultra Rich Face Cream protects the skin against environmental damage while preserving its softness and comfort.
Among the 95% of natural-origin ingredients in its formula a high-quantity (25%) of nourishing Shea Butter. Harvested according to the local traditions in Burkina Faso, it is part of a sustainable, fair trade supply chain to ensure ethical practices. As a result of this conscientious effort, this Shea Butter is particularly rich in Omega 6 and Karitene, which results in a significantly more nourishing and soothing cream. Not only that, but the skin complexion is also hydrated and moisturized for up to 72 hours.
Bash in the long-lasting comfort and nourishment this moisturizer provides and feel your skin become softer and suppler with every use.
how_to_use:
How to use
Warm a small quantity of L'Occitane Shea Butter Ultra Rich Face Cream in between your hands. Then, apply it to your skin with gentle pats to boost microcirculation, starting from the chin and moving upwards towards the forehead. Lastly, don't forget the neck and décolleté areas.

description:
SENSAI Cellular Performance Advanced Day Cream SPF30 50ml (1.7 oz) is a daily solution that offers a global anti-aging effect while protecting your skin from external aggressors. To begin with, this multipurpose formula promises to address five different aging concerns: dryness, sagging, fine lines, wrinkles, and dullness. As a result, the SENSAI Cellular Performance Advanced Day Cream visibly contributes to a more radiant, smooth, and silkier complexion. At the same time, with SPF30, this moisturizer is perfect to enjoy efficient daily protection against sun exposure and the damage it causes.  
Last but not least, all of these benefits are provided by an uplifting multisensory experience. On one side, the feather-light consistency of this cream creates an instant feeling of comfort and luxury. Simultaneously, the SENSAI Cellular Performance Advanced Day Cream has a zesty fragrance that will surely energize both your skin and senses.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use SENSAI Cellular Performance Advanced Day Cream SPF30 50ml (1.7 oz) as your selected moisturizer during your regular morning routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the dry and clean skin of your face and blend gently for maximum absorption. Lastly, explore the remaining SENSAI skincare range to complement your skincare regime for optimal results.

description:
Frudia Avocado Enzyme Relief Peeling Gel 120g (4.23 oz) is perfect for removing old dead skin. With an acidic and enzymatic composition, derived from fruits, this gel removes impurities from the skin and protects the skin barrier in order to provide a glowing complexion. Additionally, mixing avocado with other naturally derived oils nourishes the skin and leaves it clean and smooth.
Frudia is a Korean skincare brand, the result of more than 30 years of development and research. Their products make maximum use of antioxidant-rich plants and fruit extracts. The patented R VITA W technology reduces the destruction of nutrients and vitamins from the fruits used in the products so that their effects are optimized!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Frudia Avocado Enzyme Relief Peeling Gel 120g (4.23 oz) to previously clean and dry skin. Then massage gently and intensively to remove impurities. Finally, rinse thoroughly with warm water to remove the product.

description:
Erborian Bamboo Matte Lotion 190ml (6.4 fl oz) is a mattifying lotion ideal for normal to oily skin. This toner combines a liquid phase infused with the exclusive Bamboo Waterlock complex and a mattifying powder that absorbs excess sebum. On one hand, the Bamboo Waterlock complex includes both bamboo fibers and sap to deliver intense hydration and comfort to the skin. On the other hand, the mattifying powders work on reducing excess sebum and thus reduce the shine and the appearance of pores.
Furthermore, the formula also contains Willow Bark extract that besides having antioxidant properties, benefits the skin with anti-inflammatory qualities. Indeed, this lotion delivers a soothing action. Important to realize this is a toner so it is meant to be applied after cleansing the skin. However, you can also apply this formula over makeup throughout the day to control the appearance of shine. To conclude, this lotion instantly mattifies and hydrates the complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Erborian Bamboo Matte Lotion 190ml (6.4 fl oz) on the skin of both the face and neck by soaking a cotton pad or using your fingers. Use it both in the morning and evening, after cleansing. In addition, it can be used throughout the day as well. Do not rinse.

description:
Arganicare Collagen Boost Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer SPF25 50ml (1.7 fl oz) blends active ingredients with UV protection to shield the skin from the damaging effects of UV exposure, thus fighting against aging signs.
Among its star ingredients is Argan Oil, ideal to smooth out wrinkles and fine lines, and Hyaluronic Acid, which plumps up the skin. Additionally, UV protection helps protect the skin against free radicals. As a result, this moisturizer is ideal to both visibly revert aging signs, such as wrinkles, age spots, or loss of firmness, but also minimize the aging effect of UV rays on the skin.
With daily use, the skin will retain more of its moisture and elasticity. The result will be firmer skin, with a younger and beautiful glow to it.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Arganicare Collagen Boost Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer SPF25 50ml (1.7 fl oz) as part of your daily skincare routine or right before sun exposure. Massage a generous amount on the clean skin of your face and neck until completely absorbed. Reapply prior to sun exposure or when the skin feels dry and/or tight.

description:
Arganicare Collagen Boost Rejuvenating Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) moisturizes and smooths the skin by decreasing fine lines and wrinkles. By reinforcing the natural recovery process of the skin, it helps diminish signs of fatigue and recharge the skin’s complexion.
With Argan Oil and Collagen boosters, this overnight rejuvenator both minimizes skin inflation while also smoothing uneven skin texture and improving its elasticity and firmness. As a result, it visibly decreases signs of fatigue and aging of the skin. You will wake up with a skin complexion that both feel more comfortable and smoother but also looks well-rested and radiant.
how_to_use:
How to use
Gently apply Arganicare Collagen Boost Rejuvenating Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) before bedtime on previously cleansed skin. Focus mostly on the face, neck, and any areas where discoloration and brown spots may occur.

description:
Arganicare Aloe Hydra Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a soothing and restorative cream for all skin types. Due to its high concentration of antioxidants and revitalizing vitamins, it deeply hydrates the skin while slowing down the signs of aging.
Among its main ingredients is Hyaluronic Acid. Naturally found in the skin, it stimulates collagen production, strengthening the skin while keeping it hydrated. In addition, Arganicare Aloe Hydra Night Cream also includes Aloe Vera Extract and Vitamin E. The result is a rich, nourishing night cream that offers optimal hydration and softens wrinkles and fine lines.
Moreover, the advanced formula also does not include parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and mineral oils in its constitution. Undoubtedly, this night cream will improve the skin, while you rest, resulting in a luminous and radiant complexion in the morning.
how_to_use:
How to use
Massage Arganicare Aloe Hydra Night Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) on freshly clean and dry skin until it is fully absorbed.

description:
Atashi Redensifying Moisturizer SPF15 50ml is a moisturizing cream that protects the skin from sun damage through an SPF 15 filter. As we age, the production of collagen, an essential vitamin for keeping our complexion plump, slows down. Thus, it is important to stimulate its synthesis. Due to the Gardenia Extract present in its formula, this cream boosts collagen synthesis by 33% and provides a lifting effect. As a result, it reduces expression lines and deep wrinkles, unifying the skin tone.
Thanks to the Mimosa, Jojoba and Sunflower extracts, this cream moisturizes in depth and provides a silky soft touch. At the same time, it improves the skin barrier so that the skin is protected from any damage.
While suitable for all skin types, it is especially effective on dry and sensitive skin. In the end, with its soothing texture, it applies easily and gives great moments of comfort that free the skin from stress and fatigue.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Atashi Redensifying Moisturizer SPF15 50ml in the morning on previously cleansed face, neck and décolleté. Start by spreading the product evenly with an upwards motion while applying light pressure.

description: Uriage Bariéderm Cica-Cream with Copper-Zinc SPF50+ is a multifunctional cream that repairs and insulates damaged and irritated skin while shielding it from the effects of sun radiation with SPF50+. Formulated with Copper and Zinc, which purify the skin and minimize irritation, and Uriage Thermal Water, which relieves sensations of discomfort, this product may be used on a variety of small skin lesions, such as scratches, insect bites, or post-shaving irritation. The fluid texture is easily applied and easily absorbed, for an instant feeling of comfort. The skin is 97% more repaired, while the formation of scars is significantly reduced.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Bariéderm Cica-Cream with Copper-Zinc SPF50+ to clean and dry skin. In case of sun exposure, reapply every two hours. Avoid the eye contour area.

description:
Topicrem Hydra+ Moisturizing Radiance Gel 40ml offers a fresh and melting watery texture perfect to deeply hydrate and soothe dehydrated and hypersensitive skin. That said, this smooth gel effortlessly adheres to the skin of the face and neck providing an intense feeling of hydration for 24 hours. On the other hand, another great benefit of this product is the fact that it fights against surface pollution particles that dull the complexion. In this sense, it ensures that the skin becomes visibly more radiant by repelling this accumulation of particles as well as by activating cell renewal to reveal radiant, luminous skin. In the end, the skin ends up being perfectly hydrated and soothed as well as much more naturally radiant.
The composition of this moisturizing gel has the presence of Bio-active water. It is composed of active dermatological ingredients such as Taurine, Inositol, and Betaine. Gently, this exclusive patent releases bioactivators on the skin's surface, which pulls water into the core of the cell. Thus, the tissues retain hydration, remaining supple and plump for longer. Finally, this dermatologically tested gel has a non-comedogenic formula that is truly suitable for all skin types. In short, through this gel, the skin is more radiant, with a refreshing sensation, and still intensely hydrated.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an adequate amount of Topicrem Hydra+ Moisturizing Radiance Gel 40ml to your clean, dry face and neck in the morning and/or evening. Massage without exerting force so that the gel is absorbed more quickly.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products: 
 
Galénic Diffuseur De Beauté Radiance Booster 50ml 
Galénic Beauté De Nuit Chrono-Active Aqua-Gel 15ml 
 
Galénic Diffuseur De Beauté Radiance Booster  is a gel-cream that gives an instant rosy effect and a long-lasting radiance to the skin.
