The real Ruby Microparticles that are visible on this skincare are responsible for giving the cheeks a rosy glow and an immediate light to the skin, and its cocktail of vitamins, blurring eraser and glycerin energize, moisturize and smooth the skin. It can be used daily, as treatment or just as make-up primer, always giving the skin a new glow.  
Galénic Beauté De Nuit Chrono-Active Aqua-Gel  is a night care product to moisturize and recover the skin while you sleep. With its ultra-fresh, opalescent, crystal-clear gel texture, this chrono-active "patch effect" aqua-gel is easily absorbed, offering a relaxing and hydrating bath to your skin. Thanks to the action of an enzyme derived from papaya, the dead cells are removed and the skin surface is renewed, for a radiant skin in the morning. Glycerin, Sorbitol, and Glucose are responsible for deeply hydrating the skin, while Hyaluronic Acid prevents the water loss. The skin gets relaxed, radiant, and younger-looking.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
DR. GRANDEL Sensi [Code] Rejuvenating Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) consists of a cream with strong anti-aging actions specially designed for sensitive skin looking for a more youthful and comforted complexion. Namely, this range by DR. GRANDEL has a calming effect thanks to their active ingredient concept. They reduce redness, strengthen the skin barrier function and thus make sensitive skin more resistant to external influences. The result is a visibly soothed, strengthened complexion with signs of age reduced and prevented. Finally, this cream also maintains the natural balance of the skin's microbiome, also leaving the skin fully balanced and more regularized.
The composition of this cream contains a Skin Calming Complex composed of Extracts of Reed and Fu Ling that protect against external environmental irritants and noticeably soothes existing stress symptoms. On the other hand, the presence of the famous Almond Oil provides a valuable oil to this formula that is intensively smoothing, strengthening, and moisturizing, ideal for dehydrated sensitive skin. Finally, Gotu Kola Extract supports the functions of the skin barrier for a calm and more even complexion while Lysate, from lactic acid bacteria, strengthens the natural barrier function of the skin.
All in all, this cream has a strong ability to soothe the skin's sensitivity while balancing it and strengthening its natural barrier. On the other hand, signs of age, even the most profound ones, are easily reduced and prevented from appearing, thus giving rise to a complexion that is not only soothed but rejuvenated.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a hazelnut-sized amount of DR. GRANDEL Sensi [Code] Rejuvenating Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) to the face, neck and décolleté in the morning and evening after cleansing and after applying a suitable eye care product.

description:
NUXE Crème Fraîche de Beauté 48h Moisturizing Mattifying Fluid 50ml is a moisturizer with mattifying properties ideal for combination skin. To that end, this formula combines Sweet Almond Plant Milk and Oil and “Hyaluronic-like” Red Seaweed Extract together with Cassava Powder. On one hand, the combination of Sweet Almond Plant Milk and Oil retains water deep inside the skin and consequently softens the skin and provides long-lasting moisture. On the other hand, the presence of a “Hyaluronic-like” Red Seaweed extract boosts and extends hydration for up to 48 hours. In addition, this formula contains Cassava Powder, a mattifying botanical powder.
Another key point of this range is its fragrance. In this case, the product has notes of Orange Blossom, Petitgrain, and Cedar. Furthermore, this formula contains 96% of natural origin ingredients while respecting the skin's microbiome. In conclusion, its ultra-fluid texture mattifies and hydrates the skin. Furthermore, tightens the pores and refines skin texture.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Crème Fraîche de Beauté 48h Moisturizing Mattifying Fluid 50ml in the morning and/or evening to the face, neck, and décolleté.

description:
Clarins Bright Plus Dark Spot-Targeting Moisturizing Emulsion 75ml (2.54fl oz) promises to become your best friend in the fight against dullness, dark spots and overall uneven skin. Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive ones, this powerful formula is part of the  Clarins Bright Plus  collection. This line of products resorts to a plant-based Brightening Complex - Organic Lady’s Mantle, Organic Sea Lily extracts, and Vitamin C – to counteract the damaging consequences of pollution, sun exposure and aging on the skin on the skin. Therefore, this exclusive component successfully targets dullness and dark spots through a potent brightening effect.  
Additionally, the Bright Plus Dark Spot-Targeting Moisturizing Emulsion also contains Rose Myrtle and Organic Acerola Seed Extract. These superfruits equally contribute to a healthier and more even-looking skin. Besides its astonishing benefits, this emulsion is also an easy and pleasant to use product. Infused with Organic Apricot Oil, this composition leaves the skin soft and comfortable after each application. In fact, the sensorial lotion consistency melts enjoyably on the skin leaving, as a result, a supple after-feel.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Clarins Bright Plus Dark Spot-Targeting Moisturizing Emulsion 75ml (2.54fl oz) as part of your morning and evening routine after your selected serum. Apply it to the clean and dry skin of the face and neck. Explore the remaining  Clarins Bright Plus  range to achieve optimal results.

description:
Shiseido WASO Shikulime Mega Hydrating Moisturizer 50ml (1.69fl oz) is an extremely hydrating, smooth cream that locks in moisture for 48-hours, making it perfect for normal to dry skin. Namely, this texture absorbs seamlessly, leaving the skin nourished, balanced, and healthy-looking without leaving behind a heavy or greasy feeling. Plus, it eliminates any feeling of discomfort caused by dry skin or even improves the feeling of roughness. In addition to its moisturizing ability, this cream also strengthens the barrier function of the skin of the face, making it visibly stronger. In the end, the skin looks completely healthy, radiant, and much more hydrated.
This Shiseido WASO range has a sustainable concept, a fact that can also be seen in the composition of its products created from Japanese ingredients. In this case, Japanese Shikuwasa Extract is a key ingredient in this formula that hydrates and preserves moisture levels while preventing skin problems. In turn, Hydro-Balancing Complex composed of Trehalose and Glycerin helps reinforce the skin's moisture barrier. This complex is designed to lock in moisture to provide skin with long-lasting hydration and avoid dryness. Finally, Botanical Plankton Extract helps to promote healthy-looking skin by leaving it more hydrated and radiant in the long term. As a final note, this entire range is about fundamentals, focusing on maximizing the benefits of what’s proven to work and leaving out unnecessary bells and whistles.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Shiseido WASO Shikulime Mega Hydrating Moisturizer 50ml (1.69fl oz) as the last step of your morning and night skincare routine. Taking two pearl-sized drops onto your fingertips, gently smooth over the skin after cleansing for mega hydration. Use this product before UV protection items in your morning skincare routine for extra protection.

description:
Shiseido Men Total Revitalizer Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) is a high-performance anti-aging cream specially designed for normal to dry men's skin. Namely, this luxurious cream not only intensely hydrates the skin for up to 48 hours but also helps to improve five skin aging concerns for men. In this case, it acts on wrinkles, sagging, dullness, roughness, and loss of firmness, leaving the skin smoother, rejuvenated, and restored. Moreover, this cream does not leave the skin greasy or sticky, having a fast absorption. In addition, free from parabens and mineral oils, it is suitable for even the most sensitive skin.
Furthermore, its composition has the presence of a Rice Bran Technology with the power to rejuvenate the entire complexion. Notably, Rice Bran Oil Complex helps to encourage the natural production of energy in cells that supports all cellular functions. Moreover, Xylitol enhances skin moisture and barrier function while Nicotinamide helps to encourage the natural production of collagen. In this way, the skin regains its firmness, becoming plumper and, thus, with less visible wrinkles and fine lines. In addition, Cornflower Extract helps to encourage the skin's restorative power against damage, leaving the skin feeling stronger. All in all, this luxurious and gentle cream works on the skin's deepest layers, helping to build strength and reduce signs of age. At the same time, the skin of the face is more hydrated and thus smoother and softer to the touch.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Shiseido Men Total Revitalizer Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) every morning and night after cleansing and/or shaving face. Take a pearl-sized drop onto fingertips and smooth evenly over the face.

description:
Revolution Skincare Vitamin C Moisture Cream 45ml (1.52fl oz) is a fluid and moisturizing daily cream perfect for all skin types. Specifically, this cream has glow-boosting abilities that completely transform your complexion. In turn, the skin is more hydrated, smoothed and with a much more uniform tone. In addition, the appearance of blemishes and dark spots are also reduced so that your entire skin is more attenuated.
The main star of this fluid cream is undoubtedly Vitamin C. In turn, it adheres to the skin effortlessly, leaving it renewed, revitalized and with an incredible radiance. In this sense, even the dullest skin is completely transformed into something extremely illuminated and with a super natural glow. Furthermore, the presence of Niacinamide also helps to brighten the complexion while evening out the skin tone. In this way, this ingredient reduces the appearance of blemishes and dark spots leaving the skin more attenuated. Moreover, Sunflower Seed Oil and Shea Butter intensely nourish the skin while the combo of Glycerin and Hyaluronic Acid hydrates it. That said, through these ingredients the skin gains a long-lasting hydration that ends up eliminating any type of dryness or feeling of discomfort such as tightness.
All in all, this fluid cream becomes a true ally when it comes to skin radiance. On the other hand, it moisturizes and nourishes it, leaving your face much smoother and softer to the touch. Finally, the skin is uniformed with its pigmentation much more faded.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Revolution Skincare Vitamin C Moisture Cream 45ml (1.52fl oz) to clean and dry face, morning and night for best results. Apply with small circular massages until the cream is absorbed.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Laser Pressed Night Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) is an intensive anti-aging cream perfect for all skin types. Specifically, this cream visibly reduces facial wrinkles as well as evens out the skin tone while hydrating it. Especially, when applied to the eye contour region, it also helps to smooth out fine lines created over time. Furthermore, all this is achievable as this cream is enriched with a duo of Retinol and Niacinamide.
Starting with Retinol, it is an ingredient known to fight signs of age that appear over time. Specifically, it fights deeper wrinkles in the skin and fine lines in certain areas of the face. In turn, this ingredient also has the ability to even out the texture of the skin, leaving it much smoother and without any kind of grain. Furthermore, regarding Niacinamide, it is a nutrient with the ability to brighten the skin for a healthier-looking complexion. In addition to all this, this formula also has 12% complex of soothing ingredients. These, in turn, help balance the two main ingredients leaving the skin more soothed, much more hydrated, and smoothed.
Regarding the packaging of this cream, it turns out to be more practical and hygienic as it dispenses only the amount of product necessary. Moreover, the cream does not come into contact with the air in order to preserve all its benefits. In summary, this night cream leaves the skin with wrinkles and fine lines less visible, the contours of the face are firmer and toned, the complexion is more even and brighter and the skin is actually much more hydrated. In addition, this cream is quickly absorbed into the skin without leaving a greasy feeling or even clogging the facial pores.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Laser Pressed Night Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) in stages to prevent the skin from becoming irritated in any way. Thus, apply the cream only twice in the first week at night with one pea-sized pump on the face, under eyes, and crow’s feet, being sure to avoid the eyelid. Use the pea-sized pump for the décolleté. In the second week, apply every other night. From here, apply nightly as tolerated.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Cell Renew Revitalizing Day Cream SPF30 50ml (1.69fl oz) provides help with regard to the skin's natural aging process. In this sense, this daily cream preserves and recovers the skin's antioxidant reserves for a natural skin renewal process. In other words, this cream promotes cell renewal of the skin of the face so that wrinkles and fine lines are smoothed. Furthermore, the skin ends up being much more hydrated, firm, toned, and radiant as before. As an extra action, this cream also has sun protection with SPF30 perfect to protect the skin from photoaging and damage caused by the sun.
All this is possible thanks to a formula with an exclusive Antioxidant Recovery Complex. In turn, it helps to recover the skin's antioxidant reserves day after day. Namely, these antioxidants come from the presence of Black Truffle and Fermented Black Tea. Thus, they join forces and refresh the epidermis, regenerating it deeply while also adding optimal hydration levels. Furthermore, the presence of Vitamin E gives the skin an extra antioxidant protection boost. Equally important, the custom-designed glass jar adds a sleek, modern, gold-finished touch to your day. Made with recycled and recyclable glass, this beautiful jar fosters sustainable practices without compromising its elegance. In short, day after day, this cream promotes visibly younger skin, by reducing the appearance of wrinkles, improving firmness and radiance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Cell Renew Revitalizing Day Cream SPF30 50ml (1.69fl oz) all over your face on a daily basis. Make sure you've cleaned the facial and neck areas appropriately before each application. For optimal results, spread the formula in circular as well as upward motions to facilitate absorption. Stay away from the eye contouring sections as you allow the cream to define the rest of your face. Finally, pair this with other anti-aging options from the same range or brand. Choose an eye cream or night moisturizer to complement/intensify its effects.

description: YOUTH LAB Check Matte Solution is an innovative and vegan skincare product that absorbs excess oil/sebum and creates a natural matte finish on the skin. The unique packaging contains a built-in cushion saturated with a lightweight translucent liquid that turns to powder on the skin, therefore creating a velvety soft finish. Also provided is a sponge applicator that is ideal to touch up the face throughout the day, without disturbing make-up or previous skincare products. At the same time, this product provides more than just the benefits of a blotting paper: it also minimizes the appearance of enlarged pores and provides a powerful anti-inflammatory and antioxidant action.
how_to_use:
How to use
After thoroughly cleansing your face, apply YOUTH LAB Check Matte Solution in the following manner: press the sponge applicator into the built-in cushion of the compact case, then pat onto the oily areas of the face. Reapply as desired throughout the day, even over make-up.
To refill the compact case, lift the built-in cushion and fill the base with YOUTH LAB Check Matte Refiller.

description: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ is a "genius moisturizer" that is suitable for both dry and combination skin types. With a silky consistency, this penetrating lotion melts seamlessly into the skin, therefore creating an immediate feeling of comfort. Thanks to a blend of ultra-nourishing ingredients, the glossy formula strengthens the skin's moisture barrier, delivering all-day hydration and preventing water loss. At the same time, the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ also increases radiance levels improving the overall appearance of your skin. The result? A plump and glowy complexion that looks younger for longer.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ as part of your regular morning and evening skincare routine to the clean and dry skin of the face and neck. Then, massage gently in order to stimulate absorption. For the best results possible, complement with other products from the same range.

description:
Martiderm Amatist Day Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) provides daily care to mature skin improving its global condition through a moisturizing, revitalizing and comforting action. Inspired by the soothing benefits of the amatist stone, this unique cream contributes to not only softer but also firmer and brighter skin. It does so through a powerful trio of active ingredients that ensure an overall younger-looking complexion.  
On one side, the presence of Phyto-retinol helps to decrease the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. Simultaneously, Rosehip offers antioxidant and regenerating benefits, boosting the skin’s own collagen production, as well. Last but not least, the Amatist Day Cream also contains Hyaluronic Acid, a replenishing component that improves hydration levels while equally preventing moisture loss.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Martiderm Amatist Day Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) as part of your morning routine as your selected moisturizer. Apply an appropriate amount of the formula to the dry and clean skin of your face, neck and décolleté . Then, massage gently for maximum absorption. Complement its use with other products from the same range in order to obtain optimal results.

description: Martiderm The Originals Pro-Reg Cream 15 is an intensive regenerating night cream that evens out the skin tone while re-firming the skin and improving its levels of hydration. Thanks to a blend of highly moisturizing and renovating ingredients, such as Alpha Hydroxy Acids and probiotics, this product actively reduces wrinkles and delays their appearance. The skin feels hydrated and nourished, an effect which is further reinforced by the velvety gel-in-oil texture, which leaves a supple feeling on the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Martiderm The Originals Pro-Reg Cream 15 to the face, neck and neckline. Massage gently until product has been fully absorbed. Avoid contact with the eyes. Use of a high sun protection factor (SPF 50+) is recommended during the day.

description: Noreva Norelift Chrono-Filler Night Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) is a firming night cream perfect for normal to dry skin. That said, this cream acts overnight on your skin in order to firm it up, thus increasing its production of collagen and elastin. Through these, the skin ends up with a more rejuvenated and fuller appearance and with fewer fine lines and visible wrinkles. This is possible thanks to the presence of the active ElastigenFGF, an ingredient that stimulates fibroblast growth factors in order to provide a greater production of collagen and elastin. Furthermore, the presence of Hyaluronic Acid helps to provide an enormous hydration boost to the skin so that it ends up feeling more hydrated, smoothed, and supple. Additionally, this ingredient fills the skin when it penetrates to smooth out fine lines and wrinkles. Finally, this cream rich in antioxidants helps to repair the skin's barrier so that it is strengthened and helps to retain moisture longer. All in all, through this cream cell renewal is stimulated so that you wake up in the morning with a smoother, hydrated complexion, smoothed wrinkles, and even more luminous and firmer skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Noreva Norelift Chrono-Filler Night Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) in the night to your cleansed face.

description:
Caudalie Vinergetic C+ 3-In-1 Vitamin C Energy Moisturizer 40ml (1.35floz) is an all-in-one formula that promises to simplify your caring routine by focusing on hydration, radiance and protection, at the same time. To begin with, the Vinergetic C+ 3-In-1 Energy Moisturizer works towards optimal levels of hydration. Thanks to the presence of Hyaluronic Acid on the composition, this cream not only boosts skin hydration but also helps the skin to hold in the moisture. Simultaneously, this formula equally contains Vitamin C+ and Polyphenols. Since they are ultra-rich in antioxidants, these ingredients are perfect when it comes to illuminating the skin and shielding it from pollution damage. In fact, and according to the brand, the Vinergetic C+ 3-In-1 Energy Moisturizer is capable of providing anti-pollution protection for up to eight hours.
To finish, the Vinergetic C+ 3-In-1 Energy Moisturizer follows the brand’s guidelines regarding sustainability. This is a vegan composition that contains 97% of ingredients from a natural origin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Caudalie Vinergetic C+ 3-In-1 Vitamin C Energy Moisturizer 40ml (1.35floz) as part of your morning and evening routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the skin of your face and neck after your selected serum or just by itself. Complement its use with other products from the same range in order to obtain maximum results.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products: 

Nivea Naturally Good Bio Chamomile Sensitive Day Cream 50ml
Nivea Naturally Good Bio Argan Oil Night Cream 50ml
A stylish pouch

Nivea Naturally Good Bio Chamomile Sensitive Day Cream relies on 99% natural-origin ingredients to soothe delicate skin. In fact, this option is enriched with Almond as well as Jojoba Oils, helping you retain as much moisture as possible. Thus, it plumps your complexion for 24 hours while also being fragrance-free. In short, a small portion is enough to refresh one's appearance, enhancing its health. Moreover, Chamomile Flower Extract calms potential irritation sources, while the core components preserve over 50% of their molecular structure.
Nivea Naturally Good Bio Argan Oil Night Cream revitalizes the skin when it's most receptive for a rested look when you wake you. In fact, this fully vegan formula includes 99% natural-origin ingredients offering transparency as well as lasting softness. Dermatologically tested, it combines organic Argan and Jojoba Oils, retaining moisture along with 50% of the ingredients' molecular structure after being processed. Read more about Nivea Naturally Good Bio Argan Oil Night Cream here.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
The Saem Jeju Fresh Aloe Cream 89% 50ml (1.69fl oz) has a refreshing and nourishing gel-like consistency that promises not only to improve skin’s moisture levels but also to boost radiance. This is a powerful multipurpose formula that simultaneously nourishes, soothes, and cares for your complexion.  
On one side, the composition contains Jeju Herb Complex, a blend of natural ingredients that calm irritation and help to restore the skin. Moreover, the presence of seven plant-based components plays an important role when it comes to brightening and also revitalizing the skin. 
Last but not least, it is crucial to mention the star of the formula, 89% Fresh Aloe Extract. . In fact, the Jeju Fresh Aloe Cream is part of the brand’s Jeju Fresh Aloe collection. This set of products get their powers from high-quality fresh aloe extract harvested in Jeju Island. Besides its well-known soothing and anti-inflammatory properties, this ingredient has astonishing moisture-retaining abilities. Even more, all Jeju Fresh Aloe products promote cellular turnover and overall healthier skin thanks to the antioxidants and minerals present in the compositions. 
Given all this, introducing this cream to your skincare routine means enjoying soft, refreshed and reenergized skin after each application.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Apply a generous amount of the The Saem Jeju Fresh Aloe Cream 89% 50ml (1.69fl oz) as part of your morning and /or evening routine to the skin of your face. Complement its use with other products from the same range for optimal results.

description: Esthederm Excellage Balm-Cream is a nourishing cream that re-densifies and illuminates mature skin. Suitable for dry to very dry skin types, this cream restores cellular communication between different layers of the skin, increasing its overall health. This unique formulation, which includes exclusive complexes such as Repair Technology and Global Cellular Protection, re-densifies the skin while boosting its natural defenses, therefore improving its resistance against external aggressions. The addition of ingredients like camellia oil and vitamin PP provides further nourishment to the skin, ensuring its comfort and well-being. The delicate fragrance and balmy texture allows a luxurious experience every day.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Esthederm Excellage Balm-Cream in the morning and evening, to the face and neck. Remove a small amount of cream and rub it into your fingertips. Apply to each area of the face by pressing your hands for 3 seconds on the skin. Then, use the tips of your thumb and forefinger to gently pinch each area for 10 seconds. Finally, press your hands on your cheeks and under your eyes to drain the skin. Repeat several times, moving your hands to the sides of your face as you press and inhale. For optimal results, apply after Esthederm Excellage Serum.

description: Martiderm Black Diamond Epigence Optima Fluid Cream SPF50+ 30ml (1.01fl oz) is a facial cream that offers the same formulation as well as the same benefits of the original Martiderm Black Diamond Epigence Optima SPF50+ ampoules. This facial cream provides the skin with broad-spectrum protection, including from UVA, UVB, IR, HEV and REM radiation. In addition to broad-spectrum protection, the formula contains anti-aging ingredients. To point out a few, Proteum 89+ hydrates and boosts the skin's firmness and Epigence 145 protects from oxidative stress. Use it every morning in order to hydrate and protect the skin with a very strong and lightweight shield.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Martiderm Black Diamond Epigence Optima Fluid Cream SPF50+ 30ml (1.01fl oz) directly onto the face and neck. Massage it lightly onto the skin to improve absorption.

description: L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Cell Renew Revitalizing Day Cream helps to slow down the natural aging process, minimizing dullness as well as fatigue signs. In fact, thanks to a formula rich in antioxidant elements, this cream tends to speed up cell turnover, increasing vitality. Thus, Black Truffle and Fermented Black Tea join forces refreshing the epidermis, regenerating it deeply while also adding optimal hydration levels. Furthermore, Polyphenols unite with Vitamin B in order to encourage a truly youthful result, shielding from harmful outside influences. All in all, each application not only softens the skin but also nourishes it, providing a useful energy boost. Finally, this SPF15 enriched cream tones and confers greater suppleness to delicate areas, healing them day after day!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a suitable amount of L'Oréal Paris Age Perfect Cell Renew Revitalizing Day Cream all over your face on a daily basis. Make sure you've cleaned the facial and neck areas appropriately before each application. For optimal results, spread the formula in circular as well as upward motions to facilitate absorption. Stay away from the eye contouring sections as you allow the cream to define the rest of your face. Finally, pair this with other anti-aging options from the same range or brand. Choose an eye cream or night moisturizer to complement/intensify its effects.

description:
Vichy Neovadiol Redensifying Revitalizing Night Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) is a night treatment specially formulated for women undergoing or going through menopause. During menopause aging signs become more visible, increasing loss of firmness and the appearance of wrinkles. Moreover, another recurrent symptom is the occurrence of hot flashes leading to a warm uncomfortable feeling. Therefore, the Neovadiol Redensifying Revitalizing Night Cream focuses on counteracting these factors through a powerful and rejuvenating formula. 
On one side, the Hyaluronic Acid present in the composition ensures deep hydration of the skin, smoothing out wrinkles and improving elasticity, at the same time Simultaneously, a combination of other active ingredients helps to reverse and prevent loss of firmness and contour. Components like the exclusive Proxylane and Cassia Extract help to neutralize the consequences of hormonal fluctuations, leaving your skin smoother, firmer, and overall younger-looking.
Last but not least, this cream offers a pleasant cooling effect, fighting hot flashes and promoting restful sleep. Its light and refreshing gel-cream consistency provides an effortless and enjoyable application each time.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Vichy Neovadiol Redensifying Revitalizing Night Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) as part of your evening routine after serum. Apply it to the skin of the face, neck and décolleté. Complement its use with other products from the same range in order to obtain optimal results.

description:
Vichy Neovadiol Redensifying Lifting Day Cream Dry Skin 50ml (1.69fl oz) is a powerful moisturizing that focuses on counteracting signs of aging that become more prominent during menopause. In fact, specially formulated for women who are undergoing or are going through menopause, this cream promises to help nourish and revitalize mature skin. 
On one hand, the Hyaluronic Acid present in the composition ensures deep hydration of the skin, smoothing out wrinkles and improving elasticity, at the same time Simultaneously, a combination of other active ingredients helps to reverse and prevent loss of firmness and contour. Components like the exclusive Proxylane and Cassia Extract help to neutralize the consequences of hormonal fluctuations, leaving your skin smoother, firmer and overall younger-looking. 
Lastly, the Vichy Neovadiol Redensifying Lifting Day Cream is dermatologically tested and suitable for dry skin, including sensitive. It has a light pleasant fragrance and a non-comedogenic consistency that offers a soft and invisible finish.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Vichy Neovadiol Redensifying Lifting Day Cream Dry Skin 50ml (1.69fl oz) as part of your morning routine after serum. Apply it to the skin of the face, neck and décolleté. Complement its use with other products from the same range in order to obtain optimal results.

description:
Vichy Neovadiol Redensifying Lifting Day Cream Normal/Oily Skin 50ml (1.69fl oz) is a powerful moisturizing that focuses on counteracting signs of aging that become more prominent during menopause. In fact, specially formulated for women who are undergoing or are going through menopause, this cream promises to help nourish and revitalize mature skin. 
On one hand, the Hyaluronic Acid present in the composition ensures deep hydration of the skin, smoothing out wrinkles and improving elasticity, at the same time Simultaneously, a combination of other active ingredients helps to reverse and prevent loss of firmness and contour. Components like the exclusive Proxylane and Cassia Extract help to neutralize the consequences of hormonal fluctuations, leaving your skin smoother, firmer, and overall younger-looking. 
Lastly, the Vichy Neovadiol Redensifying Lifting Day Cream is dermatologically tested and suitable for normal and oily skin, including sensitive. It has a light pleasant fragrance and a non-comedogenic consistency that offers a soft and invisible finish.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Vichy Neovadiol Redensifying Lifting Day Cream Normal/Oily Skin 50ml (1.69fl oz) as part of your morning routine after serum. Apply it to the skin of the face, neck and décolleté. Complement its use with other products from the same range in order to obtain optimal results.

description:
Mizon Intensive Firming Solution Collagen Power Lifting Emulsion consists of an intensely moisturizing emulsion formulated for more mature skin that suffers from signs of age such as wrinkles and fine lines. Thus, this emulsion concentrates all the ingredients indicated not only to prevent but also to fight these already existing signs. The skin is much more hydrated, smoothed, firm, regenerated and more plumped. Also, the signs of age are less visible as the skin gains new elasticity.
For these benefits to be successful on the skin, this cream contains 54% of Marine Collagen in its composition. This ingredient provides the skin with a deep hydration and firming effect thus helping to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. On the other hand, it also has Hyaluronic Acid, a blend of Organic Argan Oil and Adenosine. In the end your skin becomes firmer, nourished and much more hydrated and nourished.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a little amount of Mizon Intensive Firming Solution Collagen Power Lifting Emulsion to your face. Gently pat with your ring finger until the product is absorbed into the skin.

description:
Sioris Enriched by Nature Cream relies on 28.5% Korean Green Tea Water to soften dry skin types instantly, enhancing your complexion's natural moisture barrier. Thanks to a nutritive as well as vegan-friendly formula, this day cream is ideal to rejuvenate one's overall appearance. In fact, the 2% Multiflora Rose Extract teams up with 8% of Organic Shea Butter as well as 1% Baobab Seed Oil for the ultimate protection against damaging free radicals. Besides, this weightless formula allows you to avoid an uncomfortable greasy finish, while also being COSMO certified.
All in all, through daily applications, even the most vulnerable skin tissues can escape harmful environmental threats. A powerful blend of multi-purpose ingredients enables you to preserve optimal hydration levels for a long period of time. Meanwhile, the plant-based Phytosphingosine contains a rich form of Ceramide that promises to leave your skin healthy as well as extra fortified. Finally, despite its buttery texture, this cream is quickly absorbed, reaching every section of your face with the right intensity and replenishing it right away. Simply massage a generous amount as the final step in your daytime skincare ritual and witness drastic improvement taking place.
how_to_use:
How to use
After cleansing your face with the appropriate products, apply a generous portion of Sioris Enriched by Nature Cream. Then, perform a gentle massage with your fingertips, drawing circular and upward motions to facilitate the penetration of beneficial ingredients. Try to apply the formula as evenly as possible and wait until it is completely absorbed by the skin. Finally, explore the rest of Sioris' skincare options to see if these also appeal to you.

description:
Clarins Calm-Essentiel Soothing Emulsion is a facial moisturizer that hydrates, protects and soothes the skin. The texture is a melting emulsion that instantly hydrates, significantly reducing skin discomfort. Suitable for all skin types, it is essential to replenish sensitive and weakened skin.
Containing 96% of ingredients of natural origin, the key for this formulation is simplicity. Combining a few botanicals with a powerful action, like clary sage and white horehound, the product works to improve the skin from within. Clary sage extract offers incredible soothing properties while white horehound protects the skin from pollutants. In addition, glycerin contributes to deeply hydrate the skin. Equally important, the emulsion presents a delicate fragrance that was tested and developed for sensitive skin. Apply it every day to restore the skin with moisture and instantly eliminate any discomfort. Day after day, the skin feels soft and looks healthier than ever!
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with, gently cleanse and tone the skin. Then, apply a small amount of Clarins Calm-Essentiel Soothing Emulsion onto the skin of the face and neck.

description:
Mádara Vitamin C Illuminating Recovery Cream is the perfect brightening skincare solution, balancing tone as well as restoring radiance. In fact, this relies heavily on a stabilized form of Vitamin C - Ascorbic Acid Glucoside - to prevent oxidation issues and enhance natural glowing properties. Moreover, a small portion is enough to revitalize dull areas, minimizing aging and fatigue signs for an extra youthful look. To the same extent, it smoothes wrinkles/fine lines, targeting hyperpigmentation as well as visible dark spots.
Among its 99% natural ingredients and supporting this energy boost, Hyaluronic Acid offers optimal hydration levels. Meanwhile, Seaweed Extract takes the brightening effect even further, softening the skin and creating a truly harmonious finish. Finally, if you are looking for purifying freshness as well as a newfound kind of luminosity, this is the ideal skin-restoring cream for you. Unsurprisingly, it also preserves Mádara's vegan-friendly mission, remaining as plant-based as possible.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small portion of Mádara Vitamin C Illuminating Recovery Cream on a daily basis. Spread the antioxidant formula as evenly as possible, paying close attention to more problematic areas. Alternatively, use as part of an intense treatment two to three times a year. Remember to avoid coming in direct contact with the sunlight after each application. Lastly, explore the rest of Mádara's anti-aging skincare options and pair this product with sunscreen for maximum protection.

description: NUXE Rêve de Miel Ultra Comforting Face Balm is an ultra-rich balm that nourishes, soothes, and repairs very dry skin. As the skin of the face is very exposed to external aggressions, it tends to suffer greater damage during the winter; it grows dry and fragile, to a point where you may even notice chapping or scaling. Especially formulated with this issue in mind, this ultra-nourishing cream features a comforting texture that envelops your skin in the repairing power of honey, propolis, and precious oils. The rich formula replenishes the skin's hydrolipidic film in order to keep it protected from external aggressions; at the same time, it helps soothe rough, red, and irritated areas. The wholesome fragrance, which combines the sweetness of mimosa and heliotrope with the warmth of honey and vanilla, contributes to the enveloping effect, offering you long-lasting comfort, all day long.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Rêve de Miel Ultra Comforting Face Balm to the clean and dry skin of the face and neck, then massage gently to stimulate absorption. Use all year round if you desired, or just during the winter for a little extra comfort and nourishment.

description: Nuxe Aquabella Beauty-Revealing Moisturising Emulsion is a twice-daily emulsion for combination skin that helps the skin to look healthier and radiant, while providing a mattifying effect. The combination of hyaluronic acid with white water-lilly helps to ensure that the skin is balanced, hydrating while at the same time ensuring that the skin id matt. The skin becomes 43% softer, the texture is improved by 26% and the skin is brighter by 44%. Thanks to the silica powders and the moisturizing ingredients in the formula, 90% of the users confirm that their skin is more hydrated and 85% state that is is more matt.
how_to_use: Not found

description: Mario Badescu Buttermilk Moisturizer is a calming and cell renewal-boosting facial moisturizer. Mainly, the focus of this lotion is keeping the skin calm for a long time, which is why it congregates the efforts of several botanical extracts. Namely, thyme (which also has a relevant purifying action), chamomile (the source for bisabolol), and allantoin (from the comfrey plant). Moreover, glycolic acid, a chemical exfoliant, performs a mild skin renewal activity that helps to reveal a healthy glow over time. A light, easily blendable, and non-comedogenic formula that also works as an adequate canvas for makeup application. Thus, the complexion will remain soft, bright, and comfortable during the day and night.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous amount of Mario Badescu Buttermilk Moisturizer on a clean and dry face and neck, every morning and/or evening. If wearing the lotion during the daytime, follow with a high SPF, especially before prolonged sun exposure. Avoid direct contact with the eyes. However, if the product accidentally gets in that area, remove it immediately with abundant water.

description:
TONYMOLY Propolis Tower Barrier Build Up Cream is a daily moisturizing cream suitable for any type of skin that is weaker and needs help to repair itself. In this way, this light cream creates a firm barrier on the skin so that it can be healthier and fortified. In addition, it is extremely hydrated, nourished and with a natural glow. Furthermore, this cream contains some anti-aging properties as it smoothes out skin and fine wrinkles.
For this to be possible, this cream contains 60% of Green Propolis extract in its composition, which is the key ingredient in this range of products. This property contains antibacterial and anti-inflammatory actions that help balance, heal and soothe all skin types. It is also ideal for skin with acne as it helps to repair the skin quickly. In short, this lightweight cream helps build a strong barrier against external agents and deeply hydrate and nourish the skin.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Green Propolis extract helps balance the skin's barrier while repairing, healing and making it healthier. It also has great antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties ideal for skin that suffers from acne.
how_to_use:
How to use
After cleansing your skin, gently apply TONYMOLY Propolis Tower Barrier Build Up Cream to your face and neck skin. Pat it for full absorption.

description:
TONYMOLY The Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Cream is a cream rich in moisturizing properties specifically designed for your face and neck. In other words, this cream contains a liquid-based formulation, which provides an ultra hydrating gel texture. In addition, its gentle formula is ideal for drier or sensitive skin as it melts into any skin type to deeply hydrate it. At the same time, its texture does not make the skin sticky or too heavy. 
This cream belongs to The Chok Chok Green Tea range. All these products have in their formulation a key ingredient specially designed for dry, dull, sensitive or irritated skin. In this case, they contain 100% of pure Fermented Green Tea. This component contains more powerful benefits than fresh green tea, which can be seen in particular in its antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties. On the other hand, this property gently soothes the skin. Thus, it becomes a great choice for skin diseases including rosacea, acne and atopic dermatitis. Finally, this component also helps protect the skin from environmental factors. 
In short, this moisturizing cream helps smooth the skin leaving it looking more radiant. At the same time, this product helps make your face skin brighter, soothed and more hydrated. Furthermore, your skin retains moisture much better as this cream forms a protective layer on your skin. For a full K-Beauty skincare routine, use the rest of The Chok Chok Green Tea Collection.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

100% of Pure Fermented Green Tea contains great antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, UV protectant and skin soothing properties. In addition, it helps to hydrate the skin while protecting it from environmental factors.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take an appropriate amount of the TONYMOLY The Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Cream and gently spread it on your skin. Massage lightly until absorbed. You can also apply this cream as a five-minute emergency moisture mask. Just apply a generous amount of cream, wait 5 minutes and then remove all the excess with a tissue.

description:
TONYMOLY Propolis Tower Barrier Rebalancing Emulsion is a cream with a light and fluid texture that helps repair and rebalance the skin's barrier and structure. Thus, this emulsion has the ability to transform dry, dull and aged skin into something radiant, smooth and with a natural glow. On the other hand, this product hydrates the skin in depth without it becoming heavy or greasy. Even on the other hand, the skin is fresher, lighter, repaired and with less visible signs of age.
For this to be possible, this emulsion contains in its composition 76% of Green Propolis extract, which is the key ingredient in this range of products. This property contains antibacterial and anti-inflammatory actions that help balance, heal and soothe all skin types. It is also ideal for skin with acne as it helps to repair the skin quickly and effectively. In addition, it also contains Niacinamide, ingredients that are rich in anti-aging and anti-acne properties. In short, this light emulsion helps balance the skin's barrier leaving it healthier, more hydrated, revitalized and repaired.
how_to_use:
How to use
Remove the right amount of TONYMOLY Propolis Tower Barrier Rebalancing Emulsion for your hands and gently spread the product over your face and neck. Tap it lightly until the product is all absorbed.

description: TONYMOLY 2X® Collagen Emulsion is ideal for a mature skin that needs a firming boost. In this way, this light moisturizing emulsion helps to brighten the skin, improve elasticity and vitality while smoothing wrinkles and fine lines. On the other hand, it helps to deeply hydrate the skin so that you can stay all day without any feeling of dryness. For this to be possible, this product contains 85% Collagen that helps to fill the skin while also creating a protective barrier to retain moisture during the day. In addition, for greater hydration and help against signs of aging, this cream also has Hyaluronic Acid. Finally, this texture is ultra light and quickly absorbed into the skin without making it heavy or greasy. On the other hand, the skin is instantly smoother, glowing and radiant. For even more intense care, use the other products in the same TONYMOLY 2X® Collagen range.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply TONYMOLY 2X® Collagen Emulsion in the morning and evening to pre-cleaned, dry face and neck. Gently massage until completely absorbed.

description:
TONYMOLY Floria Nutra Energy 100 Hours Cream is an ideal face cream for really dry and dehydrated skin. It is normal day after day for our facial skin to become drier, heavier and dull due to stress and even external agents such as pollution. In this way, this cream hydrates and nourishes the skin so that it regains its vitality, radiance and health. With a plus, this product has the ability to hydrate your skin for up to 100+ hours! It penetrates deep into the skin without leaving a heavy, greasy feeling so your skin feels comfortable even without constant reapplication.
For this gentle cream to work, it contains a composition with highly nourishing ingredients. In this case it has Safflower Extract and Organic Argan Oil, in addition to Chronoline Peptide and Resurrection Plant Extract. The latter also help the skin to become firmer and less sagging. Finally, this cream has a light formula that eliminates the discomfort of dry skin for over 100 hours. In short, if you need a really moisturizing and nourishing face cream, this product is essential in your skin care routine.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply TONYMOLY Floria Nutra Energy 100 Hours Cream on your clean and dry skin. Pat gently until the cream is fully absorbed into skin.

description:
La Prairie White Caviar Crème Extraordinaire Illuminating Cream is a powerful anti-aging facial cream that visibly lifts, improves firmness and also fades the appearance of age spots and discoloration. Suitable for all skin types, this luxurious cream features a captivating texture that indulges your senses with each application. Featuring an airless pump, this lavish bottle keeps the formula protected from external contamination and allows a practical application with exceptional elegance.
Combining the most precious ingredients, the formulation manages to deliver a unique experience and incredible results, exclusively for your skin. Lumidose is a powerful illuminating molecule that actively works to limit melanin production that causes dark spots. At the same time, natural caviar extract from bioengineering origin provides the skin with a potent firming and elasticity improving action. In addition to that, Licorice Root significantly contributes to lightening the skin while Centella Asiatica stimulates hyaluronic acid synthesis and protects the skin with antioxidant action. Each application provides the skin with unique ingredients that revive and renew the skin while fading age spots and discoloration. Day after day, the skin looks visibly firmer and lifted, more even and luminous for a healthy, radiant and youthful-looking complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with, delicate cleanse and tone the skin. Then, your may follow with your favorite rejuvenating lotion and/or serum. The following step is to press the airless pump of La Prairie White Caviar Crème Extraordinaire Illuminating Cream and warm the product between fingers. Lastly, smooth it gently over the face and neck, avoiding the eye area. Massage the skin gently while applying in order to boost the results. Complete your skincare routine with the La Prairie White Caviar range in order to enhance the rejuvenating and lifting results.

description:
COSRX Oil-Free Ultra-Moisturizing Lotion with Birch Sap is an inclusive moisturizing option, perfect for all skin types and occasions. Thanks to a feather-like texture and a combination of gentle ingredients this will address irritation or inflammation issues, soothing your complexion. Rich in vitamins as well as antioxidants, each application helps you avoid is greasy feeling. At the same time, this oil-free lotion is considered a beauty essential for drier skin tissues.
In fact, it balances and preserves optimal hydration levels, refreshing as well as nourishing skin cells from within. If you're looking for a feather-like finish this is the most hygienic option for you. Besides, like all of COSRX's ranges, this is free of animal testing. Finally, by using it on a regular basis you'll notice healthier as well as extra firm skin almost immediately, as Birch Sap tends to add a new kind of vigor. Purify, moisturize and soften your face for the ultimate polished treatment, exploring an endless list of benefits.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous portion of COSRX Oil-Free Ultra-Moisturizing Lotion with Birch Sap after cleansing and using a toner on your face. This product should follow a gentle skin exfoliation. When smoothing the lotion, please avoid the sensitive eye and mouth sections. Then, dab the formula all over to facilitate the penetration of benefits. Wait until the lightweight cream is fully absorbed before applying a bit of sunscreen or your preferred day cream.

description:
Benton Goodbye Redness Centella Gel is a low-pH product with concentrated meant to quickly alleviate the appearance of redness. Thus, it is ideal to de-stress tired as well as inflamed skin, prone to extra sensitivity. Thanks to the core Centella Asiatica Extract (80%) from South Korea, the product's rich essence helps to enhance the moisture barrier of all skin types. In other words, this gel does a stunning job protecting your complexion from different types of environmental threats. Through regular applications as well as a combination of nourishing ingredients, the epidermis is bound to feel feather-like and look more radiant than ever.
Besides, as tone and texture get rid of irregularities, the Tea Tree joins forces with Mint for the ultimate cooling/depuffing finish. In fact, this gel hydrates deeply and restores more vulnerable skin tissues from within. Finally, preserving Benton's mission of reversing the harsher effects of time by resorting the natural resources, this stress-relieving essential is free of artificial fragrances or pigments. Plus, it's 100% vegan and cruelty-free while still being highly effective, producing life-changing results.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous amount of Benton Goodbye Redness Centella Gel after cleansing and toning your face. Massage it gently and as evenly as possible all over your face, paying close attention to more delicate areas. Then, pat the rest of the formula until it penetrates fully into the skin. To intensity results and finish off the treatment, follow each application with lotion or an appropriate moisturizer. Explore this Benton range by trying the Benton Goodbye Redness Centella Spot Cream as well as Benton Goodbye Redness Centella Mask.

description: Dr. Hauschka Balancing Day Lotion is a rich formulation with valuable extracts of Anthyllis, horsetail, and nasturtium, designed to restore balance to oily combination skin prone to an oily T-zone and slightly dry cheeks. Above all, this delicate day lotion with silky-smooth texture regulates blemished skin and offers combination skin a lighter alternative to creams. At the same time, it reduces the appearance of blemishes, reduces shine, and provides moisture exactly where it is needed, creating a purer complexion. Moreover, it is quickly absorbed making it an ideal base for make-up. To conclude, it is composed of premium botanical extracts and oils and dermatologically tested for sensitive skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Hauschka Balancing Day Lotion evenly to the face, neck, and décolleté, after cleansing and toning.

description:
Uriage Eau Thermale Water Cream Tinted Compact SPF30 is a tinted cream that hydrates, protects and perfects your complexion at the same time. Infused with powder of Uriage thermal water, the texture is a melt-in cream that delivers a natural result and is suitable for all skin types. Each application coats the skin with a natural texture and also with a pleasant, soft scent.
More than natural and beautifying pigments, the formula contains a complex of UVA-UVB mineral filters that protect the skin from sun damage. In addition, hyaluronic acid boosts skin's hydration levels while Uriage thermal water strengthens the barrier of the skin. At the same time, Vitamins C and E shield the skin with antioxidant protection. It not only immediately hydrates the skin but also releases hydration continuously throughout the day. This shade adapts to multiple skin tones, leaving a natural second-skin result. After each application, the skin is protected, hydrated and visibly perfected.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Eau Thermale Water Cream Tinted Compact SPF30 using the sponge or a brush of your choice. Then, blend the product evenly onto the skin for good hydration, coverage and protection. Start by applying on the center of the face and blending outwards. Apply it after your facial serum, as the last step of your skincare routine. You may follow with other makeup products afterward, such as concealer, blush, or facial powder.

description:
Uriage Toléderm Control Rich Soothing Care is a facial cream that soothes, protects and nourishes the skin at the same time. Suitable for normal to dry skin that seeks comfort, this texture is nourishing and replenishes the skin from the first application. It is ideal for sensitive skin and actively works to improve the condition of intolerant, hyper-reactive and allergic skin.
Featuring 91% of natural ingredients, this formula not only contains Uriage thermal water but also algae polyuronides and plant squalane. Uriage thermal water - naturally rich in mineral salts and trace elements - contributes to soothe the skin and helps to relieve discomfort. At the same time, algae polyuronides work to protect, soothe and calm irritated skin. Equally important, plant squalane - Ecocert certified - contributes to protect, hydrate and soothe the skin without harming the environment. Each application contributes to soothe and calm sensitive and irritated skin, all the while working to strengthen the skin barrier. Day after day, the skin feels more comfortable and looks healthier.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Toléderm Control Rich Soothing Care onto both clean and dry skin. Massage it gently from the center of the face outwards in order to improve absorption.

description:
Mádara Time Miracle Total Renewal Night Cream is an anti-aging cosmetic that ensures top hydration levels while also regenerating your skin as you sleep. Essentially, it tackles localized imperfections that appear on more mature skin types, like loss of firmness or poorer facial contour definition. As time progresses radiance, elasticity, and supple textures are at risk and must be brought back. This rich yet easily absorbed cream is the push in the right direction, as it uses innovative science to counteract aging/fatigue indicators. Whether genetic or circumstantial, your complexion faces a number of daily aggressions. Thanks to the Cellular Bio-Complex this simple formula offers, skin cells are regenerated often. To the same extent, the natural production of collagen ensures a continued jovial look. 
In fact, Mádara's Time Miracle range addresses issues accurately with fewer chemicals, and its products are subjected to in-house lab testing. The brand's global presence proves there's something for everyone, while its founders put ethics at the forefront of their endeavors. That is to say, their core values of transparency and sustainability don't stop them from creating effective as well as affordable cosmetics. While these appeal to a large following, their resources are not only 100% natural in origin, but also extracted consciously from northern European landscapes. All in all, the increase of cell regeneration by 25% as well as all the benefits of the core components of this age-defying cream make it a must-have. In short, experience luminous, feather-like, and youthful skin in a heartbeat by including it in your evening beauty routine.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mádara Time Miracle Total Renewal Night Cream after cleansing and drying the areas you want to focus on. Take a generous portion and smooth it gently on your face, neck, and cleavage areas, evenly. Massage it into the skin in circular, upward motions. Then, allow the cream to be fully absorbed. As you sleep, your skin regenerates and receives all the benefits of the selected ingredients. For optimal results and an extra youthful finish, use other products of the same range. Lastly, apply it with two or three drops of your favorite Custom Actives concentrate for more precision.

description:
Mádara Smart Anti-Fatigue Urban Moisture Fluid addresses initial aging signs induced by harmful free radicals, putting a stop to fine lines, enlarged pores, or uneven skin tone. One step ahead of the urban threats one faces every day, this fluid offers a trustworthy shield for duller complexions. Besides, its lightweight texture enables quick absorption, targeting delicate areas and visibly reducing under-eye puffiness. Thus, your skin is refined, extra luminous, and overall healthier after just a few applications. 100% natural in origin, its simple but effective formula puts a high-quality as well as affordable treatment at your disposal. 
Suitable for both men and women, the smart antioxidants at their core strengthen cells, energizing and detoxifying them, granting plump, glowing skin is no longer a mirage. Indeed, Mádara's Smart range follows the brand's mission of sustainability and transparency, looking after the planet's well-being. Their founders' efforts of extracting nature's resources consciously are as strong as the effects of this cream. It eliminates tiredness signs while simultaneously maintaining skin's hydration. Finally, whether you're starting or ending your day, this fluid is a faithful ally to soothe/improve your appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a good amount of Mádara Smart Anti-Fatigue Urban Moisture Fluid after cleansing/drying your face and neck. To invigorate your complexion, massage this light cream into strategic spots. As you spread it evenly, paying close attention to your forehead, cheekbones, nose, and chin, resort to circular, upward motions. Allow for full absorption and then, if you wish, apply other products to complete your skincare ritual. Also suitable for your cleavage area. For optimal results, combine it with two or three drops of Custom Actives Aox concentrate.

description:
Mádara Smart Anti-Fatigue Urban Moisture Cream addresses early aging signs propelled by harmful free radicals, putting a definitive end to fine lines, dryness, or uneven skin tone. One step ahead of the urban threats one faces every day, this moisturizing cream offers a solid shield for complexions that have lost their radiance. Besides, its rich texture concentrates nutrients and still enables quick absorption, targeting delicate, dry areas and visibly reducing puffiness. Thus, your skin is refined, extra luminous, and overall healthier after just a few applications. 100% natural in origin, its simple but effective formula puts a high-quality as well as affordable treatment at your disposal. 
Suitable for both men and women, the smart antioxidants at their core strengthen cells, energizing and detoxifying them, granting plump, glowing skin instantly. Indeed, Mádara's Smart range follows the brand's mission of sustainability and transparency, looking after the planet's well-being. Their founders' efforts of extracting nature's resources consciously are as strong as the effects of this cream. It eliminates tiredness signs while simultaneously maintaining skin's hydration, thus enhancing your comfort level. To sum up, whether you're starting or ending your day, this nourishing cream is a focal ally to soothe/improve your appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous amount of Mádara Smart Anti-Fatigue Urban Moisture Cream after cleansing/drying your face and neck. To invigorate your complexion, massage this light cream into strategic spots. As you spread it evenly, paying close attention to your forehead, cheekbones, nose, and chin, resort to circular, upward motions. Allow for full absorption and then, if you wish, apply other products to complete your skincare ritual. Also suitable for your cleavage area. For optimal results, combine it with two or three drops of Custom Actives Aox concentrate.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Classic Day Cream Fragrance-Free provides an intense and instant anti-wrinkle action and extra-firmness. Thus, this day cream is ideal for sensitive skin since it has no fragrance or any abrasive ingredients that can irritate the skin. In addition, this formula provides advanced anti-wrinkle efficacy by filling them, moisturizing the skin and visibly smoothing it.  
The lightweight formula of this day cream is enriched with Advanced Pro-Retinol which helps to improve the structure of the epidermis and promote its regeneration. In this way, this formula reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines of expression while reducing dark spots as well. In addition, this cream is enriched with Probiotic Lifting Extract, a firming complex that helps to tone the skin of the face and neck. All in all, it provides long-lasting hydration and leaves the skin firmer and more defined as a lifting effect. It also plums the skin filling fine lines and wrinkles for a more rejuvenated and radiant look for sensitive skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Classic Day Cream Fragrance-Free every morning on a perfectly cleansed face and neck using circular motions for better absorption. Avoid eye area.

description: Dr. Hauschka Regenerating Day Cream is a rich day cream for mature skin. Especially formulated with demanding skin types in mind, this cream contains a blend of antioxidant-rich natural ingredients, which not only provide protection against free radicals, but also boosts the skin's ability to fend off this type of damage. The rich and creamy formula is ideal for drier skin types, as it replenishes the skin's moisture levels and promotes a radiant, smooth complexion. As it absorbs quickly, this day cream is also ideal for use as a make-up base.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Hauschka Regenerating Day Cream after your usual toner and serum, then massage gently. In order to achieve the best possible effects, combine with other products in the Dr. Hauschka Regenerating range.

description: Martiderm Platinum GF Vital-Age Cream Dry Skin is the perfect complement to your Martiderm ampoules. This long lasting hydration cream restores the moisture levels and brightens the complexion, for a luscious skin. It restores the skin's vitality and  the hydrating complex keeps the skin moisturized for several hours. This cream is suitable for dry skin, as it deeply nourishes thanks to the jojoba and argan oils in the formula.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Martiderm Platinum GF Vital-Age Cream Dry Skin in the morning onto cleansed skin on the face, neck and chest with a light massage.

description: NUXE Nuxuriance® Ultra Replenishing Cream SPF 20 PA+++ is an anti-aging cream with protection against UVB/UVA sun rays that is suitable for all skin types. With the powerful anti-aging innovation of the Bi-Floral Cells of Saffron and Bougainvillea that help to renew the skin from within, to boost firmness, reshape the facial contours and smooth the wrinkles. The sunscreens in the formula offer great protection against the harmful sun rays, responsible for premature skin aging and dark spots. Due to its prolonged-release technology, the effects last for several hours and the cream has a continuous anti-aging action that replumps the skin and attenuates wrinkles. After 28 days of usage, the skin is more radiant, the facial contours are reshaped and wrinkles are less visible. With 7 registered patents in France, this innovative range is a must have for those who are fighting advanced signs of aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Nuxuriance® Ultra Replenishing Cream SPF 20 PA+++ in the morning on clean skin of the face, neck and décolleté.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products:

JOWAÉ Wrinkle Smoothing Light Cream 40ml
JOWAÉ Micellar Cleansing Water 200ml
JOWAÉ Hand & Nail Nourishing Cream 50ml

JOWAÉ Wrinkle Smoothing Light Cream is an anti-aging cream for normal to combination skin which unites the powerful and energizing ginseng extract with hyaluronic acid to correct wrinkles and Lumiphenols to boost radiance. The skin becomes reenergized and ready to face the new day, thanks to the formula's stimulating properties. The wrinkles are deeply reduced, the skin looks more radiant and younger. Read more about JOWAÉ Wrinkle Smoothing Light Cream here.
JOWAÉ Micellar Cleansing Water is a cleansing water suitable for even the most sensitive skins. With imperial peony, which has soothing properties, it is ideal to gently cleanse the skin. Formulated with antioxidant lumiphenols for radiance, glycerin for comfort and an emollient complex. The skin is gently cleansed and looks fresh and radiant. Read more about JOWAÉ Micellar Cleansing Water here.
JOWAÉ Hand & Nail Nourishing Cream is a deeply moisturizing cream for hands and cuticles, made from 96% natural ingredients. This nourishing formula is enrichened with Camellia, coconut, and sunflower oils, as well as shea butter and vegetable glycerin, which all contribute to repair and protect the hands and nails from daily aggressions. Read more about JOWAÉ Hand & Nail Nourishing Cream here.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel is a "genius moisturizer" adapted to both oily and oily combination skin types. This lightweight gel combines oil-free hydration with skin-strengthening ingredients, in order to balance and refresh oilier skin types. The sleek texture goes on easily and absorbs just as quickly, without adding any extra shine to the complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Twice a day, apply a small pump of Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel to the clean and dry skin of the face and neck. Massage gently in order to stimulate absorption.

description: Clinique Smart Night Custom-Repair Moisturizer - Type 2 is a smart night cream that targets all major signs of aging. Formulated with the patented Clinique Smart technology, this product is able to detect localized skin concerns and act specifically on them. As a night treatment, this product takes advantage of the skin's innate renewal process to correct skin issues while replenishing the skin's natural resources. In particular, the de-aging formula infuses the skin with long-lasting moisture, creating a fresher, firmer, and more radiant look upon waking. In the morning, the complexion appears to have been rejuvenated; wrinkles are smoothed out, slack areas are re-firmed, and the skintone has acquired a newfound glow.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clinique Smart Night Custom-Repair Moisturizer - Type 2 to the clean and dry skin of both face and neck. Then, massage gently. In order to achieve optimal results, use this product in combination with Clinique Smart Custom-Repair Eye Treatment.

description:
Clinique Men Maximum Hydrator 72-Hour Auto-Replenishing 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a refreshing gel-cream that helps replenish hydration levels and is suitable for all skin types. With a unique combination of actives, this product is not only able to hydrate and nourish the skin but also offers some protection against UV rays, brightens the skin, improves firmness, and evens out the skin tone. Due to the combination of hydrating ingredients like Glycerin, Aloe Vera, and Hyaluronic Acid, the skin is able to retain water and prevent it from evaporating, therefore keeping the skin plump and moisturized. Also, combined with ingredients like Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (MAP) and Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, this gel-cream not only brightens the skin and evens out the skin tone, but also boosts collagen production, therefore improving firmness.
The Green Tea and Birch Bark extracts used in this product, provide antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, anti-microbial, and anti-irritant properties, protecting the skin from external damage. Lastly, with Caffeine, this product is also able to improve microcirculation, which reduces puffiness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clinique Men Maximum Hydrator 72-Hour Auto-Replenishing 50ml (1.7 fl oz) every day onto clean and dry skin in the morning and/or evening. For better results apply with the Clinique Men Maximum Hydrator Eye.

description: Clinique Superdefense Fatigue + Age Cream instantly awakens the skin making it more radiant and youthful-looking. This refreshing cream will not only diminish skin fatigue but also tackle the first signs of aging. Additionally, it will also help to correct uneven texture, dullness, fine lines, and wrinkles. The Stop Signs Technology combats environmental aggressors that tire the skin and accelerate the aging process such as UV radiation, infrared, blue light, dust, and pollen. Therefore, along with vitamin E, this technology ensures optimal antioxidant protection. Furthermore, sunscreen actives such as Abovenzone and Octisalate grant appropriate UVA and UVB protection. Lastly, this cream has two formulations to address the different needs of dry and oily skin types. For dry skin types, try  Clinique Superdefense Fatigue + Age Cream SPF25 – Type 1-2.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clinique Superdefense Fatigue + Age Cream to well-cleansed face, neck, and décolletage. Massage gently into the skin, avoiding contact with the eyes.

description: ISDINCEUTICS Glicoisdin 10 Soft Facial Gel With Peeling Effect is the perfect night cream to help your skin regain a healthy and revitalized look. With a soft exfoliating action, it can refine the skin texture and renew the complexion lending you a smoother, even, and also radiant skin. Starring Glycolic Acid, this night cream will help remove the outermost layer of dead cells and stimulate cell renewal. So, besides reducing imperfections, it will provide anti-aging benefits helping reduce fine lines and wrinkles. Specially formulated for oily to combination skin with imperfections, it has a pleasant gel texture enriched with Aloe Vera. With moisturizing and also anti-inflammatory properties it is ideal to calm irritations, and keep your skin hydrated and soothed. All-in-all, it is the ideal night cream for those who have oily skin with imperfections and are worried about the appearance of aging signs.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply ISDINCEUTICS Glicoisdin 10 Soft Facial Gel With Peeling Effect in the evening to cleansed skin. Gently massage until fully absorbed. If you don't use products with exfoliating acids you should start with low concentrations and increase as tolerated. Keep in mind that when applying a product with exfoliating acids it is also important to apply sunscreen during the day to protect the skin from solar radiation.

description: ISDINCEUTICS Glicoisdin 15 Moderate Cream With Peeling Effect is perfect to help your complexion regain a radiant and youthful look. Having Glycolic Acid as a star ingredient, this night cream has a moderate peeling effect and lends your skin a fresher, brighter, and also smoother appearance. It helps remove the outermost layer of dead cells and stimulate cell renewal enhancing collagen production and providing antiaging benefits. Specially formulated for dry skin, it is also enriched with Borage Oil, Ceramides, and Glycerin that will provide this type of skin the nourishment it needs. Together they hydrate, nourish and soothe the skin improving both elasticity and softness. All-in-all, if you have dull and dry skin and are worried about the appearance of aging signs this night cream is ideal to help your skin regain a healthy and revitalized look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply ISDINCEUTICS Glicoisdin 15 Moderate Cream With Peeling Effect in the evening to cleansed skin. Gently massage until fully absorbed. If you don't use products with exfoliating acids you should start with low concentrations and increase as tolerated. Keep in mind that when applying a product with exfoliating acids it is also important to apply sunscreen during the day to protect the skin from solar radiation.

description:
DR. GRANDEL Nutri Sensation Nutrilizer is a nourishing and repairing facial cream that contributes to youthful-looking, firmer skin. The texture is comfortable and nourishing, suitable for normal to dry skin types, including sensitive and reactive skin.
The formula provides the skin with rich moisture as well as powerful repairing ingredients. In order to minimize the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, the cream is enriched with Age corrector complex. In addition, Cocoa butter reinforces the natural skin barrier, protecting dry and very dry skin from losing moisture while Plant-based Amino acids also contribute to optimize skin moisture. At the same time, Raspberry Seed Oil - rich in Vitamin E and Omega-6 - contributes to regenerate the skin and to keep the skin hydrated. After each use, the skin is visibly repaired and replenished with hydration.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with, cleanse and tone the skin. Then, apply your favorite eye treatment and/or serum and follow with the DR. GRANDEL Nutri Sensation Nutrilizer. Apply a small amount onto the face and neck, smoothing the product gently from the center of the face outwards.

description:
DR. GRANDEL Elements Of Nature Hyaluron Fluid is an intensive moisturizing fluid formulated with hyaluronic acid and arginine. The formulation replenishes the skin and ensures a smooth, plump, and fresh complexion. The acid hyaluronic used in this fluid has a depot effect. As a result, this high molecular variant of hyaluronic acid continuously supplies the skin with moisture and prevents feelings of tension, common when the skin is too dry. Additionally, arginine, an amino acid, is good at optimizing hydration by acting as a humectant. It attracts and retains moisture in the air via absorption, drawing that moisture into or beneath the skin surface. Lastly, it also helps to synthesize urea, one of the natural moisturizing factors of the skin. Perfect for extremely dry skin, that might even show irritation caused by dryness. The light texture of this product is quickly absorbed for a relaxed and soft feeling skin.
The DR. GRANDEL Elements of Nature range bears the ECO Control seal of approval thus meeting high standards of quality, sustainability, and environmental protection.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply DR. GRANDEL Elements Of Nature Hyaluron Fluid after cleansing, in the morning and evening, by distributing evenly onto the face, neck, and décolleté.

description:
DR. GRANDEL Hydro Active Oxygen Moisturizer is a hydrating facial moisturizer that refreshes while promoting a radiant complexion. The texture is comfortable, suitable for combination to dry skin types, including sensitive and reactive skin.
With comfortable and refreshing texture, this hydrating moisturizer delivers more than just instant delight. Containing Hyaluronic Acid, the formula intensely hydrates the skin. In addition, Jojoba oil promotes soft and supple skin all the while balancing excess sebum. Equally important, Perfluorodecalin is an oxygen complex that carries oxygen into the formula, promoting muscle relaxation and a dermal filling effect. After each use, the skin is comfortable, revitalized and replenished with instant and long-lasting hydration.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of DR. GRANDEL Hydro Active Oxygen Moisturizer onto cleansed skin, and lightly work it over the face, neck and décolleté. Massage the product as you apply it to promote absorption.

description: DR. GRANDEL Beautygen Renew II2 Velvet Touch is a rejuvenating cream to give the skin a smooth appearance. Dry skin or areas can feel uncomfortably tight at times and usually fine lines and wrinkles appear more evident in these skin types. This cream was specially developed to address these issues. Formulated with a blend of rich oils, this cream nourishes the skin for a soft and supple feel. Both provide a nourishing effect, moisturizing the skin and protecting it against skin damage. Furthermore, thistle oil is rich in vitamin E, thus being also effective at reducing aging effects caused by sun exposure. The formulation also contains active ingredients that target fine lines and wrinkles in specific. Snow algae extract protects the collagen fibers and gives the skin new elasticity. On the other hand, peptides activate cell renewal and improve the tissue structure so that wrinkles and lines are visibly reduced. All in all, this flowery scented cream grants a 24-hour care ideal for a youthful and radiant complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply DR. GRANDEL Beautygen Renew II2 Velvet Touch to the face, neck, and décolleté, in the morning and evening, after cleansing the skin.

description: Evolve Daily Renew Facial Cream 60ml (2.03fl oz) is an indulgent anti-aging moisturizer that protects and helps restore the structure of the skin.
