Ideal for normal to dry skin types, this silky cream features a unique combination of ingredients that work to revitalize the skin from the inside. Infused with low molecular weight Hyaluronic Acid, it helps re-plump the skin, while also smoothing out the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Combined with Peptides and Amino Acids, it helps improve firmness. This results in the reduction of the look of fine lines and wrinkles. Lastly, the presence of Argan Oil not only hydrates the skin but also helps improve skin elasticity and create a plump, soft appearance. The result is soft, smooth, skin that not only shows fewer signs of aging but is better able to resist their appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Evolve Daily Renew Facial Cream 60ml (2.03fl oz) to the previously cleansed skin of the face and neck in the morning and/or evening. Use upward circular movements in order to stimulate absorption.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Vichy Minéral 89 72H Moisture Boosting Daily Fluid Sun Cream SPF50+ 50ml (1.69floz) is particularly designed to hydrate and protect the skin. This facial moisturizer combines the benefits of SPF50+ sun protection with a blend of hydrating ingredients to deliver up to 72 hours of hydration. Featuring hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and squalane, it boosts hydration and strengthens the skin barrier. Furthermore, vitamin E and niacinamide also provide antioxidant benefits, helping to shield the skin from environmental aggressions and oxidative stress. This results in a healthier, more resilient complexion that maintains its luminosity and hydration. The light, fluid texture of the moisturizer provides a natural, radiant finish.
Moreover, this product offers a daily dose of essential elements to the skin. By combining sun protection with intense hydration and anti-pollution properties, it offers a multi-faceted daily essential. In summary, this moisturizer hydrates, protects, and revitalizes the skin, contributing to its health and radiance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Shake well before use. Apply a suitable amount of Vichy Minéral 89 72H Moisture Boosting Daily Fluid Sun Cream SPF50+ 50ml (1.69floz) to the face every morning.

description:
This gift set contains the following products:

Eve Lom Cleanser 20ml + half Muslin Cleansing Cloth
Eve Lom Foaming Cream Cleanser 20ml 
Eve Lom Rescue Mask 15ml
Eve Lom Moisture Cream 15ml

Eve Lom Cleanser is Eve Lom's iconic and award-winning bestseller, selling one unit every 30 seconds all around the world. This is a luxurious multi-benefit cleansing balm that cleanses the skin while delivering many benefits. Indeed, Eve Lom believes that cleansing is the foundation of beautiful skin, and this product provides the perfect cleanse. Its sumptuous texture melts on the skin without obstructing the pores, removing every trace of dirt and makeup, including waterproof. The relaxing scent of the plant oils, combined with the ritual of massaging the skin, makes for a spa-like application. The skin becomes exceptionally clean without feeling tight. It was clinically proven that the skin was moisturized for 12 hours after the application of this balm.
Eve Lom Foaming Cream Cleanser is a hydrating cream-to-foam cleanser, developed to provide healthy and radiant skin while cleansing it. In fact, Eve Lom promotes that beautiful skin starts with cleansing, and this product is one of the foundations of their perfect skin ritual. This cleanser is a cream that lathers into a soft and creamy foam when activated by water, effectively cleansing the skin without drying it. Not only it removes all traces of dirt, impurities and makeup, including waterproof, but it also refines and pampers the skin.
Eve Lom Rescue Mask purifies and refreshes congested skin, removing excess oil and impurities all the while being moisturizing. Even more, it offers a gentle exfoliation for a softer and brighter complexion. In fact, this product contains honey-infused kaolin clay, a type of fine clay that draws out impurities and sebum from the skin. Honey nourishes and moisturizes the skin. So, not only does this mask deeply purify the skin without drying it, but it also hydrates the skin for up to 72 hours after application. Even more, it refines the skin's texture and brightens the complexion due to the small ground almond particles that provide a gentle exfoliation when the skin is massaged. The skin is left feeling fresh, purified, and soft. In conclusion, this mask rescues dull and congested skin, being suited for all skin types, especially combination to oily skin.
Eve Lom Moisture Cream is a hydrating and anti-aging cream that plumps the skin, visibly reducing wrinkles and fine lines. It also protects the skin from damage caused by environmental pollution. This rich-textured cream quickly melts into the skin, leaving you with smoother, brighter, and moisturized skin. In fact, it contains PrimalHyal Ultrafiller™, a form of hyaluronic acid that is able to penetrate deeper into the skin, plumping it and smoothing wrinkles and fine lines. Even more, this ingredient, along with a blend of peach flower and white horehound extracts, provides antioxidant benefits. So, these protect the skin from pollution and free radical damage, as well as boost the skin's radiance. This luxurious cream also restores the skin's moisture barrier and hydrates the skin for up to 72 hours after its application. All in all, it provides lasting hydration along with smoother and more luminous skin.

description:
Skin Resist Daily Fluid 50ml (1.69floz) is a lightweight fluid that offers daily care for sensitive skin with a reactive tendency. Its formula features Aquammunist®, an exclusive technology derived from mineral water with a unique hydrobiome, rich in beneficial algae. This ingredient provides soothing and restorative benefits, actively calming the skin and reinforcing the skin barrier. These effects are enhanced by niacinamide, an ingredient with soothing and restoring properties.
Additionally, this product features Skincalm Booster, an ingredient based on cherimoya extract. It helps to reduce the production of inflammatory mediators, thus reducing skin reactivity. So, thanks to these ingredients, this product helps to strengthen the skin barrier function, reduce reactivity, and instantly calm signs of discomfort such as irritation, itching, and redness. It also increases the skin's resilience and tolerance threshold, which helps to reduce the frequency of reactive episodes. In essence, this daily fluid helps manage reactive skin, not only working to quickly calm signs of discomfort but also enhancing the skin's resilience over time.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Skin Resist Daily Fluid 50ml (1.69floz) onto the skin of the face and neck. Then, gently massage until the product fully absorbs.

description:
Vichy Liftactiv B3 Tone Correcting Night Cream 50ml (1.69floz) is a night treatment that addresses skin aging signs. Formulated with a potent combination of 4% niacinamide and 0.15% pure retinol, this cream works overnight to promote skin renewal, reduce hyperpigmentation, and minimize the appearance of wrinkles. The inclusion of these powerful active ingredients ensures that the skin appears more even and radiant by morning. Furthermore, this hypoallergenic formula includes glycerin, probiotic fractions, and panthenol, which together provide additional moisturizing, soothing, and fortifying benefits. Its efficacy in improving skin properties such as elasticity, firmness, and tone, while reducing the appearance of wrinkles and dark spots is backed by clinical studies.
Tested across all phototypes (I to VI), the cream is proven suitable for various skin types, addressing wrinkles, and dark spots. In summary, this cream offers an anti-aging solution that fights dark spots.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Vichy Liftactiv B3 Tone Correcting Night Cream 50ml (1.69floz) in the evening. Apply two evenings a week in the first week. In the second week, apply every other evening. In the third week, apply daily in the evening.

description:
Thank You Farmer Miracle Age Repair Emulsion 130ml (4.57 fl oz) embodies a harmonious blend of ingredients and texture that cater to the skin's vitality and nourishment. What sets it apart is its dual functionality. On one hand, it has a brightening effect that gives the skin a glowing complexion. On the other hand, it improves the appearance of wrinkles. At the heart of its formula are moisturizing ingredients that retain skin moisture to nurture and care for the skin. Among them are argan oil, squalane, ceramide, and bisabolol.
The texture is equally amazing. Its rich gel consistency ensures a pleasant application, wrapping the skin in an emulsion that is high in nutrients but isn't sticky. This ensures that it caters to all skin types while being particularly beneficial for those with normal to dry skin. The fragrance of this product features a delightful medley of jasmine, calendula, and other floral scents. These intertwine to produce a calming and serene olfactory experience. All in all, this emulsion brightens, combats wrinkles, and reinforces the skin barrier to provide an anti-aging action.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply one to two pumps of Thank You Farmer Miracle Age Repair Emulsion 130ml (4.57 fl oz) to the skin of the face and neck with rolling movements. Then, gently press the skin with your palms. Use after serum.

description:
PURITO BHA Dead Skin Moisture Gel 100ml (3.38 fl oz) is an exfoliating gel designed to purify the pores and promote a smoother, clearer complexion. This product's formula contains 2% Betaine Salicylate, an oil-soluble exfoliant that efficiently removes impurities and excess sebum from within the pores. By doing so, it helps prevent the occurrence of breakouts, such as whiteheads and blackheads, ensuring the skin remains clear and healthy. In addition, the gel is enriched with Tea Tree Leaf Extract, which delivers soothing effects and the ability to control excessive sebum production.
To complement the exfoliating and sebum-controlling actions, this gel incorporates Artemisia capillaris, Aloe Vera, and Hyaluronic Acid. These ingredients deliver  hydrating and soothing properties, which helps prevent dryness that can often accompany exfoliation, leaving the skin feeling soft and hydrated. So, this product gently exfoliates the skin overnight, allowing you to wake up to a more refined and purified complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of PURITO BHA Dead Skin Moisture Gel 100ml (3.38 fl oz) onto the skin of the face, avoiding the eye area. Apply sunscreen with SPF30 or higher in the morning routine. It is recommended to introduce this product gradually into your routine if your skin is not used to exfoliating acids (for example, start by using it once a week and gradually increase the frequency). Do not use with other products with AHA/BHA or high concentrations of vitamins C or A.

description:
SVR Densitium Global Correction Redensifying Cream SPF30 50ml (1.7floz) is a comprehensive anti-aging solution that specifically addresses wrinkles, dark spots, and firmness on the face and neck. On one hand, the formula is enriched with ultra-fragmented hyaluronic acid, bio-calcium, a duo of amino acids, probiotics, and peptides. Together, these ingredients deliver a global anti-aging correction, leaving the skin more toned, and visibly younger-looking. On the other hand, this cream offers an SPF 30, protecting against UVB, UVA, IR, and visible (blue) light, which are known contributors to photoaging and hyperpigmentation.
All in all, this cream has the ability to redensify and firm the skin, redefine facial contours, smooth the skin, and lend a more even-toned complexion. Moreover, its silky, non-greasy, and non-sticky texture, lightly scented, provides intense hydration and comfort throughout the day. That said, this cream is particularly suitable for normal to dry skin types. In summary, this product is a day cream that offers protection against the sun's rays while addressing signs of aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply SVR Densitium Global Correction Redensifying Cream SPF30 50ml (1.7floz) to clean dry skin in the morning.

description:
Esthederm Intensive Pro-Collagen+ Face & Neck Cream 50ml (1.6floz) is particularly designed to address key signs of aging, including loss of firmness, wrinkles, and skin sagging. This powerful cream is formulated to firm, tighten, smooth lines and wrinkles, reduce sagging skin, and improve skin elasticity by boosting collagen production. For that purpose, it features the Procoll+ technology which specifically combines three biomimetic peptides and one biomimetic sugar. It stimulates the natural production of five types of collagen, thus enhancing the skin's structural integrity and youthful appearance. As a result, the skin not only feels firmer but also shows visibly redefined contours over time. In fact, clinical results demonstrate a significant 43% increase in skin firmness, a 52% elevation in skin tightening, and a 40% enhancement in skin elasticity after consistent use. Moreover, 94%users report firmer skin, 81% note re-sculpted facial contours, and 90% observe smoothed wrinkles.
This cream stands out not only for its formula but also for its commitment to providing a luxurious user experience. With a rich yet non-greasy texture, it ensures that the application is pleasurable and suitable for all skin types. In summary, this cream offers a solution for those looking to improve their skin's firmness, elasticity, and overall appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Esthederm Intensive Pro-Collagen+ Face & Neck Cream 50ml (1.6floz) to the face, neck, and décolleté.

description:
Nivea Anti-Wrinkle Revitalizing Day Cream 55+ SPF15 50ml (1.69floz) is specially formulated to address the unique needs of mature skin during the day. This cream works particularly to visibly reduce wrinkles, enhance the skin's vitality, and bolster its defense against dehydration. It not only hydrates the skin and helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles but also provides protection against sun-induced aging thanks to its SPF15. For that purpose, the formula features argan oil and calcium. Argan oil, rich in essential fatty acids, deeply moisturizes the skin while calcium replenishes the skin’s density and resilience, promoting a visibly youthful look. Equally important, this day cream features an SPF 15 to protect the skin against the harmful effects of sun rays such as premature skin aging.
Lastly, this cream is specifically suitable for individuals aged 55 and above, offering a comprehensive approach to daytime skin care. It ensures that mature skin receives the care it deserves, promising a significant enhancement in skin texture and a reduction in wrinkle visibility. Making it a part of your daily skincare routine guarantees a protected, hydrated, and revitalized complexion. In short, it is a great option to fight wrinkles while offering sun protection at the same time.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Nivea Anti-Wrinkle Revitalizing Day Cream 55+ SPF15 50ml (1.69floz) to clean, dry skin of the face and neckline in the morning.

description:
L'Occitane Shea Butter Light Comforting Cream 50ml (1.7 oz) offers a feeling of comfort and softness to the skin.
Among the 98% of natural-origin ingredients in its formula is the nourishing Shea Butter. Harvested according to the local traditions in Burkina Faso, it is part of a sustainable, fair trade supply chain to ensure ethical practices. As a result of this conscientious effort, this Shea Butter is particularly rich in Omega 6 and Karitene, which results in a significantly more nourishing and soothing cream. Not only that, but the skin complexion is also hydrated and moisturized for longer, for this careful blend of ingredients also protects the surface layers of the skin against the damaging effects of free radicals.
Bash in the long-lasting comfort and nourishment this moisturizer provides and feel your skin become softer and suppler with every use.
how_to_use:
How to use
Warm a small quantity of L'Occitane Shea Butter Light Comforting Cream 50ml (1.7 oz) in between your hands. Then, apply it to your skin with gentle pats to boost microcirculation, starting from the chin and moving upwards towards the forehead. Lastly, don't forget the neck and décolleté areas.

description:
Collistar Pure Actives Retinol + Phloretin Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) is particularly formulated to renew the complexion and fight dark spots. Central to the efficacy of this cream is hydroxypinacolone retinoate (HPR), a derivative of retinol. HPR works by accelerating the cell renewal process, a key factor in achieving a smoother, more youthful-looking skin surface. It also enhances collagen synthesis. Overall, it reduces fine lines and wrinkles, evens skin tone, and improves skin texture, making it a great ingredient in anti-aging skincare. In addition, phloretin, a potent antioxidant, works to reduce hyperpigmentation. This action is crucial in reducing the appearance of dark spots and uneven skin tone, thus contributing to a more even and radiant complexion.
The synergy between these two ingredients leads to a reduction in signs of aging and a more uniform complexion. Also particularly noteworthy, this cream caters to a wide range of skin types, including sensitive skin. Nonetheless, it is especially suitable for those new to retinoids who have non-sensitive skin or for individuals with sensitive skin who are already used to retinoids.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Collistar Pure Actives Retinol + Phloretin Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) to the face and neck, preferably in the evening, gradually increasing the frequency of use.

how_to_use: Not found

description: D'AVEIA Ceutics Absolute Repair Anti-Aging Night Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) is an innovative anti-aging night cream that addresses the appearance of the first aging signs. This cream is uniquely formulated to prevent and delay the aging process, ensuring a revitalizing action while hydrating and soothing the skin. At the heart of this product's efficacy is a potent antioxidant composition, comprising bakuchiol, colloidal oatmeal, and rice. At the same time, the inclusion of both high and low molecular-weight hyaluronic acid offers powerful hydration while visibly reducing dehydration lines. Meanwhile, the low molecular weight of hyaluronic acid, along with Tripeptide 38, contributes to the filling effect, consequently reducing the appearance of wrinkles. This cream's revitalizing properties are further enhanced by glycolic and lactic acids, which bring luminosity to the skin and help smooth out its texture.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply D'AVEIA Ceutics Absolute Repair Anti-Aging Night Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to clean, dry skin in the evening routine.

description:
D'AVEIA Ceutics Hyaluronic Glow Day Cream SPF15 50ml (1.69 fl oz) is a multifaceted skincare solution that offers hydration, revitalization, protection, and anti-aging benefits. At the heart of this product's hydrating power is the combination of hyaluronic acid and glucuronic acid. With these ingredients, this moisturizer delivers immediate and long-lasting hydration, effectively addressing dehydration lines and wrinkles. In addition, glycolic acid in the formula plays a role in revitalizing the skin, enhancing its luminosity, and smoothing its texture. Equally important, the cream contains an exclusive detox ingredient for a detox effect. It offers comprehensive protection against a range of environmental stressors, including urban pollution, UVA and UVB radiation, infrared rays, and blue light. Additionally, it combats the effects of chemical agents and temperature variations, which can contribute to skin stress.
Furthermore, the cream’s unique "Perlante" ingredient brightens the complexion instantly, providing an immediate glow. This feature, combined with its hydrating properties, makes it an excellent choice for those seeking a radiant appearance. Beyond these benefits, this product is also formulated to offer a potent antioxidant composition, containing colloidal oatmeal, rice, and corn. In summary, this day moisturizer provides a prolonged hydration boost while simultaneously shielding the skin from aging and photoaging effects.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply D'AVEIA Ceutics Hyaluronic Glow Day Cream SPF15 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to clean, dry skin in the morning routine.

description:
This set contains the following products:

Galénic Huile De Beauté Floral Pre-Care Elixir 30ml
Galénic Diffuseur De Beauté Radiance Booster 50ml
Galénic Beauté De Nuit Chrono-Active Aqua-Gel 15ml

Galénic Huile De Beauté Floral Pre-Care Elixir is a pre-treatment oil that perfectly prepares the skin for the following steps. This delightful oil is especially suitable for mature skin that has been affected by hormonal changes, providing it with a revitalizing and nourishing action. In this way, by applying it before the usual skincare routine, this product enhances skin absorption so that it is more ready to receive the following products. At the same time, this product lets the skin recover elasticity, comfort, luminosity, and softness. With this in mind, this oil has a distinctive formula with four main ingredients of natural origin that offer amazing sensoriality and efficacy. That said, the formula resorts to the properties of Jojoba esters, Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Triheptanoin, and Alkanes.
 Galénic Diffuseur De Beauté Radiance Booster is a gel cream that gives an instant rosy effect and a long-lasting radiance to the skin. The real Ruby Microparticles that are visible on this skincare is responsible for giving the cheeks a rosy glow and an immediate light to the skin, and its cocktail of vitamins, blurring erasers, and glycerin energizes, moisturizes, and smooth the skin. It can be used daily, as a treatment, or just as a makeup primer, always giving the skin a new glow.
Galénic Beauté De Nuit Chrono-Active Aqua-Gel is a night care product to moisturize and recover the skin while you sleep. With its ultra-fresh, opalescent, crystal-clear gel texture, this chrono-active "patch effect" aqua-gel is easily absorbed, offering a relaxing and hydrating bath to your skin. Thanks to the action of an enzyme derived from papaya, the dead cells are removed, and the skin surface is renewed, for radiant skin in the morning. Glycerin, Sorbitol, and Glucose are responsible for deeply hydrating the skin, while Hyaluronic Acid prevents water loss. The skin gets relaxed, radiant, and younger-looking.

The fluid also takes care of the skin's microbiome, incorporating pre-postbiotics to ensure a balanced and healthy skin environment as well as hydration with the presence of hyaluronic acid.
Its light, melting texture is designed for swift absorption, ensuring a comfortable and non-greasy feel on the skin. With this in mind, this product serves as a moisturizer for various skin types. In summary, this fluid is a suitable addition to a depigmenting skincare routine aimed at achieving more radiant and even skin.

How to use
Apply Babé Depigment+ Control Fluid 40ml (1.35 fl oz) to clean, dry skin.

description:
This gift set contains the following products:

1x Collistar Rigenera Smoothing Anti-Wrinkle Cream 50ml
1x Collistar Rigenera Anti-Wrinkle Repairing Night Cream 15ml
1x Necessaire The Bridge 

Collistar Rigenera Smoothing Anti-Wrinkle Cream 50ml  has a creamy, gentle and luxurious texture that effortlessly adheres to the skin of the face and neck. In this sense, this cream reduces and prevents the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines on the face by filling the skin from the inside. Moreover, cell regeneration is reactivated, giving rise to a revitalized complexion with incredible natural radiance. Finally, the skin also gains a boost of nourishment and hydration, leaving it with a healthier, more beautiful, and rejuvenated appearance. This cream has numerous active ingredients inspired by the science of bioregeneration. Specifically, it has super low molecular weight Hyaluronic Acid and two Biomimetic Peptides. These end up penetrating the skin very easily, stimulating cell regeneration in the lower layers of the epidermis and filling in the wrinkles from within. Furthermore, Meristematic Italian Echinacea cells repairs the skin's barrier and stimulates its collagen production thus giving a rejuvenated appearance to the face and neck. On the other hand, Glycerin helps to retain moisture on the surface of the skin making it more hydrated in the long run. Finally, thanks to exclusive Targeted Active Technology®, this cream encapsulates the ingredients and delivers them where needed, ensuring they penetrate deep down for optimal results.

Collistar Rigenera Anti-Wrinkle Repairing Night Cream  is an anti-aging cream that works to repair the skin overnight. In this sense, this cream helps educe and prevent the appearance of wrinkles thanks to a unique formula, inspired by the science of bioregeneration. In this case, the formula features low molecular weight Hyaluronic Acid, two biomimetic Peptides, and Italian meristematic Lemon Balm cells. These ingredients work together to stimulate cell regeneration and fill in wrinkles. As a result, this cream helps reduce the effects of pollution and oxidation that are responsible for cell aging. Furthermore, thanks to exclusive Targeted Active Technology, this cream encapsulates the ingredients and delivers them where needed, ensuring they penetrate deep down for optimal results. As a last note, this vegan nourishing cream is suitable even for sensitive skin. All in all, this product ensures younger-looking skin day after day while hydrating, nourishing, and regenerating the skin.

description:
This gift set contains the following products:

1x Collistar Pure Actives Collagen + Malachite Cream Balm 50ml
1x Collistar Pure Actives Hyaluronic Acid + Peptides Eye Contour 5ml
1x Necessaire The Bridge 

Collistar Pure Actives Collagen + Malachite Cream Balm   provides a trustworthy anti-aging treatment with an intense firming as well as wrinkle-smoothing effect. In fact, its core amino acids come from plant-based Collagen carefully selected by Collistar's Clean Research®. This option aggregates protein fibers from corn, soy, and wheat, replicating their structure, and imitating animal collagen action. Moreover, collagen is then blended with Malachite - a copper-rich mineral extract - that protects your skin from the harshest effects of the aging process. Besides, it has anti-oxidant and anti-glycation properties which prevent collagen fibers from hardening and losing their main function. All in all, the skin looks youthful, smoother, and more toned than ever. Through continued use, tissues tend to become even more elastic, visibly stronger, and remarkably resilient.

Collistar Pure Actives Hyaluronic Acid + Peptides Eye Contour is a gel-serum specifically for the eye contour that fights signs of aging. For that purpose, this product features Hyaluronic acid and Peptides, which work together to improve the appearance of the eye contour. On one hand, Hyaluronic acid in four molecular weights is responsible for deeply hydrating the skin, having the ability to retain water in the skin. Besides keeping the eye contour hydrated, it will also plump the skin. On the other hand, three Peptides have a lifting effect and also reduce puffiness and dark circles. And an extra tip, you can store this product in the refrigerator to enhance its decongesting action. Additionally, the formula also contains Ginseng extract that helps protect against blue light damage. In conclusion, this eye contour cream provides a lifting effect that rejuvenates your complexion. As a last note, this product has a formula with 97% ingredients of natural origin, including Ultra-Pure Water from the Dolomites.

description:
Elizabeth Arden Retinol + HPR Ceramide Rapid Skin Renewing Water Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a groundbreaking skincare product that boasts the potent effects of retinol in a gentle formula. To begin with, the formula features a blend of pure retinol and HPR (High-Performance Retinol), a next-generation retinoid known for its sustained release. HPR is particularly noteworthy for being gentle enough even for those new to retinol, and its compatibility with both day and night usage. The cream's formula is further enriched with peptides to complement its anti-aging action. Equally important, phytoceramides, hyaluronic acid, bisabolol, and ginger extract add to the lineup to offer caring benefits. All these ingredients contribute to the product's ability to smooth wrinkles and lines, retexturize skin, improve firmness, and strengthen the moisture barrier.
The product's efficacy translates into a visible reduction in wrinkles and pores. The skin's firmness is enhanced, and improvements in tone and texture are visibly apparent. Right from the first application, the cream imparts a sense of nourishment, leaving skin looking radiant and revitalized. As a last note, this product presents an airless dispenser bottle, which preserves the stability of the formula and releases the exact and appropriate amount of product for each application. In summary, this product addresses various skin aging concerns, offering visible improvements in skin texture, firmness, and hydration, while being gentle enough for first-time users and suitable for daily application.
how_to_use:
How to use
Pump Elizabeth Arden Retinol + HPR Ceramide Rapid Skin Renewing Water Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto the hands and massage gently onto clean face and neck, applying with upward motion.

description: Mizon Cicaluronic Moisturizer 50ml (1.69 fl oz) caters to key skin concerns such as dryness, redness, dehydration, uneven tone, and dullness. With this in mind, the formula features the Cicaluronic Complex™, a blend that leverages the soothing and moisturizing properties of Centella asiatica and hyaluronic acid. As a result, this unique complex works to not only intensely moisturize the skin but also to calm and reduce visible signs of irritation. In addition, the formula contains notable moisturizing ingredients such as squalane, shea butter, and Betula alba juice. The rich, thick texture of this cream is another key point. This makes it particularly suitable for dry and sensitive skin and great for cold and dry months or for those who prefer this type of texture.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mizon Cicaluronic Moisturizer 50ml (1.69 fl oz) over the face and neck.

description:
Ziaja Acai Berry Antioxidation Protective & Soothing Day Cream SPF10 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a soothing and moisturizing daily cream that softens the skin while providing protection against environmental aggressors. Formulated with a combination of açaí berry extract, beta-glucan, hyaluronic acid, shea butter, and a hesperidin derivative, this cream is rich in antioxidants that help protect the skin from damage caused by environmental damage such as pollution. Additionally, the hydrating properties ensure that the skin stays moisturized throughout the day, helping to maintain a smooth complexion. It also delivers soothing benefits to the skin, and features low sun protection, with SPF10.
So, this moisturizer helps maintain soft and calm skin, while delivering antioxidant protection against environmental damage, preventing signs of aging, and promoting a radiant complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Ziaja Acai Berry Antioxidation Protective & Soothing Day Cream SPF10 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto the skin of the face, avoiding the eye area. Then, gently massage until the product fully absorbs.

description:
Ziaja Jasmine Anti-Wrinkle Day Cream SPF6 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a rich moisturizing cream designed for dry and mature skin. This day cream provides long-lasting nourishment while helping to reduce skin roughness and smooth out wrinkles. Its formula is vegan and contains a peptide complex, hyaluronic acid, jasmine oil, and fatty acids derived from vegetable oils. So, peptides help stimulate collagen production, leading to firmer and more resilient skin. Hyaluronic acid deeply hydrates the epidermis, ensuring that the skin retains moisture throughout the day. Then, jasmine oil and fatty acids from vegetable oils enhance the cream's ability to nourish and soften the epidermis, leaving the skin visibly more supple.
In addition to its moisturizing and anti-aging benefits, this product also offers low protection against sun damage, thanks to its UVA/UVB filters, with an SPF of 6. Last but not least, the cream's fragrance adds a pleasant element to the skincare routine. In essence, this rich moisturizer helps hydrate and nourish the skin while working to reduce the appearance of signs of aging in mature skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Jasmine Anti-Wrinkle Day Cream SPF6 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto the skin of face and neck. Then, gently massage until the product fully absorbs.

description:
Ziaja Cucumber Mint Moisturising Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a lightweight face cream that moisturizes, refreshes, and smooths the skin. Its vegan formula includes lactobionic acid, cucumber and mint extracts, and panthenol, which work together to hydrate, refine, and soothe the skin. Lactobionic acid, a polyhydroxy acid (PHA), removes dead skin cells while being gentle on the skin, promoting a smoother and more even skin texture. Cucumber extract provides a refreshing and moisturizing effect, while mint extract adds a cooling sensation that energizes the skin. Moreover, panthenol not only hydrates but also helps to soothe irritation.
The cream also delivers low sun protection, with an SPF of 6. Additionally, its energizing and cooling fragrance allows for a pleasant application experience. All in all, this face cream is an affordable and easy-to-use option for maintaining a hydrated, smooth, and calm complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Cucumber Mint Moisturising Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto previously cleansed skin of the face. Then, gently massage until the product fully absorbs.

description:
Clarins Extra-Firming Face Emulsion 75ml (2.6 fl oz) is formulated to target lack of firmness, dullness, and wrinkles. This emulsion stands out for delivering optimal hydration and firmness as promised by the Extra-Firming range but in a much lighter delivery system. For that purpose, the formula features several key ingredients that contribute to its multifaceted benefits. To begin with, kangaroo flower and mitracarpus extract work together to improve skin firmness while diminishing the appearance of wrinkles at the same time. Furthermore, oat sugars are included for their tightening effect, while Leaf of Life extract hydrates the skin. Additionally, Date Desert addresses dark spots and evens out skin tone, and Acerola bio works to enhance skin radiance.
The emulsion's texture is particularly noteworthy. Its ultra-lightweight nature makes it suitable for all skin types and particularly ideal for combination to oily skin or those who prefer this type of texture. Still, it offers a silky finish and "bouncy" effect. To complete the sensory experience, the emulsion boasts a delightful fragrance, featuring notes of rose and camellia. In summary, this product is ideal for those seeking a lighter solution for firming and hydrating the skin, while also addressing concerns like uneven skin tone and enhancing overall radiance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins Extra-Firming Face Emulsion 75ml (2.6 fl oz) to the face and neckline both in the morning and evening.

description:
coxir Green Tea Clear Emulsion 100ml (3.38floz) is a lightweight moisturizing emulsion that leaves the skin feeling refreshed, balanced, and soft. Perfect for acne-prone skin, this product offers the hydration the skin needs while delivering additional soothing and restoring benefits. Additionally, it features a light and quickly absorbed texture that doesn't leave any heavy or greasy feeling behind. 
So, in its formulation, there's green tea, an ingredient rich in antioxidants, which also has soothing properties and helps maintain a healthy oil-moisture balance in the skin. Then, aloe vera provides an additional layer of hydration and soothing benefits, so that the skin remains hydrated and calm throughout the day. Snail mucin, renowned for its regenerative properties, further enhances the emulsion's ability to maintain healthy and soft skin. In fact, it aids in the skin's natural healing process, reducing the appearance of scars and imperfections. In essence, this product is a great option for daily use, seamlessly integrating into any skincare routine to offer essential hydration. Its lightweight texture makes it pleasant to apply, while the formula helps balance, restore, and calm the complexion.

description:
coxir Tea Tree Pore & Sebum Emulsion 100ml (3.38floz) is a lightweight moisturizer that helps purify the skin while also minimizing the appearance of pores, making it a great choice for those with oily and acne-prone skin. This product's formula features tea tree extract, an ingredient with antimicrobial properties that help reduce acne blemishes. Additionally, it also helps regulate excess oil and soothe irritated skin. In addition to tea tree, the formula is enhanced with Centella asiatica extract, an ingredient known for its ability to repair and soothe the skin. Another unique component of this emulsion is volcanic water, rich in minerals, which aids in maintaining natural skin hydration.
The product has a lightweight texture that absorbs quickly, leaving no sticky residue behind. This allows for a comfortable application experience and ensures that the skin feels refreshed and soft after use. coxir Vita C Bright Cream 50ml (1.69floz) is a revitalizing facial cream formulated to enhance skin radiance and promote an even-toned complexion. Enriched with Vitamin C, this cream harnesses its antioxidant power to protect the skin against free radical damage, while simultaneously working to maintain the skin's natural luminosity. The antioxidant benefits of this cream are further amplified by Vitamin E, which complements Vitamin C in fighting oxidative stress, contributing to a more vibrant complexion.
Niacinamide is another key ingredient in this moisturizer, known for its ability to combat dark spots and enhance the skin barrier's health. Its inclusion supports a more even skin tone and the skin's hydration and resilience. Last but not least, adding to the cream's formula is honey extract. Honey not only nourishes the skin but also helps soothe it and promote its natural healing mechanisms. All in all, this product is a great option for anyone seeking naturally glowing and even-toned skin. Suitable for daily use, it leaves the skin feeling soft, nourished, and illuminated with each application.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products:

Some By Mi Propolis B5 Glow Barrier Calming Oil to Foam 30ml
Some By Mi Propolis B5 Glow Barrier Calming Toner 30ml
Some By Mi Propolis B5 Glow Barrier Calming Serum 10ml
Some By Mi Propolis B5 Glow Barrier Calming Cream 20g

Some By Mi Propolis B5 Glow Barrier Calming Oil to Foam incorporates the benefits of double cleansing into a single, efficient step. This transformative product starts as an oil, and then emulsifies into a gentle and rich foam upon contact with water. Thanks to this, it effectively removes dirt, impurities, and makeup in one step, without the need for a separate foaming cleanser. With a skin-calming and restorative formula, this cleanser is suitable for all skin types, but perfect for sensitive or irritated skin. It is also suitable for acne-prone skin. It is formulated with a combination of natural ingredients that create a rich and soft foam, Pro-Panthenol (a fusion of panthenol and propolis), honey, and royal jelly extracts. Pro-Panthenol helps repair and strengthen the damaged skin barrier, thus reducing irritation and enhancing skin resilience against external stressors. The inclusion of honey and royal jelly further soothes and enriches the skin with nourishment, leaving it soft and glowing post-cleansing, without the uncomfortable tightness often associated with traditional cleansers. Last but not least, it features Truecica™, a patented ingredient with the ability to calm irritated and inflamed skin. 

Some By Mi Propolis B5 Glow Barrier Calming Toner is a hydrating and soothing toner that supports skin barrier enhancement. It features Pro-Panthenol, a combination of propolis and panthenol that helps fortify the skin's barrier while hydrating and nourishing the skin. It also contains Royal Jelly and Honey extracts, ingredients that enhance the nourishing and calming effects and contribute to enhancing the skin's luminosity. The formula is complemented by calming Bee Pollen, soothing TrueCica™, and hydrating ceramides and hyaluronic acid. Thanks to all of these ingredients, this toner is a great option for sensitive and irritated skin, while also helping to improve the appearance of acne-prone skin.

Some By Mi Propolis B5 Glow Barrier Calming Serum helps improve the condition of damaged skin barrier, enhance the skin's softness and glow, and also prevent acne breakouts. At its core, this serum features Pro-Panthenol, a synergy of propolis and panthenol, to fortify the skin's barrier, soothe irritation, and provide deep hydration. Propolis extract helps to strengthen the damaged skin barrier while also featuring antimicrobial and soothing properties. So, the combination of these effects helps improve the appearance of acne lesions while calming irritated and inflamed skin, a common occurrence in acne-prone skin. Panthenol contributes to this protective and soothing effect by enhancing the skin's moisture retention and barrier function. To further elevate its effects, the serum incorporates Royal Gold Honey Rx™, a blend of honey, royal jelly, and gold. This mix not only deeply moisturizes and nourishes the skin but also imparts a radiant glow, making the skin appear more luminous. Additionally, TrueCica™ provides the ability to soothe irritation, offering relief to troubled skin areas. Last but not least, the serum's formula is also enriched with ceramides and hyaluronic acid, essential components for maintaining skin hydration and softness.

Some By Mi Propolis B5 Glow Barrier Calming Cream features a blend of nourishing and soothing ingredients that help strengthen and repair the damaged skin barrier, leaving the skin soft and with a natural glow. Its formula features Pro-Panthenol, a combination of propolis and panthenol. These ingredients not only nourish and soothe the skin but also help improve the damaged skin barrier, leading to soft and healthy-looking skin. In particular, propolis extract also features antimicrobial properties. So, the combination of these effects also makes this moisturizer a great option for calming and improving the appearance of acne-prone skin. Additionally, royal jelly and honey enhance this cream's formula, delivering a boost of nourishment and enhancing the skin's natural glow. Last but not least, ceramides and hyaluronic acid work together to ensure hydration and softness, while TrueCica™ helps enhance the soothing benefits.

description:
PURITO Dermide Balancing Barrier Balm 60ml (2.02 fl oz) is a skincare product that provides intense moisture to dry and sensitive skin. This balm excels in balancing the skin's natural oil and water levels, a critical factor in maintaining skin health. Additionally, it helps soothe the skin and reinforce its protective barrier, making it ideal for those with sensitive skin. Central to this balm's effectiveness are ceramides, lipid molecules found naturally in the skin that are crucial for maintaining the skin's barrier function and retaining moisture. So, this product features three different types of ceramides: EOS, NP, and NS. Each type contributes uniquely to strengthening the skin barrier and improving its hydration. 
Further enhancing the balm’s formula is the inclusion of squalane, a well-known emollient. Squalane also helps reinforce the skin barrier, soothe the skin, and provide additional moisture. So, this results in a product that effectively hydrates, soothes, and strengthens the skin. In essence, it addresses the needs of dry and sensitive skin by providing essential moisture and reinforcing the skin’s natural barrier, leaving the skin feeling soft, calm, and well-nourished.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of PURITO Dermide Balancing Barrier Balm 60ml (2.02 fl oz) onto clean and toned skin of the face. Then, gently massage until the product completely absorbs.

description:
AXIS-Y Cera-Heart My Type Duo Cream 60ml (2.02 fl oz) is an innovative solution designed to cater to different needs of the skin. Depending on internal or external factors, such as the climate, our skin's condition and needs can vary and fluctuate. This product is your answer to those changing needs, ensuring you maintain a healthy-looking complexion every day. So, what sets this 2-in-1 product apart are its two unique formulas. First, there's the blue gel-cream, a lightweight formula that hydrates oilier areas without leaving a heavy or greasy feel. Enriched with heartleaf, sage, and licorice extracts, this formula not only hydrates but also offers soothing, oil-regulating, and antioxidant benefits.
On the other hand, the white cream is a great option for drier areas of the skin that crave extra moisture and nourishment. It's rich with ceramides and purslane, combined with Pure Medi Technology. These ingredients make sure your skin receives added hydration, skin-repairing benefits, and proactive protection against signs of aging. But that's not all. Both formulas have been enhanced with ingredients like Centella asiatica, sorghum, and allantoin. This blend guarantees that your skin gets a consistent dose of soothing, anti-aging, and hydrating effects. 
The best part of this duo cream is the freedom it offers. Thanks to the two different formulas, you can easily customize your application based on your skin's needs. It is also perfect for combination skin! For instance, if your T-Zone (forehead and nose) tends to be oilier, apply the blue gel-cream to it to deliver lightweight hydration. Meanwhile, for the U-Zone, which is generally drier, the white cream will provide the necessary hydration and care. All in all, this product is a convenient choice for the skin's daily hydration needs.
how_to_use:
How to use
Scoop a blue or white portion of AXIS-Y Cera-Heart My Type Duo Cream 60ml (2.02 fl oz) onto the spatula. Apply the blue cream to oilier parts of the skin, normally the T-zone (forehead and nose) and the white cream to drier parts of the skin, usually the U-zone (cheeks and jawline). Finally, gently massage the skin until the product fully absorbs.

description:
Teaology White Tea Miracle Anti-Age Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) is an anti-aging face and neck cream that works to refine the skin, increase its radiance, and decrease the visibility of signs of aging. So, in its formula, there's an infusion of Organic White Tea, with a high concentration of polyphenols. These polyphenols are potent antioxidants, therefore playing a role in protecting the skin from the aging effects of environmental stressors. This infusion is crafted using the brand's patented Tea Infusion Skincare technology, ensuring that the maximum beneficial properties of the tea are harnessed. Then, the formula is enhanced with a combination of vegetable collagen and a peptide complex. These ingredients work to decrease wrinkles, hydrate, refine, and boost collagen production in the skin.
So, with consistent use, this product promises to visibly reduce wrinkles and fine lines, as well as increase the skin's natural glow, so that the skin radiates natural beauty. In essence, this moisturizer delivers comprehensive anti-aging care, designed to reveal the skin's natural beauty and vitality.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Teaology White Tea Miracle Anti-Age Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) onto clean skin of the face and neck. Then, gently massage it using light, circular movements.

description:
Teaology Happy Skin All-In-One Beauty Balm 100ml (3.3 fl oz) is a versatile and multifunctional beauty balm that caters to the needs of the face, neck, and eye contour. Infused with Blue Tea Infusion, rich in antioxidants, and ceramides, this balm helps to hydrate and soothe stressed skin while promoting its elasticity and luminosity. In its formula, there's a concentrated blend of plant ceramides, essential lipids that form the skin's protective barrier. By replenishing these vital ceramides, the balm not only restores but also promotes a healthy skin barrier and a correct water balance. This reinforcement of the skin's natural barrier is crucial for maintaining overall skin health and vitality. Then, niacinamide also aids in maintaining a healthy skin barrier, minimizing pores, and evening out skin tone.
The inclusion of olive oil, shea butter, and jojoba oil enhances this balm's nourishing properties. These natural oils deeply nourish the skin, leaving it feeling soft and supple. Last but not least, this balm helps to repair and calm the skin, making it an excellent choice for those with irritated skin. It features soothing ingredients such as Centella Asiatica, known for its healing and soothing properties. This balm's rich and melting texture is a delight to the senses and can be used in multiple ways. It serves as a daily nourishing cream for the face, neck, eye contour, and even the lips. As an SOS treatment, it provides quick relief from dryness and soothes irritation. Additionally, it can be applied as an intensive regenerating mask without rinsing, offering a restorative treatment. In essence, this balm ensures that the skin remains happy, hydrated, and radiantly healthy.
how_to_use:
How to use
As a daily moisturizer, apply Teaology Happy Skin All-In-One Beauty Balm 100ml (3.3 fl oz) to clean skin of the face, neck, and eye contour and gently massage. As a mask, apply an even layer to the skin, including the eye contour. Then, leave to act overnight or until the product fully absorbs.

description: Dr. Ceuracle Hyal Reyouth Night Cream 60g (2.11 oz) is your overnight ticket to deeply hydrated and revitalized skin. It is packed with moisturizing ingredients, such as the distinct 6 Hyal complex, a blend of six types of hyaluronic acid. Upon application, the skin's surface is immediately moisturized, quenching its thirst. Beyond this surface touch, it absorbs into deeper layers, delivering long-lasting hydration, masterfully plumping the skin and reinforcing its elasticity during sleep. Therefore, this helps you wake up with a face that feels softer, firmer, and irresistibly plump. While this cream boasts intensive moisturizing properties, it gives the skin a refreshing finish. Moreover, despite being a night cream, if your skin is craving an extra hydration boost, it can also be used in the morning. So, let this cream replenish your skin, so that you can embrace deep hydration and a rejuvenated appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Dr. Ceuracle Hyal Reyouth Night Cream 60g (2.11 oz) to previously cleansed skin. Gently massage the skin until the product fully absorbs.

description: Dr. Ceuracle Tea Tree Purifine 80 Cream 50g (1.76 oz) is a lightweight moisturizer that hydrates and soothes the skin, helping to regulate the oil-moisture balance. So, it contains 80% tea tree extract and tea tree oil, ingredients with renowned beneficial effects on acne-prone skin, helping to decrease the appearance of acne blemishes. Additionally, moisturizing ingredients such as panthenol supply hydration to the skin, making it soft and plump and helping to restore the oil-moisture balance of the skin. Even more, it helps to soothe the skin, thanks to botanical extracts such as Centella asiatica, known for its calming effects. Its light but creamy texture refreshes the skin and doesn't leave a greasy finish, locking moisture and calming the skin. All in all, it is a great moisturizer for daily use on combination to oily skin prone to breakouts.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Ceuracle Tea Tree Purifine 80 Cream 50g (1.76 oz) onto previously cleansed skin of the face. Gently massage the skin using circular motions, until full absorption of the product.

description:
It'S Skin Peptide Collagen Moisturizer 50ml (1.69 fl oz) offers a solution to revitalize and rejuvenate tired and aging skin. To begin with, at the heart of this moisturizer lies the properties of vegan collagen. This key ingredient will boost collagen production and cell turnover. Consequently, this aids in reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while enhancing skin firmness. Furthermore, the formula contains niacinamide, a powerhouse component renowned for its ability to brighten the complexion. This element works synergistically with the other ingredients to provide a more radiant and even skin tone. Additionally, the moisturizer is infused with moisturizing and soothing betaine. This ingredient ensures your skin remains hydrated and calm.
With a rich nutritious texture, this cream envelops the skin in moisture and a comfortable feeling while being suitable for all skin types. The result of using this moisturizer is a visibly plumper, smoother, and more youthful complexion with each application. In summary, this moisturizer combats fine lines, wrinkles, and sagging, improving skin moisture and elasticity. Ultimately, it helps achieve a firmer and smoother complexion.

Apply It'S Skin Peptide Collagen Moisturizer 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to clean dry skin of the face and neckline.

description:
Dove Body Love One Cream Light Hydrating Care 250ml (8.45 fl oz) allows you to show your skin all of the love and care it deserves. In fact, moisturizing is a key step in maintaining your skin's softness and resilience, so finding a product that suits your needs and preferences is important. And finding a product that can be used for the face, hands, and body can be a difficult task, but don't worry, Dove's got you covered! So, this cream is able to effectively moisturize and soften the skin. Its formula contains ceramide restoring serum, a blend of ingredients that support the skin's natural production of ceramides, helping to maintain a healthy and strong moisture barrier. Thanks to this, this cream delivers hydration and softness to the skin for up to 24 hours.
Moreover, it can be applied from face to toes, so it is very convenient and easy to use. It has an ultra-light texture that quickly absorbs into the skin, not leaving any oily residue. All in all, this multi-purpose cream is perfect for you if you want an effective and practical moisturizer that is suitable for the hands, face, and body, leaving you with soft, refreshed, and healthy-looking skin!
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Sunflower Oil is an emollient, helping to hydrate and smooth the skin. It also helps to restore irritated skin barrier.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dove Body Love One Cream Light Hydrating Care 250ml (8.45 fl oz) onto clean and dry skin of the face, hands, and body. Gently massage the skin using circular motions, until the product is fully absorbed.

description:
Revolution Skincare Salicylic Acid & Zinc PCA Gel Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) specifically caters to blemish-prone skin that desires the dual benefits of hydration and blemish control. This lightweight moisturizer stands out as a hydration powerhouse that also tackles the challenges of active breakouts. It strikes the perfect balance between moisturizing and fighting blemishes. For that purpose, the formula of this product harnesses the blemish-fighting prowess of 0.5% salicylic acid, an ingredient renowned for its ability to deep-cleanse pores by removing trapped dirt and sebum. The inclusion of zinc in the formula works to maintain skin moisture while simultaneously controlling excess oiliness. Hyaluronic acid further enhances the formula's hydrating properties, ensuring that the skin remains balanced and deeply hydrated. This combination of ingredients makes this moisturizer a multi-action hero, capable of soothing, purifying, and hydrating the skin all at once.
This gel cream's ultra-soothing and purifying formula is particularly crafted to meet the needs of blemish-prone skin without compromising on hydration. Its lightweight texture ensures that it's easily absorbed into the skin, leaving no greasy residue behind, only a feeling of comfort and balance. In summary, it addresses the complex needs of blemish-prone skin by combining hydration, blemish control, and soothing properties.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Revolution Skincare Salicylic Acid & Zinc PCA Gel Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to the face, neck, and chest in the morning and/or evening routine.

description: BeautyLab Peptide Lightening Complex 50ml (1.69 fl oz) tackles the appearance of dark spots while deeply moisturizing the skin. Thanks to a plant-derived complex, this moisturizer fades any hyperpigmentation. Both Kojic and Bearberry suppress tyrosinase which is involved in melanin production. Thus, lightening up the complexion. At the same time, Arbutin evens the skin tone and Lemon Peel boosts the skin's glow and softness. In the end, the skin tone is even and the skin is radiant.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply BeautyLab Peptide Lightening Complex 50ml (1.69 fl oz) in the morning and evening to previously cleansed and toned skin. Then, gently massage it all over the face and neck in circular motions. Avoid the eye area.

description: BeautyLab Relax Neuro-Peptide Serum 50ml (1.69 fl oz) is ideal for skin that is starting to show signs of aging such as fine lines and wrinkles. In fact, this serum includes potent peptides that make the muscles relax and smooth the expression wrinkles while also boosting collagen synthesis. At the same time, Hyaluronic Acid ensures the moisture is locked in and restores elasticity and bounce to the skin. On top of that, antioxidant-rich vitamins brighten up the complexion and protect the skin from any damage caused by pollution. In the end, your skin feels firmer and plumper and looks youthful!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply BeautyLab Relax Neuro-Peptide Serum 50ml (1.69 fl oz) in the morning and evening to previously cleansed and toned skin. Then, gently massage it all over the face and neck, using upward circular motions. Avoid the eye area. Pay special attention to the mid-forehead, side of eyes and laugh lines areas.

description: BeautyLab Black Diamond Cellular Repair Night Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) is ideal for skin with fine lines and wrinkles in need of vibrancy and evenness. In fact, this night cream fills the skin with moisture and nourishment while you are sleeping. Due to the presence of advanced peptides, it improves tissue healing and the levels of elasticity. At the same time, it boosts collagen production and attenuates the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. Moreover, vitamins ensure better cell renewal while Goji Berry reduces oxidative stress. Then, Ruby energizes the skin and Diamond tackles wrinkles and unevenness. In this way, the skin is smooth and even. You wake up feeling rejuvenated and looking glowy!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply BeautyLab Black Diamond Cellular Repair Night Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) in the evening to previously cleansed and toned skin. Then, gently massage it in circular motions, upward, all over the face and neck. Avoid the eye area.

description: BeautyLab Youth Elixir Advanced Cell Recovery Night Complex 50ml (1.69 fl oz) works wonders while you are sleeping! This moisturizer is ideal for skin showing signs of aging such as lack of firmness, hyperpigmentation and wrinkles. In fact, it repairs damaged tissue while smoothing wrinkles. Due to the presence of an Orchid Stem Cell and a Stem Cell Peptide Complex, it boosts cell renewal while intensely hydrating the skin. Thus, leaving the skin young and rejuvenated. At the same time, the presence of Hyaluronic Acid fills the skin with moisture and prevents water loss so the skin recovers its elasticity. Last, but not, least, this cream features an anti-aging complex that increases collagen production, also essential for skin firmness and elasticity. Expect to wake up looking radiant!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply BeautyLab Youth Elixir Advanced Cell Recovery Night Complex 50ml (1.69 fl oz) every evening to previously cleansed and toned skin. Then, gently massage it upward all over the face and neck in circular motions. Avoid the eye area.

description:
Suntique I'm 8.8% Dark Spot Solution 30ml (1.0 f ozl) targets and reduces dark spots on the skin. Moreover, it features a potent blend of ingredients that work together to fade and lighten dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and uneven skin tone. Due to the presence of one of its key active ingredients, Niacinamide (3,8%), also known as vitamin B3, it has brightening properties and the ability to inhibit the production of melanin, the pigment responsible for dark spots.
This powerful ingredient, combined with other skin-nourishing components, such as Arbutin (3,5%), Tranexamic Acid (1%) and 0.5% Alpha-bisabolol (0,5&), makes up the 8,8% that makes this product the dark spot solution. Hence, visibly reducing the appearance of dark spots over time and promoting a more even and radiant complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a suitable amount of the Suntique I'm 8.8% Dark Spot Solution 30ml (1.0 f ozl) to a previously cleansed face. Then, spread and massage it evenly.

description:
Mario Badescu Vitamin C Cream 28g (1 oz) brings forth the power of Vitamin C to brighten your complexion. That said, this cream features 10% Vitamin C that provides the skin with multiple benefits. Combined with Niacinamide, these ingredients work together to brighten the skin and reduce the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation. At the same time, its ability to stimulate collagen production helps to improve skin elasticity, consequently diminishing the look of fine lines and wrinkles. In addition, Rosehip seed oil and Bakuchiol also deliver an anti-aging action, therefore helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Ultimately, this unique formula works to leave the skin radiant and youthful. It fights aging signs, promotes a brighter and more even skin tone, and improves skin texture as well. With a lightweight texture, this cream is suitable as a morning moisturizer for all skin types. In conclusion, this anti-aging and brightening moisturizer unveils a luminous and glowy complexion!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mario Badescu Vitamin C Cream 28g (1 oz) to clean, dry skin of the face every morning.

description:
Payot Source Adaptogen Spray Moisturizer 50ml (1.35 fl oz) is a moisturizing spray with a biomimetic skincare formula. In detail, this moisturizer features a powerful formula with two adaptogen plants to provide the skin with intense moisture. Composed of a Breton Algae and Reishi Mushroom, this formula resorts to the power of these plants to resist and adapt to environmental changes. In this way, this moisturizer recharges the skin with moisture and helps it fight daily environmental stress. In addition, the formula features Horehound extract, with antioxidant benefits that help shield the skin from blue light effects. As a matter of fact, this spray delivers lasting hydration for 48 hours. At the same time, it strengthens the skin's ability to adapt to a constantly changing environment.
Equally amazing, this moisturizer has a milk texture in a spray bottle, which makes it very practical and convenient. The texture is lightweight and non-sticky, leaving a fresh feeling on the skin, perfect for summer or weekend getaways. In conclusion, with 99% ingredients of natural origin, this incredible spray boosts skin's hydration and helps protect it.
how_to_use:
How to use
Spray Payot Source Adaptogen Spray Moisturizer 50ml (1.35 fl oz) evenly to the face in the morning routine instead of your usual moisturizer.

description: Allegro Natura Anti-Aging And Regenerating Organic Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) helps to keep the skin feeling soft and elastic, by effectively moisturizing the skin and fighting signs of aging. First, this cream combines the hydrating action of hyaluronic acid with emollient and moisturizing rice bran and organic olive oils. These ingredients deeply hydrate and nourish the skin, making it soft, supple, and plump. Furthermore, this cream has an effective antioxidant action, due to the stabilized vitamin C. So, vitamin C helps to decrease skin damage caused by oxidative stress, maintain the skin's natural radiance, and increase collagen production, therefore helping to fight aging signs such as wrinkles and fine lines. Even more, organic Italian strawflower and hops extracts provide soothing and toning benefits. All in all, this anti-aging cream is ideal for maintaining elastic, soft, and youthful-looking skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an adequate amount of Allegro Natura Anti-Aging And Regenerating Organic Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) onto previously cleansed skin of the face, neck, and décolleté. Gently massage the skin, using circular motions, until the product is fully absorbed.

description:
AMEŌN Holy Cream Diamond Moisturizer 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a luxurious and hydrating cream that is extremely nourishing and protects the skin. Moreover, its formula is a blend of natural and high-quality ingredients that work together to hydrate and enhance skin firmness. Thus, the key ingredients in the cream include Diamond Powder, which brightens and smooths the skin. Then, Edelweiss Leaf Extract with rich antioxidant and skin-soothing properties. As a result, it protects against oxidative stress and strengthens the skin barrier. Therefore, delaying signs of premature aging. restoring the photo-aged and mature skin. Additionally, Sodium Hyaluronate absorbs and penetrates rapidly into the skin, deeply moisturizing and plumping the skin.
The cream has a rich and luxurious texture that glides smoothly onto the skin, leaving it soft, supple, and nourished. With regular use, it provides a radiant and youthful-looking complexion deeply moisturized.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply light strokes of AMEŌN Holy Cream Diamond Moisturizer 50ml (1.7 fl oz) to the face and neck. Then, gently massage it.

description:
CHANEL Hydra Beauty Micro Crème 50g (1.7 oz) is a moisturizer that brings innovation into the skincare routine. First and foremost, this cream contains Camellia micro-droplets, hence its name. When applying this moisturizer, the micro-droplets melt in the skin and penetrate to provide the skin with its benefits. The Camellia extract in these droplets delivers moisture for a plumping and replenishing effect. In addition, the formula features Blue Ginger which offers antioxidant properties and therefore helps protect the skin against environmental stress. As a result, this moisturizer intensely hydrates the skin while protecting it from daily aggressions.
Besides these caring benefits, this formula has a unique texture for a true sensory experience. As mentioned, it contains these microdroplets that fuse with the skin. But, equally important, the texture feels as fresh and light as water while enveloping the skin in comfort like a cream. Suitable for all skin types, this daily moisturizer is a must-have to boost skin hydration. In short, it leaves the skin supple and fortified, ready to face the challenges of everyday life.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply CHANEL Hydra Beauty Micro Crème 50g (1.7 oz) morning and evening to the face and neck.

description:
Klorane Soothing Rich Cream with Peony 40ml (1.3floz) is a rich moisturizer that resorts to a soothing formula to suit the specific needs of sensitive skin. That said, this product features soothing Peony extract that reduces skin sensitivity and calms the skin. At the same time, Argan oil and Safflower oil deeply nourish the skin and strengthen the skin barrier. In this way, this cream provides nutrition to dry skin and helps protect it against external aggressions. Most importantly, thanks to this unique formula, it soothes the skin from discomfort feelings such as tightness and burning, keeping it comfortable all day long. In short, this cream soothes, protects, and nourishes the skin.
Equally important, the rich texture melts on the skin and leaves the skin comfortable and supple. That said, this moisturizer is formulated to nourish dry skin. As a last note, the formula is vegan and organic certified with 99% ingredients of natural origin. All in all, this high-tolerance moisturizer is perfect for sensitive skin, immediately and lastingly soothing it.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Klorane Soothing Rich Cream with Peony 40ml (1.3floz) to the face and neck in circular motions. Use once or twice a day.

description: SKINFOOD Avocado Rich Cream 55ml (1.85 fl oz) is a nutritive cream that effectively nourishes and moisturizes dry skin. As the name suggests, this cream's formula contains avocado extract, an ingredient that contains many vitamins and minerals and that is able to replenish and nourish the skin, making it soft and comfortable. The addition of other emollient ingredients, such as macadamia seed oil, shea butter, and jojoba seed oil, provides moisture and the nutrition that dry skin lacks. This cream's texture is rich and butter-like, allowing this cream to melt into the skin, leaving it smooth and decreasing the tightness and roughness associated with dry skin. In summary, this cream softens, hydrates, and nourishes the skin, and is ideal for people with dry to very dry skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an adequate amount of SKINFOOD Avocado Rich Cream 55ml (1.85 fl oz) onto previously cleansed and toned skin. Gently massage the skin, using circular motions, until the cream completely absorbs.

description: SKINFOOD Yuja C Dark Spot Clear Cream 61ml (2.06 fl oz) is specially formulated to target and diminish the appearance of dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and uneven skin tone. For that purpose, it features a unique blend of ingredients. At its core is the extract of Yuja fruit, a citrus fruit renowned for its vitamin C content. In addition, the formula includes a vitamin C derivative, tranexamic acid, and niacinamide. That said, vitamin C is a powerful antioxidant that helps combat skin-damaging free radicals but also has brightening properties consequently reducing pigmentation and increasing skin radiance. When paired with niacinamide and tranexamic acid, the result is a powerful cream that fights dark spots and brightens the complexion. In addition, this moisturizer features glutathione vitamin capsules that boast not only antioxidant properties but also brightening benefits. All in all, this moisturizer helps reduce the appearance of dark spots and restores a luminous complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply SKINFOOD Yuja C Dark Spot Clear Cream 61ml (2.06 fl oz) to clean, dry skin of the face and neck.

description:
Elemis Pro-Collagen Rose Marine Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) is a luxurious, rose-infused variant of Elemis's iconic anti-aging cream. Combining cutting-edge marine and plant ingredients, it effectively hydrates and rejuvenates the skin, reducing signs of aging and promoting a youthful glow.
Furthermore, the star ingredient, Padina Pavonica, a marine algae, boosts the skin's natural collagen production, enhancing firmness and elasticity. Paired with 20 varieties of rose extracts, Gingko Biloba and Chlorella Vulgaris, known for their antioxidant and soothing properties, this cream deeply nourishes the skin, leaving it softer and plumper.
On top of that, this anti-wrinkle hydrating day cream is lightweight, thus absorbing easily. Additionally, it leaves a subtle, uplifting rose aroma that adds to the sensory pleasure of the skincare routine.
With daily use, this cream smooths fine lines and wrinkles, leaving skin visibly firmer and radiant while also deeply hydrating it.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Elemis Pro-Collagen Rose Marine Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) in the morning to previously cleansed skin. Firstly, take a small amount of the product. Then, apply it all over the face, neck and décolleté in upwards strokes.

description: Collistar Pure Actives Collagen + Malachite Cream Balm provides a trustworthy anti-aging treatment with an intense firming as well as wrinkle-smoothing effect. In fact, its core amino acids come from plant-based Collagen carefully selected by Collistar's Clean Research®. This option aggregates protein fibers from corn, soy, and wheat, replicating their structure, and imitating animal collagen action. Moreover, collagen is then blended with Malachite - a copper-rich mineral extract - that protects your skin from the harshest effects of the aging process. Besides, it has anti-oxidant and anti-glycation properties which prevent collagen fibers from hardening and losing their main function. All in all, the skin looks youthful, smoother, and more toned than ever. Through continued use, tissues tend to become even more elastic, visibly stronger, and remarkably resilient.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small portion of Collistar Pure Actives Collagen + Malachite Cream Balm to your face and neck after cleansing them appropriately. Massage as delicately and evenly as possible, waiting until the skin absorbs the formula completely. Ideally, draw circular as well as upward motions with your fingertips. Finally, resort to this balm after using two or three drops of the Collistar Pure Actives Collagen + Glycogen Serum. This will intensify and accelerate results, boosting the product's skin-firming effect.

description: Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing Day Cream is a rich day cream that revitalizes the skin while smoothing fine lines and wrinkles. Formulated for young skin that is beginning to show the first signs of aging, such as wrinkles, fine lines, and maybe even a certain dullness, this velvety cream softens the complexion with a delicate touch. It combines wild rose seed oil with soothing sweet almond oil, both of which pamper the skin in order to bring out its inner radiance and glow. Like a rose petal, the skin emerges with newfound softness and smoothness; fine lines are minimized, the skin maintains its elasticity and bounce, and the complexion regains its youthful vitality.
how_to_use:
How to use
Every morning, after cleansing, apply Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing Day Cream to the face, neck, and decolletage. Massage gently in order to stimulate absorption. Leave on for a few moments, then apply make-up if desired. If you're looking for a lighter moisturizer for normal to combination skin, try Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing Facial Lotion.

description: Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream Skin Protectant is an award-winning skin protectant that deeply moisturizes and protects the skin any time, anywhere. This legendary formula, created in 1930, is an incredibly complete moisturizer: it doubles as an emergency hand cream, lip balm, eyebrow gel, highlighter, and so much more! An instant success when it was launched, this product remains an essential part of the beauty rituals of make-up artists and beauty influencers worldwide. Moreover, clinical studies show it hydrates and protects the skin for eight hours!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream Skin Protectant anywhere on the body in order to obtain hydrated, healthy-looking skin.

description: YOUTH LAB Oxygen Moisture Cream SPF10 is a light moisturizing composition that is easily absorbed and provides long-lasting hydration for up to 24 hours! Thanks to the presence of vitamin B5, this product oxygenates and rejuvenates the skin, while antioxidant Vitamin E repairs any damage caused by free radicals. The non-greasy and lightly scented formula is suitable for normal skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a thin layer of YOUTH LAB Oxygen Moisture Cream SPF10 on the face and neck after cleansing. Avoid the eye contour area.

description: Skin Generics Multi-Shield Moisturising Cream Niacinamide + Osmo'city SPF30 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a moisturizer with several protective benefits for the skin. For that purpose, the formula relies on a percentage of 24% of active complex. This active complex comprises, amongst other ingredients, Niacinamide, that hydrates and strengthens the skin barrier, and Osmo'city® which has anti-pollution properties. Besides, this product has an SPF30 that provides protection against UVB and UVA radiation. So, it protects from environmental aggressions such as pollution and sun exposure but also blue light and stress. Still, its amazing formula also prevents dehydration and skin aging signs. All in all, this moisturizer shields the skin from several daily threats to keep it protected day after day.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Skin Generics Multi-Shield Moisturising Cream Niacinamide + Osmo'city SPF30 50ml (1.7 fl oz) in the morning routine to clean dry face, neck, and neckline.

description:
Clarins Hydra-Essentiel [HA²] Matte Gel 75ml (2.6 fl oz) is a mattifying and hydrating cream that quenches the skin. For this purpose, this new formula features a Hyaluronic Power Complex that provides a triple action thanks to a Hyaluronic acid duo combined with Leaf of Life extract. Consequently, this moisturizer immediately hydrates and re-densifies the skin for a smoother complexion. Equally important, it also provides long-term hydration, and day by day the skin is fortified and visibly more hydrated. In this way, this moisturizer plumps and smoothes the skin while also providing a luminous complexion and reducing the appearance of fine lines. At the same time, it has a mattifying action thus being ideal for even combination to oily dehydrated skin.
In addition to these hydrating benefits, the texture and scent will captivate your senses. With a fresh and non-oily texture, this moisturizer restores immediate comfort. In conclusion, this product is the perfect ally to keep the skin healthy and mattified all day.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins Hydra-Essentiel [HA²] Matte Gel 75ml (2.6 fl oz) to the face and neck in the morning routine.

description:
Clarins Hydra-Essentiel [HA²] Light Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a hydrating cream that quenches every skin type. For this purpose, this new formula features a Hyaluronic Power Complex that provides a triple action thanks to a Hyaluronic acid duo combined with Leaf of Life extract. Consequently, this moisturizer immediately hydrates and re-densifies the skin for a smoother complexion. Equally important, it also provides long-term hydration, and day by day the skin is fortified and visibly more hydrated. In this way, this moisturizer plumps and smoothes the skin while also providing a luminous complexion and reducing the appearance of fine lines. At the same time, it has a mattifying effect. It is ideal for everyone who struggles with dehydrated skin, especially for normal to combination skin.
In addition to these hydrating benefits, the texture and scent will captivate your senses. With a fresh and light texture that melts on the skin, this moisturizer is suitable for all skin types. In conclusion, this product is the perfect ally to keep the skin healthy and luminous all day.
