How to use
Apply Clarins Hydra-Essentiel [HA²] Light Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) to the face and neck in the morning routine.

description:
This set contains the following products:

Nivea Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Power Ultra Recovery Night Serum 30ml
Nivea Q10 Power Anti-Wrinkle + Firming Day Cream SPF15 50ml

Nivea Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Power Ultra Recovery Night Serum  has a fluid texture with rapid absorption with high moisturizing and anti-aging capabilities. That said, this serum works overnight as an intensive treatment suitable for all skin types. Basically, it recovers the skin, counterbalancing the daily damage to which it is exposed. In turn, wrinkles, fine lines, and loss of firmness are instantly treated and prevented. In just fourteen nights, even the deepest wrinkles are reduced. Thus, through this serum, the entire skin of the face and neck is de-stressed, leaving it looking fresher, rested, and with a youthful radiance
Nivea Q10 Power Anti-Wrinkle + Firming Day Cream SPF15 relies on deeply moisturizing ingredients to reduce wrinkles as well as fine lines. At the same time, the core Coenzyme Q10 prevents oxidative as well as UV-induced damage, targeting age spots as well as increasing firmness. 100% identical to the one produced by the skin itself, the brand's Q10 works to harmonize your complexion, making it appear extra healthy. In fact, while SPF15 meets the need of normal aging skin, other ingredients come together to visibly rejuvenate, inhibiting age spots from showing. Through daily applications, you'll be able to diminish photo-aging, as this guards vulnerable areas against UVA/UVB rays, smoothing and nourishing.

how_to_use: Not found

description:
The Saem Jeju Fresh Aloe 99% Soothing Gel 300ml (10.14 fl oz) harnesses the power of Aloe Vera, sourced from the pristine region of Jeju Island. Moreover, this soothing gel contains a remarkable 99% Aloe Vera, ensuring your skin benefits from its healing and hydrating properties. Additionally, Aloe is renowned for its ability to soothe and calm irritation, making this product a great choice for those with sensitive or sunburned skin.
Beyond its soothing abilities, this gel also maintains your skin's natural moisture barrier. Thus, it hydrates your skin deeply, improving its overall health and giving it a youthful, radiant glow.
Due to the presence of extracts such as Lemon Balm, Oregano, Mint, Chamomile, Sage and Chrysanthemum, the gel deeply protects and boosts cell regeneration. Hence, strengthening the skin and improving its elasticity.
On another note, this is a multi-purpose product that suits the face, body, hair and nails. The gel-like texture absorbs quickly without leaving any sticky residue, providing an instant cooling and refreshing sensation.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply The Saem Jeju Fresh Aloe 99% Soothing Gel 300ml (10.14 fl oz) all over the body, face, nails and hair. Firstly, take an appropriate amount and use it in the desired area. Then, gently massage it in.

description:
Payot Lisse Wrinkle Smoothing Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) is an anti-aging cream that fights wrinkles, suitable for all skin types. For this purpose, it features a natural formula with 91% ingredients of natural origin, containing a Hyaluronic acid duo coupled with Swiss Pine and Wild Pansy extracts. In addition, it contains White Horehound extract that grants protection against pollution and blue light. Thanks to this effective formula, this moisturizer is able to smooth wrinkles and protect the skin from daily aggressions. Equally important, this cream not only provides Hyaluronic acid but also helps enhance and preserve the skin's natural capital of hyaluronic acid. 
In addition to its powerful anti-aging benefits, this moisturizer also offers a pleasant experience thanks to its sensorial properties. It has a velvety texture that melts on the skin and envelops it in a delicate floral and musk scent touched by pine notes that soothes the mind. All in all, this moisturizer rejuvenates the complexion, reducing the appearance of wrinkles and lending it radiance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Payot Lisse Wrinkle Smoothing Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) in the morning to a clean face and neck.

description:
Sioris Calm Me Down Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) is a moisturizer with special soothing properties that hydrates and calms the skin. For this purpose, it relies on natural and organic components that provide the skin with such benefits. On one hand, it contains 40% of Omija extract which adds hydration and calmness to the skin. This hydrating extract teams up with a calming complex. 5% Natural-calming™ complex comprises botanical ingredients - Evening Primrose oil, Calendula extract, and Artemisia complex - to soothe the skin. Simultaneously, it balances the skin microbiome and refines skin texture. In addition, this moisturizer not only soothes the skin but also the mind thanks to a delicate lavender scent. 
With a lightweight texture that easily absorbs, this cream is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive, but works wonders for dehydrated oily skin. 100% natural as well as vegan, this product is made from the best seasonal ingredients to increase personal comfort and deliver maximum effectiveness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply one to two pumps of Sioris Calm Me Down Cream 50ml (1.69 fl oz) to clean and dry face and distribute evenly until complete absorption.

description:
Glow Hub Nourish & Hydrate Gel Moisturiser 50g (1.7 oz) provides instant moisture to the skin, boosting its hydration levels and adding a healthy glow to your complexion.
A rich and delicious blend of Peach Extract and Coconut Oil gently coats the skin, providing a nourishing and deeply hydrating feeling. Not only that but, with the famed Hyaluronic Acid, this moisturizer also plumps the skin, helping restore its elasticity. The result could only be a healthy and fully nourished complexion, with an added vibrancy and radiance to it.
Quench your skin’s thirst and then just relax and fully enjoy your new-found glow. Trust us, it’s here to stay.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Glow Hub Nourish & Hydrate Gel Moisturiser 50g (1.7 oz) as the last step of your daily skincare routine. Gently massage a generous amount onto clean skin, on both the face and neck, using circular motions. When used in the morning, don’t forget to follow up with an adequate sunscreen.

description:
This gift set contains the following products:

Darphin Ideal Resource Smoothing Retexturizing Radiance Cream 50ml
Darphin Intral Inner Youth Rescue Serum 5ml
Darphin Ideal Resource Youth Retinol Oil Concentrate x7

Darphin Ideal Resource Smoothing Retexturizing Radiance Cream 50ml has a light creamy texture and helps to fight the first signs of aging while recovering the skin’s natural glow. As a matter of fact, this rich cream not only reduces fine and dry lines but also has the power to improve overall skin texture. Through continuous use, your skin will feel more even and your complexion will look more radiant. Moreover, the Smoothing Retexturizing Radiance Cream by Darphin is part of the brand’s Ideal Resource range. This set of products focuses on the first signs of aging, working to rejuvenate the skin through the power of natural ingredients. In fact, this invigorating cream has 87% of ingredients of natural origin. In its formula, you will find, therefore, a blend of three powerful flowers: Japanese Knotweed, Centella Asiatica, and White Hibiscus. These potent botanical components will help you achieve smoother and also younger-looking skin. Effortlessly incorporate the Smoothing Retexturizing Radiance Cream into your skincare routine by applying it in the morning and at nighttime. For optimal results, complement its use with other products from Darphin’s Ideal Resource line.
Darphin Intral Inner Youth Rescue Serum is a serum specially designed for sensitive, irritated, red, and dry skin. That said, this revolutionary serum is the daily skincare essential that preserves youthful skin by helping to correct and prevent skin sensitivity that can lead to the breakdown of collagen and elastin. In this way, this formula enriched with 84% natural ingredients acts in a first stage on the skin's sensitivity, promoting its maximum health. In the second phase, this serum acts on the fine lines and wrinkles of the face, promoting a more uniform, smoothed, and fully youthful complexion. As an extra benefit, it works in a short time, since in just one hour the redness of the skin is reduced. Already the signs of age are also smoothed in just a few hours, thus revealing a plumped complexion and a stronger epidermal barrier.
Darphin Ideal Resource Youth Retinol Oil Concentrate is a set of 7 individual-use capsules that promise to rejuvenate your skin leaving it instantly younger-looking and radiant. Formulated with Youth Retinol Oil, this powerful vegan treatment not only enhances cellular turnover but also boosts the skin's level of moisture. In fact, with this product, you do not have to worry about the dryness that Retinol usually provides. Thanks to the presence of ultra-nourishing ingredients like Jojoba, Sesame, Macadamia, and Argan, this Oil Concentrate delivers a hydrated result and a plumping effect. Watch how your skin's overall texture improves with the continuous use of this dermatologist and ophthalmologist-tested product. Last but not least, the Youth Retinol Oil Concentrate by Darphin follows the brand’s natural inspiration and identity. On one side, this fast-absorbing composition has 98% of its ingredients that come from a natural origin. In addition to that, the Retinol Oil Concentrate comes in 100% biodegradable capsules that are also airtight and opaque in order to protect the formula.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Uriage Age Lift Firming Smoothing Day Fluid 40ml (1.35 fl oz) replaces Uriage Age Protect Multi-Action Fluid, keeping the same formula. That said, this fluid moisturizer is ideal for normal to combination skin. It acts on both wrinkles and firmness while protecting the skin from daily external aggressions namely blue light, UV rays, pollution, stress, and fatigue. Firstly, the formula contains a Retinol derivative coupled with Hyaluronic acid for an intensive anti-aging effect. Together these ingredients work synergically to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while improving skin firmness. Then, Blue Light Barrier complex protects from blue light damaging effects while Filmexel avoids the adhesion of pollution particles. Lastly, Rose Fruit extract along with AHA mattifies the skin. As a result, pores are tightened and skin texture is refined. 
In conclusion, this moisturizer provides firmer and smoother skin, visibly reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles at the same time it improves skin firmness for more defined contours.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Age Lift Firming Smoothing Day Fluid 40ml (1.35 fl oz) in the morning to clean and dry skin. Avoid contact with the eyes. In case of tingling sensations, space out the application.

description:
DR. GRANDEL Puri [Code] Purifying Cream Gel 50ml (1.7 oz) helps purify and balance blemish-prone skin. Due to its light texture, it is ideal for oily skin, leaving it soft. At the same time, it is non-greasy and controls the sebum levels without drying the skin. Furthermore, it provides an instant matte effect. This gel-cream contains a blend of natural ingredients that work together to soothe, hydrate, and refine the skin. For instance, a complex of Black Pepper, Manuka Oil, and Magnolia Bark ensures long-term protection against blemishes. Thus, it leads to a clearer complexion.
All in all, with regular use, this cream can help to purify and balance the skin, leaving it looking matte and refreshed.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Lotus Flower Extract is a natural moisturizer that aids dry and flaky skin, improving its health. Additionally, it is suitable for nearly all skin types, since it balances skin levels. Furthermore, it fights blemishes.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply DR. GRANDEL Puri [Code] Purifying Cream Gel 50ml (1.7 oz) to previously cleansed skin in the morning and evening. Firstly, apply a small amount of the cream to the face, neck and décolleté. Then, gently massage it into the skin in upward circular motions. Finally, let it absorb.

description: B-Lift Age Supreme Bisomes Evolute Lifting Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) is a facial cream suitable for mature, aged skin with the presence of blemishes, which stimulates collagen production and restores skin firmness. Due to the presence of a 5% peptide solution of Acetyl Octapeptide-3, a molecule capable of decreasing contractions of the muscles of the face, the cream reduces wrinkles and fine lines. Additionally, it provides an effective lifting effect and gives the skin a more youthful appearance. At the same time, Oligopeptide-20 reinforces the anti-aging action, seeing that it is capable of stimulating collagen production and thus restoring the skin's firmness. As we age, the production of collagen, an essential vitamin for keeping our complexion plump, slows down. Thus, it is important to stimulate its synthesis.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply B-Lift Age Supreme Bisomes Evolute Lifting Face Cream 50ml (1.7 fl oz) in the morning and/or in the evening on a previously cleansed face. Then, massage gently until the skin absorbs the cream completely. Avoid contact with the eyes. The B-Lift Lifting Cream is ideal as a make-up base.
This product must be kept out of the sight and reach of children.

description:
Guerlain Orchidée Impériale Brightening The Radiance Concentrate 30ml (1.0 fl oz) is a luxurious serum that brightens and smooths the skin. It makes the complexion look two shades lighter and it reduces the appearance of dark spots. This serum has been clinically tested and the results are clear. Firstly, 97% find their complexion radiant. Secondly, wrinkles are reduced by 22%. Thirdly, 95% say the skin texture is more refined. As a result, you can expect your skin to recover its brightness and youth by applying it consistently. 
The making-off of this serum has been deeply researched to ensure a highly effective result. The secrets of the Guerlain Orchidée Impériale Brightening The Radiance Concentrate lie in its dual technology: Cell Respiration Technology and Orchid Noble Light Technology. While the first improves the appearance of the skin to make it a suitable light vector, the second one acts on the sources of dullness so radiance can come through. Due to the presence of the orchid in its formula, the serum is capable of transferring longevity to the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Guerlain Orchidée Impériale Brightening The Radiance Concentrate 30ml (1.0 fl oz) in the morning and evening to the face and neck. Firstly, work outwards from the center in circular motions. Secondly, pinch the skin,  slightly turning the wrists and repeat the process all over the face. Thirdly, place the hands in a V shape on the lower part of the face and move upwards while applying pressure. Finally, tap the face with the fingertips.

description:
Guerlain Abeille Royale Night Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) is a luxurious cream with a fine balm-like texture that makes the skin firmer and more redefined. It combats skin slackening from wrinkles to fine lines, smoothening the skin. This day cream has been clinically tested and proved its youth efficacy from the first application. Firstly, it reduces wrinkles by 48%%. Secondly, the skin is visibly lifted by 97%. Finally, the firmness and the redefinition of facial contours increase by 74% and 48%, respectively. In the end, it makes for a comfortable application not leaving a greasy layer on the skin.
The making-off of this cream has been deeply researched to ensure a highly effective result. The secrets of Guerlain Abeille Royale Night Cream lie in its composition of vitamin E and its Blackbee Repair Technology which stimulates skin repairing processes from wrinkle to loss of firmness correction.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Guerlain Abeille Royale Night Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) in the evening to the previously cleansed face. Start by applying to the middle of the face and then outwards. Dab and gently massage with the fingertips along the contour of the face. Then, repeat the procedure starting two centimeters higher until you reach the hairline. Don't forget to tap the fingertips over the face specifically on the areas prone to wrinkles. For optimum results, apply after serum.

description:
Guerlain Abeille Royale Mattifying Day Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) is a luxurious honeyed cream that ensures mattified and firm skin. At the same time, it corrects imperfections and wrinkles, smoothing and evening out the skin texture. As the pores tighten, it refines the complexion. On top of this, to achieve a mattified look, the cream controls sebum levels and balances the skin.
This day cream has been clinically tested and proved its youth efficacy from the first application. Firstly, it reduces imperfections by 27%. Secondly, it increases a matte look by 77%. Finally, the smoothness and the firmness of the skin increase by 84% and 79%, respectively. In the end, its light texture makes for a comfortable application, leaving a matte finish on the skin without greasiness.
The making-off of this cream has been deeply researched to ensure a highly effective result. The secret of Guerlain Abeille Royale Mattifying Day Cream lies in its Blackbee Repair Technology which stimulates skin repairing processes from wrinkle to loss of firmness correction.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Guerlain Abeille Royale Mattifying Day Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) in the morning to the previously cleansed face. Start by applying to the middle of the face and then outwards. Dab and gently massage with the fingertips along the contour of the face. Then, repeat the procedure starting two centimeters higher until you reach the hairline. Don't forget to tap the fingertips over the face specifically on the areas prone to wrinkles. For optimum results, apply after serum.

description:
Sisley Paris Restorative Facial Cream 40ml (1.3 fl oz) is a high-end face cream that protects the skin against external aggressions. Due to its formula rich in Shea Butter, this cream can prevent any harmful consequences from environmental stress exposure and repair damaged skin. At the same time, it deeply soothes skin irritation. Shea Butter is a great component for its multi-action of protecting and regenerating the skin. Lastly, thanks to the Carrot Extract in its recipe, this cream heavily hydrates and nurtures the skin, leaving it supple.
Due to its fresh and creamy texture, it applies and absorbs easily and provides moments of comfort, leaving the skin soft without a greasy layer. In the end, this face cream creates a special well-being moment in the skincare routine for both the face and the mind. Expect supple and moisturized skin!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sisley Paris Restorative Facial Cream 40ml (1.3 fl oz) when necessary. Either apply all over the face, neck and décolleté or locally on the irritated areas.

description:
Sisley Paris Night Cream with Collagen and Woodmallow 50ml (1.6 fl oz) is a high-end antiaging cream that works overnight to ensure a firm and youthful complexion. As we age, the production of collagen, an essential vitamin for keeping our complexion plump, slows down. Thus, it is important to stimulate its synthesis. So, as a result, this night cream efficiently reduces wrinkles and fine lines, giving the skin homogeneity, firmness, and elasticity because its recipe contains a high concentration of soluble Collagen. At the same time, thanks to the Woodmallow in its formula, the cream has a softening effect on the tired epidermis.
Due to its gentle creamy texture, it applies easily and provides moments of comfort, leaving the skin soft. In the end, this night cream creates a special well-being moment in the skincare routine for both the skin and the mind. Expect a revitalized and firm complexion!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sisley Paris Night Cream with Collagen and Woodmallow 50ml (1.6 fl oz) in the evening to previously cleansed and dry skin. Apply on the face and neck by massaging gently in a circular motion.

description:
Sisley Paris Restorative Facial Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) is a high-end face cream that protects the skin against external aggressions. Due to its formula rich in Shea Butter, this cream can prevent any harmful consequences from environmental stress exposure and repair damaged skin. At the same time, it deeply soothes skin irritation. Shea Butter is a great component for its multi-action of protecting and regenerating the skin. Lastly, thanks to the Carrot Extract in its recipe, this cream heavily hydrates and nurtures the skin, leaving it supple.
Due to its fresh and creamy texture, it applies and absorbs easily and provides moments of comfort, leaving the skin soft without a greasy layer. In the end, this face cream creates a special well-being moment in the skincare routine for both the face and the mind. Expect supple and moisturized skin!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sisley Paris Restorative Facial Cream 50ml (1.6 fl oz) when necessary. Either apply all over the face, neck and décolleté or locally on the irritated areas.

description:
Sisley Paris Phyto-Touche Sun Glow Gel 30ml (1 fl oz) is a high-end tinted gel that brightens the complexion leaving an iridescent finish. Hence, with this gel, count on a tanned complexion all year round. Due to the pigments that reflect light and the golden reflections in its formula, the gel enhances the tan and brightness of the skin. At the same time, thanks to a recipe rich in plant extracts, it hydrates and softens the skin. Therefore, the skin texture looks even and healthy. On top of that, the color payoff is buildable so you can decide on the amount of product to use depending on your needs. Additionally, you can choose if you want a fully bronzed face or just highlight some features. It is suitable for all skin tones and skin types.
Moreover, its fresh gel texture facilitates the application process as it melts easily into the skin, providing moments of comfort without leaving a greasy layer. In the end, this gel creates a special well-being moment between the face and the mind. Expect a healthy glow and a natural complexion!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sisley Paris Phyto-Touche Sun Glow Gel 30ml (1 fl oz) over the face or any areas you wish to highlight. Make sure you distribute it evenly. Repeat the process until you reach the desired color. For a more comfortable application, apply after the skincare routine or after applying foundation.

description:
SENSAI Cellular Performance Emulsion III (Super Moist) 100ml (3.4 fl oz) is an extra rich formula that not only provides deep moisture but also supplies several anti-aging benefits. On one side, with powerful replenishing properties, this product promises to envelop your skin in a sensation of instant and also long-lasting comfort. At the same time, the SENSAI Cellular Performance Emulsion I Light also works as an anti-aging solution. As it happens, this composition is part of the SENSAI anti-aging basic line. In addition to supplying intense nourishment, this emulsion equally increases firmness, unveils radiance and prevents the appearance of wrinkles. The result? A smooth, tight and luminous complexion that displays optimal levels of moisture for hours long.   
To conclude, this formula has an ultra-rich texture that is perfect for dry to very dry skin.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use SENSAI Cellular Performance Emulsion III (Super Moist) 100ml (3.4 fl oz) as part of your regular morning and evening routine. Apply an appropriate amount to dry skin, after cleansing and using a matching lotion.

description:
SENSAI Cellular Performance Cream 40ml (1.4 oz) is a very rich anti-aging treatment that revitalizes, nourishes and protects the skin, all at the same time. Suitable for all skin types but especially beneficial for dry and rough complexions, this cream promises to supply maximum comfort for hours long. In fact, its luxurious and dense consistency wraps the skin in optimal moisture for a complexion that feels and looks silky smooth.  
A the same time, the Cellular Performance Cream also works as an anti-aging solution. As it happens, this composition is part of the SENSAI anti-aging basic line. In addition to supplying intense nourishment, this cream equally increases firmness, unveils radiance and prevents the appearance of wrinkles. The result? By complementing its use with the remaining range, the Cellular Performance Cream contributes to lustrous, young-looking and luminous skin.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use SENSAI Cellular Performance Cream 40ml (1.4 oz) as part of your regular morning and evening routine. Apply an appropriate amount to dry skin, after cleansing and using a matching lotion.

description: TONYMOLY TONY LAB AC Control Emulsion 160ml (5.41 fl oz) is a soothing and light emulsion that transforms the texture of the skin leaving it soft and silky. On top of that, it provides a refreshing scent mixed with deep hydration. It is ideal for acne-prone skin with excessive sebum or dehydration. In fact, it purifies the skin and tightens enlarged pores while firming the skin. Lastly, it absorbs rapidly.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of TONYMOLY TONY LAB AC Control Emulsion 160ml (5.41 fl oz) and spread it all over the skin. Then, tap gently until it absorbs.

description:
Frudia My Orchard Peach Real Soothing Gel 300ml (10.1 fl oz) is a gel that moisturizes and cools the skin. Due to its weak acidity, it is suitable for sensitive skin. Besides controlling the pH levels that are disturbed by external aggressions, due to the Peach Extract (99%) present in the formula, the gel soothes and nurtures your skin. Additionally, its texture makes for an easy and even application that confers immediate cooling effects, without stickiness.
You can use this gel in many ways and apply it to both your face and body. For instance, you can apply it before going to bed so that you can sleep with cool and relaxed skin. You can also use it as an after-shave to relieve the skin from irritation. Or you can mix it with BB cream or foundation so that your skin keeps moist.
Frudia is a Korean skincare brand, the result of more than 30 years of development and research. Their products make maximum use of antioxidant-rich plants and fruit extracts. The patented R VITA W technology reduces the destruction of nutrients and vitamins from the fruits used in the products so that their effects are optimized!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a suitable amount of Frudia My Orchard Peach Real Soothing Gel 300ml (10.1 fl oz) on the dry or sensitive areas of the face and body. Then, tap gently for rapid and better absorption. For optimum results, keep the soothing gel refrigerated before applying it.

description: Missha Super Aqua Ultra Hyalron Balm Cream Original 70ml (2.36 fl oz) comes with a new and improved formula that has a powerful hydrating effect on the skin. With 5% hyaluronic acid, this balm not only deeply hydrates the skin but also helps to prevent transdermal moisture loss. The 10 different molecular weights of Hyaluronic Acid present in the formulation fill the various skin layers with moisture. Therefore, the skin is sure to be optimally cared for and will feel nourished and moisturized for a long time. Additionally, Hyaluronic Acid also helps to smooth fine lines and small wrinkles and has a gentle tightening effect on the skin. Overall, the complexion will appear younger, healthier, and more radiant. Moreover, with bergamot, lavender, and orange peel oils, this balm will revitalize the skin and leave it feeling fresh.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an adequate amount of Missha Super Aqua Ultra Hyalron Balm Cream Original 70ml (2.36 fl oz) to the skin and gently massage. Use this cream as the last step of your skincare routine. Complement with other products from the same range in order to obtain optimal results.

description:
Arganicare Moisturizing Treatment Nourishing Hydrator hydrates the face and neck and adds a unique feeling of freshness and youthfulness to the skin.
With Argan Oil and Aloe Vera Extract, this moisturizer helps regenerate the skin and protect its barrier against free radical damage. In addition, it also improves the skin’s elasticity and prevents sun damage, resulting in a fully hydrated, soft, and clear complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Arganicare Moisturizing Treatment Nourishing Hydrator on the previously clean and dry face and neck area, carefully avoiding the area around the eyes. Gently massage the cream in order for it to be fully absorbed by the skin. Lastly, do not rinse it off.

description:
Atashi Brightening Protective Therapy Regenerating Cream 50ml brightens the skin by attenuating the spots and unifying the tone. This cream's illuminating therapy reduces blemishes and calms redness, improving the skin's appearance. On top of that, Red Algae Extract and Nano White Liposomes prevent new dark spots. Lastly, Edelweiss Extract acts on skin regeneration from the inside, leaving the skin rejuvenated. In the end, any spots caused by sun exposure, aging or hormonal factors are reduced and prevented, leaving space for the skin to reveal its natural shine.
On another note, this cream has powerful moisturizing properties, thanks to Vitamin E and waxes such as Jojoba, Sunflower and Mimosa. In fact, it keeps the skin hydrated for 24 hours. Therefore, it is ideal for normal to dry skin and combination skin. Additionally, its fresh and comfortable texture melts easily into the skin providing moments of great pleasure and relaxation to the most sensitive skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Atashi Brightening Protective Therapy Regenerating Cream 50ml in the morning and evening on a previously cleansed face. Then, gently massage it in a circular motion all over the face.

description:
YOUTH LAB Retinol Reboot Night Cream 50ml is an overnight treatment that targets fine lines, wrinkles and loss of firmness. Infused with a smart retinoid technology, this cream is able to recharge cellular functions while you sleep. In fact, by acting right at the heart of cells, this composition promises to improve their metabolism and renewal process with efficiency. Like so, the Retinol Reboot Night Cream contributes to smoother and younger-looking skin, while improving collagen and elastin levels.
To complement this action, the Retinol Reboot Night Cream also contains a blend of soothing and hydrating agents that encourage skin regeneration and balance. Ingredients like Niacinamide improve resilience and humidity levels in order to prevent any reactivity or irritation.
As a last note, the Retinol Reboot Night Cream comes in a smart and luxurious airtight packaging that avoids contamination, dehydration and also the oxidation of the cream from air exposure and contact with hands.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply YOUTH LAB Retinol Reboot Night Cream 50ml at night on the skin of your face, neck and chest. Start by using this product every other night and gradually increase the frequency. In case of irritation, reduce the frequency of use to twice a week. If irritation persists, take a short break and return, once the skin has recovered, applying it once to three times a week.

description:
Missha Vita C Plus Eraser Toning Cream 30ml harnesses the benefits of 8% Vitamin C to simultaneously address dark spots, blemishes and dullness. As it happens, this formula was specially developed to illuminate the butterfly zone of the face, creating a more even and radiant result. At the same time, the Vita C Plus Eraser Toning Cream also proves to be efficient when it comes to counteracting dryness and lack of elasticity. In fact, its composition resorts to ingredients like Niacinamide to deeply replenish the complexion and increase levels of firmness. The result? According to the brand, the Vita C Plus Eraser Toning Cream is part of a blemish care system that promises to improve the condition of your skin in just three days. With regular application, this cream visibly targets sagginess while supplying an illuminated look.  

To conclude, the Vita C Plus Eraser Toning Cream has a rich yet fluid consistency that blends easily with the skin offering a refreshing result. Moreover, its pleasant texture does not clump and is suitable to use under makeup.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Missha Vita C Plus Eraser Toning Cream 30ml as part of your morning and/or evening routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the dry and clean skin of your face. Then, massage gently for maximum absorption. Complement its use with other products from the same range to obtain optimal results.

description:
Missha Artemisia Calming Moisture Cream 50ml is one of the newest additions to the Missha range dedicated to the potent Artemisia extract, now present here after 100 days of fermentation process. In particular, this richer cream is suitable for dehydrated and malnourished skin as well as more sensitized and irritated skin. That said, this cream enriched with 60% naturally double-fermented extract of artemisia and a patented Derma-Clera complex deeply soothes the epidermis making it more comforted. In addition, these two improve the skin's protective barrier so that it becomes stronger and repaired. Furthermore, the patented Aqua Ceramide complex also helps to hydrate the skin as well as repair its entire barrier. In the end, the skin becomes naturally more protected, soothed, and perfectly hydrated for up to 24 hours.
Once dermatologically tested on sensitized skin, this cream has high comforting action. In turn, it also has a low pH that feels mild and healthy on the skin. In this case, this also helps the skin to retain its moisture for much longer, thus keeping it balanced.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take an appropriate amount of Missha Artemisia Calming Moisture Cream 50ml and gently apply it on your skin. Tap for a better absorption.

description:
Payot Herbier Universal Face Cream 50ml detoxifies, soothes and nourishes the skin through a caring action that is suitable for morning and evening. With 99.7% ingredients of natural origin, this vegan composition resorts to Lavender Essential Oil as its star ingredient. This component is responsible for providing not only an aromatic scent but also multiple caring benefits. In fact, grown in Vaucluse, the Organic Lavender Essential Oil is able to calm both the mind and skin. To complement its action, the Herbier Universal Face Cream equally contains a Blend of Sunflower and Olive Oil. This mix deeply nourishes the skin, leaving it soft and comfortable after each application.  
As a last note, the Herbier Universal Face Cream has a lightweight and refreshing texture that ensures a pleasant after-feel, every time. Its floral fragrance, without any synthetic components, creates a lovely multisensory experience that revitalizes the complexion and the senses.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Payot Herbier Universal Face Cream 50ml as part of your regular morning and evening routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the dry and clean skin of your face and neck. Then, massage gently for maximum absorption. Complement this formula with other products from the same range.

description: It'S Skin Hyaluronic Acid Moisture Emulsion+ 150ml improves the skin's texture and promotes suppleness as well as radiance, moisturizing deeply. In fact, it merges Hyaluronic Acid with Acerola Fruit Extract, a rich source of Vitamin C, to combat free radical damage. Meanwhile, a fast-absorbing formula penetrates the skin for efficient results on a daily basis. Basically, emulsions are lighter companions to moisturizing creams, restoring elasticity and radiance instantly without leaving a greasy feeling. Therefore, your complexion will be bouncy and smooth in the long run, as this also blends easily with other products in your skincare routine. Finally, a moderate amount helps you achieve unprecedented resilience and vitality!
how_to_use:
How to use
Place a suitable amount of It'S Skin Hyaluronic Acid Moisture Emulsion+ 150ml in your hand. Then, after cleansing the face, spread the lightweight formula as evenly as possible. Extend the application to the neck, moving your fingertips in circular as well as upward motions. Finally, explore the rest of this range's options for optimal results!

description: Clinique Turnaround Overnight Revitalizing Moisturizer is a revitalizing night cream that helps reveal more luminous skin. Because skin that's exposed to pollution and external aggressions during the day tends to be dull and lifeless, this cream maximizes the skin's repair cycle during the night. The ultra-smooth formula is rich in both moisturizing and exfoliating actives, all of which combine to restore a healthy radiance to the complexion. Antioxidant ingredients such as squalane help the skin recover from the free radical damage sustained during the day; meanwhile, salicylic acid sloughs away dead skin cells, revealing clear skin underneath. In the morning, the skin is noticeably brighter and smoother, practically glowing from within.
how_to_use:
How to use
In the evening, apply Clinique Turnaround Overnight Revitalizing Moisturizer to the clean and dry skin of the face and neck, then massage gently.

description: Missha Super Aqua Ultra Hyalron Emulsion regenerates dry as well as sensitive skin with great moisture and hydration. Thanks to an improved and innovative formula, this product penetrates 10 layers of skin with 10 types of different versions of Hyaluronic Acid. In fact, this stabilizes texture as well as tone as gently as possible so there is no damage associated with each application. All in all, this option not only reinforces moisture and provides quicker results but also prevents further irritation or redness. Despite its visible effectiveness, this remains incredibly mild being formulated without 20 chemical components. For better outcomes, use in conjunction with other products from the same skin-plumping/soothing range!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a moderate amount of Missha Super Aqua Ultra Hyalron Emulsion, after cleansing your face and neck. Tap the fluid formula into the skin gently until full absorption. Finally, proceed with your usual skincare routine, using your preferred moisturizing cream for extra soothing results!

description:
mccosmetics Facial Renew 50ml (1.69fl oz) has a combination of ingredients that support the regeneration, hydration and repair of sensitive, dry and/or damaged skin. In this sense, this specific cream becomes fantastic to be used as a complement to your daily skin creams, to promote a more repaired skin. In turn, it is suitable for all skin types, being especially helpful in cases such as after sun exposure or even after peelings. Furthermore, this cream has a high enzymatic activity and works as a diffuser agent of other ingredients. It acts directly on the elimination of water retention and on the reduction of the adiposities. Finally, it exerts a restructured action on the connective tissue and rebalances the skin affected by a hydrolipodystrophy.
One of the main key ingredients of this cream is Aloe Vera. Basically, it has several properties, namely hydrating, anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, regenerating, soothing, and anti-itching, hence making this cream perfect for sensitized or damaged skin. Furthermore, for a soothing action, Apricot Kernel Oil and Allantoin help to give the skin the maximum possible comfort so that it feels at its best. In addition, both have an anti-inflammatory action and promote wound healing.
All in all, this cream becomes a great daily ally to work in partnership with your specific care creams. In particular, it deeply repairs damaged skin while simultaneously hydrating, calming, and smoothing it. Finally, it exerts a restructured action on the connective tissue, rebalancing and renewing the entire skin surface.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply mccosmetics Facial Renew 50ml (1.69fl oz) after cleansing the skin, on face and neck, with gentle movements. Can be used morning and evening. Also great to combine with other facial creams, to boost and support skin regeneration.

description:
La Prairie Pure Gold Radiance Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) is specially designed to reveal radiant, nourished, hydrated skin with a luxuriously smoother texture. On the other hand, this powerful cream also helps to restructure the epidermis, thus increasing its volume, which provides the entire complexion with a revitalized, renewed, and totally youthful beauty. That said, this cream has unique properties particularly suitable for devitalized skin. That is, fragile, thin, dry, and dull skin with a lack of nutrients.
Inspired by the twilight behind a mountain, La Prairie tries to recreate its unique radiance through this cream, giving the skin a glow, as if the light came from its interior. The rare and immutable ingredient that can convey this undeniable beauty is Gold. This rich and luxurious moisturizer then gives the skin the radiance of pure gold, giving it back the luminosity that time has extinguished. In addition, infused with the Pure Gold Diffusion System, this cream provides nutrients, smoothes the skin, evens out its texture, comforts, and moisturizes in depth. In this way, skin weakened due to environmental conditions or physiological changes becomes fully more receptive to the penetration of other ingredients. In this case, the skin ends up being restored, revitalized, and rejuvenated.
As an added benefit, this Pure Gold Diffusion System is designed to help compensate for the skin's loss of responsiveness. Thus, it offers a three-phase action to the skin. First, a direct application of gold is made to its surface, giving it an immediate radiant illumination. Then follows an intensive combination of Reconstituting Ingredients that nourish the skin and make it visibly restored. Finally, the sequence is completed through a constant release of such reconstituting ingredients related to the gold particles applied to the skin's surface. In this last phase, the skin remains luxuriously healthy, repaired, nourished, and youthful for a long period of time.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply La Prairie Pure Gold Radiance Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) morning and evening after cleansing and applying toner and eye creams or concentrates. Start by gliding between the eyebrows, up to the forehead, and continue towards the temples. Apply along the cheekbones towards the top of the nose, down to the jawline and chin. Finish by gliding with one hand along the contour of the lips. Repeat the complete sequence until absorbed.

description:
Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Lift & Firm Day Cream SPF15 50ml (1.69fl oz) has a luxurious creamy texture that effortlessly adheres to all skin types, acting on signs of aging. In this sense, this cream absorbs quickly and deeply into the skin of the face, filling it with nutrients that are lost over time. That said, the skin gains incredible hydration and nourishment as well as the complexion is firmer and lifted, toned, and tightened. In turn, the face is also more contoured and with wrinkles and fine lines filled, thus becoming rejuvenated and radiant.
This powerful and luxurious cream has an SPF15 filter that easily protects the skin from sun damage. In addition, early age signs are also prevented. Furthermore, this composition enriched with 5x more Ceramides reinforces the natural barrier of the epidermis so that it can withstand hydration and nourishment longer. Moreover, Tetrapeptides restore skin's firmness while reducing wrinkles and fine lines. Regarding the moisturizing action, the presence of Red Algae supports moisture retention and all-day hydration. Finally, Edelweiss Extract helps to lift sagging skin and enhance facial contours for a more sculpted and youthful look. That said, this luxurious daily cream not only takes care of the skin by protecting and hydrating it, but also restores, restructures, and rejuvenates it. In the end, the entire complexion becomes more even, radiant, and more energized looking.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, cleanse and tone your skin. Secondly, apply your favorite serum. Thirdly, apply Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Lift & Firm Day Cream SPF15 50ml (1.69fl oz) to your face and neck, working from the center of the face and outwards with a light massage.

description:
Noreva Iklen+ [Pure-C-Reverse] Day Care 40ml (1.35fl oz) has the ability to restore volume, firmness and radiance to the skin of the face. In this way, this day cream is perfect for all types of mature skin. This is because in addition to these abilities it also helps to attenuate and prevent signs of age such as wrinkles and fine lines. At the same time, the skin ends up looking more rejuvenated and with a radiant and sublime luminosity.
Regarding the composition of this cream, the main star is Pure Vitamin C. This, in turn, brightens the entire complexion of the face while preventing and protecting the skin from the common signs of aging. In addition, biometric Hyaluronic Acid provides enormous hydration and a boost of firmness. Furthermore, both Vitamin PP and Resorcinol reduce skin hyperpigmentation and limit the appearance of skin blemishes. Finally, the presence of Liporeversin produces a smoothing effect on the skin, strengthening its filling. That said, all these properties end up rejuvenating the skin of the face, leaving it more radiant, uniform and even hydrated.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Noreva Iklen+ [Pure-C-Reverse] Day Care 40ml (1.35fl oz) to clean, dry face every morning. You can apply after Noreva Iklen+ Booster Serum for a more intense and prolonged effect.

description:
Clarins Nutri-Lumière Revive Revitalizing Day Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) is a complete anti-aging cream that focuses especially on counterbalancing the yellowing of the complexion. As it happens, this cream proves to be highly efficient in neutralizing yellowish tones thanks to the presence of Khaki Extract on the composition. Even more, it also contains illuminating purple pearls and a purple treatment formula that provide an instant beautifying effect that acts optically against the yellow.
To top this, the Nutri-Lumière Revive Revitalizing Day Cream also works towards extra firmness and radiance. Its hydrating formula plumps undernourished mature skin, smoothing out wrinkles and offering an overall revitalized look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Clarins Nutri-Lumière Revive Revitalizing Day Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) as part of your morning routine as your selected moisturizer. Apply an appropriate amount to the dry and clean skin of your face and neck, moving from the inside to the outside. Then, apply gentle pressure to boost drainage.

description: Clinique Dramaticaly Diferent Hydrating Jelly is a lightweight gel moisturizer that delivers 24-hour hydration while protecting the skin from environmental aggressions. Formulated with an exclusive Clean Shield Technology™, this water-jelly locks moisture into the skin while filtering out pollution particles. The oil-free formula goes on smoothly without leaving a residue on the skin. It creates a smooth and glowy complexion that's also 87% more resilient against pollution.
how_to_use:
How to use
Twice a day, apply a small pump of Clinique Dramaticaly Diferent Hydrating Jelly  to the clean and dry skin of the face and neck. Massage gently in order to stimulate absorption.

description:
Clinique Even Better Clinical Dark Spot Corrector + Interrupter is a powerful serum that will tackle various marks of skin damage such as discoloration or acne scars. This brightening serum will not only help to visibly minimize the appearance of discoloration spots and blemish marks but also interrupt the look of future dark spots. The result is a more even skin tone. The formulation of this serum includes the patented CL302 Equalizer Technology in a more concentrated state.
This technology, a pair of two different complexes, is responsible for single-handedly targeting dark spots both by minimizing their appearance and preventing future ones. Among the ingredients that are part of this technology, we can find glucosamine, yeast extract, and salicylic acid. Glucosamine weakens the bonds that hold dead skin cells together thus encouraging their separation from the skin. All the while yeast extract breaks up the appearance of large clusters of pigments to make them less visible. Additionally, salicylic acid gently sloughs off the uppermost layers of the skin revealing fresh and more even-toned skin.
As for preventing future dark spots, this serum contains gyokuro and rice bran extracts that will soothe the appearance of the skin and minimize the appearance of future discoloration patches. Furthermore, a complex of olive squalene, barley extract, and wheat germ extract helps to nourish and replenish the skin for a comfortable feeling. Lastly, licorice extract, an anti-irritant, along with other antioxidants present in the formulation, helps to reduce the negative effects of stress on the skin.
Overall, this brightening serum will give the skin a whole new appearance by tackling multiple problems and their origins. Moreover, although powerful, this serum is still gentle enough to be suitable for all skin types.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clinique Even Better Clinical Dark Spot Corrector + Interrupter twice a day, morning and afternoon in well-cleansed skin. First, dispense one to two pumps onto your fingertips. Then spread the serum all over the face, avoiding the eye area. Follow with a moisturizer. It is of the utmost importance to apply sunscreen in the morning, after moisturizing.

description:
Martiderm Amatist Night Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) promises to rejuvenate and deeply nourish your skin during sleep, so you wake up to a younger-looking complexion each morning. Inspired by the soothing powers of the ametist stone, this cream was, in fact, specially developed as a global night-time antiaging treatment. Like so, the Amatist Night Cream not only regenerates the skin but also promotes a protective and moisturizing action.
All of these benefits are possible thanks to a composition that blends multiple active ingredients. On one side, the presence of Phyto-retinol helps to decrease the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. Simultaneously, Rosehip offers antioxidant and regenerating benefits, boosting the skin’s own collagen production, as well. Last but not least, the Amatist Night Cream also contains Omega 3, 6 and 9 that act as nourishing and rejuvenating agents.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Martiderm Amatist Night Cream 50ml (1.69fl oz) as part of your evening routine as your selected moisturizer. Apply an appropriate amount of the formula to the dry and clean skin of your face, neck and décolleté. Then, massage gently for maximum absorption. Complement its use with other products from the same range in order to obtain optimal results.

description: Apaisac Biorga Pure Purifying Cream is a non-sticky fluid option that suits combination to oily and sensitive skin, absorbing excess sebum. Hence, daily applications mattify blemished areas while also tightening pores and offering optimal hydration. Moreover, this produces optimal results remaining as effective as ever thanks to carefully selected ingredients. In fact, it contains Beta-Hydroxide ACSD in order to improve one's overall appearance. To the same extent, Betapur detoxifies congested facial sections, tackling hyperpigmentation. Non-comedogenic, the formula relies on Hyaluronic Acid to shield the skin against all kinds of external threats, creating a reliable yet discreet film on its surface. All in all, this is ideal to reduce a shiny look, granting 24-hour hydration nevertheless. Finally, thanks to anti-imperfection effects, the cream constitutes a nice make-up base, playing a pivotal part in your skincare routine!
how_to_use:
How to use
After cleansing and drying the skin, apply a suitable portion of Apaisac Biorga Pure Purifying Cream all over your face. Do so by performing circular as well as upward motions. Wait until the product is completely absorbed. Finally, feel free to pair this daily moisturizer with other options from the same range to ensure optimal and lasting results!

description: Missha Time Revolution Night Repair Ampoule Cream moisturizes mature skin deeply, improving its condition thanks to 51% Extreme Biome™. This exclusive core compound blends 10 distinct highly-concentrated fermented ingredients in order to deliver fast and effective results. In fact, it penetrates the epidermis effortlessly, causing this clinically tested option to reduce the appearance of fatigue signs after just 10 hours of use. Thus, this remains a safe bet from the very first application, repairing issues such as loss of elasticity, wrinkles, pigmentation spots, or uneven texture. As the list progresses, this creates a reliable/lasting push-up effect, soothing and increasing radiance. In short, it helps to sculpt less defined facial contours, adding resilience to all skin types. Finally, if you're looking for skin rejuvenation, this is a must-have!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a suitable amount of Missha Time Revolution Night Repair Ampoule Cream as the final step of your nighttime skincare routine. Then, massage the formula into your face/neck in circular motions until full absorption. Ideally, follow the skin's texture. Finally, use products from the same anti-aging range beforehand like the Time Revolution Night Repair Ampoule 5X for optimal results!

description:
Huxley Cream Glow Awakening 50ml helps to deeply hydrate the skin while giving it a more awakened, brightening and healthy appearance. Thus, this cream has a smooth texture that is quickly absorbed into the skin without leaving it sticky. On the other hand, your skin automatically feels more illuminated and with a super natural glow, in addition to being hydrated and repaired.
This is only possible thanks to a composition rich in botanical ingredients. In turn, the star of this cream is Prickly Pear Seed Oil. In addition to moisturizing the skin, it also repairs and strengthens its natural barrier. Furthermore, Niacinamide helps to lighten the skin while evening out skin tone and hyper-pigmentation. In this way, the skin instantly gains a brighter and more awake appearance. All in all, if you are looking for an effective cream in terms of moisturizing and lightening your skin, this one is ideal for that purpose. In addition, its soothing properties help to reduce any type of skin discomfort, leaving only a healthier, more even, and radiant appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply 1 to 2 pearl-sized amount of Huxley Cream Glow Awakening 50ml over your entire face in an upward lifting motion. Can be used in the morning and at night.

description: Noreva Norelift Chrono-Filler Day Cream 40ml (1.35fl oz) is a daily anti-wrinkle cream perfect for normal to dry skin. That said, this cream helps to firm the skin, thus boosting its production of collagen and elastin. Through these, the skin ends up with a more rejuvenated and fuller appearance and with fewer fine lines and visible wrinkles. This is possible thanks to the presence of the active ElastigenFGF, an ingredient that stimulates fibroblast growth factors in order to provide a greater production of collagen and elastin. Furthermore, the presence of Hyaluronic Acid helps to provide an enormous hydration boost to the skin so that it ends up feeling more hydrated, smoothed, and supple. Additionally, this ingredient fills the skin when it penetrates to smooth out fine lines and wrinkles. Finally, this cream rich in antioxidants helps to repair the skin's barrier so that it is strengthened and helps to retain moisture longer. Thus, not only the skin is more hydrated but also protected, smoothed, with less visible wrinkles and even firmer and brighter.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Noreva Norelift Chrono-Filler Day Cream 40ml (1.35fl oz) in the morning to your cleansed face.

description: Boí Thermal Silessence Day Cream is a complete morning moisturizer for sensitive skin. In light of the botanical blend, which includes tamarind, marvel of Peru and white iris, this cream has an antioxidant action. Moreover, it also deeply hydrates the skin and improves the elasticity of the skin. Given that is has a unique dispensing system, you only retrieve the amount you need. This ensures that the formula is not disrupted every time you retrieve the lid to use it.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Boí Thermal Silessence Day Cream every morning onto clean skin. To conclude the application, always ensure that you massage the skin for 30-60 seconds to boost the absorption.

description:
D'AVEIA Souple Intensive Repair Cream 40ml (1.35fl oz) is an intensive moisturizing cream suitable for dehydrated skin. On the other hand, this cream is also indicated for those who make aggressive treatments such as anti-acne or anti-wrinkle treatments. In turn, it is also great for skin attacked by cleaning agents and extreme weather conditions. This cream then helps to save this type of skin as it deeply hydrates, soothes and prevents any kind of irritation.
Regarding its formula, this cream contains substances that reinforce the cohesion of the epidermis cells. This ends up preventing the loss of water from the skin. In this way, your skin can stay hydrated for eight hours. Furthermore, this formula also features Biotech Hyaluronic Acid, an ingredient that has the ability to create an invisible and permeable film on skin surfaces. This ends up fixing water and moisture in the skin in order to increase its hydration over time. For an even more moisturizing action, the Gelled Polymeric System also promotes the progressive release of water on the skin. Finally, the presence of oats and antioxidants help soothe dehydrated irritated skin. All in all, if your skin is dehydrated and irritated, this cream helps to soothe, care for and hydrate it as much as possible so that it regains its vitality.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply D'AVEIA Souple Intensive Repair Cream 40ml (1.35fl oz) to the skin, massaging it gently, morning and night and whenever necessary.

description:
DC Moisturizing Cream for Normal/Dry Skin 50ml (1.69fl oz) provides luxurious daily care for normal, dehydrated and parched skin. Thus, this product helps to intensely hydrate the skin on the face so that it has a healthier, revitalized and illuminated appearance. In turn, this cream is quickly absorbed into the skin without leaving it sticky or oily.
Regarding its composition, this cream is built by a Synergistic Antioxidant Complex with the ability to preserve the good condition of skin cells, thus preventing their aging. At the same time, the Moisturizing/Exfoliating Active Ingredients Complex, rich in Omega 6 and Ceramides, restructure the skin's surface layer and its physiological balance. Finally, this luxurious cream also has UVA and UVB sunscreens that guarantee daily sun protection. Specifically, SPF15 prevents aging induced by solar radiation. All in all, this daily face cream provides a strong moisturizing action while giving precise help with regard to skin aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply DC Moisturizing Cream for Normal/Dry Skin 50ml (1.69fl oz) to previously cleansed skin, gently massaging until completely absorbed. Apply in the morning and at night.

description:
The Saem Iceland Aqua Gel Cream 60ml (2.03fl oz) is an ultra-moisturizing formula specially developed to nourish and also  revitalize oily to combination skin. In fact, with a gel-like texture, this refreshing cream instantly plumps your complexion through a nourishing and reenergizing action. As a result, you will enjoy optimal levels of hydration and overall healthier skin after each application.
These benefits are possible thanks to an advanced composition that uses the power of natural ingredients from Iceland. On one side, a blend of Iceland Plants helps to soothe the skin and prevent moisture loss. At the same time, the star of the composition, Iceland Glacier Water, immediately replaces the lost moisture on the skin. This potent ingredient has a composition that resembles the water present on the human body and comes from a preserved and pollution-free environment. Furthermore, its extraction is completely eco-friendly and does not cause any damage to its original ecological system.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous amount of the The Saem Iceland Aqua Gel Cream 60ml (2.03fl oz) as part of your morning and /or evening routine to the skin of your face. Then, massage gently for maximum absorption. Complement its use with other products from the same range for optimal results.

description: COSRX Green Tea Aqua Soothing Gel Cream is a cooling option that adds great moisture to hyperreactive or typically inflamed skin. Thanks to a non-oily texture, this refreshes heated as well as vulnerable areas instantly, increasing personal comfort. In fact, COSRX's exclusive Hydrium Curation teams up with Panthenol (Vitamin B5) to regenerate and shielding from all kinds of external threats. With plenty of anti-inflammatory properties, this option suits all skin types, calming /balancing them. To the same extent, Aloe Ferox Leaf Extract unites with Green Tea Leaf Extract in order to minimize blemishes, in turn clearing your face. Furthermore, this also targets sunburns, offering considerable relief. As weightless as possible, a unique jelly consistency makes this cream perfect for hot, humid climates. All in all, this not only absorbs quickly but also provides a fresh finish that is particularly appealing for those with oily skin!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous amount of COSRX Green Tea Aqua Soothing Gel Cream all over your face, as evenly as possible. However, make sure to stay away from the eye/mouth sections and cleanse as well as tone the skin with the appropriate products beforehand. Tap the cream into the skin in order to facilitate absorption. Finally, feel free to explore the rest of COSRX's soothing and moisturizing options to see if these also appeal to you.

description: COSRX Lightweight Soothing Moisturizer is a daily hydrating gel cream that invigorates acne-prone skin, calming irritation as well as redness. Weightless, this option allows for non-greasy, effortless application as it is also quickly absorbed by congested complexions. Enriched with the brand's exclusive Centella AC-Rx Complex, it not only targets acne but also heals/alleviates more vulnerable or sensitive skin tissues. In fact, its cooling finish increases personal comfort considerably for a blemished-free appearance. Meanwhile, all the carefully selected ingredients have EWG green grade and this inclusive option soothes heated skin instantly. Mild yet highly effective, this moisturizer does not have any fragrances, oil, silicone, or gluten, appealing to particularly sensitive skin types. Finally, among other key components, it includes Propolis Extract as well as Aloe Vera Leaf Water for a truly relaxing treatment.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a generous portion of COSRX Lightweight Soothing Moisturizer all over your face, after cleansing and toning it with the appropriate products. However, when spreading the formula as delicately as possible, make sure to stay away from the eye area. For optimal results, tap the skin with your fingertips to enable easier absorption. Ideally, keep the tube away from direct sunlight so that the gel cream does not turn brown.  Finally, feel free to explore the rest of COSRX's hydrating/soothing options to see if these also appeal to you.
